1b1('dul ba): 'dul ba gno//bam po lnga pa//thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na//dge slong
1b2('dul ba): dag sngon byung ba bA ra na se'i grong khyer du/rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du
1b3('dul ba): 'jug ste/'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyas par bya ste/de'i tshe smad 'tshong ma bzong mi
1b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba dang /skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa log ces bya ba zhig gnaso//des de
2a1('dul ba): //dga' dgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang /rgyun rnams bskur ba dang /des gos dang rgyun rnams bsos
2a2('dul ba): nas song ba las/skyes pa go zhen zhig kyang dong che lnga brgya thogs te 'ongs nas/bzang mo dga' dgur spyod kyi tshur
2a3('dul ba): shog ces smraso//des bsams pa/gal te song na ni dong tshe lnga brgya yang mi thob la/khyim du 'ongs pa bo ro ti gzhan du
2a4('dul ba): 'gro ba 'di ni gsol ka mi yang bar yang 'gyur ro//snyam nas/des bu mo mngag gau zhug maM la smras pa/song la
2a5('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtsa lag la jo bo re shig bdag gis lta gon ma 'gyis kyis slad kyis mchi'o zhes zer ro//zhes smros shig/de
2b1('dul ba): de'i gan du song nas smras so//skyes pa de yang bya ba mang po zhig pus dga' dgur spyad nas/srod nyid la phyir song ngo //des bsams
2b2('dul ba): pa/thun mong du yod pas bdag gis de'i sems kyang srung nus so//snyam nas/dris yang bu mo de la smos pa/song la/pad+ma'i
2b3('dul ba): rtsa lag la/jo mo lta gon bgyis lags na/bskyod mos tshal gang du mchi shig ces mchi'o//zhes smros shig/de'i drung
2b4('dul ba): du song nas smras pa dang /des smras pa/khyod kyi jo mo skad cig gis ni lte gon+da byas/skad cig gis ni sta gon ma byas/bu mo
2b5('dul ba): dri yang de dang rigs mi 'phrod pas/des smras pa/rje'i skyes des lta gron bgyis te'on kyang khyod kyi gos dang /rgyun rnams
2b6('dul ba): kyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod do//de 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral/gnod sems
3a1('dul ba): kyis kun nus kris pan-i skyes par gyur te/de mi zod pa skyes nas smras pa/ba pa dang mo'i rgyu du song la/
3a2('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtsa lag nA re/bskyed mos tshol ge ge mo zhog tu shog shig ces zer ro zhes smros shig/des song nas bzang mo lI smras pa dang /
3a3('dul ba): baspya nas la de seng ba ngas na can du'i na la gagis skyes ba gas dang rgyun gyis dranan
3a4('dul ba): lhan cig dga' 'gur yongs su spyad pa ji ga rigs sam des smras pa/rje'i sras 'di ni bdag gis nongs lags to//'on kyang
3a5('dul ba): bud med ni rtag tu skyon can lags kyis/bzod par mdzod cig/de nas des mi bzod pa skyes nas/ral dri shungs nas phyung ste
3a6('dul ba): srog dang bral lo//de nas bu mo des jo mo bsad do jo mo bsad do zhes ku co'i sgra chen po gton po de/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos thos nas
3b1('dul ba): brgyugs so//de tsam na bskyed mos tshal de na/rang sangs rgyas legs smon zhes bya ba bsam gtan byed do//de nas skyes pa g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag des skrag pas/ral
3b2('dul ba): gri khrag can rang sangs rgyas logs smon gyi drung du bor nas/skye bo'i tshogs chen po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so//skye bo'i tshogs chen pos ral gri khrag ce na mthong nas/
3b3('dul ba): rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo'i srog dang bral lo zhes de nas rang sangs rgyas de kun nas bskor nas/mi bzod pa bskyed de smras pa/kye rab tu byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan
3b4('dul ba): bsrel nas/'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/des smras pa/ci zhig byas te/de rnams kyis smras pa/khyod kyis bzang mo lhan cig dga' 'gur spyad nas/
3b5('dul ba): de srog dang phral lo//des smras pa/rna bas mi bzod do//nga ni las 'dri mi byed do//des rnams mi bzod pa'i tshig smras kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po des lag pa
3b6('dul ba): phyi na ka log tu dam du bcings nis rgyal po la phul te/lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de srog dang bral lags so//
3b7('dul ba): rgyal po dag mi rtog pa yin pas/des smras pa gal te de lta na/rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis/deng la sod cig/de nas de'i mgul nas me tog ka ra bi
4a1('dul ba): /ra'i phreng ba btags nas/gshed mgos sngon do gyon pa/mtshon thogs pa/rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/lam po che dang /
4a2('dul ba): tshong dus dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo rnams su bsgrags te/grong khyer nas bskyed mos tshal log suM khrid do//de nas skyes pa g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gi
4a3('dul ba): blo skyes pas/rab tu byung ba dka' thub can/skyon med pa/nyes pa mi byed pa 'di la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pos/ 'di gsad pa la thug ni bdag gi yal bar dod
4a4('dul ba): ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no//snyam du bsams nas/slar log ste/rgyal po'i drung du song nas/rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/lha rab tu byung ba
4a5('dul ba): 'dis ni las 'di ma bgyis te/sdig po'i las 'di ni bdag gis gyis kyis/rab tu byung ba 'di btang bar gsol//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe
4a6('dul ba): de'i dus kyi skyes pa g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gang yin pa de nga nyid yin te/ngas rang sangs rgyas la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam
4a7('dul ba): par smin pas lo mang po dang zhes byi ba nas/sems can dmyal ba rnamasu gtses so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//las kyi lhag ma de kho nas/da ltar nga
4b1('dul ba): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang bram ze'i bu mo rtsa mis yang dag pa ma yin pas bskur pa btab ste/'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci
4b2('dul ba): zhig mdzad na/drin las de'i rnam par smin pas/yul dgra mthar dge slong gnyis kyis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba'i dge slong rnams dang thabs gcig nas rul gsol la/tshe dang ldan pa
4b3('dul ba): shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ni lha'i zhal zas la longs spyad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi tshe rabs
4b4('dul ba): gzhan rnams las rnams byas shing bsags zhes bya ba nas/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad
4b5('dul ba): khri thub pa na/'jig rten du ston pa rnam par gzigaso zhes bya ba zhig byung nas zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhon du'o//des 'khor
4b6('dul ba): drug khri dang ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/rgyal po'i pho brang ba shes ldan du byon to//bshes ldan do'i bram ze zhig/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la/bram ze'i rnams kyis gsang
4b7('dul ba): tshig klog tu 'jug go/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'khor lnga brgya dge mthong nas/des bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag dge
5a1('dul ba): skyong mgro rag 'di dag lha'i zhal zas la longs spyod pa'i 'od ma yin gyi//nas rul pa za ba'i 'os yin no//de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ba byas te/mkhan
5a2('dul ba): bode med de/dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni lce'i zhal zas la longs spyod pa'i 'os ma lags kyi nas rul pa tshal ba'i 'os lags so//de nas yang bram ze'i khye'u dkar po can
5a3('dul ba): gnyis shig gis smras pa/mkhan pos ni ma sregs pa zhig gsungs te/bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni lha'i zhal zas la longs spyod pa'i 'os lags so//dge slong dag ji snyam
5a4('dul ba): du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze lnga brgya can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la
5a5('dul ba): ngag gi lus rtsug mos byung ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/nga lo mang po dang lo brgya phrag mang po dang /lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang por nas rul
5a6('dul ba): pa zos so//las kyi lhag ma de kho nas de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang mthar dge slong gnyis kyis lnga brgyar ma tshangs pa'i dge slong rnams dang thabs cig nas rul pa la
5a7('dul ba): longs spyad do//bram ze'i khye'u gnyis po gang yin pa de na dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /mau'i 'gal gyi bu 'di dag nyid yin no//btsum pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las
5b1('dul ba): ci zhig mdzad na/phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas lo drug tu dga' ba spyad par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong drag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
5b2('dul ba): kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsag pa dag no zhes bya ba nas/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//dge slong dag sngon byung
5b3('dul ba): bya/ljongs kyi grong rdalnga baM'i b+hi Ding gi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang /mi mang pos rab tu gang ba zhig yod de/dge slong dag
5b4('dul ba): lhod kyi grong rdal be'i b+hi Ding ga na/rdza mkhan dga' skyong zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/chos dang drog 'dun la mngon par dad pa/sangs rgyas la skyabasu song ba/
5b5('dul ba): chos dang /dge 'dun la skyabasu song ba/sangs rgyas la gcig tu byed pa/chos dang /dge 'dun la gcig tu byed pa/sangs rgyas la yid gnyis dang /the tsom med pa/
5b6('dul ba): chos dang /dge 'dun la yod gnyis dang /the tsom med pa/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang /lam la yid gnyis dang /the tsom med pa bden pa mtho/
5b7('dul ba): ba 'bras bu thob pa/lo ma dang /gtun spangs pa zhig byung ste/de gang ni chus rkos pa 'am/byi blun ma gtogs pa rang gi lag gis sa la mi rko zhing rkor mi 'jug go/de nas
6a1('dul ba): rang gis sa blangs nas/srog chags med pa'i chus sbrus twa/snod rnams byas nas/mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/'di skad ces 'phags pa 'am/bzhin
6a2('dul ba): bzangs dag 'dir til lam/'bras sam/srin mun ga tshal tsho dag mtha' gcig tu zhog la/khyed cag las gang zhig snod gang dgos pa de des long la/deng shig ces
6a3('dul ba): smras nas/de nas pha ma long ba gnyis gso zhing dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsod snyoms 'bul lo//bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i grogs po dang /snying du
6a4('dul ba): sdug pa dang /ne'u zla yang yin no//dge slong dag ljongs kyi grong rdal ba'i b+hi Ding ga na bram ze shing sbru la chen po n+ya gro d+ha zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che zhig byung ste/
6a5('dul ba): bi'i b+hi Ding gis rgyas pa/'du thang dang bcas/rtswa shing dang /'bab chur bcas pa/rgyal po kri kis bram ze'i sbyin par byin pa la yongasu spyod do//bram ze shing sA la chen
6a6('dul ba): chen pa lta bu n+ya go d+ha'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba/pha dang ma'i rigs dang ldan po/mo phyogs nas dag pa/mos po'i phyogs dang /phyi mo'i phyogs zung bdun
6a7('dul ba): durgyud kyis bor bzung ste/rigs la gtam gyis ma phog pa/klog tu 'jug pa/gsang tshig 'dzin pa rig byed gsum po sgra nges par sbyor ba dang /shes gsal rdo
6b1('dul ba): bcas pa'i yi ge rab tu 'byed pa dang bcaswa pa dang /lnga pa de lta bu byung ba can rnams kyi rol tu phyin cing smon par byed pa/gzugs bzang ba/spya na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig smod de/
6b2('dul ba): bram ze shing sA la chen po lte bu n+ya gro d+hA'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsa ma la/bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug/rdzu mkhan dga' skyong gi grogs po dang /snying bsdug
6b3('dul ba): bye dang /ne'u zla yang yin no//de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pod srung gang na ba song ste phyin pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
6b4('dul ba): 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis
6b5('dul ba): rdza mkhan dga' skyong la/chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad//yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad
6b6('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug/yang dag par gzengs bstod
6b7('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //de nas rje mkhan dga' skyong /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsung ba la mngon par dag
7a1('dul ba): ste/rjes su yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/stan las langs te song ngo //de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u bla mas rta
7a2('dul ba): rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shing rta thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te/gser gyi ril ba dang /dbyug pa thogs nas/bram ze'i khye'u gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing
7a3('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u gya tshogs kyis mdun du mdar nas/be'i b+hi Ding gi phyi rol tu bram ze rnams klog tu 'jug par 'dod nas/be'i b+hi Ding gi gnas nas byung ba dang /bram ze'i khye'u bla mas
7a4('dul ba): rdza mkhan dga' skyong thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so//des pa dga' skyong da gzod ga las 'ongs/nges pa bla ma kho bo ni 'o ni nas yang dag par
7a5('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la brnyan bkur byed du 'gros/des pa bla ma tshur shog/bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rnyen bkur byed du 'dong ngo //
7a6('dul ba): nges pa dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong shig/dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub ga la yod/byang chub ni mtshig tu dka' ba yin
7a7('dul ba): no//des po bla ma dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub ga la yod/byang chubo ni mchog tu dka' ba yin no zhes de skad ma smra shig/'on kyang bcomo ldan 'das de nyid sangs rgyas
7b1('dul ba): yin te/'dis chos thams cad sangs rgyas so//des pa bla ma chur/bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong /bram ze'i khye'u bla mas
7b2('dul ba): lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so//nges pa dga' skyong thong shig/sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba nas/byang chub mchog tu dka'o zhes bya
7b3('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du bram ze'i khye'u bla mA la 'di skad ces smras so//nges pa bla ma khyod de skad ma smra bar zhes bya ba
7b4('dul ba): nas/bsnyen bkur byed du zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i shing rta la 'jigs nas/bram ze'i khye'u bla na'i tse two nas bzung ste 'di skad
7b5('dul ba): ces smras so//des bu bla ma tshur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong /de nas bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di snyam du sems twe/e ma'o sangs
7b6('dul ba): rgyas ni mchog ma ma yin pa ma yin zhing /chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin paso//de ltar rdza mkhan dga' skyong yun ring po nas gtum po ma yin/gzu lum
7b7('dul ba): ma yin/brlang po ma yin/bsri ba med pa ma yin pa/des bdag gi skra rnams nas bzung bar gyur to snyam du rig nas/rje mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so//nges pa
8a1('dul ba): dga' skyod de tsam bya ba la thug gam/des pa bla ma de tsam bya ba la thub ches so//nges pa dga' spyod de lta na thong shig dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
8a2('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong ngo //de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong dang /bram ze'i khye'u bla ma shing rta gcig gi nang du bzhugs nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
8a3('dul ba): rgyorgyas 'od srung gang na ba der dong ste/de gnyis kyi ji tsamA bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du gzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs rkang pa kho nas kun dpa' ra ba'i nang du zhugs te/
8a4('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der phyin pa dang /de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo
8a5('dul ba): bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba de yang dag par mgu bar
8a6('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gtu ma rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis thal mo sbyar ba btud de/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
8a7('dul ba): 'od srung la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par mdod cing /chos dang /dge 'dun la mngon par me dang lags na
8b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing /chos dang /dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos legs par bshad du gsol//
8b2('dul ba): de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par
8b3('dul ba): mdzad/yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par stan/yang dag
8b4('dul ba): par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //de nas bram ze'i khye'u bla mas/rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad
8b5('dul ba): ces smras so//nges pa dga' skyong khyod chos 'dul ba 'di lta bu thos nas/ci'i phyir dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu mi 'byung /des pa bla mo kho bo 'di
8b6('dul ba): ltar pha ma long ba gnyis gso ba dang //yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus dus su bsod snyo mo 'bul ba/khyod kyis mi shes sam/nges pa bla ma khyod rab tu
8b7('dul ba): phyung shig/kho bo ni re shig rab tu mi 'byung ngo //de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bram
9a1('dul ba): ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi/dngos po 'thob pa lta na/bcom ldan
9a2('dul ba): 'das kyis thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste rab tu 'byung ba dang /brnyan par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol//bram ze'i khye'u bla mas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
9a3('dul ba): la rab tu 'byung ba dang /brnyan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma rab tu phyung
9a4('dul ba): zhing /brnyan par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ba'i b+hi Ding gir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/bA ra na saM gang na ba der rgyu zhing gishegs te/rim gyis rgyu zhing
9a5('dul ba): gshegs pa dang /bA ra na ser byon to//rgyal po kri kis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yul ka shi ka nas ldong rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /bA ra na
9a6('dul ba): ser gshegs te/bA ra na se'i drang srong smra ba ro dgas kyi nags na bzhugaso zhes thos so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga na
9a7('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu
9b1('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/rgyal po kri ki la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
9b2('dul ba): par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin
9b3('dul ba): tu bcug/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang me gsung //de nas rgyal po kri kaM stan las langs te/blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
9b4('dul ba): la gtsugs te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bod srung gang na ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la 'di skad ces
9b5('dul ba): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la sang bdag gis gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na glanang bar mdzad du gsol//yang dag par rdzor
9b6('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kri kI la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal po kri kas yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung cang mi gsung byas gnang
9b7('dul ba): bar rig nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs te song ngo //de nas rgyal po kri ki sa de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang
10a1('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba rnams sta gon byas nas/nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams/nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/yang
10a2('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus tshod gsol pa/btsun pa gdugs chod bshams legs shing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das dri de'i dus la badra byar
10a3('dul ba): dgongasu gsol/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dron bza' sham thabs gnabs/lhung bzed dang /chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs
10a4('dul ba): kyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bdar te/rgyal po kli ki'i bkang sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gung la gdan
10a5('dul ba): bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//de nas rgyal po kri kIs sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs zin par rig nas/btsong zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba
10a6('dul ba): drang bca' ba rnams kyis rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byed de/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba rnams kyis rang gi lag nas bstabs shing
10a7('dul ba): tshims par byas te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig
10b1('dul ba): blangs te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag gis dgung zla gsum/
10b2('dul ba): dun bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims tsha dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dbul zhing bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slang du gtsug lag khir
10b3('dul ba): brgya tsam brtsig cing /khri dang //dri'u dang /stan nang tshangs can dang /sngos nang tshangs can dang /gor bu lnga brgya tsam 'bul zhing /'bras srubasu smin pa da lta bu'i dis bcom
10b4('dul ba): ldan 'das dge sbyong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na/gnang bar mdzad du gsol/rgyal po chen po ji tsam sems mngon par dad par byas pa de tsam gyis byas
10b5('dul ba): zin gyis chog go//lan gnyis gsum du yang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rgyal po kri kis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong ga
10b6('dul ba): 'dun dang thabs gcig la zhes bya ba nas/bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhin du'o//lan gnyis ldan gsum du yang yang dag par rdzogs
10b7('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kri ki la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po ji tsam sems mngon par dad par byas pa de tsam gyis byas zin gyi cho ga/de nas yang
11a1('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rgyal po kri kis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa/dper na
11a2('dul ba): ltar gyi bdag 'dra ba gzhan 'ga' lha mchis lags sam/rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul na/de'i b+hi Di zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/don rdza mkhan dga' skyong zhes
11a3('dul ba): bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa zhes bya ba nas/gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//des pha ma longs pa gnyis gso zhing /dus dus su nga la yang bsod
11a4('dul ba): snyoms kyis stobs par byed do//rgyal po chen po dus gcig cig na/nga be'i b+hi Ding gi'i ljongs kyi grong rdal na nye bar brten cing bzhugs nas/snga dro sham thabs brnabs
11a5('dul ba): te/lhung bzed dang choso gos bsnams nas/be'i b+hi Ding gi ljongs kyi grong rdal du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ngas pa'i b+hi Ding gir bsod snyoms spyad cing /rdza mkhan
11a6('dul ba): dga' skyong gi khyim gang na ba der gshegs pa dang /de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga' skyong dgos pa zhig la phyi logs su song nas ngas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi sgo 'phar la rim gyis dal
11a7('dul ba): bu dal bus brdungs pa las/rtswa mkhan dga' skyong gi pha dang mes sgo 'phar lo brdungs pa'i sgra thos so//thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smras//'phags pa 'di su zhig/
11b1('dul ba): bzhin bzangs 'di su zhig/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi sgo 'phar la rdung /de gnyis la ngas 'di skad ces smras te/nga ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yin te/
11b2('dul ba): bsod snyoms bzhed do//de gnyis 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa nang du spyon cig/bzhin bzangs nang du spyon cig khyod la rim gro bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis kyis//
11b3('dul ba): phrul na zan dron dang /rje'u na sran tshod mchis kyis nyid kyis bzhes te longs spyad du gsol/rgyal po chen po ngas kyang byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus byin gyis de rlabs nas/phru ba
11b4('dul ba): na zan dron dang /rje'u na sran tshod yod pa nga nyid kyis blangs nas longs spyad do//de nas phyi zhig na rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'ongs nas/phru ba na zan dron dang /rje'u na sran chod yod pa
11b5('dul ba): zos par mthong nas/pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//yab yu ma phru ba na zan dron dang /rje'u'i sran cho do su zhig gis 'tshal lags/de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces
11b6('dul ba): smras so//dga' skyong khyod 'di nas phyir byung ba na/bdag cag gi sgo 'phar rdungs pa'i sgra zhig thos so//thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa 'di su zhig/
11b7('dul ba): bzhin bzangs 'di su zhog/sgo 'phar la rdung /des 'di skad ces gsungs so//nga ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yin te/bsod snyoms bzhed do//de la
12a1('dul ba): bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//'phags pa nang du spyon cig/bzhin bzangs nang du skyon cig/khyod la rim gro bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis kyis/
12a2('dul ba): phru ba na zan dron dang /rje'u na sran tshod mchis kyis nyid kyis bzhes la longs spyod du gsol//des de dag longs spyad par gyur to//de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'di snyam du sems
12a3('dul ba): tiyang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi khyim du shin tu bag phab cing 'dris par gyur pa ni//bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyamo nas/dga' ba
12a4('dul ba): dang /rab tu dga' bas skyil mo krung bcas te/zhag bdun 'das par byas so//zla ba phyed kyi bar du yang de'i lhan cig ldan pa'i dga' ba las kyis mi 'dor zhing /de rtag tu
12a5('dul ba): lus la bar chad med par 'dug go//'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus zhag bdun gyi bar du pha dang ma gnyis phru ba'i zan dron dang /
12a6('dul ba): rje'u gyi sran chod kyang de bzhin du 'dug go//rgyal po chen po dus gcig cig na/nga be'i b+hi DIng gi ljongs kyi grong rdal du nye bar brten te/dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa
12a7('dul ba): dang /nga'i gtsug lag khang du char 'bebs pa'i lhas thog mar char phab par gyur to//de'i tshe rdza kha na dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa rtswa sa ro pas g.yogs so//nga'i
12b1('dul ba): zham 'bring byed pa dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed cag deng la/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs mas nga'i gtsug lag khang gu yogs
12b2('dul ba): shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis nga las mnyan nas/rdza mkhan dga'o skyong gi la so byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma 'chu bar byed pa na/de'i tshe rdzam par
12b3('dul ba): dga' skyong dgos pa 'ga' zhig la phyi rol du song ngo //rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi pha dang ma gnyis kyis las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma 'chu ba'i sgra thos//thos nas kyang 'di skad ces
12b4('dul ba): smraso//'phags pa 'di su zhig/bzhin bzangs 'di su zhig/las byed pa'i g.yogs ma 'chu/de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smraso//kho bo cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zham 'bring ba'i dge slong dag yin te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang du char 'bebs pa'i lhas thog mar cher phab pas
12b6('dul ba): kho bo cag gis 'di ba shus te de g.yog go//de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smraso//khyed la rim gro bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis kyis/'jugs pa dag snoms shig/bzhin
12b7('dul ba): bzangs dag snoms shig/de nas dge slong de rnams kyis las byed pa'i khang pa bshus nas/nga'i gtsug lag khang g.yog so//de nas phyi zhig na rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'ongs nas//
13a1('dul ba): rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma ba shus pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang ba dang mA la 'di skad ces smraso//yab yum las byed pa
13a2('dul ba): khang pa 'di su zhig gis ba shus/de gnyis kyi so 'di skad ces smras so//'di nas khyod phyi log su song ba na/bdag cag gis las byed pa'i g.yogs ma 'chu'i sgra thos so//
13a3('dul ba): thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa 'di su zhig/bzhin bzangs 'di su zhog las byed pa'i khang pa 'chu/de rnams kyi 'di skad ces smras so//kho bo cag ni
13a4('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zham 'bring ba dge slong dag yin te/yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang du char 'bebs pa'i lhas
13a5('dul ba): thog mar char phab pas/kho bo cag gis 'dri ba shus la de g.yog go//de rnams la bdag cag gis 'di skad ces smras so//khyed cag la rim gro bgyid pa ni slad rol
13a6('dul ba): du mchis kyis/'phags pa dag snyoms shig/bzhin bzangs dgra snoms shig/de rnams kyis las byed pa'i khang pade bshus so//de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong
13a7('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi khyim du shin tu bag phab cing 'dris par gyur pa na/bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnye rdo
13b1('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/zhag bdun du zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi phra ma'i
13b2('dul ba): dbyar gyi gnas der/las byed pa'i khang par char ba thogs pa cig kyang ma bab bo//rgyal po chen po khyad ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zla ba gsum du ni bza' chos
13b3('dul ba): gos dang /bsod snyom dang /gzims cha dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul na/ma gnang ngo zhes khyod kyi sems gzhan du 'gyur gyis/dga' skyang ni las
13b4('dul ba): byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma ba shus kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur to//btsun pa rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis thob pa legs par thob pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
13b5('dul ba): sdusdom par shin tu brag phab cing 'dris par gyur lagaso//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kri ki'i sbyin pa de la rje su yi rang ba 'dis rje su yi rang bar
13b6('dul ba): mdzad de/sbyin sregs mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog/sdeb sbyor mchog ni nyi ma'i lha//mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste//rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog/zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso//
13b7('dul ba): nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso//steng dang 'og dang thang kar yang //'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na//smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas//de nas yang
14a1('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs gis rgyal rba kra ka la chos dang ldan pa'i btum gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang
14a2('dul ba): dag par gzed ba stod/yang dag pa rab tu dga' bar mdzod nas/gdan las bzhengs te gsheg so//de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas ring po ma lon par rgyal
14a3('dul ba): bopokli kis mi zhig la smras pa/kwa'i nang rje khyod song la sbubasu smin pa'i 'bras kyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam khong la/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gdu na pa der song ste byin pa dang
14a4('dul ba): 'di skad ces nges pa dga' skyong /rgyal po kr-i kis khyod la sbubs su smin pa'i 'bras kyis bkang ba'i shing rta lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag bskur gyis/'dis khyod kyi pha ma long
14a5('dul ba): bganyis gso ba dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus dus su bsod snyoms 'bul ba dang /bdag nyid kyang legs par bde bas tshim par byos shig+sa
14a6('dul ba): wAg+hA' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po kr-i kI las mnyan nas/sbubs su smin pa'i 'bras kyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam nAkang ste/mkhan dga' sbyong gang no ba der so
14a7('dul ba): nas phyin pa dang /rdza mkhan dga'o skyeng la 'di skad ces smras so//des pa dga' skyong rgyal po kri kis las la sbub su smin pa'i 'bras kyis bkang ba'i shing rta lnga brgya tsam
14b1('dul ba): ba 'di dag bskur gyis/'dis khyod kyi phra ma long ba gnyis gso ba dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsod snyoms dbul ba dang /bdag nyid kyang logs par bde/
14b2('dul ba): bas tshim par byos shig ces gsung ngo //kye nang rje rgyal po kri ki ni dgos pa mang zhing bya ba mang ba yin la/bdag ni dgos pa nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba yi no zhes smras nas ma blangs
14b3('dul ba): so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u bla ma gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ngas gang zag la skur gyi/byang chub la ma yin pa gang yin pa
14b4('dul ba): de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas byang chub kyi snying byor dka' ba lo drug spyad do//gal te ngas byang chub la skur bar gyur na/ngas slar yang bskal po grangs med pa gsum du bya
14b5('dul ba): chub kyi ched du bdag nyid shin tu dub par 'gyuraro//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/phrin lus de'i rnam par smin pas mngon par rdzogs par
14b6('dul ba): byang chub na yang bcom ldan 'das la 'khru ba'i spun gyis thebs lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi rgya
14b7('dul ba): rirabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ri 'or
15a1('dul ba): zhig na sman pa zhig yod pa las/de na khyim bdag gcig gi bu nad kyis thebs nas des sman pa de bkug ste dris nas/des de la sman byin pas sos par
15a2('dul ba): gyur na/khyim bdag des de la rngon pa ma byin no//khyim bdag gi bu de lan gsum gyi bar du nad kyis thebs te/sman pa des lan gsum gyi bar du sos par byas kyang /des de
15a3('dul ba): le rngan pa ma byi nas/de nas sman pa de kun nas dkris pa drag pos ma bzod par gyur nas bsams pa/khyim bdag gi bu 'di bdag gis lan gsum gyi bar du dpyad byas//'dis
15a4('dul ba): cung zad kyang lan du phan ma btags kyis/de ni brgya la nad kyis thebs par gyur tang /de la sman ma yin pa gang zhig gis/de'i nang grol rnams dum bu dum bur 'dzag par
15a5('dul ba): 'gyur ba de lta bu sbyin no snyam pa las/ji tsam na khyim bdag de'i bu ma skyes te/slar na bar gyur pa las sman pa des mi bzod pa skyes te/de la sman ma yin pa byin nas/des
15a6('dul ba): nang grol rnams dum bu dum bur zag so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi smin pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te//ngas ngan sems kyis khyim bdag gi
15a7('dul ba): bu la sman ma yin pa byin nas/des nang grol rnams dum bu dum bur zags pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo mang po zhes bya ba nas/sems can dmyal ba
15b1('dul ba): nams s+yA btses so zhes byu ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//las de'i lcug mde kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs pa byang btsun yang+ga/'bru ba'i spyan gyis byeb so//btsun pa bcom ldan//
15b2('dul ba): sa kyikyi phrin las cinago mdzad na/drin la skye de rnam par spyod ngas/rnaMms su me na/mi na kyi bu na rab N+DI drigs ngas thams par gyur lan
15b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin ga shegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshwa bas gzhan rnams su 'di dag byas shing bstsags pa zhes byu nas/'dus zungs
15b4('dul ba): 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba chubo gnyen ldan gyi 'gram na/1 rje brgya rten cing gnas /de rnams kyis te shin tu che ba ga
15b5('dul ba): shig ra na ston gyi nang du gas te/la basbyin pa dang /dri dag padi ma du sa~M m+mem+med+d+hi/ gnyis dusod na sh+'u la bu par mi 'gyu shing /rnam par gyuraro sna nas
15b6('dul ba): de rnams kyis de gnyis bur ba liM b+h+yat+tha gas nas bzhug go/gang gi rmyi lan 'gro'i zhig gi nyo 'ongs pa de'i tshe brjod cing brgyad rjed sbyin par byed do//de gnyis kyi 'tshul gri
15b7('dul ba): yini drug sngal gyi tshe bas rang gi ris 'dun ci'i skad 'byin pas 'brogro sgra 'dzin par byed do//den nyi 'i khyo dru ci ga ci de ge nyis rkye ga gi cing ben 'di dang yang du sgra na
16a1('dul ba): la dga' bar gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nye ba'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ngas nywa gsod par byed pa la dga' bstod pa
16a2('dul ba): gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga la mang po zhes bya ba nas/glad pan par gyur to zhes bya bor bar gong ma bzhin du'o//lus kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon
16a3('dul ba): par rdzogs par byang chub na yang shAkya rnams bsad pa na/glad nad rab tu drag pos thebs par gyur to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/phrin
16a4('dul ba): las de'i rnam par smin pas/mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku rgyab bser ma'i snyun gyis thebs par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
16a5('dul ba): spel pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su le sa 'di dag byas shing bsags pas zhes bya ba nas/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid
16a6('dul ba): ces bya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba gyad gcig gis yul ljongs kyi gyad thams cad brdabs nas/rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin pa dang rgyal po'i pho
16a7('dul ba): brang don rgyal po'i gyad stobs dang /pha rol gnon pa thub rlog pa zhig yod de/de de dang lhan cig rgyal mtshan gyi phyir stobs 'gyod pa la zhugaso//gyad de dag gi kun tu
16b1('dul ba): spyod pa ni/lag pa nas bzung ba nus gyad kyis gyad shes pa yin te/de nas rgyal po'i gyad des/yul ljongs kyi gyad 'di ni/bdag pas stobs che'o zhes bya bar shes nas des smras
16b2('dul ba): pa/ne'u zla ba dag gi 'di ni rigs brgyad kyis 'ongs pa yin gyis/khyod bdag nyid 'gyel bar byos shig dang /bdag la ni grags par zad la/ru mtshon ni khyod kyi yin par
16b3('dul ba): 'gyuraro//des khas blangs pa dang des de mnan to//des ru mtshon blang bar brtsams pa dang /des smras pa/ne'u zla skya 'am mthus rgyal ba don du gnyer ba yin pa las/khyod ngas
16b4('dul ba): sgyuskyes bskus na/ci'i phyir ru mtshon sbyin/bdag nyid chen po de nga rgyal bcom pa zhig pas/lan gsum gyi bar du gyod de dang lhan cig 'gyes par zhugs pa na/yang de la bsdu
16b5('dul ba): ber brtsams pa na/ne'u zla khyod la ru mtshon gyis ci zhig bya/bdag gi sring mo phyugs chung ma khyim thab la ma song ba zhig yod pa de khyod la sbyin gyis/bdag nyid 'gyel bar
16b6('dul ba): byos shig/bslus pa de de'i chung mas thos nas/des smras pa/rje'i sras snga ma gleng gzhi dog dgongs sam/de nas de chung mas nga rgyalo bskyed nas kun nas dkris pa drag
16b7('dul ba): pos de tig ste rjebs de sam tshigs chen ni po shig//dge slong ga/ji mam dusams/ che sa kyi tshus rlos kyi dkri mdun
17a1('dul ba): ngas ngan sems bskyed nas/kun+da nas dkris pa drag pos rgyal po'i gyad skal tshigs bcag pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/nga lo mang
17a2('dul ba): po dang /lo brgya phrag mang po dang /lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo brgya stong phrag mang po rnams su sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so//las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar
17a3('dul ba): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang du'i skal tshigs rlung nad kyis thebs par gyur to//dge slong dag de lta bas na/las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas
17a4('dul ba): btsal bar bya ste/dge sbyong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no///'dul ba ga ni//bam po drug
17a5('dul ba): pa/thams cad zil gnon thams cad gzigs//thub pa 'jig rten kun la sman//sred pa thams cad zag pa brnyes//sbyor ba kun gyi mthar phyin mdzad//thams
17a6('dul ba): cad mkhyen cing thams cad rig/thub chen thams cad mngon par mkhyen//'khon dang 'jigs pa kun las 'das//tshim kun gyi ni pha rol gshegs//bsam pa kun
17a7('dul ba): la ma khos pa po/6/sred pa thams cad rab tu bcom//sems can kun la phan dgongs pa//mdud pa thams cad rab tu grol//bag la nyal kun bcad nas ni//'ching
17b1('dul ba): ba thams cad yang dag bcad//sems can kun gyi mchog rab ste//thub pa chos rnams ston par mdzad//sems dpa' chen po shes rab che//brtson 'grus chen po grags
17b2('dul ba): pache/4/chos chen 'od ni chen po pa//chos chen don gyi pha rol gshegs//klu chen seng ge chen po pa//dge slong chen po drang srong che//shes rab chen po'i ral gri mtshon//
17b3('dul ba): nyon mongs chen po rab tu bcom//stobs dang brtson 'grus rab tu che//brtan pa chen po pha rol gnon//byang chub chen po brnyes pa gang //dgra chen rnams las rnam par rgyal//
17b4('dul ba): nad chen po yi dpyad mdzad pas/7/bcom ldan sman pa chen po lags/'dod chags chen po zil gnon la//sman chen po ni stsol ba po//'khor ba chen po'i btson ra na//
17b5('dul ba): 'ching ba chen posau bcings rnams la//thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas//'ching ba kun las grol bar mdzad//skyes bu chen po lha chen po//tshogs rnams kyi ni tshogs chen ldan//
17b6('dul ba): sbyin pa'i mchog ni sprin chen po/zhi ba chen po go 'phang reg/sems can mchog ste drang srong mchog/de bzhi ni rnam par 'dren mchog brnyes//nyan thos mchog ni phun sum chog///
17b7('dul ba): chos kyi mchog ni rab ston pa//shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i mchog/yon gnas rnams kyi mchog tu 'os//rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog/mtshan ni mchog rab kun
18b1('dul ba): smin pa dus//dmyal ba rnams su myos 'dangs//slar yang ma nI u dun//ngan slong brjo bar byur//donas smras s+ho lcagasas byung //ngaso yang spyod dam/durgyu/
18b2('dul ba): rnams kyis ma so pa'i phyir//yang dag ma yin sku pe tag+sa/nga sngon dram T+Ter byung ba ni//gas pa smyig thos pa//bram ni k+Sha bad+hA rnams pa ni//rgyalan gsung
18b3('dul ba): tshig brjod pa'i tshe//mngon shes lnga ldan rdzu 'phru'i ni//byin chen drang skyong der 'ongs pa//'gyur bsti byed pa ngas mthong nas//skyon med la ni srung po byertag/drang srong 'di ni 'dod
18b4('dul ba): spyod ces//dus ni byam ze'i khye'u la skyes//bram ze'i khye'u rnams dri yi tshig/thos nas rje su l-i rung zhing //de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis//khyim dang khyim du spong ba na/
18b5('dul ba): drong srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces//spyi dri mang po dag la smras//lus kyi rnam par smin pa des//dge slong lnga brgya dag dang yang //mdzes mkho na'i rgyu lasu no//srung po dag na tho
18b6('dul ba): ra gyur//si seM d+d+his rnams cad nil gnan /sa rgyu gnas dzig rje//de ci gi sbyong dzinan ma 'dzin cung jig 'i sa ng+ge sa sa
18b7('dul ba): ni//mi bza ngan 'gror song nas ni//sems can dmyal ba rnams skyes//sdug bsngal tshar ba nyim su //de nas las kyi skyeg na//de sa bram ze rnas 'dzu
19a1('dul ba): skye ba'i tshogs ni 'dus pa na//yang dag ma yin skur pa btab//nor gyi phyir ni skyon med par//ngasnga na g.yas khyim nu bo ni//rI yi gaskyeb tu bcug nas su//
19a2('dul ba): ngas ni rdo bdag gis bsnun//las kyi rnam par smin pa des//dmyal ba drag tu yun rings 'phangs//rab tu tshe dang thig nag gi/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar gyur//de nas
19a3('dul ba): las kyi lhag mas ni//lha sbyin gyis ni rdo 'phangs te//nga yi zhabs kyi the bo ni//rdo ba'i dum bus rma yang phyung //rgya mtsho yi ni gru bai ches//rgya mtsho la ni 'gro ba na//grun
19a4('dul ba): 'dug pa'i tshong pa ni//mdung thung rnon pos bsad par gyur//las kyi rnam par smin pa des//dmyal ba rnamasu yun rings 'phangs//de yi lus kyi lhag mas nga'i//zhabs
19a5('dul ba): la tshal pa bzug par gyur//sngon ni nye pa'i grong khyer gyi//nya pa'i bur ni gyur pa na//nya rnams bsod par byed pa dang //yid dga' ba ni skyes par gyur//las kyi rnam par
19a6('dul ba): smin pa des//nga ni dmyal bar yun rings 'phangs//rab tu tshe dang thig nag dang //sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur//de nas las kyi lhag mas ni//gang gi tshe na
19a7('dul ba): 'phags skyes po//shAkya rnams ni gsod pa na//klad pa mi bzad nad kyis thebs//rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi//nyan thos yongasu smad byas te//khyed ni
19b1('dul ba): nas dag za bar 'ong //khyed la 'bras ni mi rigs shes//ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang //las kyi rnam par smin pa des//dmyal ba'i thig nag rnams su ni//sdug bsngal mang
19b2('dul ba): po nyamasu myong //de nas las kyi lhag mas ni//dgra mthar dbyar ni gnas btsas te//bram ze yis ni spyan drangs tshe//zla ba gsum du nas dag zos//nga ni sman par gyur/
19b3('dul ba): ba na/tshong dpon bu pho 'khrur 'jug che//nad kyis sdug bsngal gyur pa la//sman ma yin pa ngas byin no//las kyi rnam par smin pa des//sdug bsngal mang po nyam su myong //
19b4('dul ba): de nas las kyi lhag mas ni//de 'dra'i 'khru ba'i nad kyis thebs//sngon gyi tshe rangs gzhan rnamasu//nga ni mthu can gyad gyur tshe//stobs dag 'gyed par byed pa na//ngas
19b5('dul ba): ni gyad kyi bu zhig bsad//las kyi rnam par smin pa des//sdug bsngal mang po nyamasu myong //de nas las kyi lhag mas ni//'di na nga yi rgyab sbyang ngo //sngon ni dran spong bur
19b6('dul ba): gyur pa//dga' skyong la ni smras pa ni//mgo reg ngas mthong ci zhig bya//'di la byang chub yod ma yin//ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dra//les kyi rnam par smin pa des//
19b7('dul ba): 'dir yang mir ni 'ongs pa na//khyim med par ni rab byung nas//byang chub mchog ni 'dod pa'i phyir//lteng rgyas 'gram du lo drug tu//mchog tu dka' ba spyad pa ngas//sdug
20a1('dul ba): bsngal mang po nyams su myong //sems can kun gyi rab mchog gis//chos kyi dam pa thugs chud nas//sdig pa'i lus ni gang mdzad pa/
20a2('dul ba): tshogs kyi mchog la bka' stsal to//thams cad zil gnon stobs brnyes kyis//dge slong dge 'dun gung bzhugs nas//ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du//nyid kyi
20a3('dul ba): byin las lung bstan to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u'o///sdom ni/gnas 'dzeg sbrang rtsi can dang ni//rgyu can ko'u ngi nye bar 'khor//
20a4('dul ba): 'od byed dang ni nam gru ste//phyi ma bde bar gshegs pa yin//ma dros pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs gcig
20a5('dul ba): tu/mtsho chen po ma dros par phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas/ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/mnyan yod kyi ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang
20a6('dul ba): bzangs na bzhugaso//ri dgas 'dzin gyi mAM sa gas/bcom ldan 'das mtsho che ni po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/mnyan yod du gshegs nas/mnyan
20a7('dul ba): yod kyi bdag gi khang bzangs kho na na bzhug so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas thung nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/rab tu dag
20b1('dul ba): bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung po zhes bya 'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyi mas gu stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na 'dir dro gas thal mo sbyor ba
20b2('dul ba): btud nes/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros par/rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba yung bstan pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya gang dag
20b3('dul ba): lags pa drang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshong sbyor zhing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mjed du gsol/ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sogs
20b4('dul ba): gnang bar rig nas zhes bya ba nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu par rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/stan ches dma'
20b5('dul ba): ba zhig blangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir//bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ri dgaso 'dzin gyi mas ga la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
20b6('dul ba): gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du gtsug/yang dag par gzengs stong /yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te gshegs
20b7('dul ba): nas/gtsug lag khang du byon pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
21a1('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la ma rdzogs par yod de/des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na//
21a2('dul ba): 'on kyang dge 'dun gyi ched du yon ma phu lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa lar ljongs rgyu zhing nga/sh+ye ba na /khrong khyer zig pa can du byonas/grong bye zhi ba can gyi byang phyogs kyi grong bye zhing sha pa'i
21a3('dul ba): tshal na bzhugs so//grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas zhes bya ba nas shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugaso
21a4('dul ba): zhes thos so zhes bya ba'i byar gong ma bzhin du'o//thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /khyu nas khyur phrad cing 'dus te/grong khyer thigs pa can nas byung nas/bcom
21a5('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te zhes bya ba nas/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
21a6('dul ba): nas/cang mi gsungo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/bcom ldan
21a7('dul ba): 'das gang na ba de yog su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu
21b1('dul ba): sad bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyam bdag rnams la
21b2('dul ba): cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom
21b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //de nas yi dgasu rus gong sbrel ba bsgreng ba lta bu//rang gi sgras yog
21b4('dul ba): pa lto ri tsam/kha khab kyi mig tsam/'byor rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar to/me lce gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya com ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lkugs pa dang /
21b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la kun nas yongs su bskor te/'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag 'di
21b6('dul ba): dag ni bdag cag gi nye dur gyur pa lags na/kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/bdag cag kho na'i ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/bcom/
21b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/des dam zhig bcas te/gal te khyed cag cha byad 'di nyid kyis yin sngo ba byed pa'i tshe 'ong na ni/khyed cag gi ming nas yin bsngo ba bya'o//
22a1('dul ba): de rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das g.yar tshwa lags nus/ji ltar mchi lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/de'i tsha tshigasu bcad pas
22a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ngo tsha med la ngo tsha byed//ngo tsha ba la ngo mi che//'jigs pa med la 'jigs par lta//'jigs pa la ni mi 'jigs lte//log pa'i lta ba blangs pas na//sems
22a3('dul ba): can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro//ngo tsha ba la ngo tsha dang //ngo tsha med la ngo mi tsha//mi 'jig pa la mi 'jigs lta//'jigs pa la ni 'jigs lta ba'i//yang dag lta ba blangs
22a4('dul ba): pa yis//sems can rnams ni bde 'gror 'gro//de rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na mchi lagaso//de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang //
22a5('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams kyis/de gnyis kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bce' ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba na/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/chos
22a6('dul ba): momanyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//yi dgas lnga brgya po de dag 'ongs pa dang /de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram
22a7('dul ba): ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis/yi dgas rnams mthong nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros//
22b1('dul ba): dernams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das yi dwags 'o ni dag mtsho lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chur shog/'di dag ni khyed cag gi nye du yin no//gal te
22b2('dul ba): khyed cag gis gnang na/ngas 'di rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo'o//de rnams kyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das rung lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag
22b3('dul ba): lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/de rnams kyis ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad de//sbyin pa 'di yis bsod nams gang //de ni yi dgas rjes 'gro zhing //'di dag yi dgas
22b4('dul ba): 'jig rten ni//mi bzod pa nas myur ldeng shog/de yis gos dang skom dang zas//gnas mal rnam pa sna tshogs pa//dus kun du ni ma zad par//de rnams la ni grub par
22b5('dul ba): shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin
22b6('dul ba): du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te gshegaso//de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /
22b7('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams rtog khang du lhags shing tshogs nas/'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed de/kye dge slong go'u t+ya ma ni 'dod zhen tshe zhing /de'i nyan thos rnams kyang
23a1('dul ba): 'dod zhen che ba yin no//kha cig gis smras pa/shes ldan dag/dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing /de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen rlung
23a2('dul ba): ste/mu stegs can rnams ni da lta ma yin no//de'i tshe bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to//de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng gis//
23a3('dul ba): grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//dge sbyong go'u tA ma 'dod zhe na che'am/'dod zhan chung ba dang /de'i nyan thos
23a4('dul ba): rnams 'dod zhe na che'am/'dod zhe na chung ba ngas khyed cag yid ches par bya'o//de nas bram ze spro 'dod kyi seng ge/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
23a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//shes ldan go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/bdag gi bca' ba bu ram zhig 'bul zhing mchis na/
23a6('dul ba): gnang bar mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze smra 'dod kyi sang gi la cang mi gsung bas gnang //de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges bcom ldan 'das cang ma
23a7('dul ba): gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze smra
23b1('dul ba): 'dod kyi seng ge klan ka tshol bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bca' ba bu ram la spyan drangs kyis/khyed cag las gang gis ji tsam yog pa des de tsam zhig
23b2('dul ba): blang bar bya'o//bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge lta bu ram 'tsheng pa'i khang pa lnga brgya yod pa nas des bu ramo gyi khang pa re re nas/bu ram gyi snod blangs te/bu ram gyi snod lnga brgya khyer
23b3('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//shes ldan go'u ta ma bu ram brdegs na/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
23b4('dul ba): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/longs spyad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag dang lhung bzed bsabs nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams
23b5('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugaso//de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges bu ram gyi snod gcig blangs te/brim par brtsams pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun
23b6('dul ba): gyi bar du brims kyang lhag pas/thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'dug pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so//de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge mngon par dad par gyur to//de nas de
23b7('dul ba): da pa skyes nas phyogs mtha' dag tu sgra bsgrags pa/shes ldan go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhe na chung zhing /de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yino//de nas des mu steg can
24a1('dul ba): rnams bur ma la longs spyod du gzhug pa'i phyir 'gron du bos pa dang /de rnams kyis bu ram bag med par blangs nas/kha cig gis ni longs spyad do//
24a2('dul ba): kha cig gis ni snod bkang nas bor zhing khyer te song ngo //de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges smras pa/skyes bu blun po khyed cag kho na 'dod zhen che ba yin la/dge slong go'u
24a3('dul ba): tam ni 'dod zhen chung zhing /de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no smras nas//bcom ldan 'das la lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das
24a4('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa
24a5('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag ces bya ba nas/tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
24a6('dul ba): chur shog ces bya ba nas/dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungs pas zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs dka' bar gyur cis
24a7('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/dus sam/dus ma yin pa 'am/na pa
24b1('dul ba): 'am/mi na bas bu ram la ljongs spyad par bya ste/'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi song gi ro myags pa'i dri mi zhim pas/sems rtse gcig pa nyid ma thob
24b2('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge ni/srid pa tha ma pa yin na/ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam du dgongs na/lus rul ba'i dri mi zhim
24b3('dul ba): pa las gyur par gzigaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo sdong la/dge slong smra 'drod kyi seng ge'i gtsug lag
24b4('dul ba): khang dri dang /me tog gi phreng ba dang bdug pa dang /phye ma rnams kyis gtor la/gnas mal la yang bdug pas bdug cing /me tog dri zhim pos brgyan pa'i me tog gi
24b5('dul ba): gdug res shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan to//ji tsam na de bsod snyoms la song
24b6('dul ba): bde'i byar du/de'i gtsug lag khang du song nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin thums cad byas//de nas tshe dang ldan pa smra 'drod kyi seng ge
24b7('dul ba): bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang lha'i 'byor pa mthong nas/de nas dga' ba'i yid kyis bsod snyoms la longs spyad de/zas kyi bya ba byas nas//
25a1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/lus drang por bsrangs nas/dranapa
25a2('dul ba): mngon du phyogs par gzhag ste 'dug pa dang /dri zhim po mnam nas de'i sems mnyam par gzhag par skyeso//de nas des nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom
25a3('dul ba): pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas zhes bya ba nas/mngon du smra bar gyur to//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka'
25a4('dul ba): stsal pa/dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dang /nga'i nyan thos sdug pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge 'di yin no//dge slong rnams
25a5('dul ba): the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong gzhan rnams ni/mi sdug pas rnam par grol na/tshe
25a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge sdug pas rnam par grol ba la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di ni tshe rabs lnga pa rgya btud mar sum cu rtsa gsum
25a7('dul ba): gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos shing /de nyid du skyes te/da ltar gyi srid pa the ma mi rnamasu skyes pa na/lus rul ba'i dri minam pas sems rtse gcig pa ma grub pa'o//
25b1('dul ba): dIdri zhim po'i dri mnam nas sems mnyam pa thob nas sdug pas rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to//gal te 'di la thabs 'di ma byas par gyur na/dro bar gyur pa yang 'dis bskyed par
25b2('dul ba): mi 'gyur ro//de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/gzhin gang zhig sdug pa 'di lta bus rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba des rim pa de lta bu ste/'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o//de nas bcom
25b3('dul ba): ldan 'das yul spong byed nas/ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/yangs pa can du byon nas/yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhun
25b4('dul ba): so//yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/yangs pa can du byon nas/yangs pa
25b5('dul ba): can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram ni/khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugaso zhes thos so//thos nas kyang gcig tu 'dus nas smras pa/shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das yul spong
25b6('dul ba): byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/yangs pa can du byon nas/yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gramA na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhug so zhes grag gis/gal
25b7('dul ba): bdag cag re re ni sa bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na ni/bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs dang //gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed par gyur pas/de la khrims
26a1('dul ba): shig bcas te/ci nas kyang tshogs shing 'dus pa kho nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol gyi/mi gcig pus ni ma yin no zhes de rnams kyis
26a2('dul ba): khrims su bca' bu dag byas nas bzhag go//de'i tshe yangs pa can bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa bzhi gnas te/nor can dang /nor can gyi chung ma dang /nor can gyi bu
26a3('dul ba): dang /nar can gyi mna' ma'o//de dag gi khyim du ni lha dang /mi rnams kyi g.yang bdes par gyur to//de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa de ma thos par/khyim
26a4('dul ba): bdag nor can gyis/bcom ldan 'das gang yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/yangs pa can du byon nas/yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang
26a5('dul ba): pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhags so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang yangs pa can nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/yang dag par rab
26a6('dul ba): tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas khyim bdag nor can stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
26a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig/
26b1('dul ba): tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas/khyim bdag nor can la gnang ngo //de nas
26b2('dul ba): khyim bdag nor can gyis/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyog byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
26b3('dul ba): sngo nas song ngo //de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang //khyim bdag rnams yangs pa can nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na bo der song ste zhes bya ba nas/bcom ldan
26b4('dul ba): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang /thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
26b5('dul ba): du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas 'jog gi bu dag/de sngar khyim bdag nor can gyis spyan drangs zin to//de rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag
26b6('dul ba): khyim bdag nor can gyis ni tshogs kyi khrims bcas pa las 'das par byas//khe cig gis smras pa/ci ste de 'dras par byed/gdon mi za ba ri des khrims bcas pa ma
26b7('dul ba): thos so//'on kyang bdag cag pas de ni skyes bu dam pa yin pas/gdugs tshod gsol du chug/bdag cag gis ni gonangs gdugs tshod gsol lo//de nas tshe dang
27a1('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs nas/khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
27a2('dul ba): shar sgo nas zhugs pa dang /ji tsam na gdan ma bshams shing /zhal zas rnams lha gon ma byas pa mthong nas/de nas khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces smos so//
27a3('dul ba): khyim bdag khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/snying las chung ngus gnas sam/des smras pa/'phags pa kun dga'
27a4('dul ba): po ci ste de skad gsung //khyim bdag gdan ma bshams shing /zhal zas rnams sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo //'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/khyim bdag
27a5('dul ba): shar nas so//'phags pa lho nas zhugs shig/de zhugs pa las/ji tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shing /lha'i zhal zas rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo //
27a6('dul ba): mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to//de nas khyim bdag nor can gyi spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol ba//btsun pa gdugs
27a7('dul ba): chod pashams shing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das da do'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/
27b1('dul ba): phyog bcwabs te lhung bzod gyu bar rig nas/snyun ches dma' bzhig zungs te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma byanan du'o//de nas/
27b2('dul ba): nor can gyi chung ma stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das grwa la bde log su thal mo sbyar bye btu do nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge
27b3('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs gcig tu/seng bdag gi sum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis/gnang bar mdzad du gsal/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung
27b4('dul ba): sa nod can gyi chung ma la gnang ngo //gnang nas kyang khyim bdig nor can mo chos bshad pa mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te ga sheg so//nor tsan+da r+g+ha chung mas kyang nal
27b5('dul ba): zas rnams stu gni byas so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dgo' bo nang par sngar langs te/lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs nas/khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der
27b6('dul ba): song ste phyin nas lho sgo nas zhugs nas/gdan ma shoms shing /zhal zas rnams kyang ste glon ma byas par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang nor can gyi chung mA la 'di skad ces smras
27b7('dul ba): khyim dog gi chu mi sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/tshe skyong las chung dus gnas sam/des spros pa/'phags pa ci ste de skad gsu/
28a1('dul ba): gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo //'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/lho nas so/'phags pa
28a2('dul ba): shar nas zhugs shig/ji tsam na gdan bzang po bshams shing /zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur
28a3('dul ba): to//de nas nor can gyi chung ma'i spyan 'dren gyis/bcom ldan 'das la dud tshod gsol pa/btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/bcom ldan
28a4('dul ba): 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan tshes dma' ba zhig blangs te/chos mnyan
28a5('dul ba): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas nor can gyi bu stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
28a6('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das ga lo ba de log su thal mo sbyor ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
28a7('dul ba): dang thabs gcig tu/sang bdag gi sdum par gdug so tshad sbyor zhing mchis na/gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can kyi bu laM
28b1('dul ba): gan nga //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi chung ma la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshugs//nar can gyi bus byu gra tsang zhing bsnod du'i drana' pa dang /haca' bdag stag/
28b2('dul ba): byas so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bo nang par sngar langs te/lhung 'azed dang /chos pos thogs te/nor can gyi khyim gang nu ba der song so phyin nasalho sgo nas zhugs nas/
28b3('dul ba): glang na ma bshams shing /zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa yang mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang nor can gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so//khyim bdag gi bu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
28b4('dul ba): gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/ci snying las chung ngus gnas sam/des smras pa/'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung /gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa
28b5('dul ba): mthong ngo //'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/lho nas so//'phags pa nub nas zhugs shig/ji tsam na gdan bzang po bshams shing /zhal zas bsod pa ste
28b6('dul ba): gon byas pa yang mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to//de nas nor can gyi bu'i spyan 'dren gyis/bcom ldan 'das la dus chod gsol pa/btsun pa
28b7('dul ba): gdugs chod pa shams lags shing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig
29a1('dul ba): nas/spyan chas dma' ba zhig thangs te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar go ma bzhin du'o//de nas nor/
29a2('dul ba): can gyi mna' ma stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logasu thal sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
29a3('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsu
29a4('dul ba): bAs nar can gyi mna' ma la gnang ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi bu la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegaso//de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /
29a5('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu
29a6('dul ba): 'dug go//phyogs tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'o gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/
29a7('dul ba): cang me gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams stan lam langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
29b1('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
29b2('dul ba): gcig tu/sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tsho dro sbyor zhing mchis na/gA nang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas 'jog gi
29b3('dul ba): bu dag nga sngar nor can gyis mna' mos spyan drangs zin to//de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams rngam nas smras pa/shes ldan dag nor can gcig pu
29b4('dul ba): la nor yod kyis/bdag cag la med dmo ci na/des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nyi ma re re gdun tshod gsol zhing mchis bdag cig kho nas skabs ma thob
29b5('dul ba): par gyur/de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/gzhan dag gis smras pa/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas gshegs
29b6('dul ba): par gyur pa de'i tshe/de'i khyi mu rdo bai re re nas bkogs te gzhig go//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar ldangs te/lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs
29b7('dul ba): nas/khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/nub sgo nas zhugs na/gdan ma bshams shing /zhal zas kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo //
30a1('dul ba): mthong nas kyang nor can gyi mna'am la'ang skad rjes skyes so//nor can gyi mna' ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong ga dag 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/
30a2('dul ba): tsisnying las chung dus gnas sum/des smras pa/'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung /gdan me ba shams shing zhal zas rnams cad mya gon mi byis pa 'i myong ngo //
30a3('dul ba): 'phags pa chab sgo gang nas zhugs/nub nas so//'phags pa byang nas zhugs shig/de nas byang nas zhugs na/ji tsam na lha'i gdan po shams shing /lha'i
30a4('dul ba): zhal zas sta gon byas pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/de nas nor can gyi mna' ma'i spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus
30a5('dul ba): tshod gsol pa/btsun pa gdugs chod pashams shing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/dge
30a6('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdani bI shams pa nyid la bzhug so zhes bya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin du'o//de nas yungs po can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag thams cad
30a7('dul ba): 'dus nas/khyim bdag nor can gyi sgron 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyimo bdag yangs pa can/
30b1('dul ba): bye tshogs rdum nas/spo na 'dug ste/de dag gres khyod la gnod pa byas par 'gyur du 'ong gis/song la bzod pa mdzod cig de phyir byung nas bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang /
30b2('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/khyim bdag ci khyod gcig pu la nor yod dmau/gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyin re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol to//
30b3('dul ba): kho bo cag gis skabs mi snyod par byed/des smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag gis tshogs kyi khrims bcas pa ma thos kyis/de bas na tshogs kyi bzod par bya ba'i rigaso//
30b4('dul ba): gzhan dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di ni dam pa yin pas/'di la bzod par bya'o zhes de rnams bzod par gyur pa dang /des smras pa/gal te de lta na
30b5('dul ba): nang du zhugs shig/de rnams khyim du zhugs pa dang /gdan bzang po bshams shing zhal zas bsod pa rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo
30b6('dul ba): mtshar skyes par gyur nas/smras pa/khyim bdag khyed 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar 'os kyi kho bo cag ni ma yin
30b7('dul ba): no//des de rnam pa la rin po che dag byin pa dang /de rnams kyis ma blangaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rin po che 'di dag ni rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis long
31a1('dul ba): /shig/de rnams kyis blangs pa las gang gis ci 'dra ba da ba de'i kha dog de 'dra ba kho rgar snang bar gyur to//de nas nor can gyi mna' mas sangs rgyas la sogs
31a2('dul ba): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag gis zhes bya ba nas/phyag bcabs te lhung zad gyu bar rig
31a3('dul ba): nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
31a4('dul ba): kyis nor can dang /nor can gyi chung ma dang /nor can gyi bu dang /nor can gyi mna' mo rnams kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/
31a5('dul ba): gang thos na nor can dang /nor can gyi chung ma dang /nor can gyi bu dang /nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyi 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes
31a6('dul ba): bcom ste/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de rnams kyis bden/
31a7('dul ba): pa mthong nas/lano gsum ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba nas/bdag cag ni mngon par 'phag so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//bdag cag bcom
31b1('dul ba): ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gri dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi lcags kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis/bdag cag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
31b2('dul ba): srog dang yang bsngos te/skyabasu mchis par mngon por dngad lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang nor can gyi chung ma dang /nor can gyi bu dang /nor
31b3('dul ba): can gyi mna' ma rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par stan/yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
31b4('dul ba): mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gsheg so////'dul ba gzhi/bam po nga bdun pa//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad brjod
31b5('dul ba): pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa nor can dang /nor can gyi mchis brang dang /nor can gyi bu dang /nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyis las ci zhing
31b6('dul ba): bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pra phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che'i rigasu skyes shing /lci dang /mi rnams kyi dpal nyam su myong bar gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das
31b7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di rnams kho nas las rnams byas shing bsogs pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong
32a1('dul ba): ma bzhin no//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA ra na se na/me tog phreng brgyud mkhan zhig yod pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang ldan
32a2('dul ba): cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsaso//
32a3('dul ba): des de yang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de dus phyi zhig na bkren zhing shin tu bkren par gyur nas/de dang bu dang /chung ma dang /mna' mas brtson pa chen pos
32a4('dul ba): 'bad pas/radar yug gcig cig grub nas/de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan yang de bgos nas rgyal po la me tog phreng 'bul/me tog phreng rgyud kyi chung ma yang de
32a5('dul ba): nyid bgos nas btsun mo la 'bul/me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu y-ing de nyid bgos nas gzhon nu rnams la 'bul/me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma yang de
32a6('dul ba): nyid bgos nas/rgyal po'i mna' ma rnams la me tog phreng 'bul bar byed do//sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
32a7('dul ba): ngan pa la snying brtse ba/gnas mal bas mtha' la bstan pa/'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dge 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig
32b1('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/nyi ma nub ka'i dus su bA ra na ser phyin nas/me tog phreng rgyud med pa na de'i khyim grong khyer gyi sgo na 'dug pa de'i ldum rar nub mo gnas btab ste/me'i
32b2('dul ba): khams la snyoms par zhug so//de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan des/me'i phung po 'bar ba lta bur mthong nas/de ded pa skyes te/chung ma la smras pa dang /de yang dad
32b3('dul ba): par gyur to//des bu la smras pa dang /de yang dad par gyur to//des mna' ma la smras pa bla de yang dad par gyur to//den+da de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /bdag cag sang zan ma
32b4('dul ba): zos kyang bla 'dus la/rab tu byung ba/zhi ba/zhi ba'i bdag nyid can 'di bshos gsol lo//de nas nam langs nas/de rnams kyis de la bsod snyoms phu lo//me tog
32b5('dul ba): phreng rgyud mkhan gyis smras pa/bzang mo kho bo'i ras kyi bgo skal gang yin pa de ni/rab tu byung ba 'di la dbul lo//des smras pa/rje'i sras bdag gi yang dbu'o//busmras pa/
32b6('dul ba): bdag gi yang dbul lo//mna' mas smras pa/bdag gi yang dbul lo//des de rnams 'dus nas/de la ras bskon to//bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/lus kyis chos
32b7('dul ba): ston gyi/tshig gis ma yin pas/de nas bdag nyid chen po de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir na mkha' la 'phags nas/'bar ba dang /gsal ba dang /char 'bebs pa
33a1('dul ba): dang /zlog 'byin pa'i 'dul dag bya bar brtsams//sa sa skye bonas ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/\u0f7flanas dang
33a2('dul ba): bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/bdag cag gis mA~M na gnas de ma pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag
33a3('dul ba): phyug cing nor mang la/longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing /bdag cag gi khyim du lha dang /mi'i g.yang 'bab par gyur cig/'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/'di
33a4('dul ba): bas khyad par 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed kyi/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas//de nas rang sangs rgyas kyis de rnams la snying brtse bas rdzu 'phrul byas
33a5('dul ba): nas rgyal po'i khab kyi steng na phar chas te song ba dong /de'i grib mas rgyal po'i steng du rab pa dang /de gdong bstod de blta bar brtsams pa dang /bdag nyid chen bro de mthong
33a6('dul ba): nus/des bsams pa/dadug nyid chen po 'dis yongasu zhig gi bkren bu'i rtsa bo phyung bar gyur snya mo//me tig phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal blo la me tog 'dul ba'i dus gang
33a7('dul ba): yin pa de las theg gi tsam zhig yol lo//rgyal po yang me tog la sdod cing 'dug go/de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkho na de/rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho de rnams kyis
33b1('dul ba): bkug pa dang /rgyal pos de la smras pa/ci'i phyir khyod kyis me tog de ring dus las yol/des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /de nas rgyal pos ji snyed gyon pa byin no//de
33b2('dul ba): bzhin du me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma la nr-i btsun mo rnams kyis ji snyed gyon pa byin no//me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu la ni gzhon nu rnams kyis so//me tog phreng rgyud mkhyen
33b3('dul ba): gyi mna' ma la ni rgya bre po'i mna'am rnams kyis te/de mthong ba'i chos de nyid lo nor gyi me tog mngon bar grub par gyur te/dbul ba med par gyur to//dge slong dag
33b4('dul ba): ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gang yin pa de ni/nor can 'di nyid yin no//me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni nor can gyi rlung
33b5('dul ba): ma yin no//me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu gang yin pa de ni/nor can gyi bu yin no//me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' me nor can gyi san 'am yin te/ri dag gis rang sangs rgyas la
33b6('dul ba): bya ba byas shing /smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skyes nas/khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang
33b7('dul ba): babs par gyur to//de'i spyan snga nas kyang bden pa mthong bar byas te/de rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa 'di dag gis mnyes par byas
34a1('dul ba): kye/myi mnyes par ni ma yin no//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/brtsal khyar byaste/dge slong dag khyed
34a2('dul ba): kyide lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams lhag par yang mngon por dad par gyur nas skyon
34a3('dul ba): las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
34a4('dul ba): 'dun dang thabs gcig la/bdag cag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /spyan dpyad kyi sbyin sman dang /yo byad
34a5('dul ba): rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/gnang bar mdzad du gsolabacom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams la
34a6('dul ba): gnang ngo //de nas yangs pa can gyi khyim bdag dang /bram ze rnams bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rnyogs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
34a7('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ston las langs te dong ngo //de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing
34b1('dul ba): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas/phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/chos mnyan
34b2('dul ba): pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//zhes bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams
