34b3('dul ba): la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yong dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag/par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
34b4('dul ba): nas/gden las bzhengs te gshegasaso//de nyid du nyi ma gnyis sam/gsum gyi bar du 'das so//yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyi
34b5('dul ba): 'khor brgya chen po mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/de rnams kyi nye du dag zas kyi phyir nyi ma re re zhing 'ong bas/de dag gis gtses par gyur nas/dge slong rnams
34b6('dul ba): la smras pa/'phags pa dag mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/bdag cag gi nye du drag slar mchis te/de rnams la bdag cag gdugs gcig bzhin stsol bas/
34b7('dul ba): khyed cag dang de rnams la khyab par rdo mi thog na/kye 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis yo byad rnams dbul gyis/zhal ta kho na mdzod cig/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa
35a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o zhes dge slong rnams kyis skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta
35a2('dul ba): na rjes su gnang ste/dge slong rnams kyis zhal ta bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas/de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bar
35a3('dul ba): brtsams te/ji tsam na steng g.yogs med par thug pa 'tshed pa'i zhal ta byas pa las/lcelnga char phab pas des ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la gsol
35a4('dul ba): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/steng g.yogs med par btso bar mi bya'o//sgo khang dang /khyams su 'tshed par byed pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
35a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/sgo khang dang /khyams su btso bar mi bya'o//dge slong dag de lta bas na/rung ba'i gnas kyi gzhir/mi rung ba 'i bcu po 'di dag ste/'di rnams du
35a6('dul ba): zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/steng g.yogs med pa dang /sgo khang dang /khyams dang /bsgo khang dang /khrus khang dang /rgyal po'i gnas dang /mchod
35a7('dul ba): rten gyi gnas dang /mu stegs can gyi gnas dang /khyim bdag gi gnas dang /dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngo //bzhi bcu po 'di dag ni rung nga ma yin pa gnas kyi gzhi
35b1('dul ba): yon tAM/de rnamasu dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o//zhal ta d+yod na 'gal tshangs can du 'gyuro//sdom ni/nang bu can dang zlas dag dang //g.yar chus lhag pa dag dang yang //
35b2('dul ba): tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang //pad+ma'i rtsa dang lug dag go/gleng gzho ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod nA/dge slong nad bu can zhig yod pas des sman pA la dris pa/bzhin
35b3('dul ba): bzangs dag kho bo la sman ston cig/des nad gyi gzhi dris nas smras pa/'phags pa thug pa gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro//des smras pa/bzhin bzangs bcom ldan
35b4('dul ba): 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //smin pas smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas/'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yod do//des skab
35b5('dul ba): de dge slong rnams la'o//dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal te sman pas thug pa 'thung shig ces zer
35b6('dul ba): na/sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
35b7('dul ba): de'i nad g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer te byin no//de nas sman pas 'ongs nas dris pa/'phags pa khyod 'di 'am/des smras pa/bzhin bzangs mi bde'o//khyod
36a1('dul ba): kyis thug pa ma gsol tam/'thungs so//ci 'dra ba zhig/grang mo'o//'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so//sang ni dron mo gsol cig/de nas de'i
36a2('dul ba): nad g.yogs gis blangs nas glang mo kho na rnyed nas/des de bsros te byin no//de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du dris pa dang /des smras pa/mi bde'o//ci thugs pa ma gsol
36a3('dul ba): tama?/'thungs so//ci 'dra ba zhig grang mo zhig bsros nas so//'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so//de drang ste bsros pa las kyis/ngas ni rang bzhin gyis dron por
36a4('dul ba): mdzod de gsol cig/de nas de'i nad g.yog gis/'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas/gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi shing drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa las/de nas
36a5('dul ba): kha'i rtug pas/de ma rung bar byas pas/dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams la'o//dge slong rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das lha gsol pa/
36a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o zhes bka'
36a7('dul ba): stsal pa dang //dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang /ji tsam pa ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/rung ba'i gnas lnga ste/rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang /
36b1('dul ba): sems gtod pa'i mtha' can dang /ba nyal ba lta bu dang /stong pa'i gnas dang /bskos pa'o//de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni/'di lta ste/dge slong lag gi blas nas rtsom pa na/
36b2('dul ba): der thog mar gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyis rung ba'i gnas su 'gyuro zhes sems bskyed cing /tshig tu smras pa ste/'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o//sems da/
36b3('dul ba): gtod pa'i mtha' can gang zhen/'di lta ste/dge slong lag gi zlas der thog mor rdo ba 'deg pa ni/nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dog gzhi 'di ni de
36b4('dul ba): 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnasu 'gyur ba'i nges par zung shig/nges par zung shig ces bya ba ste/'di ni sems gtod pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o//ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/gang
36b5('dul ba): la sgo tha dad par gsas pa ste/'di ni ba nyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o//gnas stong po gang zhe na/spangs pa'i gnas te/'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o//bskos pa gang zhe na/
36b6('dul ba): gsol pa dang /gnyis kyi las bskos pa'o//dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsko ba ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas gang zhig thams cad
36b7('dul ba): zin par byas pa/nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa la/dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o//bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/gnas
37a1('dul ba): mal ba shams la/gaN+DI brdungs te/dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsko la/dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par//
37a2('dul ba): 'gyur ba dang /dge sbyong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gnas thams cad lags pa/nang mtshams
37a3('dul ba): dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis//
37a4('dul ba): gnang bar mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad legs pa/nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i
37a5('dul ba): gan su bsko'o//'di ni gsol pa'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gnas thams cad lags pa/nong mtshams
37a6('dul ba): dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzhed de/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa//
37a7('dul ba): nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gan su bsko na/tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad
37b1('dul ba): lags pa/nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnasu bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de
37b2('dul ba): dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa/nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang
37b3('dul ba): bcas pa 'di/dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnasu skos lags te/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnasu skos pa der gnyis
37b4('dul ba): skabs dbye ste/mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang /mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtse
37b5('dul ba): pa'i gnas na bzhugaso//yangs pa can na sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/de'i nyen kor na gnas pa rnams kyis/de'i tshe ched du shes khyer te 'ongs nas/
37b6('dul ba): de yang za bar byed do//gang gi tshe des bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/mi za bas khyer te 'ongs na yang dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed do//dge slong
37b7('dul ba): rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang /mu stegs can rnams smod par byed/gzhogs 'phyas byed/kho zer bar byed de/shes ldan dag sngo dpon song ge'i ched du byas
38a1('dul ba): te/sha khyer te 'ongs na ni/des de dag ma thos la shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la byin pa dang /shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi ched du byas pa'i sha na
38a2('dul ba): zos so zhes bya ba'i skabs de dag dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba ma yin pa'i sha
38a3('dul ba): bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa gsum gang zhe na/bdag gi ched du byas par mngon sum du mthong ba/rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /yid
38a4('dul ba): ches pa las khyod kyi ched du byas pa yin no zhes pa thos pa/rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /rang nyid kyi blo las rnam par rtog pa skyes pa tshul
38a5('dul ba): las 'di ni bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam du rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no//dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza'
38a6('dul ba): bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa/gsum gang zhe na/'dis bdag gi ched du byed par mngon sum du ma mthong ba rung ba'i shu bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /yid ches
38a7('dul ba): pa los 'dis khyed kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsung pa dang /bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa tshul las 'di bdag
38b1('dul ba): rgyud du byas pa yin na/ma pas skyes na/ na rgyunas gsus pa yinan//klung gan na mnyan yana'o//mug dang
38b2('dul ba): pa'i disi b+h+yo s+ya/dge slong dag rtogs par gyur pa sa na nas rlos ba ste 'a bye dang /khyis dadagu rnams kyis smras 'amigs pa dag gcig
38b3('dul ba): chu brtson por bye bya'i bsnun pa'i/rje'i slad du glos pa'i ste bzhugs shing dge pa'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzad/de rnams kyis smras pa/mu ge dang bzlas pa'i dus bya
38b4('dul ba): sod snyoms skye dra skye par me smre gu ru bas dros nagos pa pa ste dug gi/de rnamasakyis smras pa/ ste zhes tshus mi gso
38b5('dul ba): ma ldan 'das kyis mgun //khyod kyi sbyin pa ni thugs can yin pas/gnang bya gyur bag na pa'i gnas de yod de zhes bya ba'i sbubs ng+ge/dge slong rnams
38b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang ma ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal na/dge slong dag du'i phyir rje sgyu gnang ste/mu ga'o sdug bsngal dkon pa 'di sa klur dge slong
38b7('dul ba): rnams kyis g.yer nus bza' bar bya ste/drilas bye pa mo /2///gleng shin ni monyan mngon na//mug dong so nga'i dus byung nas/do
39a1('dul ba): la bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas
39a2('dul ba): bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang bza' bar 'dod na/'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs der
39a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'dod na/sngar blangs zin to snyam du sems
39a4('dul ba): la/sngar rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o////gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/bram
39a5('dul ba): ze dang /khyim bdag drad pa rnams kyis/dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la mgron du bos nas/de rnams kyis zos pa dang /bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus
39a6('dul ba): so//bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag khyed kyi chad du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyi/snoms te bzhud la phyis gsol cig/de rnams
39a7('dul ba): kyis khyer te dong ngo //dong nas de bza' bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
39b1('dul ba): kaku' stsal pa/de'i phyir rje su gnang skye/mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'di dag ni byin pa yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi
39b2('dul ba): bya'o///gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/dge slong rnams
39b3('dul ba): l-i mgron du bos te/de rnams kyis zos nas/bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhag ste/dge slong rnams dong ba dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa
39b4('dul ba): 'di ni bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na la ngas btang yongasu btang ba lags te/'tshal te mchis la/khyed kho na la dbul lo zhes de rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs pa dang
39b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams de la yang za bar 'dod na/'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs dri/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
39b6('dul ba): stsal pa/de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur/sngar yongs su btang ba'o snyam du bsam na sa bza' bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par ni
39b7('dul ba): mi bya'o////gleng gzhi ni mi nyan yid na'o//bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis nub phyogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub
40a1('dul ba): nus/de rnams kyis bsam pa/'di dag ni rnyed da/ka' ba yin pas/'phags pa rnams la dbulo zhes de dag gis dge slong rnams zas zos nas spang ba byas
40a2('dul ba): pa rnams la de dag byin pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/'phagos
40a3('dul ba): bdag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i /mu stegs can rnams la sngon gnas bgyid pa las/da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas
40a4('dul ba): khyed rnam kyang ni yon gnasu gyur pa lags na/gal te khyod kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag gi dge ba'i shul rgyags dang bral te/'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol
40a5('dul ba): tu mchi bar bgyi 'am/de lta ba na thugs brtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
40a6('dul ba): gaka' stsal pa/de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/rnyed dka' ba yin no snyam bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bres bu ni'i
40a7('dul ba): dag yin te/dgun 'brum dang /bal ba se'u dang /'brag gi dang /star rga dang /yon tsho dang /shing tog ur man dang /shing tog u ru ma yi/shing tog
40b1('dul ba): noko tsa dang / tog pa b+hA dang /shing tog sin cike'o///gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod nado//zlum za dang /khyim bdag dang ba can rnams kyis/dge slong
40b2('dul ba): rnams zas zos zin pa dang /chu nas skyes pa dge phul ba dang /dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spang ba byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis
40b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnyed dka' ba yin no snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//de la
40b4('dul ba): chu nas skye ba ni 'di dag yin te/ud pa la dang /pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /ku mu da'i sa bon dang /pad+ma'i sa bon no//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
40b5('dul ba): khams mo snyoms pas khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur to//rim gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/bdug rang gi blo ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
40b6('dul ba): bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyi/lan 'ga' yang sman po lam dris kyi/ma la bdag gis dri'o snyam nas/des snyan pa la dris pa/bzhin bzungs tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
40b7('dul ba): bu khrag dang bdakan 'khyogs par gyur na/de'i sprin ston cig/des smras pa/'phags pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa mo
41a1('dul ba): dgal gyi bu chen blo bsams pa/gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/pad+ma'i rtsa ba phal pa'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin
41a2('dul ba): snyam du bsams nas/ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhug pas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de
41a3('dul ba): bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang /de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas smras
41a4('dul ba): pa/'phags pa dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir byon/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kun 'khrugs nas/de la sman pos pad+ma'i rtsu ba'i
41a5('dul ba): 'o ma bstun to//klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/'phags pa gal te de lta na re shig bzhes shig/de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs mi'i tshad tsan
41a6('dul ba): gyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag gton cing bskyon cing /pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad+ma'i mdab ma'i sbyo rar gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo //
41a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa li blta bar brtsoms pa dang /de nase klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/'phags pa
41b1('dul ba): cigazigs/pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol par bzhed dam/de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /smras pa dang /'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dga'
41b2('dul ba): gyi bu chen pos/pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lhung bzed bkang ba khyer nas del gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te/mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/mgon
41b3('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyin to//de nas tshe dang ljon pa shA rI'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhi ni pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to//klu'i rgyal po
41b4('dul ba): rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la pad+ma'i rtsa ba khur cig bskur nas/mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la/gtsug lag khang gi khyim gyi
41b5('dul ba): mdun du zhog la shog/de rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa'i thus/mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams
41b6('dul ba): kyi mdun du bzhag nas/slar log pa las lamu gyi phyed na tshal gyi b.lA glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhon cig 'dus par gyur to//dus gzhan zhig na bal glang mo de las
41b7('dul ba): bal gleng phrug gu cig 'brangs te/'brangs pa'i mdo la sring ge'i sgra 'byin to//de nas bal glang mo de skrag pas gci ni rtug gtor nas/bal glang phrag gu bor te bros//
42a1('dul ba): de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i shing mkhan zhig shing gi chad du tshal du song ba las bal glang phrug gu de mthong nas/khyim dag du blangs bskrun gsos
42a2('dul ba): bskyed de/nor gyis bskyangs pas/ming nor skyong nor skyong zhes bya bar gragaso//kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la ni ra skyong skyes
42a3('dul ba): su bskur ba las de mnyan yod kyi yul na gnas pa la skye bos nor gyis bskyangs pa na nor bskyong zhes 'don to//pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos
42a4('dul ba): zas/khwa cig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/kho cig ni dge 'dun pa brims pa las 'on kyang lhag par gyur to//de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas nas kyang za 'dod
42a5('dul ba): na bdag cag gis spang bar bya'o zhes me zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/dge slong
42a6('dul ba): dag mi rnams kyis lce'i pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' bas de'i phyis rje su gan //pad+ma'i rtswa ba rnyed par dka' ba yino snyam du bsams nas brda' bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//
42a7('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byedon bsod nams chen por shes bya ba drug gnas te/khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang /lug gi chung ma dang
42b1('dul ba): lug gi bu dang /lug gi mna' ma dang /lug gi bran pho dang /lug gi bran mo'o//khyim bdag lug bsod nams tsho bar ji ltar shes she na/gal te bang mdzod stong pa
42b2('dul ba): rnams la bltas na/mthong ma thag kho nar gang bar 'gyur te/de ltar khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so//lug gi chung ma ji lta bu zhe na/des gcig gi
42b3('dul ba): don du smod du btsos pa ni brgya stong gi bza' ba 'byung ste/lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin no//lug gi bu ni ji lta bu zhe na/de'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod brtags te 'dug
42b4('dul ba): la/des gang gi tshe brgya'om/stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe/de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/yongasu zad par mi 'gyur te/lug go bu ni de lta bu yin no//
42b5('dul ba): lug gi mna' ma ji lta bu zhe na/des gcig gi don du dri sbyar na/brgya stong khyad par gyur te/lug gi mna'i ma ni de lta bu yin no//lug gi bran po ji lta bu zhe na/
42b6('dul ba): des gang gi tshe zhing la rol cig rmos pa de'i tshe/zhing la rol bdun rmos par 'gyur te/de lug gi bran pa ni de lta yi no//lug gi bran mo ji ltar ni bsod nams che bar
42b7('dul ba): shes zhe na/de gang gi tshe gang tsam drus pa de'i tshe/bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/de ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das
43a1('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag lug gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lnga bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag/
43a2('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gau shegs kyis/khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer
43a3('dul ba): bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams long shig ces sgo shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
43a4('dul ba): mnyan nas/dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs/
43a5('dul ba): pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams long shig/tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis//
43a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sa mnyan to//de nas bicom ldan 'das dul ba/'khor dul ba dang /zhi ba/'khor zhi ba/dgra bcom pa/'khor dgra bcom
43a7('dul ba): pa dang /ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshig so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe/mu stegs can rnams mtha'
43b1('dul ba): 'khob du dong ba las/de nus kha cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong nas gnas pa de rnams kyis/dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo zhes zos so//thos nas kyang rod rod por gyur nas/
43b2('dul ba): bdag cag sngon ni dge sbyong go'u ta mas yul dbus nas spyugaso//de gal te 'dir 'ongs na gdon mi za bar bdag cag 'di nas spyugs par 'gyur gyis/de la thabs shig
43b3('dul ba): bsham par bya'o snyam mo//de rnams rigs kyi khyim dag tu dong nas smras pa/chos thob par gyur cig/chos thob par gyur ci ga/'phags pa dag de ci lags//
43b4('dul ba): shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis 'gro'o//ci'i slad du re shig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis//ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar
43b5('dul ba): du 'dong ngo //'phags pa dag bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur logs/shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing /du ma zhig bu
43b6('dul ba): med pa dang /khyim thabs med par byed cing 'ong ngo //'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar po zhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi ba
43b7('dul ba): 'am/bzhugs shig/ma bzhud cig/de rnams kyis smras pa/bdag cag ci ste 'dug/khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan mi btub bo//'phags pa dag gsungs
44a1('dul ba): shig/mnyan par bgyi'o//de rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'bar gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas
44a2('dul ba): phyung la/grong khyer bzangs byed kyi nang du chud cig/rtsa sngon po rnams ni rdos shig 'dug gnas rnams ni shig/me tog dang /'bras bu'i shing rnams ni chod cig
44a3('dul ba): chu rnams ni dug blugs shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag gzhugs shig dang /thams cad bgyi'o//de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi
44a4('dul ba): nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas/grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du bcud de/rtswa sngon po rnams ni brngas/'dug gnas rnams ni bshig/
44a5('dul ba): me tog dang /'bras bu'i shing rnams ni bcad/chu rnams ni dug blugs so//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das la bkur
44a6('dul ba): sti ma yin pa byed pa yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa
44a7('dul ba): drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas/bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong du rmya zhing gshegs pa bya Dam
44b1('dul ba): ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang zabs gcig tu badre ba la reg par bya'o snyam nas/des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/song la chu drug can
44b2('dul ba): rnams snyoms shig/cher ba 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/'di rnams kyis bskams pa dang /khyod kyis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas khong shig/rgyal chen
44b3('dul ba): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la yang bsgo ba/khyed kyi grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas thob shig/de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni chu dug can rnams bskam so//char ba
44b4('dul ba): 'bebs pa'i lha'i bus ni der yang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang ngo //rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis lha rnams kyis kyang glong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas btab nas/
44b5('dul ba): longs spyod rnams 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to//mu stegs can rnams kyis grong khye na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bstsogs no//de rnams kyis rtogs chen dag mngags
44b6('dul ba): te ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shog/de rnams dong ba las/ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas/slar 'ongs te smras pa/shes ldan
44b7('dul ba): dag ljongs 'di lta bur 'byor cing rgyas pa ni sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo //mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/
45a1('dul ba): re shig gang zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang bsgyur bar byed pa des/khyed cag bsgyur bar mi byed pa de lta srid re skan/khyed cag rnam pa thams/
45a2('dul ba): cad du bltas zin te blta ba'i mtha' ma byas nas 'gro'o/de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag bzhug sa shig/khyed cig la dge sbyong go'u ta mas cing zhig bgyir/
45a3('dul ba): mchis/de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/khyed kyang rab tu byung ba slong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ci des khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam 'am/mu stegs can
45a4('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/dim zhig bcas te/gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la lta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing /gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par kar sha pa na
45a5('dul ba): drug cus bcad par khrims 'cha' na 'dug go/de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrimasu btsaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/rim gyis
45a6('dul ba): grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs nas bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig ni bzhug so/7/de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'iri bram ze bu mo grong khyer bzang byed du bag
45a7('dul ba): mar btang ba des ra ba'i kha na 'dud khas/bcom ldan 'das mun khang na bzhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/
45b1('dul ba): shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas/rab tu byung ba de ni 'di yin te/gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur na/bdag mar me thog la 'babs pa zhig/de nas
45b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas/them skas zhig sprul to//de nas de snying dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' bas mang me thogs te
45b3('dul ba): them sbas las babs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mar me bzhag nas/zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
45b4('dul ba): phyag byas te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bgo la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin mkhyen nas//
45b5('dul ba): do dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa de zhi so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar
45b6('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bu mo khyod tshur shog khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang /
45b7('dul ba): de la da na re nad med par gyur cig ces smos la 'di skad ces kyang smros shig/khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho nar du 'dir 'ongs na/khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa glo
46a1('dul ba): bur b+ha la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de cig rigs sam+b+ha/gal te tshogs kyis khrims su bca' bar byas so zhes smras pa dang // ra//
46a2('dul ba): rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa/des gal te brgya'am/stong 'god par btang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing /yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na
46a3('dul ba): khyod kar she ba ni drug cu byin nas 'od mi nus sam zhes smras shig/btsun pa dka' bzhin 'tshal zhesabu mo dris bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas tshos pa dang /
46a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang /sbas pa/khyim bdag bcom lda
46a5('dul ba): 'das khyod la nad med par gyur cig ces gsung so//des smras pa/bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsha lo//khyim bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
46a6('dul ba): sprul pa/khyod kho na'i ched du nga'i 'dir gshegs na/khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/glo bur+ya ba la ji ltar khyed byed pa de lta bur bya ba cig rigs sam/des smras
46a7('dul ba): pa/bu mo tshogs kyis khrimasu bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o//gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kar sha pa na drug cu'i chad pas
46b1('dul ba): bcad do zheso//khyim bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod kyi bu'i nang pa na lnga brgya pa'i snod cig gtags te 'dug pa/des gal te brgya 'am
46b2('dul ba): skyospyo 'god phyur ba don glang de kho nar 'gyur zhing yongasu zad par mi 'gyur na/kar shrI ban drug cu byin nas/khyod 'ad par mi nus sam zhes gsung //des byas
46b3('dul ba): 'di ni sus kyang mi shes na/bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gro'o snyam nas/des kAr sha pa na drug cu sbyor bzhag nas bram ze'i bu
46b4('dul ba): chos bstan pa'i tham skas las 'bab ste/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
46b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /
46b6('dul ba): rang bzhin mkhyen nasa'aphags pa'i bdon pa bzhis sor rtog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/khyim bdag lug gis de zlos nas zhes bya
46b7('dul ba): nas/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das ba/
47a1('dul ba): byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
47a2('dul ba): pab/khyim bdag khyod la brten nas phal cher kun gyis 'thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro//de nas khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
47a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/de khyim du phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kar sha pa na'i phung po gcer te/tshigasu bcad pas smras pa/gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod
47a4('dul ba): chags skyon bcom rtsod med pa/mtshungs pa med pa gser gyi mdog can blta 'dod pa/de ni 'jigs med snying gis shin tu nges byos la/myur tu dengs shigade
47a5('dul ba): yi nor ni kho bos gzhal//skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur ram/des smras pa/dge bar 'gyur ro//de rnams
47a6('dul ba): kyis smras pa/gal te de lta ni tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/tshogs kho nas bshig tu zad mod/'di rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsams/
47a7('dul ba): so//de nas phan tshun sngos pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'dus pa'i skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phags pas rab dral nas/srog chags
47b1('dul ba): brgya stong du ma kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo //de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas/bcom ldan 'das
47b2('dul ba): kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad gcig tshun tshod 'khor bar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la grad na bshams
47b3('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugs nas/sems can du ma drug gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos nas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
47b4('dul ba): mngon du byas so zhes bya ba nas/kha cig gis ni skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blang so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o///
47b5('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/bam po nga brgyad pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring zhig tu chos bshad pas/gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to//khyim bdag lug gis
47b6('dul ba): gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag zas kyi dus las yol bar gyur to//des
47b7('dul ba): gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung ba ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mar dang /bu ram dang /hwags dang /shaM kha ra dang
48a1('dul ba): btung ba dag go/de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste/smras pa/shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur du sta
48a2('dul ba): bon gyis shig/de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon byaso//des nas khyim bdag lug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma
48a3('dul ba): yin pa'i bca' ba dang /dus ma yin pa'i gtung ba rnams kyis tshim por byaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams
48a4('dul ba): la so sor bkod/ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du btul te gshegs pa na/khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/bcom ldan
48a5('dul ba): 'das shul gyi snyan rgyags kyi zong kar sha pa na dag bzhes shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/blang bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha pa na blang
48a6('dul ba): bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rung ba byed pas so//
48a7('dul ba): rung po byed pa med nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge tshul gyis so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/
48b1('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul bslab pa'i gzhi bcu par gser dngul len pa gsungs la/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu
48b2('dul ba): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nye bar 'khor ngas 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi/mi blang ba ni ma yin te/de bas na dge tshul gyis blang /
48b3('dul ba): bar bya ri/blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o//khyim bdag lugis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/blang
48b4('dul ba): /dge sbyong rnams kyi su zhig gos ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/khyim pa 'am/dge tshul med na/dge slong gis
48b5('dul ba): zhog bdun par byin gyis brlabs nas/rang nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya bo ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
48b6('dul ba): sbal pa'i/log pa gnyis bkrus nas sbyin lon byas te/lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la/lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug
48b7('dul ba): nas/tshe dang ldan pa dgong su gsum//bdag med 'di zhes bya ba'i sman 'di dag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab pa zhes ngo no/
49a1('dul ba): lan gnyis ldan gsum du brjod par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis nus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan
49a2('dul ba): 'das kyis buram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab par bya'o//zhes gang gsungs pa su zhig gas 'tshal bar bye gyi lags/nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/
49a3('dul ba): lam du zhugs pa dang /smyung ba byas pa dang /nad pa dang dge skas dang /lag gi blas so//dge slong ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis/'bras dang /phye dag gi
49a4('dul ba): nang du bu rim bcug pa las/lam gyis ngal nas/bza' bar 'dod nas/'gyod pas ma zlos pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
49a5('dul ba): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag zas nges byas kyi bya ba byed mi nus pas/'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sprugs
49a6('dul ba): nas bza' bar bya'o//phye rnams gang yin pa de chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya'o//kho cig zhu bar gyur pa de bkrur ma rung ste/zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur ni sa//
49a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/snag ma'i tshal pas bzhar la chus bkru bar bya'o//'on kyang zas med par bkru ma nus nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
49b1('dul ba): pa/legs par gsal te/chu'i nang du mnyes la btung bar byas nas/nga tshags kyis btsags la btung bar bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes
49b2('dul ba): nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag lug dang /lug gi mchis brang dang lug gi bu dang /
49b3('dul ba): lug gi mna' ma dang /lug gi bran pho dang /lug gi bran mos las ci zhig bgyis ni/des na de drug bsod nams chen por gyur cing /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
49b4('dul ba): sngar bden pa mthong nas/'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis kyi/ma mnyes par ni ma lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dog
49b5('dul ba): 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsregs pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung
49b6('dul ba): ba/bA ri na se'i grong khyer du/rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/de'i tshe bA ra na se'i grong khyer du ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyi su cher mi
49b7('dul ba): 'bebs pas/thur mos 'tsho ba'i mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan to//mu ke rnam pa gsum na za me tog dang /rus gong dkar po dang /thur mas
50a1('dul ba): 'tsho ba'o//de la zu ma tog ces bya ba ni/za ma tog de'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag blugs te/ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzhag/
50a2('dul ba): nas/bdag cag shi na 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro snyam pa ste/'di ni za ma tog dang 'brel bas za ma tog ces bya'o//rus gong dkar po gang zhe
50a3('dul ba): nu/dus de na mi rnams kyis rus pa dag bsdus nas re shig bcos te/ji tsam na rus pa de dag dkar por gyur pa dang /de nas de'i khu ba 'thung ba ste/'di ni rus
50a4('dul ba): gong dkar po dang 'brel pas rus gong dkar po zhes bya'o//thur mas 'tsho ba gang zhe na/dus de na mi rnams kyis g.yul gyi ser ga nas/'bru'i 'brum bu dag thur
50a5('dul ba): mas brus nas/chu mang po'i snod du bac+doMs nas 'thung ba ste/'di ni thur ma dang 'brel bas thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o//de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis bA ra na ser dul
50a6('dul ba): sgrogasu bcug pa/bA ra na se na gnas pa'i shes lnga na grong khyer pa dag nyon cig/ltas mkhan rnams lo bcu gnyi suM char me 'bab pas/za ma tog dang /rus gung
50a7('dul ba): dkar po dang /thur mes 'tshe ba'i mu ge 'byung bar lung brtan byas/khyed las gang dag lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod pa de rnams ni 'khod cig/gang dag la med pa de
50b1('dul ba): dgra ni/gar dga' bar deng la/mu ge med cing lo legs par gyur nas slar sheg shig/de'i chu na bA ra na se na khyim bdag phyug pa/nor mang ba/longs spyod che ba/'khor yangs
50b2('dul ba): shing rgya che ba zhig yod de/des mya ngan bkug ste/smras pa/kye nang rje kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod dam/des smras pa/dpon po mchis so//de de
50b3('dul ba): nyid na gnas pa las/mu ge de lo brgyud ma kho nar byung bas/de'i bang mdzod rnams yongasu zad pas/'khor gyi skye bo thams cad shi bar gyur te/bdag nyid dang dug cig luso//
50b4('dul ba): de nas khyim bdag des pang mdzad rnams phyogs pa las/'bras bre'u chung gang zhig byung nas/de chung mas snod du blugs te bcos so//sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med
50b5('dul ba): bA na/rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'gyur bas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas
50b6('dul ba): sheg ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang /bA ra na ser phyin nas/snga gro sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs te/bA ra na ser bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/
50b7('dul ba): khyim bdeg des kyang bza' bar bsdogs pa dang /rang sangs rgyas de yang rims bzhin du bsod snyoms la rgyus nas/de'i khyim du phyin to//khyim bdag des de lus mdzes
51a1('dul ba): shing sems dang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bsams pa/'di dag gis zos kyang gdon mi za bar srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyis/ma lnga bdag gi sbrul
51a2('dul ba): pa rab tu byung ba 'di la sbyin no snyam nas/des chung ma la smras pa/bzang mo kho bo'i skal ba ni rab tu byung ba 'di la dbulo//des bsams pa/bdag gi khyim thabs mi za
51a3('dul ba): na/bdag gis ci ste bza' snyam nas/des smras pa/rje'i sras bdag gi skal ba yang 'di la dbul lo//de bzhin du bu dang /mna' ma dang /bran po dang /bran mos
51a4('dul ba): kyang dpyad nas rang rang gi skal ba yongs su btang ste/de nas de thams cad 'dus nas//rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul lo//bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis
51a5('dul ba): chos ston kyis/tshig gis ni ma yin pas des dang pa'i rgyal po mdab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/'bar ba dang /gsal ba dang /char
51a6('dul ba): 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsam so//so so'i skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/shing rtsa ba nas bcad de 'gyel ba
51a7('dul ba): bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la btugs nas/smon lam ci 'dod par gdab pa rtsom ste/khyim bdag gis smon lam btab pa/bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu
51b1('dul ba): lobya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/bdag gis gal te bang ba dang /bang mdzod stong pa dag la bltas bAn/mthong ba de'i mod la gang bar gyur cig/'di lta bu
51b2('dul ba): chos rnams kyang thob nas/'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing /mi mnyes pAr mi bgyid par gyur cig/chung mas smon lam btub pa
51b3('dul ba): bdug gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/bdag gi gal te gcig gi don du snod du bcas pa de brgya 'am/stong gis zos
51b4('dul ba): ji skad bdag gis sbyor ba ma btang du'i bar yongasu zad par mi 'gyur zhing 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par
51b5('dul ba): bgyid cing /mi mnyes par myi bgyid par gyur cig/bus smon lam btab pa bdag gi yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la b+h+yo ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis
51b6('dul ba): bdag gi rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa/galI tAM brgya 'am/stong 'god par byating yang gang ba nyid du 'dug s+ho/yongasu zad par mi 'gyur zhing /'di lta
51b7('dul ba): bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston po rnams mnyes par bgyid cing /me mnyes bA ma bgyid par gyur cig/mna' mas smon lam btab po//
52a1('dul ba): bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byasmra pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/bdag gis gal te gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbyar na/des
52a2('dul ba): brgya 'am/stong byugs kyang ji srid kyang sbyor ba ma btang gi bar du zad par mi 'gyur zhing /'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa
52a3('dul ba): rnams mnyes par bgyid cing /mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/khyan pos smon lam btab pa/bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i
52a4('dul ba): rtsertsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/bdag gis gal te zhing rol cig rmos darol bdun nos par 'gyur zhing /'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i stosngon pa rnams
52a5('dul ba): mnyes par bgyid cingami mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/bran mos smon lam btab pa/bdag gis yon gnas dam po 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i
52a6('dul ba): rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/bdag gis gal te snod gang tsam drus pa gang yin pa des/snod bdun tsam du 'phel ba 'gyur zhing /'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/
52a7('dul ba): 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing /mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/de rnams kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/rang
52b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang /ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs sbyin ste shi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song ste 'dug pa las//
52b2('dul ba): driderdordzu 'phrul gyis song ba'i grib ma rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi stong du bab nas/des gyen du blta bar brtsams pa las/rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas/de 'di snyam du bdag
52b3('dul ba): nyid chen po 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bshol chen po yang su zhig gis bkren po'i drungs phyung bar gyur snyamo//de nas khyim bdag de re ba chen pos mdzod dang /bang mdzod rnams la blta
52b4('dul ba): ba dang /ji tsam na gang bar mthong ngo //des chung ma la smras pa/re shig kho bo'i smon lam ni rdzogs par gyur gyis/nga khyed cag gi blta'o//de nas bran mos
52b5('dul ba): 'bras snod gang tsam brus na bdun tsam du 'phel bar gyur to//chung mas gcig gi dron du snod du btsos pa la de dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug/nye 'khor
52b6('dul ba): gyi srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug go/de nas khyim bdag des bA ra na ser dril sgrogasu bcug pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag las su
52b7('dul ba): zhig ci don du gnyer ba dang shig shog/bA ra na ser sgra gsal ba dang /sgra chen por byung ba rgyal pos thos nas/des smras pa/shes ldan dag sgra gsol ba dang /sgra chen
53a1('dul ba): rma canag na/rgyun na smra pa/ sa bdag rgyug mnag cos zugs ma dang /nga sa sngags
53a2('dul ba): pos smras pa/gang gi kyi jig rten rgyas kyid nyin rje/ ga des mdzad dang /byung nams skye'i na da /ma klu
53a3('dul ba): de rnams kyis dkrug pa dang /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/khyim bdag gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe/khyim gyi mjed dang /bang nganam
53a4('dul ba): 'am/lha su'i mdzod dang /bang ba rnams bye/'on kyang de ring kho na sa bon sprul pa'i 'bras bu de ring nyid du grub lag so//rgyal pos smras pa/de ji lta bu zhig
53a5('dul ba): des rlabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /rgyus pos smras pa/khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag nyid chen blo la bsod snyoms phral lham+b+ha/l-I bdag gis dul lo//de
53a6('dul ba): lhag par da par gyur nas/tshig smra baHda pas skyes pa/sgoma'o yon ton los byung ba'i//sbyin kun rnam par spangs d+ma'i zhing //de las sa bon pa /
53a7('dul ba): 'bras bu de nyid thob par gyur//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//khyim bdag dang /khyim bdag gi chung ma dang /khyim bdag gi bu dang /khyim bdag gaman/
53b1('dul ba): ma dang /khyim bdag gi dran po dang /khyim bdag gi bran+ta mo gang yin pa de ni/khyim bdag lug dang /khyim bdag lug gi chung ma dang /lug gi bu dang /lug go/
53b2('dul ba): mna' ma dang /lug gi bran po dang /lug gi bran mo 'di dag nyid yin no//'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par
53b3('dul ba): smin pas drug char yang bsod nams chen por gyur cing /nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong zhing /rang sangs rgyas bya ba brgya stong pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas
53b4('dul ba): kyis/mi mnyes par ma yin no//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa'i rnam par smin pa ni cig tu gnag pa yin la/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba
53b5('dul ba): yin pa zhes bya ba nas/brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//sdom ni/
53b6('dul ba): ke na'i bu yi so btung ba blangs//ka she'i tshod rdal nas thug dang /sdig can du ni bcu' bo dang //'gyod dang sbyar ba'i zas dag go/bcom ldan 'das yul u du ma'i gnas na
53b7('dul ba): bzhugs//de'i tshe drang srong ke'u na khri gnas pa'i yul u du ma'i gnas ni 'dug/nyin par ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram na gnaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ngas
54a1('dul ba): su/gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhin rnams lnga chos bshad na/der ngas chags chung ngus drang srong kI'i na'i bu thul bar 'gyur snyam pa d+mang //de nas bcom ldan
54a2('dul ba): 'das 'di snyam du sems te/ma lo ngas rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bshad na/der thul bar 'gyuraro snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs
54a3('dul ba): bskyed de/chos nyid chos gang gis tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs skyed pa de'i tshe/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs te/lha rnams
54a4('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgod pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas/rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus pas mos pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi phyir//'jig rten pa'i thugs
54a5('dul ba): bskyed pa mdzad/bltas na bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams kho na la chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rig nas/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen la bsgo ba/lnga
54a6('dul ba): rgyurgyan song la/rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab gyi 'gram du bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan shoms te/'dun mtshan po 'dus pa na sus kyang de'i mdangs/'brog par mi 'gyur bar drung
54a7('dul ba): srong ke ne'i bu'i srungs ma gcig kyang skos shig/des rdzing bu del gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du drang song ke na'i bu'i srungs ma bzhag nas gnas shom par rtsom pa na de na skye bo'i tshogs
54b1('dul ba): chen po'i ca co'i sgra byung ba dang /de nas drang srong ke ne'i bu ca co'i sgras langs nas/srungs ma de la dris pa/ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig/des smras pa/gdan shom par byed pa byed pa'o//ci
54b2('dul ba): bo'i phyir ram/khyod kyi phyir ni ma yin mod kyi/'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir yin no//khyod 'di na ci zhig la sdod/khyod kho na srung ngo //ci'i phyir 'byung po mang po
54b3('dul ba): 'du bar 'gyur bas so//des smras pa/dge sbyong go'u ta ma de su zhig srung bar byed par 'gyur//des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das de la su zhig srung /bcom ldan 'das de
54b4('dul ba): nyid ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i srungs ma mdzad do zhes byas pa dang /drang srong ke ne'i bus thos nas cang mi smra'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro ni bza' sham thabs mnabs
54b5('dul ba): te/lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas/u du mor bsod snyoms la zhugs te/u du mar bsod snyoms spyad nas/zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/zas phyi ma'i bsod
54b6('dul ba): snyoms spangs nas/ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu u du ma nas ma snang bar gyur te/rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du
54b7('dul ba): byin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//de nas rgyal
55a1('dul ba): po chen po yul 'khor skyong dri za du ma'i 'khor dang dri za brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang dri za stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang dri za bcu stong phrag du ma'i khor dang /lha'i nor bus thub bkang
55a2('dul ba): ste/bac+doMs gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
55a3('dul ba): te/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas shar phyogasu brten te 'dug go/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum du ma'i 'khor
55a4('dul ba): dang /grul bum brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /grul bum stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /lha'i mu tig gis thu ba bkang ste
55a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mu tig gis btor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
55a6('dul ba): te/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis deltas nas/lho phyogasu brten te 'dug go//rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu du ma'i 'khor dang
55a7('dul ba): klu brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /klu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /klu brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma
55b1('dul ba): dkar po dang /man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma
55b2('dul ba): dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man da ra ba rnams kyis gtor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das
55b3('dul ba): drang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas/nub phyogs su brten te 'dug/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang gaunod sbyin du ma'i 'khor dang /gnod
55b4('dul ba): sbyin brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /lha'i dbyig dang /gser gyis thub dkang
55b5('dul ba): s+ho/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nos phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lho'i dbyig dang /gser gyis gtor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
55b6('dul ba): lnga mgro bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun bltas nas/byang phyogasu brten te 'du'o//de la dbus pa'i rigs
55b7('dul ba): ni gnyis yin te/yul 'khor skyong dang /'phags skyes po'o//mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/mig mi bzong dang /rnam thos kyi bu'o//de nas bcom ldan
56a1('dul ba): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad na/gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/gnyis kyis ni mi shes la/
56a2('dul ba): gal te mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad na/gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/gnyis kyis mi shes pas/me langs gnyis la ni dbus pa'i tshig gis chos
56a3('dul ba): bshad do//gnyis la ni mtha' khob pa'i tshig gis bshad do snyam du dgongs nas/rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus
56a4('dul ba): zhig pa dang /tshor ba gsil bar gyur pa dang /'du shes 'gag pa dang /'du byed rnams nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang /rnam par shes pa nub par gyur pa de nyid
56a5('dul ba): sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang /de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i dri za brgya stong phrog du ma
56a6('dul ba): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyeso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po
56a7('dul ba): de la khyod kyis mthong ba la mthong ba tsam dang /thos pa dang /rtogs pa dang /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes po tsam du gyis shig/chos kyi rnam grangs
56b1('dul ba): 'di bka' stsal pa na/rgyal po chen po 'phaT skyes po dang /de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes//
56b2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/de ltar na rgyal po chen po ming /e ne/me ne/dab phyi/da Dab phi/'di nyid sdug bsngal
56b3('dul ba): gyi mtha' yino//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /de dang bskal ba mnyam pa'i klu brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos
56b4('dul ba): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyeso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/de ltar na rgyal po chen po/mA ny+dza/tu lA/sang
56b5('dul ba): shA mA/sarba tra bi ru nI/'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /de dang skal ba mnyam
56b6('dul ba): pa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyeso//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/da ni bdag yongasu mya ngan las 'da'
56b7('dul ba): ba'i dus la khad kyis nyen/su la bstan pa btad nas/yongasu mya ngan las 'da'/gal te lha rnams la na ni lha rnams bag med pa la dga' ba mang bas yun
57a1('dul ba): ring du gnas par mi 'gyuraro//'on te ni rnams nA ni mini tshe thung ba yin pas de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyis/ma la dngas lha dang mi rnams dang /
57a2('dul ba): dge slong 'od srung la gtad nas/yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du dgongs nas/rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la dka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las
57a3('dul ba): 'das pa'i bskyon pa shwar phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang lho phyogs nas srung ba byos shig
57a4('dul ba): rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang nub phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po
57a5('dul ba): chen po khyod kyis kyang byang phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' bo'i yid kyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
57a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad srum pa de bzhin du bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi lagaso zhes gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong
57a7('dul ba): nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang //bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag
57b1('dul ba): bya ba rnams gtad nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang /bstan pa'i don gyi bya ba la brtson par gyis shig/dge slong rnams tha
57b2('dul ba): tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/btsun pa rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/las de'i rnam par
57b3('dul ba): smin pos rgyal po bzhir gyur cing /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mtho bar bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis
57b4('dul ba): sngon gyis tshe rabs gzhan rnamasu las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong
57b5('dul ba): dge sngon byung ba/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ston pa zhes bya ba nas/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
57b6('dul ba): 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong mi bzhin du'o//de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po na klu gnyis shig gnas pa/dbyigs 'byin dang /dbugs cher 'byin no//
57b7('dul ba): shing shal mo brtsegs pa na yang na mkha' lding gnyis shig yod pa/'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang gtsug gi dbang phyug/gang gi tshe dbugs 'byin dang /dbugs cher 'byin
58a1('dul ba): gnyis la/de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i cha/de gnyis sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar byed do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/dbugs 'byin dang /dbugs char
58a2('dul ba): 'byin gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skya su song zhing /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang de gnyis la na mkha' ldeng gis gnod par bya
58a3('dul ba): bor brtsams pa las/ri rab la rlung dang /chu'i shugs bzhin du rdzogs nas/skur mog pu dang /de gnyis kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag sngon ni kha bos cag gis
58a4('dul ba): khyed cag la gnod pa byas na/so'i 'og tu 'gro ni/da glang gis ni kho bo cag khyed dang phrad nas ri rab la rlung dang /tshu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la
58a5('dul ba): rgyu ci zhig yod/dbugs 'byin dang /dbugs cher 'byin kyis smras pa/bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabasu 'gro ba dang /
58a6('dul ba): sgrub pa'i gzhi rnams blangs//de gnyis kyis smras pa/gal te de ltar bdag cag gis kyang blang ngo zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te/yang dag par rdzogs
58a7('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar dong nas/de dag phyin pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan snga nas/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa dag gis
58b1('dul ba): de thos nas/dong ba de dag de gnyis kyis mthong nas/na mkha' lding de nyid kyis/klu dbugs 'byin dang /dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa/'gro ba pha pa'i dag su yin
58b2('dul ba): de gnyis kyis rgyas par smras pa dang /na mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/gal te de ltar na bdag cag gis kyang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan
58b3('dul ba): sngar skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa smon lam gdab bo zhes de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab
58b4('dul ba): pa'i gzhi rnams blangaso//dbugs 'byin dang /dbugs cher 'byin gnyis ni slar blangaso//de nas lhan cig 'dus nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhangs
58b5('dul ba): gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ji ltar 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar chos mnyan nas/bden pa
58b6('dul ba): mthong ste/rang gi gan su mchis pa de bzhin du/bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
58b7('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung gis/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de la/bram ze'i khye'u skye dgu rnams kyis tshe lo brgya thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
59a1('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das des kyang de bzhin du rdzing bud pa gyis 'dab kyi 'gram du bag
59a2('dul ba): cag la chos bshad de/bdag cag gis chos de thos nas bden pa mthong ste/'di bzhin du rang gi gan su mchi bar gyur cig ces byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/klu da
59a3('dul ba): nam mkha' lding bzhi po gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po gang yin pa de dag nyid yin te/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dbugs 'byin gang yin pa de ni/yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin
59a4('dul ba): no//dbugs cher 'byin gang yin pa de ni 'phags skyes po yin no//'gro ba'i dbang phyug ni mig mi bzang yin no//gtsug gi dbang phyug ni rnam thos kyi bu yin te/de'i tshe re'o//
59a5('dul ba): dus na 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs shing /smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i waM
59a6('dul ba): kyekyi rnam par smin pas/'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing /ngo'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gran su song ngo //chos bshad pa drang srong ke'u na'i bus thos na
59a7('dul ba): mchog tu dga' ba bskyes te/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyel dang /khams dang /
59b1('dul ba): rang bzhin mkhyen nas/gang thos nas mod la drang srong ke na'i bus 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos
59b2('dul ba): bshad pa mdzad do//de nas de rtogs pa'i drad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/btung ba brgyad po tsa tsa'i btung ba dang /chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang /rgya shug gi btung ba dang
59b3('dul ba): a shwa tha'i btung ba dang u dum ba ra'i btung ba dang /rngub 'gyur gyi btung ba dang /'bra go'i btung ba dang /rgun gyi btung ba khyer to//bcom ldan 'das gang nu ba
59b4('dul ba): der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa btung ba brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyis drang srong rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags pa lags kyis/
59b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhesu gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la thugs brtse ba'i nye bar dgongs nas/btung ba brgyad po dag
59b6('dul ba): bAzheso//bzhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag btung ba brgyad po 'di dag du su sbyin lan byas/dusu mnyes/dus su btsag so//dus byin
59b7('dul ba): gyis brlabs na/dus su longs spyad par bya zhing /bus ma yin par longs spyad par mi bya la/na mo gyi thun dang po thal nas longs spyad mi bya'o//btung ba brgyad po 'di
60a1('dul ba): dag dus su byin len byas la/dus ma yin par mnyes//dus ma yin par bcags/dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa na//
60a2('dul ba): longs spyad par mi bya'o//btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/dus su mnyes/dus ma yin par btsags/dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs
60a3('dul ba): spyad par mi bya'o//bdung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus ma yin par sbyin len byas la/dus ma yin par mnyes/dus ma yin par btsags pa ni/zas kyi 'og tu yang longs spyad
60a4('dul ba): bir mi bya lo/nam gyi cha stong 'das na yang longs spyad par mi bya'o//de nas drang srong ke na'i bu bstan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan
60a5('dul ba): 'das gang na ba dri log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu srang bdag gis
60a6('dul ba): gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong ke na'i bu la cing mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas drang srong ke na'i bu bcom
60a7('dul ba): ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/stan las langs te song ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar mdzad de/dge
60b1('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu u du mar gshegaso//de nas drang srong ke na'i bu ni ma langs par langs nas/nang mi rnams la smras pa/'phags pa dag bzhengs shig/
60b2('dul ba): bzhin bzangs dag longs shig/shing dag gshegs shig/me bus shig zhal zas dag gral bar gyis shig/dka sa dag byi dor gyis shig/de'i tshe drang srong ke na
60b3('dul ba): sring mo'i bu dadrang srong ri bo zhes bya bas de nyid nub mo gnas btab pa las drang srong ri bos/drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas/nang mi rnams la sla ba thos so//thos
60b4('dul ba): nas kyang drang srong ke na'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso//drang srong ci khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'gron du bos sam/yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po
60b5('dul ba): 'am/pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs sam/drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yong su rdzogs sam/des smras pa/dI baM kho bo ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnam
60b6('dul ba): 'gro na du bos pa yang ma yin/yul ma gra d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang ma yin/phro brang 'khor nas gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang ma yin/drang srong gi
60b7('dul ba): chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongasu rdzogs pa yang ma yin gyi/'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drongaso//des sangs rgyas bya ba'i sgra sngon
61a1('dul ba): mthos pa thos nas/ba spu thams cad zing zhes byed nas/gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa drang srong sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ri bo dge sbyong go'u/
61a2('dul ba): ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dgos te/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/de blo na med
61a3('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ri bo sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de yin//ri bos smras pa/drang srong dge 'dun zhes
61a4('dul ba): bya ba de ci zhig yin/drang srong ke na'i bus smras pa/ri bo rgyal rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nos gos ngur smrig bgos to/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim
61a5('dul ba): nas med par rab tu byung ba yang yod//bram ze'i rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang zhes bya ba nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
61a6('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi rje su rab tu byung ba yod de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ri bo 'di ni dge 'dun
61a7('dul ba): zhes bya'o//ri bo dge 'dun 'di dag sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas te/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di kho bos gdugs tshod la spyan drangaso//de nas dreng
61b1('dul ba): srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa 'drin pas nang bar sngar langs te/'khor lnga brgya dang /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
61b2('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu'i dug nas/drang srong ri byes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa leg
61b3('dul ba): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung ba dang /bstan par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad
61b4('dul ba): par bgyi'o//drang srong rib 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to//
61b5('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/bam po de dgu pa/de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas btabs shing tshim par byaso zhes bya
61b6('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge sbyong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na/ri bo rab tu byung ba mthong nas/des smras pa/ri bo khyod rab tu byung du ma/
61b7('dul ba): rab tu byung ngo //lpags par byas so//shin tu legs par byas//khro ba yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas/rab tu byung ngo //
62a1('dul ba): de nas drang srong ke na'i bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba pas rang gi lags nas
62a2('dul ba): bslabs shing tshim par byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das
62a3('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yon bsngos pa dang /chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegaso//de nas drang srong ke na'i bus rgyu
62a4('dul ba): lhag de dag thams cad btang ba'i chos byas nas/'khor lnga brgya dang /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
62a5('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/drang srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa legs par
62a6('dul ba): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba lnga bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos pos thob pa lta na/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan+da sngar bdag tshangs par dpyad par
62a7('dul ba): bgyi'o//drang srong ke na'i bus 'khor lnga brgya dang /legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to//
62b1('dul ba): denas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stob po de dang /'bab chu rab tu bzang mo'i 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so//
62b2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa blam zi ka ba pin la dge slong lnga brgya gta //tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtAdo//tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/
62b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa thams
62b4('dul ba): cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas//tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//tshe dang ldan pa
62b5('dul ba): shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni rgyun tu chu bya ba'i 'bras bu'o//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun
62b6('dul ba): pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sa tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu ni/shes rab che ba rnams dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ni mthu che ba dang /rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog tu
62b7('dul ba): lags na//'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ke phyi nas/gdams ngag phog pa gang lags pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag lags
63a1('dul ba): pa de dag ni lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
63a2('dul ba): bgyis pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de ltar du mi zad/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ka phi nA'i gdams ngag phog pa gang yin pa de
63a3('dul ba): dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang /shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de ni mngon par shes
63a4('dul ba): pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas zhig na drang srong gnyis shig gnas te/so sor 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do//ji tsam dus
63a5('dul ba): gzhan zhig na de gnyis la gcig shi nas/de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /yid mi bde bas gdungs nas phan tshun 'phyan 'phyan nas/drang srong
63a6('dul ba): cig shos de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /des de rnams mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas dris pa/bram ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyi mkhan po de gar song /des bsams pa/bdag
63a7('dul ba): 'das na bram ze'i khye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabasu 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar bya'o snyam nas/des de rnams dbugs byung ste bsdus so//ji
63b1('dul ba): tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de yang nad kyis thebs par gyur nas/de'i slob ma mchog gsum yod pa la/des gcig la lnga brgya/gnyis pa la nyis brgya lnga bcu/gsum pa
63b2('dul ba): la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do//de ni 'tsho ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to//de la lnga brgya gtad pa gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs med pa'i khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams
63b3('dul ba): ngadag pog go/nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad pa gang yin pa des ni/ji ltar gzugs kyi khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go//nyis brgya lnga bcu phog pa cig shos kyis ni
63b4('dul ba): ji ltar mngon par shes pa lnga la bkad pa de ltar gdams ngagra phogo/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gzugs med pa'i khams la
63b5('dul ba): 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ka phin 'di nyid yino//nyis brgya lnga bcu gzugs kyi khams la rab tu 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yino//cig
63b6('dul ba): shos kyis nyis brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yino//'on kyang dge slong ka pi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang yin
63b7('dul ba): ba de dag ni dbang po rnon po yin no//mo'u dgal gyi bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni dbang po 'bring po yin//shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni dbang po rtul po yino//gal te
64a1('dul ba): shA ri'i bus gdam sna ngag ma phog par gyur na/de dag gis dro bar gyur pa yang rtogs par mi 'gyuraro//kA na'i bu ni rdul pa can//ji ltar sangs rgyas /
64a2('dul ba): brjod pa//rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni//thams cad 'thun par mnyan par gyis//ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni//dus gcig cig ni ston pa po//dpa' chen nyan thos thabs
64a3('dul ba): gcig tu//gdugs chod la ni spyan drangaso//ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni//zas kyi zhal ta byed pa dag/bram ze ri bos mthong gyur te//mthong nas kle na'i bu la dris//byag ma/
64a4('dul ba): len tam 'on te//rgyal po yul 'khor 'gron pos sam//khyod kyi mchod sbyin cha dus sam//dris pa de ni bdag la smros//bdag ni bag ma mi len la//rgyal po 'am
64a5('dul ba): yul 'khor 'gron ma bos//bdag gi sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog/gdugs tshod pa ni spyan drang so//ri bo sangs rgyas sgra thos nas//yid skye ba ni skyes gyur te/
64a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas de ci ke na'i bu//dris pa de ni bdag la smyos//shAkya'i rigs las skyes pa yi//ston pa gang zag zla med yod//de ni chos kun blo ljon pas//de bas sangs
64a7('dul ba): rgyas zhes bya'o//'dus byas 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i chos//'das pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs la//de bzhini ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing //da ltar byung ba rnams kyang
64b1('dul ba): gzigs//mngon shes bya ba ji snyed pa//de kun rtogs pas thams cad rig/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs//de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//mngon par shes
64b2('dul ba): bya mngon shes byas//bsgoms par bya ba rnams kyang bsgoms//spang bar bya rnams spangs pas nas//de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//gang zhig bltam par gyur pa na//rgya mtsho'i
64b3('dul ba): ri bor bcas pa yi//sa 'di rab tu g.yo mdzad pa//de la thal sbyar phyag 'tsha lo//gang gis bdud dang nag po yis//rtsa lag bzhon bcas bcom nas ni//de bzhin
64b4('dul ba): gshegs kyi stobs thob pa//de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshalo//bA ra na se'i grong bzhud nas//gang gis rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i//chos kyis 'khor lo de bskor ba//de la thal
64b5('dul ba): sbyar phyag 'tshal lo//gang gis 'dod cha gos bcing bas bcings//'dod chags zhe sdang gis gdungs pa'i//sems can mang po grol mdzad pa//de la thal sbyar phyag
64b6('dul ba): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhig/rnam 'dren de ni ji srid na//shAkya'i sras po 'od mdzad la//de ring nyid nas skyabasu 'gro//tshal sdug yid du 'ong ba de/
64b7('dul ba): gang na bar ni bram ze'i chos//dri zas rgyal po lta bu yi//sangs rgyas bla med mthong bar 'gyur//na bza' ngur smrig 'od ldan de//gsor 'od nyi ma'i 'od zer can//de bzhin gser
65a1('dul ba): bcom yi//gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin//sa la shing gi me tog dang //kar ni kar ri me tog 'dra//rin chen sna tshogs spras pa de//rin chen mar
65a2('dul ba): sdong ji bzhin no//n+ya gro d+ha lta lta bur ni//chu zheng gab par gyur pa dang //khor yug 'dom gang 'od kyis ni//kun nas snang ba dag tu mdzes//rgyal srid rgyal dang nye dur bcas//'dod
65a3('dul ba): pa kun dga' spangs nas ni//rab tu byung bar mngon byung ba'i//thob pa dben pa rnams la dgyes//spos ngad ldang ba'i seng ge ni//nags su 'jigs pa med pa ltar//seng ge lta bur bsnyed
65a4('dul ba): med gsungs//bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur//zhal 'dzum 'jam pa'i gsung dang ni//tshangs pa'i gsung dang snyan pa'i gsung //rnga yi sgra yi gsung lta bu'i//sangs
65a5('dul ba): rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur//zla ba dag pa na mkha' la//rgyu skar rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi//sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur//
65a6('dul ba): nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa//na mkha'i ngos la mdzes pa lha'i//sangs rgyas mun dang bral gyur cing //mdzes par bram ze mthong bar 'gyur//ji ltar byung ba'i khyu mchog
65a7('dul ba): ni//nog dang ldan pa'i g.yog gnas ldan//skyes bu khyu mchog stengs bcu ldan//sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur//rgya mtsho dag ni gting zab pa'o//chu
65b1('dul ba): tshon tshad gzung med pa lta'i//sangs rgyas bsam gtan pa yi mchog/bsam gyis mi khyab bla med mthong //nag po'i phyogs las nges byung ba'i//nyi ma mkha' la gsal ba
65b2('dul ba): dang //me yi phung po 'bar ba lta'i//go'u ta ma sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur//ji ltar 'khor lo sgyur rgyal po//zhom ring byed pa'i yongs bskor ltar//de bzhin rdzogs
65b3('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas ni//dgra btsem rnams kyis mdun byas mdzes//'dod pa rnams la dbang sgyur dang ni//ji ltar tshangs chen dbang phyug ltar//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
65b4('dul ba): khams//thub pa dbang ni sbyar bar mdzad//gang thos nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing //sdug bsngal mtsho che na las sgrol ba//sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang //sdug bsngal kun 'byung grang
65b5('dul ba): yin dang //sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang /lam ni yan lag bzhi tshan gnyis//sbrang rtsi ma bskol ro lta bu'i//bden pa dag ni rab tu 'chang //nor med rnams la nor sbyin
65b6('dul ba): zhing //nad pa rnams kyi dpyad kyang mdzad//gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs gyur pas//skye dgu sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad//mun par gyur pa'i sems can dang //blun po lam gol
65b7('dul ba): rgyu ba dang //bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro nga'i//lam gyis drang po rab tu ston//'dod chags zhe sdang kun 'bar bzhin//gti mug rab 'bar skye dgu rnams//ji ltar sprin chen cha
66a1('dul ba): 'as //zung 'tshan pos zhi ba mdzad//gzugs dang kha dag stabs ldan pa// dang 'an mdam mam//mA na grogs spyosas ga ldan
66a2('dul ba): pa ni//ri bo bzhin du shin tu gnas//rnyed dang ma rnyed bde sdug dang //smad pa dang ni bstod pa dang //grags pa dang ni ma grags pas//chu yis pad+ma bzhin ma gos/
66a3('dul ba): srog gcod pa ni rnams spangs te//ma byin pa la dga' mi byed//bden pa gsungs zhing tshangs par spyod//de ni phra ma spangs pa yin//tshig rtsub dag ni mi gsung zhing //
66a4('dul ba): dus bab par mjam po gsungs//de ni 'dod la brnab sems med//skye bo rnams la de sems bya mas//yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs//ting 'dzin stobs
66a5('dul ba): spyod yul ba//bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la gshegs//lha dang mi yi sgra dag ni//gang yin rnam pa sna tshogs gsan//nyon/
66a6('dul ba): mongs can nam dag yang rung //pha rol gyi ni sems kyang mkhyen//gang dang gang du sngon gnas pa//sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa dang //sems can 'gro dang 'ong ba yi/
66a7('dul ba): 'chi 'pho dang ni skye ba mkhyen//zag pa zad cing mi ldan pas//nyer ni shin tu mya ngani 'das//dbang bzhi zhing thugs zhi ga/mtshan gang ba bzhin du gnas//pad+ma
66b1('dul ba): na glang po che//pad+ma drug cu lon pa ltar//mthong na ngoms ni mi shes pas//bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur//ri bo bcom ldan 'di 'dra ste//de yi sku ni skyes chen gyi//sum//
66b2('dul ba): cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing //gzi brjid me yi phung po bzhin//gang gis lo brgya tshang bar ni//skyob pa'i sngags pa brjod byas kyang //de bzhin go shogs pa tshad med
66b3('dul ba): pas//des ni mthar phyin mi 'gyur ro//bram ze gang gis de mthong ba//de yi rnyed pa bla na med//gang gis mthong nas skyabs srong ba//de yi rnyed pa de bas 'phags//bram
66b4('dul ba): ze ri bo thub chen gyi//bsngags pa thos nas skyo bar gyur//dben pa'i sems kyi rtogs pa yis//ke na'i bu la 'di skad smras//mar gyur pa la bdag gis ni//de 'dra'i
