66b5('dul ba): bsngags pa thos ma myong //ke na 'chad pa dang sbyar na//de ni 'jig rten kun gyis gtso//tshong pa nor dag don gnyer ba//khyod kyis nga rgyal rgyal mtshan spongs/de la
66b6('dul ba): bkur sti gus byos dang //bram ze dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur//bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya yis//slob ma dag gis mdun bdur te//sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzang po der//bram
66b7('dul ba): ze ri bo song bar gyur//lha rnams kyi ni dga' tshal ltar//me tog shing ni phun sum tshogs//rnam par dben zhing sgra med cing //bya yi tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa//mi min/
67a1('dul ba): gdugs pa med rgyu ba//shAkya'i sras kyis bsten pa yi//chos kyi rgyal po'i gan su ni//de nas bram zes zhugs par gyur//ma dul 'dul ba kha lo sgyur//
67a2('dul ba): skyes bu dam pa mthong nas ni//ri bo yaM sa ni tshigs gsol pa//shes ldan cig spyan mi mnga' 'am//ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs can//sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba
67a3('dul ba): bokAs//ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa//ngal nad ni yad min te//nyes pa med cing sgrib pa med//the tshom thams cad rnam par bcad//rnam par grol zhing mi ldan pa//
67a4('dul ba): nga ni zag med thal ba med//'jig rten na ni rdul med rgyu//gtsang zhing dag la dri nga med//des na bram ze nga gtsang ste//kho na dang 'jigs pa kun las rgal//ri bo khyod
67a5('dul ba): kyang 'ong pa legs//stan 'di la ni legs par 'dug/bram ze cig bde 'am khyod//lus ni dal bar ma gyur mod//dpa' bo chen po khyod mthong bas//thub pa chen po de
67a6('dul ba): ltar bde//rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa ltar//yid ni rab tu dga' ba yis//de dang rje su 'tsham pa'i gtam//rim pa bzhin du byas nas ni//de nas bram ze 'dzem
67a7('dul ba): pa dang //dman pa'i yid kyis 'dug par gyur//klog pa dang ni gsang tshig 'dzin//rig byed gsum gyis rigs mthar phyin//bram ze ri bo 'dug nas ni//thub pI/
67b1('dul ba): mtshan la rtogs par byed//'jig rten gyi ni mgon po yi//sku la mtshan ni sum cu mthong //ljags srab mdoms sgra sbubs nub pa//gnyis pa ri bo the tshom za//thub
67b2('dul ba): pa chen po'i mtshan rnams la//the tshom yid gnyis gyur nas ni//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs//bden pa'i mtshan la yongs zhus pa//thub pa chen po'i mtshan /
67b3('dul ba): rnams ni//sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa gang //go'u ta ma khyod kyi sku dag la//gnyis ni g.yar sngar ma bab po//mI yi dam pa 'doms kyi ni//sba ba sbubasu nub lags sam/
67b4('dul ba): ljags bzang zhes na bgyi ba yang //cig thung ba ma lags grang //thub chen bdag gis ci nas kyang //ljags ring glo bar chud 'gyur bar//ljags srab myur du brkyang
67b5('dul ba): mdzod de//bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol//rnam par 'dren rnams 'jig rten du//brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' 'byung //u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin//thub pa
67b6('dul ba): chen po dkon pa lags//sos kwa skom pa chab dang ni//bkris pa la ni g.yang zas dang //nad pasman la ji lta bar//ston pa la ni bkur sti bgyid//ka la bing ka sgra dbyangs ca na/
67b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas//ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa//bram ze the tshom spangs par gyis//ljags kyis spyan dang snyan dag ni//rab tu khebs par ljags ring gis//
68a1('dul ba): zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs par mdzad//rdzu 'phrul bzhi la mkhas pa yi//rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang bstan mdzad pas//thub pa'i 'doms sra sbubs nub pa//
68a2('dul ba): bram ze ri bos mthong bar gyur//thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams la//the tshom med cing zug rngu phyung //sems kyi rtog pa rab dga' nas//ri bo yis ni tshigs gsal ba//sum
68a3('dul ba): cu gnyis dang dpe byad rnams//bdag gis gsang tshig las thos pa//de kun khyod kyi sku 'di la//yongasu rdzogs te ma tshang med//dge dang ldan pas spyod pa bzang //legs pa
68a4('dul ba): lakhrungs pas bston sdug/nyan thos dge 'dun dbus na ni//gdugs bdal po ni lta bur mdzes//dam par bsngags pa khyod la ni//dge sbyong dngos pos ci zhig bgyi//mi
68a5('dul ba): khyu mchog khyod lta bu//dpung gi yan lag bzhi dag dang //rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yin//'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'os//sa bdag rgyal po mdzad nas ni//sa steng 'khor
68a6('dul ba): lo sgyur ba mdzod//ri bong ni rgyal po ste//chos kyi rgyal chen bla na med//da ni sa yi dkyil 'khor 'dir//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed//nga yi rigs ni rgyal rigs te/
68a7('dul ba): ngani dge ba'i rigs las 'khrungs//bdud dpung bcas par bcom nas ni//rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa thob//bram ze dran 'khor lo ste//nga yi shes rab blon pa ma
68b1('dul ba): rtson 'grus shugs mgyogs rta ba ni//btang na dngal 'byung ba yin//nga yi nor bu dam bya na//ting 'dzin mun pa gasngal byed yin//gang snyoms glang chen dam pa ste/
68b2('dul ba): bskul na deng la rgyug pa yin//chags bcas bud med 'dod pa lhur//bram ze dga' 'dod pa yin//bram ze nga yi khyim po dag ni//shin tu sbyangs nor dam pa yin//
68b3('dul ba): mi byang chub yan lcag bdun//'jig rten kun 'das rin chen des//long bar gyur cing gnyid ldog pa'i//skye dgu 'di gsad par bya//phyogs rnams kun+da nas nga rgyal byas
68b4('dul ba): nga lo sngo bo'i dgra yod min//nyon mongs tshogs rnams 'joms pa yi//'khor bzhi po dag nga yi sras//rdzu 'phrul kun dga' phun sum tshogs//lam gyis bzhi mdor
68b5('dul ba): sprul pa byas//mdo sde skyes pa'i rabs dag bkram//skyes bu chen po rnams kyis bsten//rnam thar gsum po sgo mo can//dran pa'i srung ma rnams kyis bsrungs//ngo tsha khrel
68b6('dul ba): yid kyis g.yog pa'o//grong khyer sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis//sten pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs//rgyal po nga ni bzhugs na su//nga yi chos kyis g.yul smad de//chos kyi rdzu
68b7('dul ba): chen brdungs nas ni//bdud rnams mtha' dag bcom byas te//nga ni byang chub phyir dbang bskur//tshad mod pa dag rab bsgoms pa//nga yi rgyan du bdog pa yin//tshangs pa'i
69a1('dul ba): gnas pa bzhi po yis//nyon mongs pa dag rab tu bzlogs//pha rol rab tu rgol bcom ste//rnam par bcom zhing rmeg med byas//srog chags rnams la
69a2('dul ba): 'jig rten 'dir//snang ba sbyin zhing yang dag spyad//nga ni bden par gnas bcas nas//ye shes kyis ni mtshon gyis bcad//rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gnas yin te//zhi gnas dag
69a3('dul ba): ni 'dzin stangs yin//tshul khrims shing rta sgra snyan la//nga yi lhag mthong kha lo sgyur//bzod dang nges pa'i go dgos nas//lam bsgoms pas na g.yul dor ni//gang gis
69a4('dul ba): sgrib pa 'joms pa yi//dbang po la yi dod pa dang //gang gis nyon mongs theg 'jud pa'i//yang dag spong ba bzhi po yis//ngas ni dpa' dro'i g.yul sprad de//chos kyi rnga bo che
69a5('dul ba): brdungs nas//bdud dpung bcas par bcom byas te//da ni byang chub dbang bskur to//rig pas ma rig bcom nas ni//phung po skye zhing 'jig pa can//g.yul gyi rtse mo rgal
69a6('dul ba): tweng //skye dgu byang chub phyir sangs rgyas//gang gis skye dgu gnod byed pa//'jig rten chom rkun chen po gsum//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//de kun du
69a7('dul ba): yis bcomo bso nas//mngon shes kun gyi stobs byung bas//nga ni dgra bcom yon gnas 'os//zhing gshin pa la zhugs pa yis//sbyin sreg rnams kyang len/
69b1('dul ba): ba yin//brtson 'grus dam pa brtsams nas ni//ngas ni zag pa rnams bcom mo//chu bo che las rgal nas ni//bsgral ba'i phyir ni gnas pa yin//ji ltar seng ge mche ba'i stobs//
69b2('dul ba): nagasu srog chags dang phrad nas//chung dang 'bring dang chen po'ang rung //de la mtshungs par snun pa ltar//mi yi seng ge rnamo 'dren pa//rdzogs sangs de bzhin 'jig rten ni//byis
69b3('dul ba): pa'am 'bring ngan chen po la//mnyam par chos ni ston par mdzad//go'u tum khyod kyis 'di ru ni//nad pa bdag gi the tsom sol//zug rngu 'byin pa rnams dang ni//mag mkhan
69b4('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog khyod lags//khyod kyi the tshom bsal bar byas//bram ze khyod ni 'dun par gyis//grags ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//mthong ba rnyed pa dka' ba ste//gang
69b5('dul ba): zhig 'di na rnyed dka' ba//brgya lam na ni lan dga' 'byung //bram ze rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga //chos kyi rgyal po bla med yin//de bzhin gshegs la ris gsol pa//rdzogs
69b6('dul ba): sangs rgyas shes bka' stsal te//ma 'dres 'khor lo skar mdzad na//go'u ta ma ji skad gsung pa bzhin//khyod kyis 'khor lo bskor ba gang //rjesu mkhas pa bskor bgyid pa/
69b7('dul ba): ston pa nyid 'khrungs nyan thos ni//sde dpon dag tu su 'gyur lags//bram ze nga la nyan thos ni//shes rab mtshungs pa'i sras yod pa//nye rgyal zhes ni grags pa'o//mang du
70a1('dul ba): thos pa shA ri'i bu//mdud pa kun las rnams grol ba//nyar ni zag pa med yod de//ngas ni 'khor lo gang skor ba//mkhas pa rjesu bskor bas byed//e mar//
70a2('dul ba): nyan thos phun sum tshogs//e ma'o rin chen dam pa gsung //'jig rten byung ba ngo mtshar che//bzang po khyod kyi nyan thosu//bdag gis g.yer gyis blang bgyis la//kye
70a3('dul ba): mamo'o chos kyi bcad 'tshal nas//shin tu mya ngan 'das par bgyi//sems rtogs rab tu dga' gyur nas//de nas bram ze skye gyur te//dben pa 'dod pa'i sems kyis ni/
70a4('dul ba): 'khor lo 'di skad ces smras so//nags na seng ge sgra 'byin ltar//bsam gtan chen po zug rngu 'byin//spyan dang ldan pas ci gsungs pa//'di ni shes ldan dag nyon
70a5('dul ba): cig/gang dgra 'dod pa rjesu song //gang dag mi 'dod de dag deng //shes ldan mchog gi bstan pa la//de ring kho na rab 'byung ngo //tshangs spyod 'di la legs spyad cing //
70a6('dul ba): lam nyid shin tu goms byas na//bag yod pa la gnas pa yi//rab byung 'bras bu bcas par 'byung //gal te khyed cig rab 'byung zhing //bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod/
70a7('dul ba): na ni//bram ze ral pa 'dir bregs te//bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bya//sems rtogs rab tu mgu gyur nas//sor mo bcu yis thal sbyar te//bla gos phrag ma gcig
70b1('dul ba): gzar nas//bram ze ri bos de gsol pa//bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po//'di dag thal sbyar 'khod pa ni//thub chen rab tu 'byung ba dang //bsnyen par rdzogs par thob par 'tshul/
70b2('dul ba): de nas ston pa thugs rje can//drang srong chen po thugs brtse bas//dge slong tshur shog bka' stsal pas//de dge bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur//shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/
70b3('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul ldan pa mo'u dag la dang //dga' yod gnas brtan ka pi ni//spobs pa rtogs par khong du chud//chu bo bzang po'i 'gram du ni//yid du 'ong ba'i tshal khrod du//spobs pa
70b4('dul ba): byibyung ba'i gnas brtan gyis//de dag la ni gdams ngag phog/der ni de la chos kyi tam//rje su 'thun par de shes nas//ring po ma thogs rnam grol te//dam pa'i don la
70b5('dul ba): rab tu bkod//de dag mthong thob bde gyur pas//mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das//sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la//rab tu mgu bas phyag byaso//dam pa'i chos dang
70b6('dul ba): tshogs gtso dang //rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bslab pa dang //ting 'dzin dang bged pa dang //bge yod pa la phyag byaso//de bas bdag la phan 'dod pa'am//bdag nyid
70b7('dul ba): chen po mngon 'dod pas//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun lo//bkur bsti byos la skyeb su dang //'di ni de nyid gzigs pa yis//'jig rten na ni skyabasu bsngags//
71a1('dul ba): gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la//de bdun ni rang sbyin mdzad//chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen//sangs rgyas bstan pa chos can//dag tu rna
71a2('dul ba): mchog gyur la//thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu bsten//ke na'i bu'i tshigasu bcad pardzog so//de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shin rjes rgyu
71a3('dul ba): zhing gshegs te//kra shi'i tshong rdal du byin to//ka shi'i tshong rdal de na//sngon 'dreg mkhan byed byed pa rab tu byung ba pha bad gnyis shig yod pa las//bus smras pa pi bcom
71a4('dul ba): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs na//gtsug log khang du byon pa bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun sku mnyel
71a5('dul ba): gyis//ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drang na/de la ji khyod thug pa sdu gon byed dmangon te dge slong gi kyi tshu
71a6('dul ba): spyan 'dren//des smras pa/khyod song la dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs shig/nga ni thug pa ste gon byed do//des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang so//de yang me long zhi /
71a7('dul ba): thogs nas//tshong dus su song ba las//des den tshong dpon nog sgra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas//des de la me long bstan pa dang /des smras pa/dpag sgra 'di lta bu'i mkhyen
71b1('dul ba): pa yang mnga' 'am//des smras pa/yod do//gal te mnga' na rigs shig/des breg par brtsams pa dang /khyim bdag gnyid log nas bregs zin pa dang sad do//des smras
71b2('dul ba): pa/'phags pa bregs legs sam//khyim bdag bregs zin to//de mgu nas smras pa/'phags pa bdag lhag par glo ba dgas//khyod mchog ci bzhed pa don
71b3('dul ba): des smras pa/kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun nas thug la sprin drangs kyis//nas thug byin cig/des smras pa/'phags pa nas thugs ste khyod
71b4('dul ba): la tsi rung /bza' ba dang /bca' ba bsod pa dag dbul gyis/btsud pa spyan drongs shig/nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas dri song ngo //de nas khyim bdag des gtsang
71b5('dul ba): zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams po nyid la bzhug so//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bza' ba dang /bca' ba
71b6('dul ba): bsod pa dag brim pa na//dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa//bdag cag ngan pa la mgron du bos na//kha zas dra sod pa 'di bdag cag gis ji ltar blangs zhes//de rnams
71b7('dul ba): kyis ma blangs pa'i skabs de//dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gal te ngan pa la 'gron du bos la//
72a1('dul ba): kha zas bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa//nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni//dge slong
72a2('dul ba): dag rigs dang 'thun pa'i snod thogs pa las gyur gyis/de lta bas na dge slong gis rang gi bzo bsten par mi bya//rigs dang 'thun pa'i snod kyang bsrel bar mi bya'o//srel
72a3('dul ba): na'agal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//sngon snun pa yin na/gtsa' khab kyi snod srel ba dang /sngon yi ge pA yin na//ram phyis bsrel ba dang /bzang mkhan rab tu byung ba
72a4('dul ba): khab ral bsrel ba ni mi gtog so//bcom ldan 'das kyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te//sdig can du byon nas/sdig can na srin bu phrad pa'i tshal sdug pa na
72a5('dul ba): bzhug so//sdig can na tshe dang ldan pa kun dge' bo'i nang po byad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de shin tu dang ba zhig ste/bcom ldan 'das
72a6('dul ba): sdig can gyi gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te sdig can du byon nas//sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i chol stug po na gzhug so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang gros byu ba
72a7('dul ba): brtsams pa/shis ldan dge bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa ni/sdig can du byin nas/sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po ni bzhugaso
72b1('dul ba): zhes thos kyis//gal te bdag cag re res sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na//gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas/ye khyims shan/
72b2('dul ba): bca' bar bya ste//bdag cag sus kyang gcig pus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar mi bya zhing /bdag cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs
72b3('dul ba): tshod gsol bar bya'o//bdag cag las gang zhig gcig pu kho nas gdugs tshod gsol na/de la chags kyis kar shA pan drug cu'i chad pas bcad do//de nas sdig cen
72b4('dul ba): gyi rgyud thams cad 'dus nas//bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu
72b5('dul ba): 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis sdig cen gyi gyad rnams la zhes bya ba nas/yod dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
72b6('dul ba): nas cang mi gsung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams bstan las langs te/blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang
72b7('dul ba): na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag cag gi sdum par
73a1('dul ba): gzugs chod sbyor zhing mchis nA/gnang bar mdzad du gsal//bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang //de nas
73a2('dul ba): sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rigs nas//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba la mngon par dga' ste rje su yi rang nas/bcom
73a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyug byas te/stan las langs te song ngo //de nas kyad sna chen po la gtig pa 'od ldan ni de nyid na 'dug pa dang /de mtshe dang
73a4('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/'od ldan khyod dad par gyur tam ci/des smras pa/bdag dad par mi gyur mod kyis/'on kyang tshogs kyi khrimasu bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/
73a5('dul ba): ker sha pa na drug cu'i chad pas bcad do zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o//khyod chad pas 'jigs nas/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig/btsun
73a6('dul ba): pa de lta lagaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom
73a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni sangs rgyas la mngon par ma dang /chos la ma lags dge 'dun la ma
73b1('dul ba): san//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar 'di sangs rgyaspru la mngon par dang cid/chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos lags par bshad du gsol/
73b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad sna chen po la rtogs pa 'od ldan la gang thos pas gyad sna
73b3('dul ba): chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzodado//de nas gyang sna tshon
73b4('dul ba): sol gtogs pa 'od ldan sten las langs te/bla gos phyug pa gcig tu gzar nas//bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mog su bral mo sbyar ba bdud de/bcom ldan 'ang
73b5('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mtshos na gnang bar mdzad gsol/
73b6('dul ba): 'od ldan da sngar sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis spyan drangs zin to//bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang dzI wAr sdig can gyi gyud rnams btub pa de ltar bdag bgyid/
73b7('dul ba): do//'od ldan gal te sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub na//de bzhin du ngas khyod la gan //de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhas
74a1('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/stan las langs te chas nas/sdig can gyi gyad rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /sdig can gyi gyad rnams///
74a2('dul ba): la 'di skad ces smraso//shes ldan dag r-i shig sdod cig/bdag gi thog mar bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/de'i 'og tu khyed
74a3('dul ba): cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gdags tshad gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro//de rnams kyis smras pa//kho bo cag gis sngar sangs rgyas
74a4('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs zin pas//kho bo cag mi nyan to//des smras pa ji ste mi btub na//bca' ba dang btung ba re re zhing brim mo//de ni ma dad pa gang
74a5('dul ba): yin pa de dag gis smras pa//mi gnong ngo //dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di dad pa med pa zhig las 'dis dge 'dun mnga' ba'i yon dag
74a6('dul ba): 'bul bar 'gyur bas gnang ngo //zhes de rnams kyis de la gnang ngo //de nas des g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste bsgo ba/shes ldan dag kho bos yo byad thams cad
74a7('dul ba): sbar gyis//bca' ba gcig bu gang kho nas 'drangs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sta gon gyis shig/des dri zhim po smra ba dag kyis rdzas la sogs pa dang ljon pa'i yo byad
74b1('dul ba): rnams phag pa dang /de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis yongasu rgyas pa re res re re 'drangs par 'gyur ba'i bca' ba gang yin pa dag byaso//de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi nub
74b2('dul ba): mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas gyad sna chen po la
74b3('dul ba): gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' bo dang /btung ba bram par brtsams pa dang /dge slong rnams 'gyod pas longs ma spyad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yon
74b4('dul ba): bdag la blta bar bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la bltas pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis
74b5('dul ba): bdag cag bslas legs kyis bzhes shig/de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba brims pa dang /de kho nas dge slong rnams 'brangs te//bcom ldan
74b6('dul ba): 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs pas sdig can gyis gyad rnams kyi zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to//nyi ma gzhan zhig la dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
74b7('dul ba): dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/sangs rgyas tshur spyon/chos tshur spyon/dge 'dun tshur spyan/'di dag snom shig/dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs/bcom ldan
75a1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka sbrul pa/so bo bo la sbyin nan/na te bcom ldan 'das nadrug N+DIs rnams sna mchog gang yin pa la du nas nus par //
75a2('dul ba): te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'i zhes sman bdag gir myi bye'o//'on te bdag cag gi sangs rgyas ni khyod nyid lags zhes sprin blangs pa
75a3('dul ba): ste//'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//de bzhin du chos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de lnga 'am zhes brjod par bya zhing /dge 'dun tshogs rnams
75a4('dul ba): kyis mchog ga yin pa de la 'am zhes rgyusmra par sbyar bar bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//khyim+b+ha bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsgo
75a5('dul ba): khang la spyan drang so//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa so ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu sbyor bu lang tshil babye pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa//bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring por ma lon pa/
75a6('dul ba): 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma len pa des bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis nyung ngu byin pa dang /gang gis mung du byin pa dang /gang gis band
75a7('dul ba): byin pa dang /gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang /gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rje su yi ngang ba de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi skal pa can du 'gyur//
75b1('dul ba): zhes gsungs kyis/ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas des shing gshegs par brtsams pa las/rdza na man shing rul pa zhig ga ser ka nas sbrul gdug bzhag
75b2('dul ba): rgyu nas/rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la zin pa dang /do dag ga shugs kyis brtul nas sa la 'gyul te/slu bar sdug cad bzhin yad gyur/mig gyur te/de myur
75b3('dul ba): g+sa bsngal ba/bram ze dang /khyim byu ga rnams kyis na sa smras po//shes ldan dag 'di khyim bdag smon ni zla yin/gzhan dag gis smras pa/ga ma ga
75b4('dul ba): gau'o//de dag gis smras pa/dge sbyo shUny+tsa'i sras mgon med rnams kyi nang du rab tu hU~M gi grol te rab tu mi byung bar gyur na/du rnams kyis 'di la dbyung byas bzhig
75b5('dul ba): ces pa'i sbubs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/sman pa las dris li dbyung byos shig/dge slong dag gi
75b6('dul ba): sman pa la dris pa dang /des smras pa 'phags pa sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs de/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
75b7('dul ba): baM/sman pas bstan na sbyin par bya'o//dge slong dag gi zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/de rnams kyis sbyin pa la dris pa dang /des smras pa/'phags pa dag sbyong nying
76a1('dul ba): kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa/thams cad gzigs pa kho na yin te/de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
76a2('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag zas sbyar ba ni/lci ba dang /gcin dang /thal ba dang /sa'o//de la lci ba ni byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i
76a3('dul ba): be'u rnams kyi'o//gcin yang de kho ba'o//thal bA ni shing lnga po//kan tsa nau'i dang /ka pi da ka'i dang /a shwa tha'i dang /u dum ba ra'i dang /n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o//sa ni sa lAs
76a4('dul ba): sor bzhi'i 'og nas phyung ba'o//'di ni sbyar ba'i zas yino//de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sa ri la zas sbyar ba byin na/'on kyang sos por ma gyur pa'i skabs de//
76a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga las rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kun
76a6('dul ba): chub par byas te/dge slong se ri la srung ba dang /yongasu bskyab pa dang /yongasu bzung ba dang /dug gzhil ba dang /chad pa spang ba dang /dug bsad pa dang /mtshams
76a7('dul ba): bcad pa dang /sa bcing bar nus sa me/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal tu gsol//mnyan te bgyi'o//'dul ba gzhi///
76b1('dul ba): bam po drug cu pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rma bya chen mo'i rigs sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//chos la phyag 'tshal lo//dge
76b2('dul ba): 'dun la phyag 'tshalo//'di lta ste/a ma le/bi ma le/nir ma le/mang ge le/hi ra N+ye hi ra N+ya gan+d+ho/b+ha dre su b+ha dre/sa man ta b+ha dre/shrI b+hU dre/sarbo ar+tha sA d+ha Ni/pA rA
76b3('dul ba): mAn+ma sA d+ho ni/sarba a nan+da/pra sha ma ni/sarba mang ga la sA d+ha ni ma na so ma hA mA nA se a ts+tshad te/id b+hA te/ad t+yed b+hU te/mu ka te/mo tsa ni/mok+Sha ni/a ra dze/ngi
76b4('dul ba): ra dze/a mri te/a ma re/a ma ra Ni/brah+ma/brah+ma swa re/pU ra Ne/pUr+Na/me ne re the/mukaM to/dzI bat+te/sa ri/gnod pa dang /'jigs pa dang /nad thams cad las
76b5('dul ba): srungs shig swA hA//btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags blangs nas/dge slong sa ri la bde
76b6('dul ba): lagasu 'gyur bar byas pas/dug med nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/
76b7('dul ba): zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags sman pa dang /gtses spras bgyid pa ngo mtshar che lag so//dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig
77a1('dul ba): ma yin te/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi khom par gyur pa na/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos phan pa dang /gces smras byas
77a2('dul ba): pabade nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la/rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/de nang par rma bya chen mo'i
77a3('dul ba): rig sngags 'dris bde legasu 'gyur ba byas te/nyin mo bde legasu gnas/nub kar bde legasu 'gyur ba byas te/mtshan mo bde legasu gnas so//de dus gzhan
77a4('dul ba): zhig na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhags par chags/'dod pa rnams la zhe na/chums/brgya la//myos rab tu rmod/rab tu brgyal te/bag med pas nags kyi rma bya mo rab tu mang
77a5('dul ba): po rnams dang lhan cig tu kun dga'i ra ba nas/kun dga'i ra ba dang /bskyed mos tshol nas bskyed mos tshal dang /ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngosu rgyu ba las/ji tsam na ri'i sar
77a6('dul ba): gzhig tu zhugs pa dang /de der yun ring du phyir rgol ba/dgrar gyur po/'tshe bar gyur pa/glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya snyis bzung ste//de ni mi mdza' ba'i nang
77a7('dul ba): du son pa dang /rab tu rmongs par dran pa rnyed nas/rma bya chen mo'i rig pa 'di kho na yid la byaso//'di lta ste/a ma le/bi ma la/nir ma la/mang ba l+ye/hi ra N+ye tir
77b1('dul ba): N+yodz+ye gar+b+he/b+ha dre/su b+ha dre/sa man ta/b+ha dre/shrI b+hA dre/sarba an+d+ra sA d+ha ni/ba ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/sarba a nan+na/pra sha ma ni/sarba mang gA la sA d+ha ni/mA nA si/mA na si/mahA
77b2('dul ba): mA na si/ad ts+yud taM/ad b+hU te/ad t+yed b+h+r-i te/muka te/mo tsa ni/mok+Sha ni/u ri dzi/bi ra dze/a ma re/a mri tAM/a ma ra ni brah+ma sA ri/pU ra NaM/pUr+Na/ma no ra the/
77b3('dul ba): muka te/dzI ban te/bdag gi nod pa thams cad las srungs shig swA hA//de rma bya'i snyi chad nas bros so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya'i rgyal po gse
77b4('dul ba): du snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/de na yang nga la rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang /gces spras byaso//da ltar na yang nga'i rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis
77b5('dul ba): phan pa dang /gces spras byaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyis dge slong sa ri la ci tsam bde legasu 'gyur ba bgyis pa la gzigs/dge slong dag da ltar
77b6('dul ba): 'ba' shig ma yin gyi/ji ltar 'das pa'i de yang nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung bA ra na se'i grong khyer na/sbrul sngags mkhan zhig yod//rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sbrul
77b7('dul ba): gyis zin nas de shi ba dang /sbrul sngags mkhan gyis rig sngags kyi de sos par byas so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sbrul sngags mkhan gang
78a1('dul ba): yin de ni nga nyid yin no//de'atsha de 'dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni dge sbyongs ri yin no//snyun kyi klu ni rdzogs/
78a2('dul ba): gos kyi gluzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom ni/'tsho byed dang ni gso rAs dang //de bzhin kha char ring po dang //dbyar ral bar ni rig bya dang //'chi ba'i dus dang nye dga' dang /
78a3('dul ba): mdag ni nad pa yin//bsdus pa'i sdom no//'tsho byed dang ni gsum 'dra ba dang //dbyar gyi ras chen gding ba dang //g.yan po bde gshegs mi ni dar dang //bal dang
78a4('dul ba): nazar ma'i ras//sdom la/dum bu sa skyong seng ge dang //de bzhin yangs par song ba dang //sems 'phrog drang srong sa 'tsho dang //a mra skyong dang 'jigs med dang /
78a5('dul ba): tshang dpon chung ma rigs skyes dang //sman pa yi ni yud dang ni//rdo 'jog dang ni bzang byed dang //u dum par gzhal ba dang //bskyed dang rgyal chen bskyed mes tshal/
78a6('dul ba): bcom brlag byung dang bud med srul la / mi med rkyen gyis//rgyal po'i khab bdun pa ni lnga dang //'tsho byed sde mtshan bsdus pa yin//lus 'phag sma na rgyal
78a7('dul ba): 'phags skyes po zhes bye'o/'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /mo legs pa/skye bo dang /me mang ngos ga nga ban rgyal srid byed du 'jug/de'i blon
78b1('dul ba): bodum du la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa las/blon po'i mchog dum dus chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/tha snyad du bya ba yang rigs pas lta bar byed do//des na skyes/
78b2('dul ba): pa'i tshogs thams cad de'i ngor ltas shing 'dug go//des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' 'gur spyod par byed de
78b3('dul ba): dertse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/de'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu zhes bya ba nas/so skyong zhes bya bar
78b4('dul ba): btag so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de yang rtse bar byed//dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/gong ma bzhin du rgyas por sbyar te/
78b5('dul ba): dedon seng ge zhes bya bar btag so//sa skyong dang /seng ge ri mau gyis gzhon nur gyur na yang /blon po'i mchog dum du ni thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol gnon pa gnas lnga la
78b6('dul ba): byung ba yin te/des na blon po rnams kyi mo tshig tu gyur to//gang gi tshe bu'i mthu skyes pa de'i tshe lhag par yang blon pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te 'dug go/de nas blon po de rnam
78b7('dul ba): d+hiskyil gyis non pas/mi bzod pa skyes nas/phan tshun du gros byas te rgyal po'i drung du dong ngo //de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la smras pa/lha rgyal po su lags/
79a1('dul ba): des smras pa/shes ldan dag gis brtag tu nI yod/rgyal po lha yin mong /gzhan su zhig yin/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha rgyal po ni dum bu
79a2('dul ba): lags kyi/lha ma lagaso//gal te de tshal bar gyur na/lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pa na bcings te/rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyu ro//
79a3('dul ba): rgyal pos bsam pa des 'di dag thams cad zil kyis mnan pas/des na dben byedado snyamo//ri shig dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor te
79a4('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /blon po'i mchog dum bu rgol ba dang /phyir rgol ba brgya stong gis yongasu bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs te/rgyal po'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas
79a5('dul ba): 'dug go//gang gi tshe rgyal skyid kyi bya ba byas nas phyir byung po de'i tshe/yang rgyal po'i pho brang de stong par 'dug/rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs tha~Md
79a6('dul ba): phyir byung bar gyur ta ma/blon po rnams kyis glags rnyed nas de nas de rnams kyis smras pa/gang gi slad du snyan du gsol ba/lhas spyan sngar bde lags mod/gal te/
79a7('dul ba): dum bu 'tshal bar gyur na/lha rgyal sred las phyung nas/rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings te/rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur//rgyal po rnams ni khwa ltar//
79b1('dul ba): jam 'byig zla ba yin pas/des bsnams pa/'di rnams kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du gdon mi zla'o snyam nas da de la k+Shan ka tshul bar gyur tu//'jig rten ni mAH/
79b2('dul ba): ba dang /mi mdza' ba dang /bar ma yod pas/ji tsam na gzhan dag gis dum bu la smras pa/khyod la rgyal po klan ka tshol zhing 'dug gis thabs legs par soms shig
79b3('dul ba): de rtogs pa skyes shing de dpyod pa la zhugs pa/gang du 'gro/glal te mnyan yang du song na ni/mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i mnga' ris yin pas/nyen 'di nyid yod do/
79b4('dul ba): de bzhin du bI rA na se dang /rgyal po'i khab dang /tsam pa yang gcig gi dbang du gyur pas nyen 'di yod do//yangs pa can ni tshogs kyi dbang yin te/bcu dga' ba ga
79b5('dul ba): yin pa de la ni/nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur bas/de yangs pa can du 'gro'o snyam nas/de yangs pa can gyis li tsa byi rnams la bdag ni khyed cag gi dpung gi phag na 'dus
79b6('dul ba): par 'dod do//zhes phyeny+tsa btang ngo //de rnams kyis gus pa'i tshul gyis lan spyad pa/yungs pa can 'dir byon pa legs kyis skyon grucig/de nas blon po'i mchun
79b7('dul ba): dum bus nye du rnams bos te smras pa/shes ldan ba dag ni yangs pa can du rgya gr-i hU~M/khyed cag las gang dag 'dir dga' ba de dag ni 'dug shig/gang dag
80a1('dul ba): 'dod pa dag ni sta gon gyis shig dang 'dong ngo //ba lang rdzi dang /phyug rdzi rnams ma bzla ba/khyod cag gis ba lcang dang /ma he yangs pa can/
80a2('dul ba): gang na ba der sbyongs shig/zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/yangs pa can du 'dong gis go rgyan cig/de nas skye ba'i tshogs ltan de sta gon byed du bcug nas/rgyal
80a3('dul ba): po'i drung du song ste/rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/lha bgyi ba cung zhig mchis te/bskyed mos tshal du mtshon/gzig su gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/de bzhin
80a4('dul ba): byas song shig/des bskyed mos tshal byi dador byas nas/nor gces pas shing rta bkang ste/steng bzo' ba dang /bca' bas g.yogs nas song ngo //blon po rnams kyis
80a5('dul ba): dum bu zos so zhes bya bya thos nas/ngo rnams rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung du dong nas smras baM/sgyu dum bu ni bros so//rgyu la pos smras pa/dngal slar khug shig/
80a6('dul ba): de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas/bsnyugs te smras pa/dum bu ltas bku' stsal gyis/slar log shig/des smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed
80a7('dul ba): cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma'o dum bu shi 'am bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de tshogs chung ngus grub kyis dengs shig/kho bo ni bros pa yin no//
80b1('dul ba): da rnams rgyal po'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir/mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas/log ste rgyal po la smras pa/lha blon po'i mchog dum bu ni bros so//rgyal pos smras pa/
80b2('dul ba): ma leg so snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/dum bu yang rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin to//de'i tshe yangs btsA na rigs gsum du gnas te/rigs dang po na ni khang
80b3('dul ba): brtseg ma bdun stong pa gam gser las byaso//ris bar ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma khri bzhi stong pa gam dngul las byas//ri si tha ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma nyi khri cig stong pa gam zangs
80b4('dul ba): las byas pa ste/de rnams na ni mi dam pa dang /bar ma dang /phal pa rnams ci rigs par gnaso//yangs pa can gyis khrimasu bcas te bzhag pa ni/ris dang por bu mo btsas
80b5('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de ni/ris dang po nyid du gtong bar byed kyi/bar mar ma yin/tha mar ma yin no//bar ma'i gang yin pa de ni/ris dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do//tha ma'i
80b6('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni ris gsum char du gtong bar byed de/bud med rnams ni yangs pa can ma gtogs par gzhan du mi gtong zhing /mi 'byin to//bud med rin po che ni su la yang mi
80b7('dul ba): btong bar tshogs spyi'i yangasu longs spyad pa kho nor byed do//dum bu ni skyes bu dam pa yino zhes te/ris dang por khang pa byin nas/don gnas par brtsams pa las/gang gi tshe tshe
81a1('dul ba): 'dus pa de'i tshe/de bos kyang 'dur ma btub nas/de la yangs pa can gyi mi tsa byi rnams kyis smras pa/dum bu khyod ci'i phyir mi 'du/de smras
81a2('dul ba): pa/'du ba kho na las bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas bdag mi 'du'o//yangs pa can rnams kyis smras pa/dum bu 'dus shig/'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung /des
81a3('dul ba): 'dus par brtsams nas/blo gros ma byin no//de rnams kyis smras pa/dum bu blo gros byin cig/des smras pa/gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas na/
81a4('dul ba): blo gros ni mi sbyin no//de rnams kyis smras pa/blo gros byin cig/'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung /de tshogs dang lhan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin to//sngon yongs
81a5('dul ba): pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams gang su la yang rung yi ge spring bar byed na/rtsub po dang bcas par spring bar byed do//gang gi tshe dum bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe/'jam po dang bcas
81a6('dul ba): byar yi ge spring por byed do//gang dag la 'jam pa dang bcos pa'i yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/shes ldan dag/gang gis na yangs pa can gyi
81a7('dul ba): tshogs sngon rtsub po dang /bcas par spring bar byed pa las/du 'jam po dang bcas par byed par gyur pa lo ci zhi go yod/gzhan dag gis smras pa/khyad par yod do//
81b1('dul ba): lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchog dum bu der 'ongs nas/de dag de'i blo gros bzhin byed de/ngas na de ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed do//dum bus sa sbyong dang
81b2('dul ba): seng ge khyim phub nas/seng ge rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo cig btsas te/de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gos can zhes bya bar
81b3('dul ba): btag so//de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/khye'u zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/des pa sgrog dang bral nas/rang nyid cod pan bcings te/rgyal srid byed par 'gyuraro zhes
81b4('dul ba): lung bstan to//de yang rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig bcas te/de'i bcas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/nyi gos can zhes bya bar
81b5('dul ba): gtags so//de yang ltas mkhon rnams kyis mthong nas/bu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan to//sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pa yangs pa can gyi li
81b6('dul ba): tsa byi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang /bskyed mes tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras pa/yangs pa can gyi li tsaM byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis/
81b7('dul ba): de dag gi bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma byos shig ces des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas/bskyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis durl-i bu laM smras pa/khyod kyi bus yangs pa
82a1('dul ba): can gyis mi li tsa byi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/li tsa byi 'di dag ni gdugs pa rtsal po che yin pas/'di la gnod pa byas
82a2('dul ba): su 'ong gis/'di skar bzlog shig/des de bkug nas smras pa/bu yangs pa can gyi lo tse byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/'di dag gi bskyed mos tshal ma rung bar
82a3('dul ba): ma bya shig/de dag gis gnod pa byas su re/des smras pa/yab 'di dag la ni bskyed mos tshil mchis na/bdag cag la ma mchiso//des smos pa/bu bskyed mos
82a4('dul ba): tshal gyi don du tshogs la gsol ba gdab bo//des tshogs la gsol ba btab bo//shes ldan dag bdag gi bu gnyis la bskyed mos tshul ma mchis kyis/bdag la
82a5('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal cig thugs dpag mdzad pa'i rigaso//de rnams kyis de dag la bskyed mos tshal rnying pa pa zhig byin pa las/de na shing sa la chen po zhig yod de/de la
82a6('dul ba): gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed du bcug go//gcig shos kyis ni zhal sros byaso//de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du
82a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa tsan+d+ra na/so sbyong dang /seng ge'i shing sa la'i tshal na bzhugs zhes brjod do//
82b1('dul ba): sa skyong gis bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas//li tsa byi rnams smod par byed/gzhog 'phyas byed/kha zer bar byed do//de nas dum bus bkug ste bsgo ba/bu khyod chog
82b2('dul ba): 'khrug par mi byed par/ri bor che ge mo zhog tu song la/der rang gi zhing blas kyis mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug shig/de der song nas rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhanam/
82b3('dul ba): tabya bar brtsams so//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas/de rnams kyis blon po'i cho ga dum bur sde dpon du bcug pa las/des kyang dus thung ngu zhig/
82b4('dul ba): tu chos dang 'thun pas sde dpon byas nas shi'o//yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas/su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces byas pa dang /de nas kha cig gis smras pa/blon po'i mcho
82b5('dul ba): dum bus tshogs yongasu bskyangs pas na de nyid kyi bu gzhugo/kha cig gis smras pa/de'i bu sa skyong ni gdug pa/rtsal po che zhig ste/gal te sde dpon du cug na/gdon mi za bar
82b6('dul ba): tshogs phye bar 'gyur//de'i nu bo seng ge gang yin pa de ni nges pa/'grogs na bde ba/tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa zhig phas/gal te chags 'dod na/sde dpon
82b7('dul ba): du bzhug go/thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no//des smras pa/sa skyong ni bdag gi phu bo yin pas de
83a1('dul ba): sde dpon du chug shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/seng ge sde dpon khyod kyi rigs brgyud kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci/tshogs gang la 'drang ba
83a2('dul ba): des sde dpon bya bar zad mod/gal te khyod mi 'dod na kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du bzhug go/des bsams pa gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor
83a3('dul ba): na/de ni mi 'os pas yi ge bku ro snyam nas des khas blangs pa dang /de rnams kyis bkur bsti chen pos sde dpon du bcugo/yangs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge
83a4('dul ba): spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri ba las/gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe/seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa
83a5('dul ba): zhes 'dri bar bya'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ri bor na sa skyong /rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri 'or gang yin pa der spring ba 'ongs pa dang /sa
83a6('dul ba): skyong gis phye ste klags nas/des smras pa/shes ldan dag sngon ni yangs pa can gyis tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/da ni seng
83a7('dul ba): go la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ci kho bo'i pha shi 'am/de rnams kyis smras pa/shi'o/de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste
83b1('dul ba): smras pa/phu lho nga 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba cig rigs sam/seng ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang /de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas
83b2('dul ba): bsams pa/bdag la yangs pa can rnams kyis bkur bsti ma yin pa byas kyis/rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o snyam nas/des rgyal po gzugs cani snying po la bdag lha'i btsan
83b3('dul ba): phyug na mchis par 'tshal lo zhes pho nya btango //des de la sprid pa/'ong ba legs kyis shog shig ces spring ba/de rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang /de nas rgyal po gzugs
83b4('dul ba): con snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcugo/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de/sems
83b5('dul ba): khongasu chud cing 'dug pa de sa skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/lha ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad de/thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/des smras pa/nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na/
83b6('dul ba): ci'i phyir sems khongs chud cing mi 'dug/lha thong thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis
83b7('dul ba): na/de la gcig la ni ba 'gum pa'i bu gcig bca' bar 'gyur/gcig shos la ni mtshan phun sum tshogs pa cig btsa'i bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan na/lho'i ched du
84a1('dul ba): de gang khrid de mchi/bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa btsa' bar 'gyur ro//zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'o//de nus skyong gis seng ge la spring /
84a2('dul ba): bskor kyang khyed kho na la bdag 'dri bar zad kyi/khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshong ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid sheso//ji ltar tshogs kyis khrimasu bcas pa
84a3('dul ba): yangs pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi btango zhes bcas mod kyi/'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te/bskyed mos tshol du sdod cig dang /kho bos de bskyed mos tshal du byud dang /
84a4('dul ba): khyod kyis khrid de song shig/de nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la mchi phyag byas nas shing rta zhugs te/yangs pa can du song ba las/rim gyis phyin nas bskyed mos tshal du
84a5('dul ba): bsdad do//de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srungs zhig shi nas mi ma yin pa rnamasu skyes pa des yangs pa can rnams la bstan pa/bdag ni mi ma yin pa rnam su skyes kyis
84a6('dul ba): bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la/mgul bar dril sbyongs shig dang /gal te yangs pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' shig 'ongs na/bdag gis ji tsam
84b1('dul ba): du zin pa'am/'bros par gyur pa srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o//de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dri btags te/gar dang /glu dang /rol
84b2('dul ba): mo'i sgra dang /gtor ma dang /me tog phreng yo byed kyis sgo khang du bzhag go/sa skyong gis song gi la spring ba/kho bo bskyed mos tshol na sdod kyis byung shig/des yangs pa can gyi
84b3('dul ba): tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste/nye gos can la smras pa/khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis rgyan rnams thogs la/bskyed mas tshal du byung shig/de rgyan rnams
84b4('dul ba): 'dog par brtsams pa dang /gos can gyis mthong nas/des smras pa/ci zhig gi phyir rgyan rnams 'dogs//kho mo bag mar btang ngo //su zhig la/rgyal po gzugs can snying
84b5('dul ba): po la'o//des smras pa/kho mo phu mo yin na/khyod ci ste bag mar btang /gal te de ltar na khyod rgyun thogs shig/de yang smra ba las dril gyi sgra byung //yangs pa can gyi tshig
84b6('dul ba): rod rod por gyur te/bdag cag gi mi 'dza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhug so//seng ge dngangs pas nye gos can yin no snyam nas/gos can khA da myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang /
84b7('dul ba): sa skyong yang de dngos pas/gos can shing rtar bcug ste song ngo //yengs pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin bsnyegs nas/de dang de rnamasu lhan cig 'thob par brtsams pa dang /
85a1('dul ba): de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas/des li tsa byi lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas/des smras pa/shes ldan dag ngas khyod cag las lnga brgya gnad du bsnun
85a2('dul ba): zin gyis/lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar deng shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/nged cig las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do//go phud cig/de rnams
85a3('dul ba): kyis go phud pa dang /lnga brgyas lo 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to//de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yino snyam nas skrag ste bros so//yangs pa can du lhags
85a4('dul ba): nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra la gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams lan klon du gzhugs kyis klegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug
85a5('dul ba): nas/rgya skegs la rgyas btab nas gzhag go zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag/sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/nye gos can
85a6('dul ba): bebs shig/des smras pa/khu gu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te/bdag ni gos can lagaso//khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/de cang mi smra bar 'dug
85a7('dul ba): de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/rgyal po drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/sa skyong 'ongs sam/'ongs pa leg so//lha bdag mchis lags so//
85b1('dul ba): rtaglos can khrod de 'dus sam/sgyu khrid de mchis klu mchis la//khrid da ma mchis kyang ma mchis//ci zhig zer/nye gos can lags sbrum nus/kos can khrid de/
85b2('dul ba): mchi so//bltas khrid de sheg shog/de nang du khrid pa dang /rgyal pos lhag par yang gzugs dang lang tshe phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas
85b3('dul ba): mthong ma thag kho nar/rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/shes ldan dag bu pha gsod pa gang yin pa de ni/rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas gal te nga la bu yod par gyur na/
85b4('dul ba): de btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o//de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pa na/lus 'phags mi zhes
85b5('dul ba): bya bar grag so//de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed//re shig dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dgas kyi
85b6('dul ba): phyir byung ba na bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas//ji tsam na ri dgas mda'i long la btags pas skrag pa zhag/drang srong de'i bsti gnas
85b7('dul ba): su bzhugs shing 'byung ba rgyal po'i medas gnad du bsnun to//de nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/'thab grol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan bzan gdugs
86a1('dul ba): bas kyang gzem par bya bar/ri dgas skyabasu 'ongs ma khyod kyis bsad dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de skad du kha zer ba dang /dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas
86a2('dul ba): smras pa/lha 'di su la g.yar mchis/rgyal pos smras pa/nga la yin na/shes ldan dag/rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/lha de'i chad
86a3('dul ba): pa dgum pa lagaso//gal te de ltar na ngas drang srong de yongasu spangaso//de gsad par brtsams te/de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/rgyal po 'thab krol
86a4('dul ba): can 'das bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa bsad par skos pa gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/yang bsams pa/rgyal po 'di dag/
86a5('dul ba): ni shin tu sbas pa shin tu srungs gshin tu tsas pa yin pas/gal te gzhan du skye po blangs na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyis/rnam pa thams cad du smon lam///
86a6('dul ba): 'dis bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur cig ces byas so//des smon lam log par btab par gos can gyi mngal du skyes so//gang gi nyi ma kho
86a7('dul ba): nal nying mtsham sbyor ba blangs pa nyid kyi nyi ma mo khrag gi tshor bab bo//gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/e ma'o bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha bcod cing bcad cing zos kyang
86b1('dul ba): mu rung snya mo//de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang /rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas rmis pa las/de rnams kyis smras pa/lce 'di ni btsun mo'i rum du seM na
86b2('dul ba): zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lagaso//rgyal po sems khongasu chud de 'dug nas 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig/sel bar 'gyur snyam mo//mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan
86b3('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/lha ras kyi bar rtsang bltam par bgyis te/gsol la/nyid btsun mo la stongs mdzod cig/de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas pa bgos
86b4('dul ba): nas/bdag nyid gos can la bstabs pa dang /des rgyab kyi sha yi no snyam nas zos//de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to//yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/
86b5('dul ba): kye ma'o bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang /de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas khrag blud pas/de 'dod po de dang
86b6('dul ba): yang bral bar gyur to//ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa zhig btsa so//btsas te gang gis nyi ma la bcas pa de nyid
86b7('dul ba): kyi nyi ma la yang khrig gi char bab bo//rgyal nges yang ltas mkhon rnams bkug nas rmas pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/lha bstan bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na/
87a1('dul ba): //gdon ma 'chal bar khye'u 'dres lha sku tshe dang phral na/rlung nyid cod pan bcings te/rgyal skyid dgyid par 'gyur//rgyal pos bsams pa/rnam pa zung
87a2('dul ba): du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyis/'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snya mo//de'i tshe yangs pa can na li 6
87a3('dul ba): byi ming chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/de'i bskyed mos tshal na/a sma'i tshal yod pa las/der glo bur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa/kun dga'i ra ba srud tes
87a4('dul ba): mthong ngo //de ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang /de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang /des ltos mkhan rnams bkug nas dris pa dang /de rnams
87a5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/lha de bsrung du gsol cig dang /dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur 'o/khyim bdag ming chen
87a6('dul ba): gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/bskyed mos tshal der kun nas srungs ma'i mi rnams bkod nas/nyi ma bgrang ba la zhug so//ji tsam na
87a7('dul ba): zha /bdun lon pa dang /bskyed mo sa tshal ngo rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo rnams bsal nas/tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btag shin tu dri zhim po'i pog
87b1('dul ba): ra dag bshams/dang gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/me tog sel mas bkram/klu dang /rol myo'i sgra rnams pa du mu dag dang /mdza' bo dang /gnyen gshes kyi skye
87b2('dul ba): byos yongasu bskor nas/dpal b+h+yo 'byor pa chen pos/chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas/bskyes mos tshal de na/de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur
87b3('dul ba): spyod pa byed pa las/chu shing gi sdong po gas nas/bu mo gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo //de
87b4('dul ba): nas ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang /des smras pa/lha 'di'i ming gdagasu gsol/ming chen gyi smras pa/bu mo 'di ni a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pra/
87b5('dul ba): 'di'i ming a mya skyong ma zhes bya'o//ji tsam na khyim bdag ming chen bskyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste/bu mo a mra skyong ma bskyed bsring+yas te zhes bya ba nas/
87b6('dul ba): chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bor gong ma bzhin du'o//de slong ba'i phyir yul krung krung ba rnams dang /shAkya rnams dang /gzhin ya yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyal
87b7('dul ba): po dang /blon po'i bu dang /tshong pa dang /tshong dpon dang /ded dpon du ma dag 'ongs pa dang /khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsams pa/grong kho na la ma byin pa de kho na snga
88a1('dul ba): bar 'gyur na/'on kyang tshogs kyi khrimasu bcas pas/re shig tshogs la brtago snyam nas/des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/shes ldan
88a2('dul ba): dag/bram ze dang /khyim bdag gis bskyed mos tshal nas/bu ma zhig rnyed pa de bdag gis bsnun/bstod de/bskyed nas/de dag gis rang gi rigs brgyud dang 'tsham
88a3('dul ba): par/'ga' zhig la chung mar sbyin no/tshogs kyis ltos shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrimasu bcas pa/bud med rin po che mi
88a4('dul ba): btang ste/tshogs kyi spyad zhes bcas pa yin gyis/re shig bu mo de ci 'dra ba bltas/khrid de shog shig/des de tshogs kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang /gzugs
88a5('dul ba): dang /lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrad de/kun tu brtags par brtsams nas//khyim bdag 'di ni
88a6('dul ba): bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis/su la yang mi sbyi no//de nas/khyim bdag ming chen yid mi bde zhing /rang gi khyim du song nas/de 'gram pa la lag
88a7('dul ba): pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang /a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/yab ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/bu mo khyod bud med rin po che yin no zhes
88b1('dul ba): tshogs kyis spyad par gyur te/bdag gi sed la rab mardzogaso//srab ci khyod gzhan gyi dbyung du gyur tam/bum sngan rdzogs kyis khrims bcas pa/smad ma rin pa chen tshags sa
88b2('dul ba): do zhes bcustsa la/dang+ga kya bud med rin po che ldan pas/de'i phyir bdag la dbang medado//des smras pa/dem zhig bcas tegal te bdag la tshogs kyis dam pa lnga zhig stsal
88b3('dul ba): ni/bdag gis tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ris dang por khang po sprul pa dang /skyes bu gcig nang du zhugs pa na/gcig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang /nang du 'jug pa
88b4('dul ba): gang yin pa de yang kar sha pa ni lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba drung /gang gi tshe khyim tshul po de'i tshe/bdag gi khyim zhag bdun na rgyal ba dang /bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir
88b5('dul ba): 'byung ba dang /nang du 'jug pa le mi brtags pa'o//ming chen gyis/oM mra skyong ma'i phrin bzlas pa dang /tshogs kyis smras pa/de bzhin du bya ste/ris dang po'i khang pa
88b6('dul ba): hU~Msi gang zlasmra pa la ros dang po'i khang pa ni bud med rin po kho na la 'os so//gaucig nang du zhugs pa na/gcig shes nang du ma 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden
88b7('dul ba): shi/na rnams pani/'di ste/bung me khon bcad yin la/ cig cig nang du zhugs pa dang /gtsog shes kyang nang du thugs ni/gdon sa
89a1('dul ba): bar gcig la cig gsod par 'gyur ro//nang du 'jug pa des kar sha ba na lnga brgya thogs te/nang du 'jug par bya'o//zhes gang smras pa de yang
89a2('dul ba): bden te/gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang /rgyun du dgos so//zhag bdun lon na/khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes smras pa/de yang bden te/sngur rim/phyis byas
89a3('dul ba): kyang rung /de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod//skyes pa rnams phyir byung ba dang /nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go zhes gang smras pa de yang bden to/'di smad 'tshong mo'i yi na
89a4('dul ba): pas/gal te mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang /nang du 'jug pa brtags na/su zhig de'i khyim du 'jug/de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas/tshogs kyis
89a5('dul ba): smad par gyur to//yangs po can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis/dga' dgur spyad pa'i phyir/de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa las/de na kha cig ni yul la chags
89a6('dul ba): chos pa'i phyir/mthong ma thag kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te//kha cig gis ni reg pa kha nas te/de la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya ba ma byas so//des
89a7('dul ba): bsams po/'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyis/thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/
89b1('dul ba): shes ldan dag/gdun rgyal po 'am/blon po 'am/phyug po'am/tshong dpon nA ma/tshong pa 'am/ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig mthong ba de 'dra bdag rtsig pa la dris shig/de/
89b2('dul ba): rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin byis pa dang /de nas e mra skyong ma rgyun rnams kyis brgyan nas/ri mo'i las rnams la so sor brtags te/dris pa/shes ldan dag
89b3('dul ba): 'di dag ni gang zhig/'di dag ni rgyal po rab snang ngo //gzhon 'di gang zhig/kaM sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyu lo//gzhan 'di gang zhig/bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed
89b4('dul ba): do//gzhan 'di gang zhig/ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'o//des de bzhin dris pa dang /de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smraso//de nas
89b5('dul ba): des thams cad la brtags bya dang gzugs can snying po la mig chags nas/des bsams pa/skyes bu 'di lta bur chu zheng gab pas ni/bdag dang lhan cig
89b6('dul ba): druga' dgur spyad phyur nus sgyu mo//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas/blon po'i tshogs
89b7('dul ba): gyis yongasu bskor te 'dug nas/tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/shos ldan dang//sus smad tshong mi ji lta bu mthong /sa skyong gis smras pa/lha re shig gzhan
90a1('dul ba): lta zhog la/yangs btsun na snang 'tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba/shin tu gzugs dang /lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/klu rdul drug cu
90a2('dul ba): rtsa bzhi 'tshal ba/lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchi so//des smras pa/sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa can du dong /de dang lhan cig dga' dgu ra spyod do//
90a3('dul ba): des smras pa/yangs pa can gyi li ci byi rnams ni yun ring po nas gnad pa bgyid pa/slar rgol ba/dgra bo lags pa/khyod la gnod pa bgyi su mchi'o//rgyal
90a4('dul ba): pos smras pa/shes ldan dag/mi rnams ni skyes bu'i dpa' snying can yin pas 'dong ngo //des smras pa/lha gal te don ma mchis pa la/gtsigs chen mdzad na
90a5('dul ba): gshegs mod de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dong /lhan cig yangs pa can du chas te/rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas/sa skyong ni bskyed mos tshal na
90a6('dul ba): sdod do//rgyal po ni a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang /ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo //yang pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams rod rod por gyur nas/shes ldan
90a7('dul ba): dge bdag cag gi mi 'dza' bo zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khro lo zhes sgra gsal ba dang /sgra chen po byung ba dang /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/a sma skyong ma//
90b1('dul ba): la dris pa/bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/lha sdum par nyul bar bgyid do//ci zhig gi phyir/lha'i slad du'o//ji ltar bya/ci 'bros sam/lha mi dgyes par ma mdzad
90b2('dul ba): cig/lha dgung bdun lon dang /bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas/re shig dgung bdun bu rol bas dgyes par mdzod/dgyes dgur mdzod la/dpung
90b3('dul ba): bdun lags dang /dus mkhyen par bgyi'o//de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ji tsam na a mra skyong ma sem+baH/
90b4('dul ba): dang ldan par gyur nas/des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa/lha bdag la sems can zhugs lags so//de la seng ras cig dang /sor gdub
90b5('dul ba): brgya byin nas smras pa/gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyod nyid kyi yin no//'on te khye'u yin na/seng ras 'di bskon la/sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du thogs te/
90b6('dul ba): nga'i drung du skri shig/de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te/snga skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang //dril bu mi 'khrol bar 'dug/de rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan
90b7('dul ba): dag dgra ba byung gis/rjes bzhin btsa lo zhes li tsa byi sbyin 'khor gyi mda' rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyegs pa dang /sa skyed
91a1('dul ba): gis mthong nas/des smras pa/lha yangs pa can gyi lI tsa byi rnams mchin/lha ci 'di dag dang lhan cig thab mo bgyi 'am/'on te shing rta brda'/
91a2('dul ba): des smras pa/nga ni drub pas shing rta ded kyis/khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig thab mo khye shig/dris de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par btsams pa las
91a3('dul ba): yangs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes nas/de rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyis/slar log go//de rnams slar log nas/
91a4('dul ba): yangs pa can du 'ongs te/'dus nas yang khrims bcas pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la yang gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha klon du gzhug
91a5('dul ba): zhes bcaso//ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang /a mra skyong ma la khye'u gzugs bzang po/mdzes pa lta na sdug pa zhig btsaso//btsas nas zhes bya ba nas
91a6('dul ba): bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de yongs pa can gyi l-i tsa bye'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/de rnams kyis mi dga' bo'i tshig
91a7('dul ba): smras pa/bran mo'i khye'u khyod brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni skyes na/pha su yi na/des ngus nas/me'i drung du song ba dang /des smras pa/bu ci'i phyir ngu/
91b1('dul ba): des thams cad rgyus par smras pa dang /bu gal te yang dris dang /nga'i pha lta bu ni khyud cag gcig la yang med do zhes smros shig/gal te su yin zhes smra dang /rgyal po gzugs
91b2('dul ba): can snying po yin zhes smros shig/ji tsam na de de rnams dang lhan cig yang hU~M bor byed pa ltas/de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du smras pa dang /des smras pa/dadI ba sto
91b3('dul ba): ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do//su yin/rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no//de rnams kyis shes ldan dag da ga cag gi dgra gang yin pa de ni 'di'i pha yin no
91b4('dul ba): zhes lhag par yang brdeg so//des ngus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang des bsams pa/yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa cal po che yin te
91b5('dul ba): gal te 'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam mo//de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang /tshong pa rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba de dag des mthong
91b6('dul ba): nas smras pa/sor gtub kyi rgya 'dis snod rgyal thob la dang shi ka dang /sho gam mi gcod par 'gyuraro//khye'u 'di yang rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la/sor gtub kyi rgyu
91b7('dul ba): 'di 'di'i mgul du thags te/rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor zhog shig/de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so//bu laM yang mu tig gi do shal zhog
92a1('dul ba): byin nas smras pa/bu rgyal po dgongs pa'i ched du 'dus dang /mu tig gi do shal rkang pa'i steng du zho ka la 'dzegs te pang du 'dug shig/bal ta
92a2('dul ba): 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go zhes smras pa dang /de la bu pas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes som shig/de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim
92a3('dul ba): gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/de rnams kyis khrus byas te/sor gdub kyi rgya btags nas/rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag pa dang /de rgyal po gang na ba
92a4('dul ba): dur song ste phyin nas ni tig gi do shul rkang pa la bzhag nas 'dzegs te pang du 'dug/rgyal po sa smras pa/shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes pa zhig na/
92a5('dul ba): des smras pa/yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun du smras pas/rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs
92a6('dul ba): med ces bya bar grag so////'dul ba ga ni/bam po drug cu gcig pa/rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi bud
92a7('dul ba): med la ldog par chags pas/glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnamasu song nas/mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do//de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na
92b1('dul ba): tshong dpon phyug pa/nor mang ba longs spyod cha ba zhig yod pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas shes bya ba nas/dga' dgur spyod par byedado//zhes bya ba'i bar gong
92b2('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o//des dus gzhan zhig na/chung ma la skyes pa/bzang mo zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o//des smras pa//rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig
92b3('dul ba): do zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo //de yang kha zas zhim po dang /gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che
92b4('dul ba): la zhon nas/de'i khyim drung nas song ba dang /des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas/rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba bor ro//de nas rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/mar shog/
92b5('dul ba): des smras pa/lha g.yar cha lags kyis khyod nyid nang du gshegs shig/de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas/de de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/yang de'i
92b6('dul ba): tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can chags par gyur nas/des rgyal po la smras pa/lho dag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to//de nas rgyas pos de la yang sor
92b7('dul ba): gdub kyi rgya dang /seng ras khra bo byin nas/smras pa/gal te ro shig khye'ur gyur na song ras 'di bskon la/sor gdub kyi rgya yang mgul du thogs te/nga'i drung
93a1('dul ba): du m-i sh-i//na rlo ma yin nano/ gan nas smra na sa/rgyu pa da//ji tsam na du na dun rnams gyu ste/rnam pa
93a2('dul ba): dang nye ba zhig tu byin nas/des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig/khyo bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te/zhag 'di tsam kho na na phyin par 'ong ngo //spring pa des
93a3('dul ba): thos nas/bdag gis ni bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/de yang 'ong na de la ji ltar bsrub par bya snyam du 'phongs par gyur nas/des de ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal
93a4('dul ba): po la rig par byas pa dang /de nas rgyul pos slar sprid pa/blag mchu bar 'dug shig/dzin so da myuran du mi 'ongs po de ltar ngas 'o//rgyal pos de la b+h+yony+tsa
93a5('dul ba): btang ba/dod dpon ngal rin po che che go mo dang /che ge mo dag cig dgos kyis de med par khyod 'dir mya 'ongs shig/de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo/
93a6('dul ba): de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas bcas pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig bac+doM so//ma bsgrubs kyang bud med la shes nyon yod pas/des
93a7('dul ba): mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'drangs par bstod nas sor gdub kyi rgyu mgul du btags te/sing ras kyis dkris nas/sgron bu'i nang du bcug ste/bu mo mengag zhug ma
93b1('dul ba): labasgo ba/song la sgrom bu 'di khyer te rgyal ba'i pho brang gi sgor khyed kyis dkyil 'khor byos la me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdod
93b2('dul ba): cig/des de bzhin du byas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang bzangs kyis bzhir song nas/rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med dang lhan cig 'dus pa las des rgyal
93b3('dul ba): de'i pho brang gi sgon mar mi mthong ngo //de nas zho shas 'tshe ba dag la sgo ba/shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na/mar me 'bar ba'o ni ci yin ltos shig/
93b4('dul ba): de de dag gis bltas nus smras palha sgrom bu zhig mchi so//des smras pa/long shigargyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis smras pa/lha sgrom bu de na ci mchis
93b5('dul ba): de bdag la sprul bar cig ni /rgyu la bas de bzhin du bya zhes khas rlungs//ji tsam na sgrom bu zangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang /rgyal pos smras /tshe
93b6('dul ba): shig/kha phye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo //rgyal pos smras pa/'di cigason nam/'on te bri zhig/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha gson lagaso//de nas
93b7('dul ba): rgyal pos sor gdub kyi rgyud seng ras ngo shes nas/rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang /des de bsnun bskyod bskyed do//rgyal pos
94a1('dul ba): gson nAmA zhes tshig tu byung bya dang /rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis gsos pas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos zhes bya bar grug so//ji tsam
94a2('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos chen por gyur to//'jigs med dang lhan cig bre mo gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/'jigs med gzhon nu ma
94a3('dul ba): skyes dgra ni ma btsas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan gyis bdag cag ni bzo chung zad bslabs te/de na bdag cag gi phyi dus kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//de
94a4('dul ba): gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po gyo na pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor nas/rgyal po'i bopho brang du zhugs pa dang
94a5('dul ba): de rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med des mthong bas des rgyal bu'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa 'di su zhig yin/de rnams kyis smras pa/shing rta mkhan lagaso//'di ci
94a6('dul ba): 'thob/'tsho ba'o//des bsams pa/bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas/shing rta mkhan bslabo snyam nas de rgyal po'i drung du song na smras pa/lha bdag kyang shing rta mkhan
94a7('dul ba): bslab bo//rgyal pos smras pa/bu khyod ci 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/yab rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lag so//bu gal te de
94b1('dul ba): nA/da shing lta mkhan sgrub shog/des bslad par brtsam so//'tsho byed kyis kyang snyan pa gros du//rA ba~M gon pa/mo gros dkur po gon pa rnams kyi sa yod/
94b2('dul ba): suM skyod nas/rgyal ba'i bo byung du zhugs par mthong nas/dus gzhan dog la dris pa/'di su zhig yin/de dag gis smras pa/sman pa lags so//
94b3('dul ba): de ci zhig rnyed/byed bgyid de/thob gal te/nad pazhig sos na rtun pa 'thong go//'on te gum na mtsham mi 'di'o//des bsams pa/smyan
94b4('dul ba): dpyad bslab bo snyam nas/de phyi'i gan du song nas smras palha gnang bar mdzad cig//sman dpyad bsrub leg so//bu khyod rgyal ba'i sras mino//khyod la
94b5('dul ba): smon dpyad kyis tsaM byA/lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad bslab par bgyi ba lagasabu g.yo te de lta na slobs shig/do sman dpyad bslab par bya rnams pa
94b6('dul ba): sa s+thAn+na byung ni ba sam+b+ha/des klad pa'i thod pa da ng+gA'i dbyang mya shes nang /des rje'adzA sh+ma na~M dz+nyA nr-i pa'i rnal brgyun shrIs ts+tsho zhes byu ba yod de/
94b7('dul ba): klad pa'i thod pa'i byed de'i dpyad shes zhes thos nas/de mo ba'i drung du song ste smras pa/lce rje che/tsuni rtsen gi byer/de na smon pa'i rgyal po rgyu ni
95a1('dul ba): shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/de klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bar de slob tu mchi'o//bu khyod 'dis 'tsho 'am/lha yang na ni sman
95a2('dul ba): dpyad mi bslab/yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o//bu gal te de lta na song shig/des rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po la spring pa/bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu
95a3('dul ba): rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gis/'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig/de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang /pad+ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig blags
95a4('dul ba): ti rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du ched du 'ongs kyis 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig/rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa na/des
95a5('dul ba): nyung zad bstan pa dang /'tsho byed khyad par dang bcas par rdob bo//rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe/nad pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe/blam
95a6('dul ba): ze'i khye'u gcig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas/de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nasades nad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang /'di dag byin cig
95a7('dul ba): ces smos nas byung //'tsho byed kyis bsams pa'adi ni mkhan pos nyes te/gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/mkhan
95b1('dul ba): bos bstan pa ni legs pa yin gyis/thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/de rgyun shos kyi bu dang /lhan cig tu byung nas slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/mkhan po 'di skad ces
95b2('dul ba): gsung ngo //kho bos sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma byin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig/des de bzhin du byas pas sos par gyur to//ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig
95b3('dul ba): la rgyun shes kyis bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/na ba ji ltar sos par gyur to//sang yang de nyid byin cig/ci snga ma lags sam/'on te slad cis bstan pa
95b4('dul ba): lpags/ci bdag gis sngar bstan tam/'on te phyis bstan/de dag gis smras pa/'di dgon khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to//'di ni 'tsho byed la 'phreng du
95b5('dul ba): spring pa yin no//des bsams pa bdag gi nyes kyi 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yino snyam bsams nas smras pa/'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin po de byin cig
95b6('dul ba): rgyun shes kyis bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba skyes pas/de gang du 'gro ba der 'tsho byed khrid do//bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i bu'o
95b7('dul ba): snyam nas 'di la ni spro bor ston par mdzad kyi bdag cag la ni mi mdzad do//des smras pa/'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis
96a1('dul ba): dang spyad sa rgyun smra rdzun// sa smras nas smra smya rgyun tu spyan drug sus na/
96a2('dul ba): smram nas/de dag thams cad maben rdo'i rlung du de bsnun bzhin grorkyen shes kyi thamam bstan du rdzas kyi na d+han//bram
96b1('dul ba): yin te cung zad bstan na yang de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nuso zhes smras pa ni don de yino//gzhan yang mngon sum du bya'o zhes des de rnams la smras pa thang shing can gyi ro//
96b2('dul ba): la de la sman ma yin pa dag khyer de shog shig/de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis gang sman ma yin par shes pa de dag gis blangaso//'tsho byed kyis bsams pa
96b3('dul ba): sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/des 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang /rdo ba'i dum bu zhig blangaso//ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na/phyugs rdzi
96b4('dul ba): mo zhig zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las de shin tu mig na ba des mthong nas des dris pa gang du 'gro ba/des smras pa dang /des de la
96b5('dul ba): gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa las/des byas pa dang /mos la sos par gyur to//de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshung
96b6('dul ba): 'di khyod sdoms shig nges phrum chud blangs te zho'i bum pa ni de nyid l-i byin nas/de phram tshud khyer te song ba las ji tsam na bramo ze'i khye'u rnams kyis lam gyi dbus na/
96b7('dul ba): glang ni tshe'i rjes zhig mthong nas de rnams kyis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang /'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/'di ci yin/glang po che'i rjes so//'di ni
97a1('dul ba): glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyis 'di ni ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin/
97a2('dul ba): la/de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la/de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa/de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhig yino//ji tsam na rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du
97a3('dul ba): 'ongs nas/gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to//rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/re shig 'di ni cho ga
97a4('dul ba): che ge mo zhig gis nad che ge mo zhig yin la de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin no//'tsho byed la dris pa khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/des smras pa mkhan po thams
97a5('dul ba): cad sman lags te sman ma lags pa ni ci yang ma mchiso//'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang /rdo'i dum bus dang phrum tshud cig 'tshal te mchiso//
97a6('dul ba): 'di dag ci dgos sdig pas zin pa la 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go/phru ma tshud kyis ni glan par bgyi'o//rdo'i dum bus ni ston dka'i dus na zho'i bum
97a7('dul ba): pa 'chags par 'gyuraro//rgyun shes kyi bu 'dzu ma phyung ba dang /bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyi bsams pa/mkhan po ni 'di la khriso snyam nas/de rnams kyis
97b1('dul ba): smras pa/mkhan po ci 'di gcig pur bas snyam mam/bdag cag mchi ba na lam gyi dbu su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas 'di ni ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/de yang
97b2('dul ba): mog g.yas pa zhar ba la sbrum pa de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/de la gzhon pa ni bud med yin la de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum po de ring nyid du
97b3('dul ba): bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur zhes mchi'o//rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa 'tsho byed bden nam/mkhan po mang ngo do//de glang po che'i rjes sam pa lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes
97b4('dul ba): des smras pa/mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na ji ste ma 'tshal glang po che'i rjes ni zlu mo//ba lang mo rdzus ni chung //mi g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes
97b5('dul ba): g.yon phyog su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa lagaso//sbrum par ji ltar shes//rkang pa gnyis gnon cing mchi ba lagaso//deng kho nar 'bral bar 'gyur ba ji ltar shes/
97b6('dul ba): gcin be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so//glang po che'i phru gu phor 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchings so//de la bud med zhon
97b7('dul ba): par ji ltar shes/bangs nas rkang pa'i bar du gcis pa laso//de yang mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/g.yon phyogasu me tog thu zhing mchis paso//de yang
98a1('dul ba): sbrum par ji ltar shes/de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis paso//deng kho nar bca' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/gcin
98a2('dul ba): ldan ljin dang bcas te 'byung ba las so//da lta lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na/'don pa gnas pa'i phyogs drar bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig
98a3('dul ba): mngag tu gsol/des bram ze'i khye'u zhig btang ba dang 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to//rgyun shes kyi bus bram ze'i khye'u rnams la
98a4('dul ba): smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyis thos sam/'tshe byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can yin//'tshe byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs
98a5('dul ba): pa thams cad bslab so//ji tsam na mi zhig klad nad kyis thebs nas//rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/rgyun shes kyi bus bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/
98a6('dul ba): des smras pa/kye nang rje re shig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon gyis shig dang /sang bdag gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o//'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhi
98a7('dul ba): song ste/kye nang rje bdag gis cung zad bslabs pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin na bdog gis klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslabs kyis
98b1('dul ba): khyod kyis bdag dben pa zhig tu zhog zhig dang /khyod kyis las ji ltar byed pa blta'o//des smras pa/de bzhin du bgyi'o//des de phyogs dbyen pa zhig tu bzhag go/
98b2('dul ba): de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas mi de dong du bcug ste/thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phyi nas des skam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams pa dang /'tsho byed kyis smras
98b3('dul ba): pa mkhan po bzu lu ma su ma blang shig/rigs kyi bu 'di ded nyid du 'gum par 'gyu ro//des smras pa/'tsho byed 'ongs sam/smras pa/mkhan po bdag mchis so//
98b4('dul ba): kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/mkhan po skam pa tsha bar mdzad de//rgyab tu reg nas rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang /de nas 'or cig de des de bzhin
98b5('dul ba): du byas nas sos par gyur to//rgyuni shes kyi bus smras pa/'tsho byed kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur gyis/khyod khrus byos la shog shig dang /klang ba'i thod pa
98b6('dul ba): dbye ba'i dpyad sbyin//dros khrus byas nas 'ongs pa dang /des de la glad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad byin nas smras po/'tshe byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyis//
98b7('dul ba): yul 'dir khyod kyis ma bya zhig mkhon po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas nas/rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po'i drung du sod nas phyag byas nA bdag gi
99a1('dul ba): /sman du blas kyimam das rgya ma snying ba dang /mthun pa mam 'asatho sbya pa ba gcig sado/sa gas kyang ba/ ma mthun pa mtha' mkhob sgrubs pa zhes bya ba dag cig yod
99a2('dul ba): kyis 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas/re shig de pho bo la phyi so song shig dang /de lta na bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro//
99a3('dul ba): des de la khas blangs pa dang /de nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las/de mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng de rnams phab nas/gte'u bzung
99a4('dul ba): dpya blangs te/slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang de shin tu dka' nas/de nyid la rje su yi rang ste des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu
99a5('dul ba): l-i byin no//de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas/de nyid du dbyar gnas te/de na des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan
