99a6('dul ba): btsos bslabs nas grong khyer bzang byed nas chas pa dang /mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug pa/rus pa dang lpags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/lus
99a7('dul ba): kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/de la smras pa/kye nang rje ci zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/des smras pa/bdag gis kyang mi shes na
99b1('dul ba): 'on kyang bsdug gis shing khur 'di khyer nas/bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabasu gyur to//de shing btag pa la byang ba yin pas smras pa/kye nang rje ci shing khur
99b2('dul ba): 'di 'tshong ngam/'tshong ngo //rin ji tsam/shar ka pa na lnga brgya'o//des de nyes nas de nas bltas nas/'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu
99b3('dul ba): mthong nas/de'i mthu ni 'di 'dra ste/gang gi tshe nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe/mar me khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du/nad ji lta ba bzhin du sna ngo //de rim
99b4('dul ba): gyis yul u dum ba rar phyin pa dang /de na mi bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bor gzhal nas/bre mgo la snun pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/kyo nang rje ci'i phyir
99b5('dul ba): de ltar byed/bdag gi klod pa lhag par g.ya'o//tshur shog blta'o zhes des de bskal nas klad pa bltas te/de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar bying
99b6('dul ba): pa'i no bu de'i klad pa'i steng du bzhag pa dang /ji tsam na srin gyi med cig snang ngo ///de nas des smras pa/kye nang rje khyod kyi klod pa la srin gyi med yod do//des rkang
99b7('dul ba): pa gnyis pa gtugs te smras pa/bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/des khas blangaso//'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/mkhan pas ji skad bstan pa bzhin 'di'i dpyad bya
100a1('dul ba): snyam nus/das du rnas na/ rlung sa shog/de ring dong rgyas la hU~M bu dag sta glon byas sh+lo ga dang /sad byung bya'o//des rkang pa
100a2('dul ba): gaN+DIsA la gad+hAg nas song ngo //'tshe byed kyis de'i phyed nyid 'angs nas de dang du bcug ste klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis/klang pa'i thod pa phyi nas skum pa
100a3('dul ba): bas srin gyi med kyi rgyab la reg par byas tI des rlung log 'khums pa dpede nas deste skem pas thang s+pho te bor bos sos par gyur to//des de la kAr sha ba
100a4('dul ba): nardzu birgyu byin pa dang /des kyang ts+tshin shes kyi bu la bku'o//de nas 'tsho byed yul ra hi ti ka zhes bya bar phyin pa dang /yum ra hi t+ta kAn khyim bdag cig la
100a5('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal me tog dang /'bris bu dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/de de la lhag par chags pa las shi nas de nyid du mi ma yin pa rnams
100a6('dul ba): skyes so//de'i bu ni khyim gyi dpon por gyur nas des bskyed mos tshal der srungs me'i mi bzhigro ba dang /de mi ma yin pa des bsad do//gnyis bya
100a7('dul ba): gzhag pa dung de yang bsod nas khyim bdag gi bu des bskye mos tshal de bor//ji tsam na mi chu chus gang ba sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig bskyed mos
100b1('dul ba): tshal der song nas nub mo brang btab ste 'dug nas/kye ma'o bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung snya mo//de nyid du 'tsho byed kyang nub mo brang btab ste 'dug go//ji tsam na mi ma
100b2('dul ba): yin pa des/dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang /dmu chu'i nang de byung nas smras pa/'di bdag gis sngar bzung na ci'i phyir 'di bsdig khyed la ra spu'i dud pas bdug
100b3('dul ba): pa dga' yang med pa lta/des ni khyod dpag tshad bcu gnyi su 'bros par 'gyur//des kyang sngar smras pa/khyod la yang wa phug gi sa rgan mar phyung ba'i ngar ba dang btags te
100b4('dul ba): sbyin pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/des ni khyod dum bu dum bur 'dzag par 'gyur ro//thams cad 'tshe byad kyis thos nas de nang par sngar langs te khyim bdag de'i drung du song nas smras
100b5('dul ba): po/khyim bdag bskyed mos tshal me tog dang 'bras bu dang chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/khyim bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /des smras pa/
100b6('dul ba): khyim bdagu ra sA'i dung pos bdugs shig dang mA ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyi su 'bros par 'gyuraro//khyim bdag gi sau ra spu'i bdug pas bdugs pa dang
100b7('dul ba): mi yin pa de dang ga tshad bcu gnyisu bros par gyur to//khyim bdeg des kyang 'tsho byed la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang /des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskuro//
101a1('dul ba): nas 'tsho byed kyis dmu chu can la dris pa nang rje khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i bskyed mos tshal du 'dug/des de la ji ltar gyur pa dag
101a2('dul ba): smras pa dang /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/la phug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i drar pa dang btags pa 'thungs shig dang /sos par 'gyur ro//des 'thungs pas sos par
101a3('dul ba): gyur te/me des kyang 'tsho byed la kAr sha pa na lnga brgya byin no//des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro//de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom brlag du phyin nas/
101a4('dul ba): bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig gi drung du ngal so zhing 'dug go//ji ltar na gyad kyis gyad brdabs pas de'i nang grol rnamasu 'khrugs nas de shi'o zhes phyi rol du
101a5('dul ba): phyung ngo //shong de la yang bya rgod mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig 'dug pa lasade la phru gu de rnams kyis smras pa/ma shi byin cig/des smras pa/bu
101a6('dul ba): ga la yod/de rnams kyis smras pa/ma gyad kyis gyad 'di brdabs teshi nas phyung ba yin no//bu 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs na des 'di sos
101a7('dul ba): par byed pa'i gnas de yod do//ma 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/gal te de'i nang grol rnams phye mas reg par byas na'o//de thams cad 'tshe byed kyis thos
101b1('dul ba): /de nas de langs tI ro drung du song nas dris pa shes ldan dag 'di na zhog/de rnams kyis smras pa/gyad kyis gyud brdabs pas shi ba yin//'tsho byed kyis smras pa/
101b2('dul ba): zhog zhig dang /blta'o//de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang /de ni 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu klad par bzhag nas brtags na
101b3('dul ba): tsam na nang grol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas/des smyug ma'i sbub su phyi ma blugs te/khas bus pa dang /phye mas nang grol rnams la rig nas sos par gyur
101b4('dul ba): /des kyang 'tsho byed la kur sho pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang /des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur//bcom brlag nu khyim bdag gcig spyod pa de'i chung ma gzugs
101b5('dul ba): dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa yin pas de de la lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las/she nas de nyid kyi mo mtshan gyi srin bur skyes par gyur to//de gang dang lhan
101b6('dul ba): cig dga' dgur spyod pa de shi bar byed//de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par mi byed do//des sman pa 'tsho byed der 'ongs so//zhes thos nas
101b7('dul ba): de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/'tsho byed bdag la bro nad mchis kyis dpyid mdzod ciga'atsho byed kyis de mthong zhing smra dro'i tshig thos nas/chags pas smras pa/dam
102a1('dul ba): zhog bca ste/gal te dag dang lhan ci//dga' dgur spyod kun dbyad du//des smras /rga yar cha lags//des smras bya/
102a2('dul ba): dad d+ma gzhan ni myed do//bdag las pangs pa gzhan med pas des mkhas rlings //de nas des smen myor byung ste/bzod saskye nas mo mtshan gyi sku
102a3('dul ba): shi'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa las/de nas srin bu de de la chags pa dang /des de blangs nas bor te sos par gyur/de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhe
102a4('dul ba): pas brda' zhig byas pa dang /des rna ba gnyis breka ga ste smras pa/khyod kho bo'i sring mo dang 'dra ste/khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas khe bos de ltar byas par zad do//
102a5('dul ba): des kyang de la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang /des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskuro//de nas 'tsho byed kyis rim gyis chu bo ya mun na'i 'gram du phyin pa dang
102a6('dul ba): des de na mo ro zhig yod pa de'i rjong pa'i phyogs na/rgyas pa'i phreng yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las de'i mig 'byed pa dang /'dzums pa mngon s+ho/
102a7('dul ba): byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/dzi d+ha rgyas pa dang 'angs rmi la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs rno de kho na ltar 'dug snyam nas de rim gyis yangs pa
102b1('dul ba): can du phyin pa dang /ji tsam na gyad kyis gyad cig thal mos bsnun pas mig gi 'bras bu 'phags pa dang /'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/des bting ba'i rgyas pa'i drang /
102b2('dul ba): nas drangs pa dang /slar chud par gyur to//des de la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang /des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no//yangs pa can na mi zhin yod pa
102b3('dul ba): de'i rna bar srin gyi med zhugs te/der de las phru gu bdun brgya byung bas de rna ba'i nad kyis nye bar gyur nas/'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/dpyad mdzod cig
102b4('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/sngar ni bdag gis mkhan pos bstan pas las byas kyis da ni rang gi blos las bya'o snyam nas/des maM de la bsgo ba kye nang rje song la lo ma'i
102b5('dul ba): skyil po byos te ras sngon pos g.yogs la de'i 'og tu rnga zhig zhog ste sa yang dron por gyis shig/des ji skad bstan pa bzhin thams cad byaso//de nas 'tsho byed kyis
102b6('dul ba): mr-i de swa l-i bskal nas/sa de chus chag chag btab nas de na rnga brdungs pa dang /srin gyis med kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab bo snyam nas phyir byung ngo //de nas 'tsho
102b7('dul ba): byed kyi rna ba'i drung du sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa dang /de yang slar zhugs te phru gu rnams khrid de byung nas phru gu rnams dang lhan cig sha'i dum bu la chags pa dang /de
103a1('dul ba): nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la shA'i dum bu bor ba dang /mi de sos par gyur to//des kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang /des 'jigs med
103a2('dul ba): kye ma la byin no//de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed ji ltar 'ongs pa thos nas/des gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la
103a3('dul ba): bsgo ba/bu khyod kyi bu pho 'ongs kyis sbur song shig/de skur song ba dang /'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu mo skyes dgra ji ltar smrar 'ong ba thos nas/des bsams
103a4('dul ba): ba gal te bdag gis de slu ba rang gir byas na ni/nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag la gnod po byed par 'gyuraro snyam nas/da slar log ste sgo gzhan
103a5('dul ba): zhig nas zhugaso//dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongasu bskor te/sems gau yeng zhing song ba dang /ji tsam na bram ze zhig mig nang
103a6('dul ba): kyis thebs nas 'tsho byed kyis drung du song ste/bdag la sman ston cig/tshig pa zos nas smras pa thal bas thob shig/des drang po zhig pas/thal bas
103a7('dul ba): btab pa dang sos par gyur to//mig nad kyis thebs pa gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ba bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/kye nang rje gang du 'gro
103b1('dul ba): bdas lta gyur pa smras pa dang /des smras pa dang /khyodas byung ci na na du thob sa gang bstan pa ra byas nag/de yod ches par gyur nas des thal ba
103b2('dul ba): dang /meng par gyur to//dus glan na zhig ni/rgyul po gzugaso can skyeng ba'i skye bar pal rig b+h+yo //des blon pa rnams la bsdu/shes ldan dag spyan pa
103b3('dul ba): rnams khrug shig/blon po rnams kyis sbyin pa rnams bzlog pa mi thos smras pa/sa ldan dag nga'i spyi bor rol mig byung gis dpyang byos shig/de rnams
103b4('dul ba): kyis smras pa lha sman pa chen po 'tsha byed mchis na/bdag cag gi bgyi ci 'tshal/rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khrog shig/de rnams kyis
103b5('dul ba): de dgug pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/'tsho byed dbyung byos shig/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/lha dam zhig bca' ste/gal te stsol bdaganyid kyis khrus
103b6('dul ba): bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o//de bzhin gyis shig/den so 'chi byed kyis skyu ru ras skud cing smin par gyur pa'i rdzas dag btang na sbyin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang /bsres
103b7('dul ba): pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs te/gang gi tshe smin pa de'i tshon ma tshor ba spu gros reg par byas pa dang rdol to//de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nas 'tsho bar
104a1('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang /bslus pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya thugs pa dang /rmade sos shing lpags pa 'dra ba dang sgra yang mnyam par gyur te/
104a2('dul ba): rgyal po khrus byas ma thag tu smras pa/'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/des smras pa/lha re shig bshos gsol cig/rdul byas zan zas nas/
104a3('dul ba): byed dpyad byos shig/lta bgyis lagaso//de yod ma ches nas lag pas byugs na phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma shes so//me longs blangs te bltas na 'on
104a4('dul ba): kyang mo mthong ngo //btsun mo la dris na des kyang phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma shas/rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/shes
104a5('dul ba): ldan dag 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur cig/mi long ba des smras pa/lha ci sras la byams pas som/'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur
104a6('dul ba): ba mdzad/rgyal pos smras pa/sbyin mkhas pas so//des smras pa/gal te de lta logs na 'dis bdag ni sos par mi dgyis la byas so//
104a7('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/kye nang rje bdag gis khyod mthong yang ma mthong na sos par lta ga la byas/des smras pa de ni med na/'on kyang khyod kyis ga
104b1('dul ba): bstan pa des bdag la bstan to//ci zhig bstan/che ge mo zhig go/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/de'i khams kyang gzhan la/khyod kyi khams kyang gzhan yin gyis/de 'dra/
104b2('dul ba): dang 'di dag byos shig dang sros par 'gyuraro//des byas nas sos par gyur pa dang /smras pa lha 'di snyan pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/de glang po
104b3('dul ba): che la zhon nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to//rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa skran gyi nad gyis thebs nas sman pa thams cad kyis
104b4('dul ba): spangs pa dang /des bosams pa/'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o//gal te dpyad cig byas na ni de lta na legs/gal te ma byas na bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam
104b5('dul ba): nas/de 'tsho byed kyis drung du song nas/'tsho byed bdag gi dpyad mdzod cig/des smras pa/kye nang rje khyed kyi sman 'di ni rnyed par dka'o//des bsams pa
104b6('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs na/'di la ci byor yod dus la bab kyis bdag ni 'chi'o snyam nas de dur khrod du song ngo //de na ro sreg pa'i me 'bar bar ne'u le gdug
104b7('dul ba): bzhi ba dang /srog chags ga d+ha tsAn zhes bya bar 'thabs te/ltung ba dang /de bkres pas nyen pas de gnyis kar zos te/lhas dur khrod du char dang pa'i chu
105a1('dul ba): de 'thungs nas/dur khrod dang ha cang yang mya rang bzhig na gnag ltas yod pa der mdun/kaud+ho chen dang mar byung ba na 'thungs pas s+thAH/
105a2('dul ba): rdol to//yar sgron mar 'khrus nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to//dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags mya'i mdoms kyi phyogasu bol mig byung //des rgyal
105a3('dul ba): le smras pa dang rgyas pos 'tsho byed la bsgrib/ma yar mo'i dpyad gyis shig/ngas khas blang so//de nas zin byas te ma ma la byin nas khyod kyis 'dir
105a4('dul ba): steng du 'dug du chug shig/des de 'dug du bcug pa'i zan/'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsams pa phyogs che ge mo zhig na'o snya mo//de nas smon par 'gyur
105a5('dul ba): ba'i rdzas dag bat+tA ba~M ste/smin par shes nas zan gyi nang du btsugs bu smras te/mya ma la bsgob/khyod kyis de 'di la 'dug tu chug la btsun mo 'dug
105a6('dul ba): nas sgyur skrong shig/des dri bzhin byas pa las bcugs blos rag ma thig d+hA rol mig rdol bar gyur to//de nas 'tshe bar 'gyur ba'i rjes dang smras pa bsgru
105a7('dul ba): chus bkrus te 'tshe ba 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams btab bsams pa rgyu smra/tsho byed rgyam pa'i dru hU~M song ba dang /rgyam ngos skyes pa//'tsho byed khyud kyis /
105b1('dul ba): par mo'i dpyad byas sam/stu bgyiso//khyod kyis sgren mor phyung ste ma bltas grang /lha ma blta so//ji ltar byas/des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /rgyal ba
105b2('dul ba): mchog tu ngo mchir skyes nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/'chi byed la lan gnyi su sman pa'i rgyal bar dbang bskur cig/me skan can la 'tsho byed kyis sma na rnyed par
105b3('dul ba): dka' zhes smras pa gang yin pa des smras pa/m+b+hi ci sras la sdug pas sam/'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad rgyal pos smras pa'i/sman
105b4('dul ba): mkhas pas so//gal te de lta legs na/'dis bdag ni sos pa ma bgyiso//'tsho byed kyis smras pa/kye nang rjebs khyod la dpyad ni mi byas kyi 'on kyang ngas
105b5('dul ba): khyod kyi sman ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smraso//des smras pa/bdag gi sman ji lta bu dag cig yin/'chi byed kyis smras pa/gral te zla ba mor gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi
105b6('dul ba): la mi ser skya cig shi nas de dur khrod du sreg pa na ne'u le gdug pa dang /srog chags go d+ha tsan+da thabs nas mer lhung ba dang de gnyis khyod kyis zos la/dbang phyug chen
105b7('dul ba): mo'i lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od ba'i chu do la 'thungs la ko dra'i zan zos shing mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs na/de lta na khyod mod lo sos par 'gyur te/bdag
106a1('dul ba): gis de las bsam nas/sman rnyed par dka'o zhes smras pa yin no//des smras pa shin tu legs par shes te/de bzhin du bdag gis zlos//
106a2('dul ba): so//de nas dga' bar 'gyur nas smras pa/lha 'dis smin pa'i rgyal po rdo thag gis dbang bskur bas/dbang bskur du gsol/lan gnyi su yang sman pa'i rgyal por
106a3('dul ba): dbang bskur to gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i grogs po lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra btsas nas/po chos kyi rgyal po chos deng ldan pa srog dang phral ba de'i tshe/de la skran gyi
106a4('dul ba): nad kyis thobs par gyur to//sbyin pa rnaMs pa smra smra/nga la dpyad gyis shig de r+g+haM kyis smos pa/lha lha'i gachen po bla na med pa'i 'tsho byed 'di na mchis bzhin du/bdag cag gis dpyad bgyid
106a5('dul ba): rdo ga la thogs/des blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khug shig//de rnams kyis bkug pa dang /'tsho byed nga la skran gyi nad byung gis
106a6('dul ba): dpyang byos shig/lha bgyi'o//des bsams pa/rgyu gnyis kyis sman rdol bar 'gyur te/lhag par dga' ba 'am/lhag par khros pas yin na/
106a7('dul ba): sems can sdig pa 'di lhag par dga' bar ga la 'gyur gyis rnam pa thams cad du khros par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/smras pa/lha dme zhig bca' ste
106b1('dul ba): na tu smra tu na na na dun na chu rgyu rgyu du rgyu tun na na rmA chu/
106b2('dul ba): ra // ga da bangs phyi sa sa smra /dang nas kyis gan na 'a/rkyen rnams ca kyi
106b3('dul ba): depa ga nas te sa byad kyi sa stsa s+ho//de nas rmyim ma skyes sa par ba
106b4('dul ba): sa tha ba ga sa nasanas da du skrun/sdig pabyed pa khri kyis brgyas su rgya da ma/ ni yang za ba spyad
107a1('dul ba): de rngams nas smras pa/gal te de lta na ci'i phyir bsad ces mi bzod pa skyes pas de'i skran rdol nas yar slon mar 'khrus te/kha nas khrag dang
107a2('dul ba): bcas par byung ba de mthong nas brgyal te/sa la 'gyel to//de nas chus tor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang khrus byas te/'phrod pa'i zas byin pas/sngon gyi
107a3('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to//de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan te khrid te rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras
107a4('dul ba): pa/lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po 'di lags te/bdag srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar bgyid mi phod na/gzhon nu lta smos kyang ci
107a5('dul ba): 'tshal/'on kyang thabs 'dis lha 'tsho bar 'gyur bas/bdag gis thabs bshams par bgyis par bso//rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/
107a6('dul ba): des blon po rnams la spro ba/'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur cig/blon po rnams kyis glang po che la bskyon nas/dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan gsum
107a7('dul ba): du yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to//des 'tsho byed dregs pa skyes te/bdag dang mnyam pa'i sman pa ni 'jig rten na 'ga' yang yod pa
107b1('dul ba): ma yin te/bdag ni lus kyi dpyad byed pa rnams kyis mchog yin la/bcom ldan 'das ni sems kyi dpyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yino snyamo//des dus gzhan zhig na
107b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song po las de grags pa'i snyems pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis
107b3('dul ba): dge ba'i rtse ba skyed na ci'i phyir bden pa rnams ma mthong bar gyur snyam na/grags pa'i bsnyems pa las gyur par gzigs nas/de'i dregs pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas
107b4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/'tsho byed khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po gangs can mthong ngam/btsun pam mthong lagaso//de bzhin
107b5('dul ba): gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung shig/des bzung ba dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed khrid nas/ri'i rgyal po gangs
107b6('dul ba): can ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /de na sman rnam pa sna tshogs sgron ma bzhin 'baro//bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
107b7('dul ba): to//'tsho byed sman ji tsam 'dod pa long shig/bcom ldan 'das 'dzegs lags so//de na bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag
108a1('dul ba): nadza stong la na byad la srung ba byos she//de dang song nas 'cha byong la spyan rnam pa sna tshogs dag thangs dang /bcom ldan 'das
108a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/'tsho byed sman 'di med rtsi yin/des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das che gri mo legs te/cho ga 'dis nad che ge mo zhig zhi bar 'gyur
108a3('dul ba): ro//'di ni che ge mo zhig lags te/nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro//gzhan rnams kyi ni ming yang mi shes//ma shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag
108a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'tsho byed 'di ni che ge mo ste/che ga che ge mos nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro//'di yang che ge mo zhig zhes bya'o//
108a5('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis sman dpyad kyang mkhyen pa lta/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/'tsho
108a6('dul ba): byed smon pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni rgyal po la 'os pa/rgyal po la mkho ba/rgyal po'i yan lag gis grongasu 'gro'o//
108a7('dul ba): 'dul bag nibam po drug cu gnyis pa/gzhi gang zhe na/'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad la mkhas pa yin/nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin/
108b1('dul ba): nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa yin/spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te nad la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing //nang
108b2('dul ba): 'di ni 'di lta bu dang /'di lta bu yin no zhes da ltar nod la mkhas pa yin//nad kun nas slong pa la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing
108b3('dul ba): nad 'di ni rlung gis kun nas bslang ba 'am/'khris pas kun nas bslang ba'am/bad kan gyis kun nas bslang ba'am/bdag las gyur pa 'a ma~M/gzhan las gyur
108b4('dul ba): ba'am/'dus pa las gyur pa'o zhes de ltar nad kun nas klong ba la mkhas pa yin no//nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin po nang
108b5('dul ba): 'di ni mig sman nam sku mnye 'am/skyugs sman nam/bkru sman nam/snar grugs pa rim/du bas bdug pa 'am/nan rtsi'i las kyis spring bar 'gyur ro zhes de
108b6('dul ba): ltar nad byung ba spang ba mkhas pa yin no//nad spangs phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing nad 'do ni 'phrod pa'i
108b7('dul ba): tshig 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu dag byas te/spangs na phyis mi 'byung ngo zhes de ltar nad spangs phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yinade ltar sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan
109a1('dul ba): lag bzhi dang ldan pa/rgyal po la 'os pa yin rgyal po la mkho ba yin rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangasu 'gro ba yino//de bzhin du de bzhin
109a2('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa yang smyan pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o//'tsho byed bzhi gang dag zhu
109a3('dul ba): na/'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
109a4('dul ba): du rab tu mkhyen to//'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden/
109a5('dul ba): ba'i zhes yong dog pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//'tsho byed smin pa zug rngu 'byin pas ni skye ba'i rtsa ba cin gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so//
109a6('dul ba): rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang //smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba drong /yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal
109a7('dul ba): rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so//'tsho byed de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye ba'i skye bo'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen te//rga ba dngon pa dang //
109b1('dul ba): 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang //'khrugs pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen to//de lta bas na
109b2('dul ba): de bzhin go shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sman pa zug rdzu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'od bo shad pa na/'tsho//
109b3('dul ba): byed gzhon nus bskyed/chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis chos mthong ba dang /chos thob
109b4('dul ba): pa dang /chos rig pa dang /chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /som nyi las rgol ba dang /the tshom lngas rgal ba dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang
109b5('dul ba): gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/stan la langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang
109b6('dul ba): na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud do/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ni 'phag so//mngon par 'phagaso//bdag bcom ldan
109b7('dul ba): 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o/dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang sngos te skyabasu mchi bar mngon par
110a1('dul ba): dad lags so//de nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das rgya
110a2('dul ba): spyan snga nas song ngo //ri'i rgyal po gangs can kha bas yog ste rtag tu lhogs pa che bas bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyi snyun gyis thebs pa dang /sman pa'i rgyal po 'a
110a3('dul ba): khyod kyis bsams pa dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bye ba bonan bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya'o snyamo//de nas 'tsho byed kyis me tog ud
110a4('dul ba): pa la sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dang /bkru sman gyi rdzas dag sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phul te/bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams shangs kyis bsnam du
110a5('dul ba): gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnams pa las thang sum cu gnyis kho na 'khrus par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das
110a6('dul ba): jig la legs par 'khrus lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'tsho byed skyon gang dag g.yos la ma 'khrus pa de dag kyang yod de/'dres
110a7('dul ba): lam g.yos pa yang yod do//ma lakhrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod do//'tsho byed kyis gsol ba//bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na bu ma dang /a
110b1('dul ba): gsol la khu ba'i rim pa yang mdzod cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad nas snyun gdangs par gyur to//'tsho byed kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/blon
110b2('dul ba): po gang su'i dpyad byas kyang rung ste/des de la grong ngam/grong mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed kyis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dpyad
110b3('dul ba): byas pa las des de la brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che zhig byin pa dang //des de blangs nas bac+doMs gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
110b4('dul ba): la mag bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
110b5('dul ba): btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/blon po gang su'i dpyad bgyis kyang rung ste des bdag la grong ngam/grong mchog stsol ba lags pas/bdag gis lus
110b6('dul ba): 'phags kyi rgyal po la dpyod bgyis pa dang /des bdag la brgya stong re ba'i rad pa zhig sprul pa 'di bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'bul zhing mchis na bcom ldan 'das kyis
110b7('dul ba): thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhesu gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed las brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che bzheso//de'i
111a1('dul ba): tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo//bcom ldan 'das kyi gnam legs na/bsil yub rdzogs te/bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing
111a2('dul ba): 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo le bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che long la nga'i ched du gis
111a3('dul ba): dros shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te/sa phyogs gsal ba yangs par song nas gsol bar brtsams pa las/chos gos mang du ldan par
111a4('dul ba): mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' chos gos gsum dang bdag nyid kyi thu gos mthang gos dang /bcas pa dang //tshe dang ldan pa ste
111a5('dul ba): gcan 'dzin gyi ral chung dpung ched gcig byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gyi gnas der/ras lnga brgya brnyes shing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang du ma zhig
111a6('dul ba): rnyed na/dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ma shes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
111a7('dul ba): stsal pa/de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos bris dras te/kha dog ngan par byas pa bcang bar bya'o//rgyal po gzugs can skye
111b1('dul ba): po'i kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam/dge slong ma mthong na/glang po che las babs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa yino//de dus gzhan zhig na/glang po che la zhon nas/bcom//
111b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byed du song ba las/ji tsam na lam gyi dbus nas 'tsho ba zhig mthong nas/de de la gus pa bskyed de/glang po che la babs nas
111b3('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis la gtugaso//de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa lha dge slong 'ba' shig la mngon par dad pa ma yino//dad pa con gang yin pa de dag gis bsams
111b4('dul ba): pa ni gdon mi za bar lhas dge slong yin snyam ste/de gus pas glang po che las babs nas/rkang pa gnyis la gtug so snyam nas/de rnams yid gnyisu gyur te/rgyal
111b5('dul ba): po la smras pa/lhas su la phyag bgyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la'o//lha de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma lags te/'tsho ba lag so//de
111b6('dul ba): nas rgyal po gzugs tsan snying pos 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi don 'di kho na gsol to snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom
111b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to//phyon gcig tu 'dug/phyoHgcig tu 'dug nas/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo skyengs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das
112a1('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam/dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las 'bas nas/de'i rkang /
112a2('dul ba): pa la phyag bgyid pa lags pa las/de ring bdag gus pa skyes nas glang po che las babs te dge slong lags snyam nas/'tsho ba'i rkang pa gdugs lags kyis
112a3('dul ba): kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brdze ba nye bar bzung ste/'phags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan ma cung zad cig gdab tu gsol/bcom ldan 'das
112a4('dul ba): kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying pa la cang mi gsung bas snang ngo //de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas snang bar rig nas/bcom
112a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis lnga mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'tsho ba pa gang gis
112a6('dul ba): bden pa mthong ba la phyag bdag gir byas pa nyams te/mi rung ngo //de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gnam logs na bsil yab thogs te
112a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das lo g.yob cing 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus 'phags kyi cho
112b1('dul ba): mthong ngam/btsun pa ma mthong lag so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung shig/des bzung ba dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
112b2('dul ba): rgyal po'i kha nas mi snang bar mdzad de/de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gI na mkha' la gshegs nas lus 'phags kyi ri ro la bzhug so//de'i tshe ma gad+hA'i ma rnams kyi
112b3('dul ba): zhing mnyam shing nye 'khor mnyam pa rlung gi khyad par sna tshigs dag rnang skal gyis 'brel cing mdzes pa dag gzigs nas//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
112b4('dul ba): kun dga' bo khyod kyi zhing mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam la rlung gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang skal gyis 'brel bar mdzes pa de dag mthong dem/btsun pa mthong lag so//
112b5('dul ba): kun dga' bo de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras te drub par bya'o//gnas brtan kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/khyed
112b6('dul ba): sa da lta bur ches gos rnams dros la drug shig/dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dras te drub par brtsams na rnams bu rnams kha phyogs gcig tu bskyon
112b7('dul ba): bas mi mdzes nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ma stsal mna'adi kho nas rkyen byos nas gnang bar
113a1('dul ba): ba'i sa de yod do snyam nas/des snam bu rnams kha phyogs gnyis kar bstan nas/'on kyang mtha' skor med pas mdzes par ma gyur nas/
113a2('dul ba): mtha' skor bas so//de nas byas shing zin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la phul lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo legaso legs
113a3('dul ba): so//ngas gang phyir bka' stsal pa/de khyod kyis shes te/de lta byas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras la drub par bya'i//dge slong rnams
113a4('dul ba): kyis chos gos dras shing drubs pa re re bcangs nas lhag ma ni me draso//de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshogs te 'brog
113a5('dul ba): gnas su byon nas 'brog gnas na 'brog gnas kyi tshal na bzhugaso//'brog gnas 'bab chu dang nye bas grang zhing rlung ldang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thun dang
113a6('dul ba): po la mthang gos gsol to//thun par ma la bla gos gsol to//thun tha ma la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de la snam sbyar gyis
113a7('dul ba): g.yogs shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lag pa gnyis bkrus nas snam sbyar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du g.yogs te/bcom ldan 'das
113b1('dul ba): kyis na bza' chos gos gsum gyis mtshan mo de 'das par mdzad do//de nas nam nangs nas dgongs pa 'jig rten na shin tu bskyed pa/bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa su yang
113b2('dul ba): rung de rnams kyi mchog ni nga yin te/nga yang chos gos gsum gyis 'tsho bar spyod na nga'i nyan thos rnams lta smos kyang ci dgo/sa snyom du dgong nas/dge slong rnams la
113b3('dul ba): bka' stsal na/dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar
113b4('dul ba): bya'o//zhes bka' stsal pa/dge slong zhig la chos gos gsum pa med nas de'i phyir pa zhig rnyed nas des dra bar brtsamaso//bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der ga
113b5('dul ba): zhes smras pa/dge slong 'di ci yin/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/bdag
113b6('dul ba): la chos gsum ma mchis nas btsal ba las/bdag gis phying ba 'di snyed de dras nas chos gos bgyi'o//dge slong 'di ni dra ba'i 'os ma yin//'on kyang lhan
113b7('dul ba): thabs kyis klan pa'i 'os yin pas lhan thabs kyis klan nas btsong bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas gshegs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus nas/dge slong gi dge
114a1('dul ba): dun klung la d+hA na shams ba spyod 'duzhud sa//bsgyug sanas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong /mas pa ga/ sgyu na/da slong dag dang
114a2('dul ba): slong cheg mo zhes bya ba la chos gis me nas byeng ba 'dra bar byed gis dge slong dag de lta bas na mi dra ba ni rdza ste/byi ba thams cad dang snam bu rnams nyid dang be rdu ngas rnams cad dang
114a3('dul ba): sing ngas thams cad dang /bram thams cad de lhan thabs kyis klan nas bcang bar bya'o///gleng bzhini ninyan yod no'o//kau swa la'i rgyal po gas
114a4('dul ba): kyi na pa mchog dgas na pas des rigs ma pa las rlu mthu/dede da na cig rtsa bar byed dgur ba byu dgu ma spyod pa skyed /
114a5('dul ba): bar byed dga' bur byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig pacas ni su byA \u0f7fde bzhin du the'u dun \u0f7f de mjug gi ming ni ci dga' ba btagos//dz+ra
114a6('dul ba): gang nas gzhas sa ga//rdorje mini dgas 'dzin gyi rdung sa shinas//des bud+hag+h+ra gi khyim thu den nas rang ga rdu
114b1('dul ba): de'i grogs pa shes bram ze zhig yod pa des/'ongs nas des de sems khongasu chud pa mthong nas des smras pa/khyim bdag ci'i phyir sems khongasu chud !/bdag gi bu
114b2('dul ba): 'di dag rang rang gi chung ma dang lhan cig byi dor lhur len cing khyim gyi 'tsho nam mi sems par 'dug pas khyim zhig par 'gyuraro//des smras pa/ci'i phyir sa ga khyim mi 'bugs//
114b3('dul ba): gal te na de yang lhag par phung krol byed kyang sus shes/gal te 'di lhag par legs par byed kyang sus shes/gal te khyod dad na bu mo zhig btsi lo//de bzhin du gyis
114b4('dul ba): shig/de tshol zhing rim gyis yul tsam par phyin to//tsam pa na khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba yod do//de'i bu mo sa ga ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang
114b5('dul ba): ba dang la bab pa/tshul dang dul ba dang ldan pa mkhas pa/g.yer ba zhig yod pa de/bu mo yid 'phrog ma gang 'dod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bskyed mos tshil gyi bzhin
114b6('dul ba): chas pa dang /bram ze de yang phyogs der phyin te/des bu mo rnams mthong nas/des bsams pa 'di rnams kho na la re shig brtag par bya'o//snyam nas/de brtam
114b7('dul ba): pa gyur len cing dal bus 'jab cing de rnams kyi phyi bzhin du song ngo //bud med ni phal cher yang ba'i rang bzhin yin pas/de rnams las kho cig ni bang rgyug//kha cig ni
115a1('dul ba): mtshungs pa byed /kha cig nang /kha cig ni rgod/kha cig ni lus myur bar byed//da cig ni glu yin par byed de 'di dag dang gzhan yang spyong tshul ngan pa ngon
115a2('dul ba): byed do//dul ba phun sum tshogs po de ni gom pa del gyis de dag dang lhan cig tu 'i gro'o//ji tsam na bskyed yos tshal du phyin pa dang bu mo de rnams rdzi gi 'gram du gos
115a3('dul ba): rnams bzhag nas mos la zhugs te rtse bar brtsam so//de ni dza tsam ji tsam chur nub par de tsam de tsam du gos dog rje zhing 'jug la/ji tsam ni tsam ldang ba de tsam du gos
115a4('dul ba): dag 'bebs shing ldang ste de lta bur spyod lam zhi ba yino//de nas khrus kyis brtson pa byas nas gnas gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bu mo de rnams ni thog mar rang zas zos nas
115a5('dul ba): de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skye bo la sbyin par brtsom mo//de ni 'khor gyi skye bo la sngar byin nas/de'i 'og tu rang za bar rtso mo//de nas zos shing 'thungs nas bskyed mos tshal
115a6('dul ba): gyi bde ba nyam su myong por byas nas dong ngo //ji tsam lam kar chu rgal bar byed pa na/bu mo de rnams ni mchil lham rnams phud nas rgal lo//de ni mchil lha ma bcas pa
115a7('dul ba): kho nar ro//yang dong ste/de dag kun dga'i ra bar zhugs pa dang /des ni gdugs thogs te a mra'i tshal du byung ngo //gzhan dag gis gdugs rnams bor ro//
115b1('dul ba): nas drung dang par bya nas dpa 'du mnangs rnangs kyi khang du zhugs//'dunag//de ma gapa song pa'o//rnam yang dwa rjes bzhin du song ba ltas/des de'i margyan
115b2('dul ba): da/spyod du ma da lta bu mdzanas s+ho/gros del dru bar brnams pa/thu ni khyud du'i/glegs pa shes gnyen gyi bumam//zlum khyu
115b3('dul ba): bring ba kyis dus pa shig/das 'phrul pa rdzun du pa/'u 'dim du 'di dag thams mdan drug pa nga/mcho
115b4('dul ba): dang /'dro ba dang luste skur bar byed pa da /blo yin par bye /'di dag dang /gzhan yang spyod rdul ngan pa byed cing 'gren/khyod ni tshul dang dul ba phun sum
115b5('dul ba): chags pas del bus sngon pong de rnams dang lhan cig pa spyad mas tshol du 'gro bar byed do//des smras pabu mo thams cad ni pa dang mas brtsod pa'i rgyu ma yin no/gal
115b6('dul ba): bdag gis ma tshungs sa mang+yas nas/ /lab pa bachag par gyu na/'dag la su nag slong bar 'dzurahU~M/nges par 'dug /ji da 'chebar du dang /
115b7('dul ba): mkhan gson pa gyu//rnam 'a phyun dru ma na sa byeb cu ga gis gcig
116a1('dul ba): zhugs nas rtse bar bcom pa rgya na rdzaHmji tsamachur nub pa de tsam do tsam du gos rdzi bar byed do///khu gu bu med ni ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod
116a2('dul ba): ba dang ldan par bya dgos pas/gal te bdag gis gos phud pa 'ga' zhig gos mthong na mi rigs par 'gyur ro//bu mo khyod la de na su zhig lta/bu gu re shig khyod la
116a3('dul ba): nas kyang bdag mthong bar 'gyur ro//bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do//gzhan yang 'di 'dri ste bu mo 'di dag ni rang sbyar zos nas de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skye bo la zan skyon phyur
116a4('dul ba): byed pa ni lakho gyi skye sa snar zan byin na sa de'i 'og tu ring ze ba skyed do//zhwa mu bdag cig ni bris rnams kyi 'bras bu bas bdag cag la d+h+r-ig tu dus sbyin
116a5('dul ba): 'di dag ni tshigs 'byung ba'i 'bras bu 'tsho ba legs/brgyal man mo na 'ga' che ze 'thob pa'i phyir//bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do//gzhan yang
116a6('dul ba): 'di 'dri ste/'jig rten thams cad ni skam la mchil lham gyon mo/khyod ni tshul gyis pa de ni/bu gu 'jig rten thun mong/chu kho na la mchil lham dan mtshul te/
116a7('dul ba): ci'i slad du zhe na/thang la sdong dum dang /cher ma dang /rdo ba dang /zug rje dang /nya phyis kyi dum bu da /srin kag gi dum bu rnams mngon la/tshul ni de dag
116b1('dul ba): mo mngon pas des chu kho na la 'tshul l+h+wam bgo bar bag+h+nAM rI/zang la ni ma lagaso//bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do//gzhan yang 'di 'dra ste/bu mo de dag ni nyam
116b2('dul ba): gdugs thogs nas/khyod ni kun dga' ra ba'i shing gi grib ma la thogs byed na/'di rigs pa ci zhig yod/khu gu 'jig rten thun mo/kun dga' ra ba kho nar gdu
116b3('dul ba): bcang 'tshal te/de ci'i slad du nA~M na/kun dga'i ra ba ni rtag tu spre'u bya rnams kyis gang bas bya rnams ni gcin drug 'thor zhing rus pa'i dum bu dag mthor ro//sme
116b4('dul ba): rnams kyang bshung ba dang gci ba byed cing /'bras bu'i za 'phro dag 'thor bar byed la rang bzhin gyis rgod bag can yin pas phan tshun yal ga gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa na/shing dum
116b5('dul ba): dge ltung bar byed//bla gab mo mchis pa la ni de dag ma mchis//brgya la mchis na yang de res 'ga' zhig 'bab par bas te/des na kun dga' ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang ba
116b6('dul ba): babye'o/blo gab ma mchis par ni ma lag so//bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud//gzhan yang 'di 'dri ste/bu mo 'di dag ni rlung drang char pa byung na lha khang du 'jug na khyod
116b7('dul ba): ni zla gab med par 'dug//khu gu bla gab ma mchis pa kho nar gnas par bgyi'i/lha khang du 'jug par ni me lag so//bu mo 'di la rigs pa ci yod/khu gu ste khang
117a1('dul ba): pa 'di dag ni rtag tu dra dang /nal phrug dang /g.yon can rnams kyis mi stong lags te/gal te bdag zhugs pa'i yan lag dang /nying lag
117a2('dul ba): dag la 'ga' zhig gis rag na/de lta na bdag gi pha ma dag la mi snyan par mi 'gyur ram nyis na bla gab med par srog dang bral ba ni bla'ilha khang stong par mi
117a3('dul ba): 'jug go//de nas bram ze de de'i spyod tshul gyis rangs shing yid bde ba skyes nas khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen gyi khyim du zhugs te bu mo thob par 'dod pa'i spro ba dang /
117a4('dul ba): bcas pas bde legasu gyur cig/bde legasu gyur cig ces smra ba dang /khyim 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa/bram zer shig bslang ba'i dus ni ma yin na/ci
117a5('dul ba): zhig slong //bu mo slong ngo //su zhig gi ched du/mnyan yod na blon po'i mchog ri dgas 'dzin ces bya ba de'i bu sa ga zhes bya ba'i 'o//de rnams kyis smras pa/de dang //
117a6('dul ba): bdag cag ni rigs mnyam pa yin na/'on kyang yul ha cang thag ring che so//des smras pa/ring po kho na la bu mo sbyin par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nye na re shig/
117a7('dul ba): gal te bde bar gyur pa thos pa na dga' ba bskyed par zad/nye na sdug bsngal bar gyur ni sbyin pa dang /mchod pa dang /bkur sti bya bas dub par 'gyur zhing nor 'god
117b1('dul ba): bar yang 'gyuraro//de rnams kyis smras pa/gal te de lta na sbyin no//de nas bram ze bde legasu gyur cig ces smras nas song ste rim gyis gnyen yod du phyin nas lam gyis
117b2('dul ba): dub ba bsal to//blon po'i mchog ri dgas 'dzin gyi drung du song nas de nas bu mo'i za ba dang /gnas pa'i spyod tshul dang /gzugs bzang zhing dar la bab po dang /mdzes pa
117b3('dul ba): dang mkhas pa dag ji ltar bzhin du bsnyad nas smras pa/bdag gis nyon mongs pa chen pos yul dang /tshong rdal sna tshogasu rgyas pas sdug bsngal gyis de rnyed kyis da ni song
117b4('dul ba): la long shig/de nas blon po'i mchog ri dgas 'dzin gyis nyi ma dang /tshes grangs dang /yud tsam dang /rgyu skar dag bstun nas tsam par 'ongs te/dpal gyi 'byor
117b5('dul ba): pa chen pos sa ga'i chung ma blangaso//de mi yul du 'gro ba'i tshe mas bslabs pa dang /bu mo khyod kyis nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la rtag tu phyag bya/me la bsnyen bkur bya/ma
117b6('dul ba): long dri ma phyi bar bya/gos dkar po bgo bar bya/blang bar bya'i sbyin par mi bya/tshig srung bar bya/langs nas su la yang stan bstob par mi bya/zhim po bza' bar
117b7('dul ba): bya/bde bar nyal bar bya/them skas gzugs par bya'o//de nas ri dgos 'dzin gyis thos nas/des bsams pa bu mo 'di lta ba log par 'dzin du bcug ste/bdag
118a1('dul ba): gis 'di lta ba log pa dang bral la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dzin du bzhugo snyam du bsams nas de blangs te chas so//de nas de'i ma sdug pas snying dkrugs shing
118a2('dul ba): mig mchi mas gang bas mgul nas 'khyud nas ngu bzhin gyis nga ros smras pa/bu mo khyed mthong ba'i tha ni 'di yino//des de la shes par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/yum re shig
118a3('dul ba): khyod 'dir 'khrungs sam/'on te nye du'i khyim du/bu mo nye du'i khyim du'o//khyod kyi khang pa de yin nam 'on te 'di yin/'di yin no//bdag kyang 'dir skyes la der
118a4('dul ba): bdag gnas bor bsal 'du ba mchis na/gdon mi za bar mtha' 'bral bar 'gyur na bai shums su ci mchis/tsang ma gsung shig/de nas ri dgas 'dzin ni thang lo song ngo //
118a5('dul ba): sa ga ma la ni khyim thab dang /rang gi khyim nas thob pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig tu grur dong ba las de na rta rgod ma rte'u smad byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhig grur gzhug par byas
118a6('dul ba): pa dang /rte'u tha la mi rga'o snyam nas bsgrims kyang 'jug tu ma btub pa dang /ku tse byung ba sa ga mas thos nas des smras pa/ci'i phyir ku co 'di byung de rnams
118a7('dul ba): kyis ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /se ga mas smras pa/rte'u sngar nug shig dang /rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro//de rnams kyis de bzhin byas pa dang zhugaso//
118b1('dul ba): de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyis de rnams la dris pa/ci'i phyir khyed cag ring zhig lon nas 'ongs/rta rgod ma grur mchod du ma btub pas so//'o na ji ltar mchongs/tsam pa mas
118b2('dul ba): thabs bshams pa zhig bstan te rte'u sngar bcug paso//tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin//dzi tsam na 'gron po rnams lam kar nub mo brang btab ste gnas pa la ri dgas 'dzin gyi
118b3('dul ba): mal bya bsgribs zhig tu bcas pa sa ga mes thong nas dris pa/'di su'i mal/ri dgas 'dzin gyi'o//spos shig ci'i phyir gal to gnyid kyis log pa la bya skyibs stong
118b4('dul ba): durna don mi za bar non pas 'chi bar 'gyur te/bdag la gang zhig rmongs nas na gyos po khyim du ma phyin par lam kar shi ba 'odi lta bu'i bu mo bag mar blang zhes/ji snyed
118b5('dul ba): 'tshe'i bar mi snyan pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro//mal de yang spros pa las gad pa zhig pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos khyim bdag non to zhes kun tu brgyugs pa dang /khyim
118b6('dul ba): bdag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag 'di ni 'dug gis ma skrag par lam rtogasamo la spros so//sus sa ga mas so//tsam pa ma no mkhas pa yin//
118b7('dul ba): yang bskyed mos tshal rnying ba zhig tu nub mo brang btab ti 'i yod pa la ma/ri dgas 'dzin gyi mal lha khang stong pa zhig tu bcas pa sa gams mthong nas dris pa 'di mu'i chas//
119a1('dul ba): dpon po'i'o//spos shig ci'i phyir gal te lha khang rdib ste/de non na shi bar 'gyur te/bdag la zhes bya ba nas mi snyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhes
119a2('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//mal de yang spros pa las/lha khang zhig pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos brgyugs pa dang zhes bya ba nas tsam pa ma ni mkhas pa yin no zhes
119a3('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ji tsam na rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas lam gyis dubye ba bsal te/mdza'i bshes dang /nye du dang /gnyen gyi skye bo smras nas
119a4('dul ba): so gam rang gi rigs dang 'tsham pa'i khyim bdag las byed do//r-i dgas 'dzin gyi mna' ma drug gis re mos khyim mi'i zan sbyor ba las/sa ga ma la yang de bzhin du
119a5('dul ba): bsgo te/khyod kyis res kyang zhag la sbyor cig/de'i res las bab tu nye ba dang /gyos po dang sgyug mo dang /khyimo bdag rnams kyi dri'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag
119a6('dul ba): ri lur byas nas nyi ma re re zhing skam so//nyi ma re re zhing nod pa'i phye gang yin pa des las kyang bre khro phri ste bzhag la/lhag ma mar dang sres pas de dang tshad mnyam
119a7('dul ba): bar gyur to//sang lta bu res bab pa na/chang btung la reg por bya ba dang /khyim thab dang rang gi me tog gi phreng ba snying pa gang yin pa de dag bsil bar bzhag nas
119b1('dul ba): man nam 'angs pa dang /lus byud pa rnams la klu ci dang dri dang ma tog dang /zas dang tshang dag rgyan na//de rnams shin tu mgu nas bdag cag ri naka/lan nas
119b2('dul ba): khyim bdag gi rlung ma rnying pas bzhin du sa zhes du rnamakyis kyis de'i nyin par lam nyis 'gyur du d+d+ha//ji tsam na ri dgas 'dzin kyis pye d+ha'i dus su las kyi mtha' la bsgru
119b3('dul ba): bon las mang du zin pa dang /mthong nus des dris pa/sa~M khyed cag gis tha mi gzhan sa ga bkug gam+b+ha/sus kyang mu 'jug/glang gis na las nyis 'gyur du byas
119b4('dul ba): 'di la r+m+ma ts+tsha zhig yong /de rnams kyis smras pa/dpon 'a thos kyi rgyu ba de dru ba'i las bgyid//de d+hI/zla n-i/de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa r+m+ma rgyur smras pa dang /
119b5('dul ba): ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu rnams kyis rang rang gi chung ma la smras pa la//de rnams kyis smras pa/sa ka mas ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du gal te bdag cag gis kyang khyim ni sa rgyas
119b6('dul ba): zathas mi rnams dga' bar bgyis pa dang /bdag 'i yang rdzi ba dang khyed dang glu mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur//de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyis sa ga ma la dris po du ma khyed kyis
119b7('dul ba): zas rnams ji ltar bshams/des rgyas par smras pa dang /ri dgas 'dzin mgunas/des de kho na khyim gyi bya ba rnams byed du bcug ste/nang mi thams cad la smras pa/
120a1('dul ba): khyed cag las gang zhig sa ga mas byin pas mgu ba ni des gnas par gyis la de dang rje su 'thun par yang gyis shig/ji tsam khyim gyis dpon
120a2('dul ba): mor gyur nas spyod tshul dang gnas pa dang /nges pas nang mi thams cad dga' bar gyur to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na sa ga ma'i khyim steng nas ngang pa rnams kyis
120a3('dul ba): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling nAm rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu dag khyer nas dong pa las rgyal po'i khob na 'dug pa'i ngang pas de dag mthong nas skad phyung ba dang de rnams kyis kyang skye
120a4('dul ba): gonas 'thun pa'i btsugs pas mnags ma thub ste skad phyung ba dang rgyal po'i khab kyi khang tog tu 'bras kyi snye ma rnams lhung bar gyur to//de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams
120a5('dul ba): la re re byin pa dang /ri dwags 'dzin gyis rang gi skal ba sa ga ma la byin//des za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste zhing pa rnams la bsgo ba dang /de rnams kyang shin tu mgu/
120a6('dul ba): ste de rnams kyis zhing chung ngu zhig legs par bstan nas dus shes par byas te btab pa dang lhas dus bzhin du char phab pas sa bon dang mthun par phun sum tshogs par
120a7('dul ba): skyes so//yang phyi de lo la ni de bas kyang mang por gyur te/de bzhin du ji tsam na bang ba thams cad dang bas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras sa lus gang bar gyur to//ji tsam na
120b1('dul ba): sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nad kyis thebs nas des sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/lha gal te dang pas tshal te mchis pa'i sa lu brnyed na de la 'jam
120b2('dul ba): bsgral nas gsol cig dang /sos par 'gyur leg so//rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug nas smras pashes ldan dag khyed la dad pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sa lu'i snyem byin pa
120b3('dul ba): de dag khyed kyis ci byas/de na kha cig gis smras pa/lha bdag cag gis ni lha khang du phul lo//gzhan dag gis smras pa/bdag cag gis me'i nang du stsal to//gzhan
120b4('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/bdag cag gis sgo gang du btagaso//ri dgas 'dzin gyis smras pa/lha bdag gis sa ga ma la stsal na re shig des cir bgyis/rma bar 'tshalo//
120b5('dul ba): des sa ga ma la dris pa dang /des smras pa/jo bo ci dang pas 'tshal te mchis pa'i sa lu 'tshal ba zhig mchis sam/rgyal po spun gyis thebs pa la sman pa rnams kyis dang
120b6('dul ba): pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sa lu bstan to//de nas sa gA mas gser snod kyi nang du ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras kyis brkyang nas rgyal po la bskur ba las rgyal pos zos nas sos
120b7('dul ba): par gyur to//dus gzhan zhig na rgyal ba la ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis rta rgod ma ma smad gnyis shig phul ba las de la ma nI gang yin/rte'u ni gang yin pa 'gas kyang ma shes nas/
121a1('dul ba): rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag legs par rtogs la nga la gsol cig/blon po rnams kyis nyin thog thag tu dpyad na dug ste/
121a2('dul ba): gtan la ma pheb so//ri dgas 'dzin ni phyi dro khyim du song ba dang sa ga mas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/jo bo ji ste de ring ring zhig lon nos gshegs/
121a3('dul ba): des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyas par smras pa dang /sa ga mas smras pa/jo bo 'di la dpyad du ci zhig mchis/de gnyis chas mnyam par stsal dang /bu gang lags
121a4('dul ba): pabade na myur du 'tshal nas ma'i skal pa la 'tshalo//ma gang lags pa de ni mi 'tshal bar mgo steg mchis te/rtags ni de lagaso//ri dgas 'dzin gyis blon po rnams la
121a5('dul ba): smras nas/de rnams kyis kyang snyi bstan pa bzhin brtags na/de nas nam nangs pa dang /rgyal po la smras pa/lha 'di ni ma lags so//'di ni bu lags so//
121a6('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/khyed cag gis ji ltar shes lha 'di lta bud 'di lta bu la so khar tsang ci ste ma shos lha bdag cag gis 'tshal bar rngog la thog/sa ga mas de skad
121a7('dul ba): bstan legs mod/rgyal pos smras pa/tsam pa ma ni mkhas pa yin no//mi zhig chu 'gram du kla ma bzhag nas khrus byed pa dang /mi gzhan zhig 'ongs nas nges klam
121b1('dul ba): des mgo la dkris nas de nyid du khrus bya bar brtsam so//mi de khrus byas nas langs na/klam de ma mthong ngo //mo des smras pa kye nang rje ji tshol/klam mo//khyod kyis klam ga la
121b2('dul ba): yod gal te khyod kyi kla ma yod par gyur na ji ltar nges mgo la bkris nas zhugs pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang klum gyis mgo la bkris nas zhugs par 'gyuraro//des smras pa/'o ni
121b3('dul ba): nyid kho bo'i kla ma yin no//de gnyis khyod kyis nga'i zhes rtsod par gyur nas/de gnyis rgyal po'i drung du song ngo //rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag legs
121b4('dul ba): par rtogs la gang gi yin pa de la byin cig/de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams nas gcig la dris pa dang /des smras pa bdag gi lagaso//gcig shos la yang dris pa dang /
121b5('dul ba): rmas pa/bdag gi lagaso zhes khyod kyi dang ngo'i zhes pa la nyi ma 'das te/blon po rnams dub nas dgongs ka gtan la ma phebs bzhin du khyim du song ngo //sa ga mas ri
121b6('dul ba): dgas 'dzin gyi zhes bya ba na dris te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /sa ga mas smras pa/jo bo 'di la dpyad du ci zhig mchis te gnyis cig kyang phyed
121b7('dul ba): khyer cig/cig shos kyang phyed khyer cig ces gsungs shig dang /gang gi lags pa de'i mchis nas di ci'i phyir bdag gi klam dralo zhes mchi'o gang gi ma lags pa de'i glo ba
122a1('dul ba): la ni re shig bdag gis phyed thob na yang der zad/'dir bdag la ci zhig god snyam ste/de ltar brtag par bgyi'o//ri dgas 'dzin song nas blon
122a2('dul ba): po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas/rgyal pos smras pa/tsam pa ma ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//rgyal po la tshong pa gru bas tsan dran gyi sdong
122a3('dul ba): dum zhig skyes su phul ba dang /de'i mgo gang yin 'jug gang yin ma shes nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ji lta bu yin rtogs shig/de rnams kyis nyin
122a4('dul ba): thog thag dpyod na ma shes nas dgongs ka khyim du dong ngo //sa ga mas zhes bya ba nas ri dgas 'dzin gyis dris pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//des ji ltar gyur pa rnams
122a5('dul ba): rgya cher smras pa dang /des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgya cher smras pa dngas ga mas smras pa/jo bo 'di la dpyid du ci mchis/tshab tu 'or cig dang /rtsa ba gang
122a6('dul ba): lags pa ni 'byin par 'gyuraro//thor gang lags pa de ni steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de la brtag pa ni de lag so//ri dgras 'dzin kyis blon po rnams la smras nas/
122a7('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/tsam pa ma ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ri bor na khyim bdag cig yod pa de dang rigs mnyam po las chung ma
122b1('dul ba): blangs pa las de bu po yang med/bu mo yang med do/de bu mngon par 'dod pas chun ma zhig blangs pa dang /de chung mchen ma shos rlung bzhin gyi phrag dog can zhig pas/
122b2('dul ba): dri'i mngal mya rung bar bya ba'i sbyor ba zhig byas pa las/de'i mngal shin tu rnam par dag pA las sems can+da dang ldan par gyur nasaji tsam zla ba dgu 'das pa dang /khye'u
122b3('dul ba): zhig btsa so//des bsams pa sha kho na rnams la ni 'di lta ste/chen tshun 'di tha chad yin pas gdon mi za bar ma yang mos thams cad gang yang rung ba zhig gis gsod po
122b4('dul ba): 'gyur na/bdag gis khyim thab ma bdag gi tsa~M b+h+ya yod/bdag gi spya na ma du ni srung /ye de kho na la sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/de dang khyim thub lhan cig
122b5('dul ba): b+h+yas te rung nas chen ma shos la smras pache ni bdag gis bu 'di khyod la byin gyis gsum shig/des bsams po khyod ni gang la bu yod pa de kho na'i yin par zas pas
122b6('dul ba): khyim gyi bdag mor 'gyur bas gso'o snyam nas des de gsas pa las dor po yang shi bar gyur te/de gnyis khyim gyi phyir rtsod par gyur nas/gcig gis smras pa/
122b7('dul ba): 'di 'i ma'i bu yin//gcig shos kyis smras so/'di kho ma'i du yin no//rgyal po'i drung du srong 'dir /rgyal pos blon po rnams yo sgoT/shes ldan dag /ding la gang
123a1('dul ba): son ba rtogs shog/de rnams kyis dpyang bya las nyim 'das kyang gtan la mo po bas nas dgo/sa/khyim du dong pa dang /sdug na ri dgas pa na
123a2('dul ba): dris te zhes bya ba nas 'di la dpyad du ci mchis zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/de gnyis la kho bo cag gis ni gang gi bu yin pa mi shes kyis khyed gnyis las gang
123a3('dul ba): stobs che ba de khyer la song shig ces gsungs shig dang /lhag pa gnyis nas bzung nas 'dren par bgyid de/de sdug bsngal gyis ngu bar gyur pa dang /de'i ma
123a4('dul ba): gang lags pa de ni brtse bar mchis pas 'di gson na/nam zhig mthong ba chu chung rgyams ma'i cig shos de ni brtse ba ma mchis pas gang gi tshe mi gtod pa de'i tshe/de
123a5('dul ba): la lcag gis gzhus shig dang /ji ltar gyur pa smra bar 'gyur te/'di la brtag pa ni 'di lagaso//ri dgas 'dzin kyis blon po rnams la smras pa dang /zhes bya
123a6('dul ba): ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/tsam pa ma ni mkhas pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dus gzhan zhig na/ri dgas 'dzin nad kyis thebs nas de la sman
123a7('dul ba): pas nyi ma cig 'byin pa las theg gi bar gyur to//phyi de nyin par sman ma yin pa byin pas na bar gyur to//sa ga mas bsams pa jo bo ci'i slad du nyin cig ni theg gi
123b1('dul ba): bar gyur la/nyin gcig ni nad par gyur nas snyam nas des sman gang dag gis theg gi bar gyur pa'i chags de dag bzung nas de nas de sman pa rnams bsgo nas slar log nas rang nyid kyis dpyad
123b2('dul ba): dbyangs byas pa las sos par gyur to//ri dgas 'dzin gyis bsams pa gang gis na bdag nyin gcig ni theg gis/nyin gcig ni na bas gang gis tshe sman pa mi 'ongs pa de'i rtog
123b3('dul ba): tu thig go ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam ste/des sa ga ma la dris pa zhes bya ba nas tsam pa ma na mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
123b4('dul ba): gyi glang po che'i bla dpal skyed ces bya ba de la dus gnan zhig na rgyal po ga shi bar gyur to//zhes sa ga mas thos nas/de ri dgas 'dzin la smras pa/jo bo blon po thams cad la
123b5('dul ba): mthar gyis bka' 'bab par 'gyur gyis/dpal skyed la lha bzod pa mdzad du stsal ba'i rig so//des smras pa/bu mo bzod pa byed du bzhug/de na des rgyal po la smras
123b6('dul ba): ba/sku dpal skyed ni lta la glo ba nye ba lags ni/de la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/bzod par bya'o//lce gal te bzod par mdzad nas/de'i
123b7('dul ba): dbang thad de dag stsal du gsol/de bzhin du sbyin no//dpal skyed kyis ji ltar sa gams bdag la rgyal po bzod pa byed bcug pa shes nas de de la lan klan pa'i bsam pas
124a1('dul ba): gnaso//dus gzhan zhig na rI dgas 'dzin ngo mtshan la nad byung ste/de'i rim gros gam byed pa las de 'dzom par gyur to//des smras pa//
124a2('dul ba): jo bo 'di la 'dzem du ci mchis/cinga'i rim gro bu bu mos mi 'gyid dam/'on kyang de 'jam par gyur to//des bsams pa/'di dag gis rim gro byar mi btub
124a3('dul ba): pas/de'i chung me zhig blang ngo snyam nas/de dpal skyed kyi khyim du song ba dang /des 'ongs pa leg so zhes bya ba'i tshig smras nas/stan btabs te 'dug go/
124a4('dul ba): dpal skyed la bu mo zhig yod pa/des de la smras pa/bu mo sa ga mos rkang pa gnyis la zung shing /sa ga mas smras pa/bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa la bzung bar
124a5('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gnas gang lags pa de ni mchis so zhes smras nas yang smras pa/bkra shis par gyur cig/bkra shis par gyur TIg dpal skyed kyis smras pa/ci zhig
124a6('dul ba): slong bu mo slong ngo //su zhig gi ched du/des smras pa gyos po'i tshed du'o//de cang mi smra bar 'dug/dpal skyed kyi chu re mes smras pa/dgo ga cig na de la ci ste
124a7('dul ba): sbyin/sa gams smras pa/mi rnams kyi lang tshe ni nor yin pas/dpyad du ci yod byon cig/dpal skyed kyis smras pa/bzang mo bdag cag la sa ga mas
124b1('dul ba): pan+da btags kyis byin cig/gal te de lta na sbyin par bgyi'o//de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar byung nas de de'i rim gro byed par gyur te/sa ga
124b2('dul ba): ma ni de ltar mi byed do//ri dgas 'dzin gyis smras pa/bu mo bdag la tshig byin cig/des smras pa/jo bo chung zad nyams par ma gyur tama?/bu mo khyod la mas bslabs
124b3('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de cung zad blangs te myi gnas sam/jo bo thams cad blangs logs te/nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la phyag byos shig ces mchi ba gang lags pa ni/mna'
124b4('dul ba): ma'i nyi ma dang /zla ba lta bu ni gyos rgyug lags pas/re shig bdag gis phyag bgyis lags so//me la bkuro bsti bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni bud med
124b5('dul ba): kyekyi khyim thab me lta bu legs te/khyo ma thab la ha cang bsnyen par mi bgyid/ha cang ring bar yang mi bgyi ste/bdag ni khyim thab me lta bur bsnyen kur bgyid//
124b6('dul ba): me long phyi bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang legs pa ni/sdum pa ni me long lta bu lags pas rtag tu zhal zhal bgyi zheng phyag dang bgyi ba lags te/sdum pa de la bdag
124b7('dul ba): gdug so gcig bzhin du byi dor bgyid lagaso//go sa dkar po bgo bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni khyim gyi las bgyid pa na/gos gzhan dag kho nas
125a1('dul ba): lha mchod pa dang khyim thab kyi drung du mchi ba na ni gos dkar ngo rnams bgo bar bgyi ba ste/de yang bdag bgyid lagaso//blang bar bya'i sbyin par mi
125a2('dul ba): bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa la ci zhig blang bar bgyi zhe na/'jig rten las tshig ngan pa smras pa'o//tshig ngan pa ni su la yang smra bar mi bgyi ba ste/de la yang
125a3('dul ba): bdag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas lagaso//tshig bsrung bar bya'o//zhes mche ba gang lags pa ni/gsang ba'i tshig mi 'phel bar bgyi ba ste/bdag
125a4('dul ba): la ngag bsdam par mchis lags so//langs nas su la yang stan bstob par mi bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/de 'di skad ces khyod rigs kyi mna' ma yin pas khyod
125a5('dul ba): gnas dben pa na 'dug par bya'o zhes mchis pa lags te/bdag dben pa kho na na mchis lag so//zhim po bza' bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni shin tu
125a6('dul ba): bkres nas bza' bar bgyi bo ste/bdag ni rtag tu khyim gyi skye bo zas 'tshal ba'i 'og tu 'tshal lo//bde bar nyal bar bya'o//zhes mchi ba gang lags pa na
125a7('dul ba): mtshan mi khyim gyi dgos pa thams cad bgyis nas snod brtul te//ci nas kyang yang ldang sna ni mi dgos par khyod nyal bar bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags te/'di ni legs
125b1('dul ba): bar gzhag du'o//'du na ltos par gnag pa'i nas bdag pa/don bskyon thamaskas bcwa' bar bya'o zhes mtsho ba gang lags pa ni 'di skad ces khyod ston dge pa bcu las kyis ldam
125b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa des lha'i 'gro ba thub nas 'dir mi 'jig rten du skyes pa 'di ni/las kyi yin pas 'dir yang khyod kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin/bsed nams dge byaste/TIg
125b3('dul ba): pre mi bya'o//'di ni dbyug gi ya gang mtho ris kyi them sku sa lta bu yin no zhes bgyi ba lags te/de yang bdag rdo bo thogs gos bgyid//sna ga ma leg so legs sa/
125b4('dul ba): spyod kyim mkhas pa yinan/gang gis phyir mas ldem pa smras pa/rtags pas na/khyod ni lhag par mkhas pa yin//'dul brtson//bam po drug cu gsum
125b5('dul ba): pade nas ri dgas 'dzin 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/sa ga ma la bdag/bdag gis ma zhes bod do snyam nas/bcom
125b6('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun
125b7('dul ba): pa mna' ma la bdag gis ma zhos brod du rung lags sam//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/gal te chos lnga dang ldan na ste/lnga gang zhe na nad g.yog byed
126a1('dul ba): ba dang /thab rir bab pa'i chung ma len pa dang /srog gi skyabs byed pa dang /nor srung ba dang /shes rab kyi dgo ba sha byed pa'o//dar
126a2('dul ba): sdom lnga la/nad g.yogs dang ni chung ma dang //srog dang nor ni sbyin pa dang //shes rab sgrub par byed pa dang /lnga po 'di dag mar bshad do//de nas ri dgas
126a3('dul ba): 'dzin ko sa la rgyal po gsal rgyal gang ni ba der song ste phyin pa dang /rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so//lha bdag ni sa ga ma pa ma zhes bya bar bod par
126a4('dul ba): paso+om+b+haswA /swAgrAs s+yA dz+wa la s+yAd+hA m+b+ha gr-i gyis pas/bye ma la d+his langs des snying nas 'ad/des phyi mos dris /des sa
126a5('dul ba): pabakhyod kyis ngos kyang chul pos kyang rung de ni khyod kyi sring mo kho na yin no//ring du 'phur tshangs sbyin mngag gzhug mA'i bu mo dang 'dus pa las de las bu pho zhig btsas
126a6('dul ba): de'i ming stobs kyis bshes gnyen du btags pa las/de rgyal po mis kyis nyes po 'ga' zhig gi phyir spyugs pa las/tsam par song nas gnas pa de'i bu mo
126a7('dul ba): ni 'di yin te/des na khyod kyi sring mor 'ong ngo //de nas rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas dril sgogasu btsug pa/sa ga ma 'di ri dgas 'dzin gyi nem/rgyal
126b1('dul ba): bo gsal rgyal gyi ni sring mo yin//des sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar gtsug lag khang brtsigaso//phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang /de bzhin du gnas brtan
126b2('dul ba): rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gau ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzang na bzhugaso zhes gdags pa byas so//
126b3('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na se ga ma las sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo zhes ri dwags 'dzin gyis thos nas/lag pa 'gram pa la btad nas/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug ste/yul
126b4('dul ba): gyi bzang mo la phung ba ci 'dra dag byung bar gyur snyam nas/ri dgas 'dzin gyis dor bar brtsams pa dang /se ga mas smras pa/jo bo mdor bar bcom ldan 'das la zhus
126b5('dul ba): shing //des bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dngabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma dor bar gzeb bu sum cu rtsa gnyis byos la/shing bal gyis khong ste/
126b6('dul ba): gzeb bu rnams kyi nang du s+tho da re rI zhog la/sa gra mas dus gsum du lag pas yugs shig ces d+mo shig tu de nas nyi ma dun po lags nas/gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis
126b7('dul ba): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//des de bzhin du byas pa las nyi ma bdun pa lags pa dang /gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis byung nas bsrings bskyed de nar song ba dang /rtsal po che thub
127a1('dul ba): brlag sha dag tu gyur to//dus gzhan zhig na rnams shing rtar zhugs te/phyir byung nas slar 'jug pa dang /mdun na 'don gyi bu shing d+hA
127a2('dul ba): zhugs nas phyir 'byung ba ji tsam na phan tshun shing rta'i mda' gnyis thug pa dang /mdun na 'don gyi bus smras pa/zur cig de rnams kyis kyang smras pa/khyod nyid
127a3('dul ba): zur cig/mdun na 'don gyi bus 'jal to zhes byas nas tshig rtsub po smra bar bsams pa dang /de nas sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis shing rta'i mda' nas bzung ste 'phangs pas
127a4('dul ba): phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng du rngab bsnun te/de de nas gos kyis mgo bsgyur te/pa'i drung du song nas mig mchi mas gang bas smras pa/yab sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis
127a5('dul ba): bdag la 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabasu bgyis//bu ci'i phyir/des rgyas par smras pa dang /des smras pa/bu gal te de lta na thabs shig bsham pa byas la de
127a6('dul ba): rnams mthar kyis kha gdag gis mya ngan ma byed cig de de rnam sa la klan ka tshol ba lhur len cing gnaso//dus gzhan zhig na ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ri 'or pa log par
127a7('dul ba): gyur nas/rgyal pos dmago kha chen tsog bkye ba las/rdugs rab tu rdugs nas slar log go/de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du dmag kha chen bkye ba las rdugs
127b1('dul ba): rab tu rdugs te/skyur log nas rgyal po rang nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang byung ba dang /sa grA ma'i bu nang du 'jug pa de rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/lha gang
127b2('dul ba): dugashegs/ri bor rnams 'bebs su'o//lce bzhugs shig bdag cag mchi'o//de bzhin du gyis shig/des de rnams la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
127b3('dul ba): bsnyad nas/de rnams dong ste ri bor pa rnams phab nas gte'u bzung dbye blangs te/bslar 'ongs pa dang /mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/lha 'di dag ni 'phags pa rtsal
127b4('dul ba): po che drag cig ste/re shig lha'i dka' bas bsgrubs pa glang lags pa de ni 'di dag gis 'bring gis bsgrubs kyis lhas 'di la dgongs shig/rgyal po rnams ni khu phrig
127b5('dul ba): can yin pas/snying la bzhag ste slar mdun nu 'don la dris pa de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya//des smras pa/lha de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/gal te de dag 'tshal
127b6('dul ba): bar gyur na/lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyuraro//rgyal po ji mi dga'i nas bsams pa/de ltar 'gyur srid kyis ji ltar bsad par
127b7('dul ba): bya zhe na/thabs po sham pa sems shing gsang 'phel du dogs pa su la yang mi 'dri bar de dag nyid kyis dpyad pa las blo skyes pa 'di kho nar 'gron du bos la bdungs
128a1('dul ba): te btang ngo snyam nas/des sa gA ma lnga spring pa/che zhes bu rnams srang 'dir zan zo shig/des bsams pa sang ni bu rnams nad po'i der za bar
128a2('dul ba): 'gyur gyis bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol lo snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/phyin pa dang /
128a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgos 'dzin
128a4('dul ba): gyi ma sA ge ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
128a5('dul ba): de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
128a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod pa sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das
128a7('dul ba): kyis cang mi gsung ba ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la gnang ngo zhes bya ba nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
128b1('dul ba): rgyam po pha nyid rnams kyis drung du dus nas/b+h+yoru shog dashig ces thos so//de nas rgyal pos dug ta la tA la dang zas sbyar bas tshangs par byas nas/mganam
128b2('dul ba): bcad de/dA nAs gze ba bkang nas steng du dri po shos kyi mgo bzhag rgyu skyegs la rgyas data nas sa go ma la bkur ba dang /sag mas bsams pa/gdon mi
128b3('dul ba): bar lhas snying mo'i bu rnams la dgo ba zhig bskur ba yin gyis/bdag gis tsho sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bgo bar dbulo snyam nas/de nas sangs
128b4('dul ba): rgyus la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i gzar ba dang bcwa'i ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas/bcom ldan
128b5('dul ba): 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas zhesabya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin du'o//gzeb kho bya bar brnams pa dang /
128b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gal tes gra mas bden pa mi mthong bar du gsad pa mthong nu bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'byur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/snyam du dgongs
128b7('dul ba): nas/sa ga ma la bka' stsal pa/re shig 'dug la chos nyon la phyis ci dga' ba gyis shig/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas
129a1('dul ba): chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang brag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas
129a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong bar mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas bden pa mthong nas/gzeb kha phye ba da /bu'i mgo rnams mthong nas de nas gsol
129a3('dul ba): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad ni 'di ltar mi rtag pa lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal
129a4('dul ba): po gsal rgyal gyis se ga ma'i bu rnams brdungs pa ni nyeso//gal te ma brdungs par gyur na/'di rnams kho nas grogs byas pas de'i lag mthil du sa mtha' dag 'jog
129a5('dul ba): par 'gyur ba zhig/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lus rdul gyis yog cing /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab
129a6('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyisau ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyalnga la 'di skad
129a7('dul ba): ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po khyod lus rdul gyis yog cing gang nas 'dir 'ongasabatsun pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur ba yul gyi dbang phyug dang /
129b1('dul ba): mthu dang /brtson 'grus thob pasa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs par phab ste/gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po'i bgyi ba dang /rgyal po'i sgrub pa tha dad pa gang dag lpags pa
129b2('dul ba): de dag bdag gis bgyis te/yongasu rdzogs nas lus rdul gyis yog cing mchis pa lagasaso//rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri bo re byas/khyod kyis ji ltar
129b3('dul ba): bzod pa de lan thob shig/rgyal po chen po dper na/khyod la 'dir shwar phyogs nas yid mi ches pa yid brtan du rung ba brtan pa 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad
129b4('dul ba): ces lta bdag bzod 'di nas shar phyogasu mchi na/de nas bdag gis ri bgo chen po ma chag pa/ser ka ma mchis pa/phrag ma mchis pa/shin tu khregs pa
129b5('dul ba): cig tu sdug pa zhig sa'i bar dang /na mkha'i bar gyi sems can thams cad dang /srog chags thams cad dang /'byung po thams cad dang /rtswa dang /shing dang /
129b6('dul ba): yal gi dang /lo ma dang /'dab ma ji snyed pa thams cad phye mar glog cing mchi ba mthong gi snga lha khyod kyis bgyi ba 'am/sgrub pa gang lags pa de mdzod cig ces zer la de
129b7('dul ba): bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs nas mi zhig 'ongs te bya nas bgyi ba 'am/sgrub pa de mdzod cig zer te/rgyal po chen po 'jigs pa chen po'i
130a1('dul ba): yang chen po//ma bzad par byed pa mi gzad pa de lta bunye bar gnas na/mi nyid thob pa ni rnyed par dka' na khyod kyi ci zhig bya/btsun pa 'jigs
130a2('dul ba): pa chen po'i yang chen po mi byas par bgyid pa/mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na/mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba lags pa/don spyad pa dang /chos spyad pa
130a3('dul ba): dang /bsod nams spyad pa dang /dge ba spyad pa dang /bzang po spyad pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la brtson par byed pa ma lags par gzhan zhig bgyir
130a4('dul ba): mchis/rgyal po chen po khyod ci'i phyir 'di skad ces btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu'i zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la
130a5('dul ba): brtson par bgyi/zhes bya ba'i ba ro gong ma bzhin du'o//btsun pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/sa'i dkyil
130a6('dul ba): 'khor chen po legs par pha bo ste/gnas pa de rnams kyis glang po che rnams dang /glang po cher 'gyes pa dang /rta pa rnams dang /rta par 'gyed pa dang /
130a7('dul ba): shing rta pa thams cad dang /shing rta par 'gyed pa dang /dpung bu chung rnams dang /dpung bu chung du 'gyed pa dang /gsang tshig mkhan rnams dang /gsang
130b1('dul ba): tshig mkhan du 'gyod pa dang /nor rnams kyis nor bu brgya pa tha dad pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe 'byed pa'i 'brum mchis pa dang /stobs ma mchis pa
130b2('dul ba): dang /pha rol gnon pa ma mchis pa lags pas/de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu nye bar gnas nAM zhes bya ba nas
130b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi ba lags par zhes mchi'o//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//rgyal po chen po de bzhin du srog chags
130b4('dul ba): 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rga ba dang /'chi bas 'joms pa yino//rgyal po chen po de ltar rga ba dang /'chi bas 'joms pa na/skyes bu gang zag
130b5('dul ba): ge don spyad pa dang /zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bya ba ma yin par gzhan ci zhig byur yod ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nus
130b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogasu bcad paso bka' stsal pa/ji ltar che zhing rgyu rgyu ba/ri b+ho na mkha' las 'ongs pa//kun nas yang dag 'ong ba yis//sA ni phywa
130b7('dul ba): mar klog pa na/de la glang po ches mi rdzi//dpung bu chung dang shing rta dang //rtas min gsang tshig mkhan dang ni//nor gyis 'gyed pas rgyal mi thob//de bzhin no/
131a1('dul ba): dang 'chi ba yis//mi rnams 'joms par byed pa ni//rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang /dmang rigs gdol pa g.yung po dang /tshul
131a2('dul ba): khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims ldan//khyim pa de bzhin rdul zhugs can//long tshe nyid dang rgan po dang //de bzhin bar ma'i mi rnams dang //cung zad kyang ni 'dzem
131a3('dul ba): med par//thams cad mngon du 'joms par byed//de lta bas na mkhas pa'i mi//bdag gi don la lta ba yis//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni//bla med dag
131a4('dul ba): la dang bya zhing //lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis//dam pa'i chos ni spyad byas na//'di na smad par mi 'gyur zhing //mtho ris song nas dga' bar 'gyur//
131a5('dul ba): de nas kau sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rje su yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
131a6('dul ba): phyag byas te/stan las langs nas song ngo //dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
131a7('dul ba): pa/btsun pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma las ci zhig bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pas/sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la de rnams las kyang bu pho
131b1('dul ba): sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste/rgyal po che thub brlag pa sha stag tu gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/smon lam gyi dbang gis so//gang du smon
131b2('dul ba): lam btab lags//dge slong dag skyon byung ba//bA ra na so'i grong khyer du khyim bdag cig gi bu shi nas/de'i chung ma de rtag tu mngon par 'dod par gyur to//gang gi
131b3('dul ba): tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis//sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da'
131b4('dul ba): ba'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/bA ra na ser rgyal po kr-i ki sa zhes bya ba byung ste/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi
131b5('dul ba): las bo rtsigs so//de nas bu med pa bu mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang rgas par gyur nas mchod rten de la bye dor byas nas 'dug go//des 'dun pa'i slong mo byis
131b6('dul ba): nas mchod rten la mchod pa byas te/smon lam btab pa/bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge
131b7('dul ba): ba'i rtsa ba des bdag bu mang por gyur cig ces byas te song nas grong khyer du zhugaso//de na bud med cig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nos ngu ba dang /des gzhan
132a1('dul ba): nig la dris pa 'i phyir 'di du bar gyur/des dI ltar gyur rnams smras pa nga dus bsams pa ga la tu bdag kyang bu 'byung bar gyur na/bdag/
132a2('dul ba): kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyam su myong bar 'gyur//snyam pa las/ji tsam na sum cuHgnyis kyi dgu 'dun gyi mchod rten de la mchod pa byed pa ni bud med de yad de dang
132a3('dul ba): yang mi rang bzhig na 'dug go/de rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab po/dge pa'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag chen po che chen po'o stobs dang ldan par gyur cig
132a4('dul ba): byas so//de de rnams lnga dris pa/bu dag khyed kyis smon lam yin ga ba taH/de rnams kyis smras pa/yum 'di nga /'di dag go//des smras pa/bu d+yAg
