132a5('dul ba): gol te de lta na khyed cag gis mar bdag kho na gyur cig//yum de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas de rnams dong ngo //des bsams re shig bud med de lan cig
132a6('dul ba): na yad sbyin na m+WA dun/das pa na su~M d+d+haHdanyi ni/d+hIn+d+ha sa di sgyur rnam par cag pad rten dang
132a7('dul ba): nye ban phyagazhi mi nag yod pasgreng 'byu 'di tha cig tsam gyis snyi sum bu tso gnyis byu la skye sngags kyi hU~M/des sem 'o/'byung ba'i thab
132b1('dul ba): rung ba yin snyam du rig nas mchod rten de la dad pa drag pos smon lam gdub par brtsams pa/ji ltar bya gag mo 'dri zad cig tsam gyis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ba de bzhin//
132b2('dul ba): du bdag gi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang ci sgo ngar 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas//dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de nyid sa gra ma
132b3('dul ba): 'di nyid yino//sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dga' 'dun gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di rnams kho na yin te/'dis dri na smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam
132b4('dul ba): par smin pas sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo //btsun pa sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa ma bgyis shing/
132b5('dul ba): skyon ma mchis par rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bskum nas/de rnams kyis mgos gzeb bkang ste/sa ga ma la bsgyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bAkas stsal
132b6('dul ba): po/dge slong dag 'dri dag kho nas las rnams byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/lus can rnams la 'bres bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
132b7('dul ba): dge slong dang /sngon byung ba'i ri bor zhig na chang 'tshong zhig gnaso//chom brkun pa rab tu mang po chang tshol zhing de'i drung du 'ongs nas dris pa chang yod dam/chang 'tshong gi
133a1('dul ba): chung mas smras pa/yod do zhes de rnams kyi dablud na/'dzar ba med nas/des glang zhig bstan te/'di sod cig/de rnams kyis smras pa/mtshon cha mdo//des gta' blangs nas
133a2('dul ba): tshon cha byin pa dang /de rnams kyis de bsad par brtsams pa dang /de gsod pa ni sems la bdag gsod pa gang yin pa 'di dag thad ni chang tshong gi chung ma 'di yin gyis/bdag gang du 'di rnams kyi mgo
133a3('dul ba): bcad nas//gzeb bkang ste/'di la bskur bar 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces bsam so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi grang gang yin pa de ni ko sa la brgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid
133a4('dul ba): yino//chom rkun pa gang yin pa de rnams ni sa ga ma'i bu 'od nyid rnams yi no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chang tshong gi chung ma gang yin pa deni sa ga ma 'di nyid yino zhes rgyas par bya'o//sangs rgyas bac+doMs
133a5('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab na/'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhug so//de'i tshe drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bisti ga nas na drang srong shig yod//de don 'chags pa las bsti
133a6('dul ba): gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa rdzab can gyi phyogs shig tu gcin khu chu dang bcas pa zhig gci so//glo bur du ri dgas mo skom pas nyen pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/de skom pas nyen pa
133a7('dul ba): de 'thungs nas mo'i dbang po la bsnam so//son rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas/sems can dang ldan par gyur to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na phyogs de nyidadu'ong
133b1('dul ba): nas khye'u zhig byung ba dang /des de bsnams na skal ba mi mthun pa'i sems can yin nas bor te song ngo //ji tsam na drang srong de bsti gnas de na 'chag pa las/
133b2('dul ba): khye'u de mthong nas/'di su'i bu yin zhes de bsam pa la zhugs pa las/ji tsam na bdag gi yin par mthong nas/des de bsti gan su bzhag ste/bsnun bstod
133b3('dul ba): bskyed nas de'i mgo ri dgas kyi 'dra bas ri dgas mgo zhes bya bar gragaso//dus gzhan zhig na drang srong shi nas/ri dgas mgos klad pa'i thod pa rdob pa'i rig pa bslab
133b4('dul ba): de thod pa brdabs nas thams cad lung ston par byed de/gal te re shig sgra drag por gyur na/gyen du 'gro ba ltar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do//
133b5('dul ba): 'on te 'bring du gyur na gyen du 'gro ba mir skye bar lung ston por byed de/de ni bde 'gro'i rtagaso//ngan 'gro'i rtags ni gal te re shig sgra mi gsal bar gyur na 'og tu 'gro
133b6('dul ba): ba sems can dmyal bar skyed par 'gyur bor lung sbyin par byed do//'on te sgra 'bring du gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba/dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur bar lung sten par byed do//
133b7('dul ba): 'on te rtswa chung bar gyur na/'og tu 'gro ba yi dag su skye bar lung ston par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag
134a1('dul ba): do la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa'i mgo bzhi khyer cig/btsun
134a2('dul ba): pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/mgo bzhi khyer te drang srong de'i drung du song nas khyod kyis lung ston cig/
134a3('dul ba): des rgyun du zhugs pa'i thod pa la brdebs nas smras pa 'di ni lha rnams su skyes so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no//phyir mi 'ang ba'i yang de bzhin no//
134a4('dul ba): dgra bcom pa'i thod pa la yang brdabs na/ma shes rnam par ma shes nas ngo tsha bas de 'di snyam du sems te/glang phyir 'di yis 'gro ba ma shes pa//bdag
134a5('dul ba): cag bstan pa de las nyams gyur tam//'on te slob dpon rigs las ma skyes sam//'on te rtags rnams de 'dra ma yin nom//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
134a6('dul ba): smras pa/gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa//khyod kyi rig pa kun legs gams ma byas//ri shig rig pa mtha' dag rtogs byos la//khyod kyis phyi
134a7('dul ba): nas 'jig rten lung ston cig/ri dgas mgos smras pa/khyod kyis rig pa thams cad la byang ba 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/des smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa dag
134b1('dul ba): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//de nas ri dgas mgo/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
134b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal po lce mi skye bo'i 'gro 'tshal na//rig pa'i skyon gyis sems can spyod pa drug pa ma 'tshal gyis/
134b3('dul ba): gtso bo srid bu gsum gyi mtsho chen pha rol byon pa po//pha rol sgyu kun las rgyal drog pa ma 'tshal do ci gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/me ru ba
134b4('dul ba): pa lpags kyi me/lcags kyi tho bas brdungs byas nas//rims kyis nye bar zhi ba yi//'gro ba ji ltar mi mngon pa//de bzhini 'dod pa'i 'dam tshogs las//
134b5('dul ba): rgyal te yang dag rnam grol ba//mi g.yo ga 'phong 'thob rnams kyi//'gro ba dngag su yod ma yin//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la
134b6('dul ba): ri dwags mgos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos
134b7('dul ba): po thob pa ltan/bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung sbyin par rdzogs par mdzad/
135a1('dul ba): de rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nasargyal po'i khab tu ji tsam+ba bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/mnyan yod gang na ba der
135a2('dul ba): rgyu zhing gshegs te/rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /mnyan yod du byon nas/mnyan yod kyi ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs
135a3('dul ba): noni bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das bla gab med pa na 'chag cing rgyu skar rnams gyur pa gzig so//gzin nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas mgo la bkA stsal ba ri dag mgo ji srid cig/
135a4('dul ba): na lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur sems shig/des bsam pa btsun pa 'jig rten 'di mi rung 'di rab tu ma rung lags te/rgyu skar rnams ji ltar gnas pa dang
135a5('dul ba): sbyar na lo bcu gnyi su char mi 'bab lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu skar rnams mthun par byin gyis brlabs nas/bai ka' sprul pa yang shes par gyis
135a6('dul ba): shig/des gsol pa lo drug tu lcags so//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis yang smos pa dang gsalag lngar lagaso//de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi
135a7('dul ba): bar du'o//de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gnas mal rnams skye bas yod par spos shig/de ring kho
135b1('dul ba): nar lhas bye ba'i tshogs lta bu'i char 'beb par 'gyur te/de la khrus byed pa gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras dang /phol mig 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//ri dgas mgo de ltar
135b2('dul ba): na rgyu skar rnams ni 'gyur ba g.yo ba/mi brtan pa yin te/srog kyang g.yo ba mi brtan pa yino//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ri dgras mgo la
135b3('dul ba): mngon par dad par gyur to//de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas//de nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba rab tu myong nas/tshigasu bcad
135b4('dul ba): pas smras pA/ri dgas rnams ni nags khrod rten//mdab chags rnams ni mkha' la rten//rnam par sgom pa chos la brten//dgra bcom mya ngan 'das la rten//
135b5('dul ba): ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/mnyan yod na byon nas/mnyan yod na bdag kho na'i kun dga' dab kho na na bzhugs
135b6('dul ba): so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu
135b7('dul ba): 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ge ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yong dog par bstan ces bya ba nas
136a1('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bas gna'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gu ma snyan+da
136a2('dul ba): las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
136a3('dul ba): dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis sa ge ma la cang mi gsung
136a4('dul ba): bas gnang ngo zhes bya ba nas nor bu'i chu snod bzhag ste/bcom ldan 'das la bu mo mngag gzhug ma dus tshod gsol ba dus tshed de gsol du bcugo/ji tsam na bu mo
136a5('dul ba): mngag gzhug ma de sngon gyi kun dga' ro bar song nas//sgo gseb nas bltas na dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bsams pa/gdon
136a6('dul ba): mi za bar 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la/'chub pa nal phrug 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab pau snyam nas/de rings pa rings par 'ongs te smras pa/
136a7('dul ba): jo mo mkhyen par mdzod cig/'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tsho ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab lagaso//sa ga mas bsam pa/bcom
136b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/gdugs tshod ma gsol bar bzhud par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas med cing skabs med do//gdon mi za bar 'dis dge slong sgron mo rnams mthong /
136b2('dul ba): ngo snyam nas/des dus tshod gsol pa skyes pa gzhan zhig btang ste/des btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing /mchis na/bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par/
136b3('dul ba): mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/
136b4('dul ba): rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bdag ni sbyin pa chen po brgyad bca' bar 'tshal te glo bur pa la stsal pa dang /mchi
136b5('dul ba): bar chas pa la stsal pa dang /bro 'tshal ba la stsal pa dang /bro g.yog la stsal pa dang /s+yAd gnas kyi 'jams nar ma dang sman na ra ma dang /dge slong rnams
136b6('dul ba): la dbyar gyis gos rAs chen dang /dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sa ga ma khyod kyis yon tan ci zhig mthong na/glo bur
136b7('dul ba): 'ongs pa la sbyin pa sbyin/btsun pa glo bur du mchis pa'i dge slong ni spyod yul mi mkhas pa dang /lam srang mi mkhas pa lags pas des bdag cag gi bsod snyoms
137a1('dul ba): la longs spyad na/spyod yul la mkhas pa dang /lam srang la mkhas par 'gyur lags so//sa ga ma de thugasu chud de legs sa
137a2('dul ba): legs so//don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin/btsun pa dge slong mchi bar chas pa bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/'dron pa
137a3('dul ba): rnams dang bral bar 'gyur zhing /tshogs dang bral na phongs par 'gyur bas//des bdag gis bsod snyoms la longs spyod na tshogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur lags
137a4('dul ba): so//se ga mA de yang thugasu chud de/leg so legs so//don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/nad pa la sbyin pa sbyin/btsun pa dge slong bro 'tshal ba bsod
137a5('dul ba): snyoms tshol du mchis na/nyon mongs pa 'am/'gum par yang 'gyur 'am des bdag gis bsod snyoms la longs spyad na/bro nad las lda' ba
137a6('dul ba): dang /bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lagaso//sa ga ma de yang phugasu chud de legaso legs so//don gyi dbang ci zhog mthong na nad g.yog le sbyin
137a7('dul ba): pa sbyin/brgyun pa dge slong bro g.yog bgyid pa rang gi ched du bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/bro 'tshal na blo 'tshal ba'i bgyi ba nyams par 'gyur bas dos
137b1('dul ba): bdag gis bsod snyoms la longs spyod na 'grub par 'gyur lag so//sa ga ma de yang thug su chud de leg so legs so//don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/dge 'dun la nas thug
137b2('dul ba): nAnur ma sbyin/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la drod chung ba yang mchis/drod che ba yang mchis te/de la re shig drod chung ba gang lags pa de rnams
137b3('dul ba): ni nas thug 'tshal na drod skye bar 'gyur la/drod che ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nyams skye bar 'gyur lag so//sa ga ma de yang thugasu chud de/legaso legs so//
137b4('dul ba): don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la bro nad mang ba dang /blo nang nyung ba mchis te/
137b5('dul ba): de la bro nad mang po gang lags pa de rnams la ni re shig 'tshal ches bro nad nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na lhag par yang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur
137b6('dul ba): lagaso//sa ga ma de yang thugasu chud de legaso legs so//don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbyin btsun pa de ring
137b7('dul ba): kho na bdag gis bu mo mngag gzhug bgyid pa dus tshad gsol bar btang ba las/des dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus bgyid pa mthong nas de slar mchis te/bdag
138a1('dul ba): la 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la/'tsho ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang du btab bo zhes mchi bas de rnams dbyar gyi gosnga ras chen
138a2('dul ba): gyis bkab par 'gyur lagaso//sa ga ma de yang thugasu chud de leg so legs so//don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/dge slong ma rnams la khros ras sbyin/btsun
138a3('dul ba): pa dus 'di cig na khyim pa mo rab tu mang po dag/dge slong ma rab tu mang po rnams chu bo gnas ldan la sgren mor khrus bgyed pa las//khyim pa ma de rnams kyis rgad
138a4('dul ba): cing rgud nas mdzub kir gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi mdo ma nye bar ston te/de dag gis nye bar bstan pa rnams/bag khums par gyur pas de rnams bdag gi khrus
138a5('dul ba): ras kyis bkab nas khrus bgyid par 'gyur lag so//sa ga ma log so legaso//khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po brgyad smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni/rdzus
138a6('dul ba): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun rnams la yang dag par snang zhing 'di dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang dag la ba snod
138a7('dul ba): nams sam/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam zhes tshad bzung bar mi nus kyi 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir
138b1('dul ba): bsod nams kyi phung po che drang po nas bya ba'i grangasu 'gro ba rnams kyi nang du 'dus//btsun pa bdag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de snga nas dge slong /
138b2('dul ba): 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par/
138b3('dul ba): 'gyur te/lho dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan pa thos te/de mnyan yod du ras
138b4('dul ba): 'ga' mchi zhing slar yang mchi bar 'gyur la/des bdag gi blo bur du mchi ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas slar gyi gas ras chen dang /dge slong mas khrus ras longs
138b5('dul ba): spyod par gyur lag so zhes bya ba'i bar te thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lagaso//bcom ldan 'das
138b6('dul ba): kyis dge slong che ge mo dge slong 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug slabs pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jig rten 'dir lan cig/
138b7('dul ba): 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa de yang mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar mchi la/des bdag gi blo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar
139a1('dul ba): gyi gos ras chen dang /dge slong ma khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges
139a2('dul ba): pabar 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo dge slong 'di ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur
139a3('dul ba): te/'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur zhes lung bsnyen pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi nyung /slar mtshal ngos bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas
139a4('dul ba): dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang /dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par
139a5('dul ba): 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas
139a6('dul ba): nas/phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangasu 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing /slar yang mche
139a7('dul ba): la des bdag gis glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang /dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/thos nas kyang
139b1('dul ba): dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge pa nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis raM dgas 'dzin gyims gams tshus
139b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i btam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/yang dag par gzeng stod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhed
139b3('dul ba): tegashegs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhad kyi bar du bzhugs nas yangs pa can gang na bder rgyu zhing gshegs te/rim gyis rgyu zhing
139b4('dul ba): gshegs pa na/yangs pa can du byon nas/yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga drin
139b5('dul ba): bza' sham thubs mnabs chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas/yengs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhug so//de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na
139b6('dul ba): gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang /skems pa dang 'dings par byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas
139b7('dul ba): mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang /skems pa dang /'dings par byed pa gzig so//gzigs nas kyang yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/bram ze dang
140a1('dul ba): khyim bdag dad pa can dag lpags pa dang /sha dang khrag zang zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams
140a2('dul ba): bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do snyam du dgengs nas yangs pa can du bsod snyams spyad de zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas//zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs
140a3('dul ba): shing /lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos mkhosu phab nas zhabs bsil te/nang du yang dag 'jog lo gtsug lag khang du zhugaso//de nas bcom ldan
140a4('dul ba): 'das la dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas/bcom/
140a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'dir snga dro sha ma thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/yangs pa can du bsod snyoms
140a6('dul ba): le zhugs pa las ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na ga nas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang /skems pa dang /'drings par
140a7('dul ba): byed par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can dag lpags pa dang sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin par
140b1('dul ba): btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do//dge slong dag dad pas byin pa la bag yod par spyod pa dang /
140b2('dul ba): dus su spyod pa dang /skabs skabs su spyod pa dang /brtags te spyod pa dang /cung zad spyod pa ni leg so legs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin
140b3('dul ba): pa la bgo yod pas spyad par byi ba'i bsngags po gsungs nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/dge 'dren gyi gnas mal la gding
140b4('dul ba): ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o//gnas la la mi gtsang bas gos na de'i mod kho na la bkru bar bya ste/gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//de nas bcom
140b5('dul ba): ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sha mu thabs mnams lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang /yangs pa can du bsod
140b6('dul ba): snyosnyims la zhugs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyi sa mi rgyab nag por gyur pa zhig ring po kho na nas gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
140b7('dul ba): stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi rgyab nag po pha bi mthong ngam//btsun pa mthong lags so//kun dga' bo mi pha ba ni/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
141a1('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung gis gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/de nas 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la/ming tsam gyi gding ba dang /dra
141a2('dul ba): ma can gyi gding ba dang /shur bu dang /rgya cing dang /lcug gu'i gding bas gting nas longs spyod pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag
141a3('dul ba): por gyur to//da dung yang 'di rgyab nag por gyur to//zhes rig par mdzad nas/yangs pa can du bsod snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba nas nang du yang dag par 'jog
141a4('dul ba): las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
141a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag di ri nga snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
141a6('dul ba): las de na ngas mi rgyab nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/de ni yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge sbyong du gyu pa las/de nis des
141a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhin du'o//dge slong dag
141b1('dul ba): de lta bas na/dge slong rnams kyis deng phan chad ming tsam gyi gding ba dang /dri ma can gyi gding bas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la longs spyad par mi bya'o//longs spyad
141b2('dul ba): na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis longs spyad par bya ste/stug na ni rim gcig giso//seng ba zhig na ni ri mo gnyis kyis so//dge slong
141b3('dul ba): rnams gding ba bkra zhing bkra ba kha tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed pa bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/gzhog 'phyas byed/kha zer
141b4('dul ba): bar byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sngon po 'am/'dam ka 'am/kha sgyur ba'i gding ba gris gras po bcang bar bya ste/gzhan du na 'gal
141b5('dul ba): tshabaso can du 'gyur ro//dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas/de'i chos gos rnams rnag dang khrag gis reg nas dri mi zhim pa sbrang mo rnams 'du zhing de bsod
141b6('dul ba): snyoms la zhugs pa de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/gzhog 'phyas byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
141b7('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gonong ste/g.yan pa dag bo pa cang bar bya ste/zhag lnga 'am/drug lon/
142a1('dul ba): nas bkru bar bya'o//gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//dge slong mdze'i nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang /khyams
142a2('dul ba): dang /rdzing dang /sgo khang dang /bang rim dang /'chags rnams dang /shing drung gi gnas rnams ni dri mi zhim pa dang /sbrang ma rnams khor bas gnas shing
142a3('dul ba): longs spyod par byed pa de dag bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/gzhog 'phyes byed pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom
142a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong mdza nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun du spyod pa'i chos dag
142a5('dul ba): bca' bar bya ste/dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas/dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang /gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya/khyams rnams dang ji skad
142a6('dul ba): du bsgrags pa'i khyams la sogs par gnas par mi bya/dge 'dun gyi chab khungs sa dang /snam phyi bar 'jug por mi bya zhing dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben
142a7('dul ba): pa byin nas/rim gro bya'o//dge slong mdze nad kyis thibs pas/kun du bcad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal
142b1('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur///'dul ba ba ni/bam po ra bzhi pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa
142b2('dul ba): btsun pa bang bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos lhag par bcad du rung lags sam/nye bar 'khor mo rung ngo btsun pa mon dar gyi chos gres gsum du byin gyis brlabs nas
142b3('dul ba): chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te/bcing du rung lags samanye bar 'khor ci dgar zad de/de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal dang sha na'i ras la yang rung
142b4('dul ba): ngo //sdom la gso ma skya'i chos gos dang /gcer bu skye 'bal lo ma'i gos//mthang gos bcas dang g.yang gzhi dang //gso ras seng ras pa car ste//gleng gzhi ni many+dzu
142b5('dul ba): yod na'o//dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/
142b6('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag gso ma'i chos pos 'chang bar 'tsho'o//bcom ldan
142b7('dul ba): 'odas kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/gso che'i chos gos 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yino//de lta bas na dge slong gis gso ma'i gos bcang bar mi
143a1('dul ba): bya'o//bcangs na 'gal chabyas can du 'gyur ro//yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol s+ho///bcom
143a2('dul ba): ldan 'das bdag gis sku'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gti mug 'do ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no//zhes bya ba
143a3('dul ba): nas/'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag
143a4('dul ba): gcer bu bgyid par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/gcer bu 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no//gzhan
143a5('dul ba): yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na/ci'i phyir khyod gcer bu byed/de lta bas na dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o//byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur/
143a6('dul ba): de nas dge slong de gcer bu mi bya'o//byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyuraro//de nas dge slong de gcer bu ma gnang ba dang /bslab po rnams spangs te nyams par gyur to//
143a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tsam skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsunA pa dge slong 'di gcer bu ma gnang ba dang /bslabs pa
143b1('dul ba): rnams spangs te nyams par gyur pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad de/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di
143b2('dul ba): nyi ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba dang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/de'i bu mo rang khyim thabs tshal zhes yul
143b3('dul ba): phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur to//so so nas bsams pa/de'i khyim thabs tu bdag 'gyuraro snyam mo//des rma bya zhig
143b4('dul ba): mthong nas des smras pa/'di ni bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro//de la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyod khyim thab tu 'dam so zhes smras pa dang /so so nas des mjug
143b5('dul ba): ma bsgreng nas gar byed par brtsams pa dang /yul 'khor skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/'di ni ci zhig gi phyir gar byed/gzhan dag gis smras pa/'du
143b6('dul ba): dag khyod kyi bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas so//des smras pa/ngo chu dang khrel dang mi ldan pas 'di la bdag gos bu mo mi ldan pas/'di la bdag gis
143b7('dul ba): bum mo sbyin//zhes pa rma bya des thos nas/yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song nas/tshig su bcad de smras pa/dbyangs bsnyen yid 'ong kha dog mdzes par da
144a1('dul ba): mdab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/nor bu bai DUr+ya dang 'dra gyur na//ci slad khyod kyi skus mo bdag me sprul//yul 'khor skyong gis
144a2('dul ba): smras pa/dbyangs bstan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang //mdab ma 'dom gong tshad ldan mgrin pa ni//nor bu bai nAn dang 'dra gyur kyang //'dzem med bskyon gyis
144a3('dul ba): khyed la mi sbyin no//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni/dge slong 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'o skyon
144a4('dul ba): gyis chung mo ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas/bya'i tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo //da ltar yang 'dis gcer bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid
144a5('dul ba): mi bde bas/dge slong gi tshogs kyis nang nas byung //yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag skra 'bal bar 'cha
144a6('dul ba): lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ngas 'dreg par rje su gnang na/ci'i phyir khyod skra 'bal/skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/skra 'dul ba ni 'di ni mu
144a7('dul ba): stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yino//de lta bas na dge slong gis sgra 'phel bar mi bya'o//'bol ni 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//yid dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan
144b1('dul ba): 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to//btsun pa dag 'i 'gro ba byung byang d+hAH/bcom ldan 'das /Sh+mA /skyes nu gti mug 'dun mu stsogs/ ma
144b2('dul ba): zhugs yin na zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//zhes bya ba'i bar na me bzhin du/yang dge slong nig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad ces gsol to/
144b3('dul ba): britsun pa dag bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'chi bar 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/skyes bu gti mug nges tshus gos gsum rje su gnang na
144b4('dul ba): 'i phyir khyud tha gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed/de lta bas na dge slong gi b+ha gos mthong gos dang bcos don chos gos kyi 'tsho bar ma d+ha//
144b5('dul ba): no 'gal che bas rgyun du 'gyur/de/sang dge slong zhug gis tsam ldan 'dus pa 'di skad ces gsapa to//btsun pa dgag
144b6('dul ba): gzhi 'chang bar 'tsha'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mchen yino zhes bya ba nas 'grel chabs can du 'gyu ro zhes
144b7('dul ba): bya ba'i dar gong ma bzhin du'o//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdog gas ma'i sang ras kyi chos gas 'chang
145a1('dul ba): 'tsha'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dra ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yino zhes bya ba'i bar nas 'gas tshabs can du 'gyuraro zhes
145a2('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dri skad cesuM gsol pa/btsun pa bdag pa char 'chang bar 'tshalo//bcom ldan
145a3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste pa char 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas 'gal chebs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
145a4('dul ba): du'o//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang ba 'tshalo//bcom ldan
145a5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ni khyim pa 'chang bar byed//de lta bas na dge slong gis chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs
145a6('dul ba): can du 'gyuro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de bzhin du thams cad ser ba 'am/thams cad dmar ba 'am/dkar ba ni rung ba mo yin pa nyid do//
145a7('dul ba): sdom le kha tshar ring dang gdengs ka dang /ral ka gtsug tor thod dang ni//ras bal gos dang rnga bal klam//mchin nad kun dga' mthang gos bcas/yang
145b1('dul ba): dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bak+Sha/
145b2('dul ba): stsal pa/'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom/
145b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag kha car gdengs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes
145b4('dul ba): bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yino//zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom
145b5('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ras ga 'chang bar 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim
145b6('dul ba): ba'i rtags yino zhes bya ba nas/'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhi no//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
145b7('dul ba): gsol to//btsun pa bdag gtsug gtor bgyid par 'chilo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes
146a1('dul ba): ces bya ba nas/'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/
146a2('dul ba): btsun pa bdag thod 'ching bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/'gal tshabs can
146a3('dul ba): du 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ra bol gyi gos bcang bar 'tshal lo//
146a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'dres kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//yang
146a5('dul ba): dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag rnga bal gyi kla ma 'chang bar 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes
146a6('dul ba): bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yi no zhes bya ba nas/'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can dge
146a7('dul ba): slong med pa'i gnas sgo bar med pa zhig tu dbyor gnas par dam bcas te/de phyi rol tu byung ba dang /de'i rnam sbyar rkun pos khyero zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/de'i
146b1('dul ba): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med par dam mi bca' zhing /snam sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o//
146b2('dul ba): song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can na ba'i de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa los char bab pa dang /de snam sbyor gyon te
146b3('dul ba): 'gro ba'i spro ba med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mthang gos bla gosu bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o//gzhan yang snam sbyar gzhan du rung ba ni lnga s+ho/dge
146b4('dul ba): slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa dang /cher bab pa'am/char 'bab tu dogs pa dang /'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang sra brkyang
146b5('dul ba): bting ba'i gnas dang /dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o//par sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa/dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi/'byung ba gnyis po dag dang
146b6('dul ba): ni//rnyed pa chud dang 'gyod pa dang //dge 'dun rnyed dang de de yin//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na dge slong
146b7('dul ba): rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur dong ba dang de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de'i rnyed
147a1('dul ba): ba len du gzhug pa'i phyir/dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o//ma bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang /dge slong rnam
147a2('dul ba): phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o//blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
147a3('dul ba): ro//bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de rnams kyis thams cad mngon par bya'o//dge tshul rnams
147a4('dul ba): dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de rnams kyi mkhan po dang /slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o//dge slong dag
147a5('dul ba): rnyed pa chung ngu dag 'ged par byed pa na/rnying pa chung ngu yino//snyam nas/dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
147a6('dul ba): gang la btsal ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o//gzhan dag gis ma bcol bar dong ba dang /dri rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod
147a7('dul ba): bas ma blangs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/blang bar bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//rnyed pa chung ngu gzhan zhig dgor mchog nas/bcom
147b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzhan dag dang sres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgro bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//bcol bas rnyed pa chung ngu ma
147b2('dul ba): blangs na/ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni nges par bda' bar bya'o//ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag zhig yod pa des gtsug lag zhig brtsigs nas/de na gal te dge slong
147b3('dul ba): brgya gnas nA/ras yug brgya 'bulo//de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bulo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/gtsug
147b4('dul ba): lag khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa las khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur ba/de gnyis kyis blangs nas/phan tshun dbyar dpyad nas gcig
147b5('dul ba): gis smras pa/rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro//gcig shos kyis smras pa/bdag cag kho na'i 'gyu ro//gal te de lta na long shig/des smras pa/
147b6('dul ba): phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang /ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs/do gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/gcig gis smras pa/
147b7('dul ba): dge slong rnams bos la de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o//gcig shos kyis smras pa/de bzhin du byas na su 'gro/gang gi zhon pa'i//gos rnams su so srung /gang
148a1('dul ba): gnon pas so//de ltar ma rus byos gang gnon pa na 'ju//gang dran pa du na gos rnams srung ngo //dunAnan du byal nas gzhon pa shes/
148a2('dul ba): dge slong rnams 'bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo //drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug ste rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal sgre re mos ri mos kyis mi stongs par
148a3('dul ba): byed pa yin pas/nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi mtshal gyi smre nas 'dug pa des rgyud ring po kho na nas mgo smra ba'i mo tog lhong sgru ba sman ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas
148a4('dul ba): byosems pa/dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig nga gis de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas gnas brtan byon pa lagaso//byon pa legs so//
148a5('dul ba): slob dpon phyag 'tsham//des bsams pa/'di ni slob dpon yang mi shes/mkhan po yang me shes te/'di ni rgan zhugaso zhig yin snyam du
148a6('dul ba): rig nas smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod gang nas 'ongasarI 'or che ge mo zhig nas so//ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dumagatsug lag khang yad
148a7('dul ba): ci de gtsug lag khang yin nama'on te 'phongs pa yin/des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs/dge slong rnams
148b1('dul ba): dang mgo bya'i phyiraro//gal te de lta na nga kho nas khyod la snying rtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o//slob dpon legaso//he dgas daconas pa/gal te 'di dag gi thad nas gzhan du song
148b2('dul ba): na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis legs par bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas des de ngal sor bcug ste/dus ma yin pa'i btung ba dag blud nas/ji nas kyang bre
148b3('dul ba): mo gtam gyi nam sros kyi bar du brongs na sa mal bzang po bshams te/rkang pa bkru ba dang /rkang pa bsku ba byin nas ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du bsdadado//de nas
148b4('dul ba): nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das par byaso//de nas de nang par sngar langs te rgan zhugs khrid nas rings pa rings par song
148b5('dul ba): rim gyis ri 'or du phyin pa dang /de nas gtsug lag khang du gnas pa'i rgan zhugs gcig shos des 'ongs pa leg so zhes kun dgas bar 'gyur ba'i tshig
148b6('dul ba): smras nas/de gnyis nga la sos pa dang /khod gsum can yang gnas gcig tu'i tshogs nas/nye dgas smras pa/rnyed pa gos shig/gnas brtan
148b7('dul ba): bgo'o//de gnyis rgan zhugs gcig la smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/gnas brtan bdag me bgod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag la nyes pa
149a1('dul ba): byung na mi rung ngo //gcig shos la yang smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang /nye dgas
149a2('dul ba): smras pa/khyod ni nyes byi byung bas 'jigs kyi/nye dga' ni spyi chug su sems can dmyalto bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'dod dam/nyi dwags bsams pa/
149a3('dul ba): rgan zhugs 'di gnyis sdong gis dbyen bya'o snyam nas/de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun tu rung ba'i las byed pa'i ge yog po mthong nas gcig gis drung du song ste
149a4('dul ba): dris pa/rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byasaganas brtan bdag gis gtsug lag khong dag tu rtag tu chag chag btab phyag dar dang ba'i lci
149a5('dul ba): ba 'jam pos byug pa byaso//rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag dang byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob na lta/nye dga' gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag
149a6('dul ba): dur bya'o//'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de nirgan thugs gcig shos de'i mthu yin te/de brgyug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa
149a7('dul ba): sbyin po byed pas chos 'don pa den du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur to/des na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya /'khang par
149b1('dul ba): byu//des de gnang la bab pas skyed na cang mi smra bar 'du'o//de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/gnas brtan dang //
149b2('dul ba): gis 'di ru dus dus su ches bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa phyiso//rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed pa thob na//nye dgas 'greng ba dang /'gro ba dang /'dug pa dang /1
149b3('dul ba): ba dus thams cad du chos bshad do//rnyed pa gang cu zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthus yin te/des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang phyag dang
149b4('dul ba): dang ba'i lci ba 'jam por byug pa bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis phyug dar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod de/lnga gang zhe na/bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /gnan
149b5('dul ba): gyi sem sa dang bar 'gyur ba dang /lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rna ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang /lus zhig nas bde 'gro
149b6('dul ba): ros te 'jig rten gyi rgyu rnam su skye bar 'gyur zhes dka' stsal to//de lta bas na gtsug lag khang lkog dar byis pas 'on bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/lha yi pe ba
149b7('dul ba): sbyar d+he/des ni der rnyed pa 'byung bar gyur to//de bsan de'i mthus 'dir drod pa byung ba sa rjes ci byon pa de blang bar bye ste/'khang bar mi bya'o//de yang gan pa
150a1('dul ba): bas sbyangs nas cang ni smra bar 'dug/de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas smras pa rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i las
150a2('dul ba): mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgro'o//de gnyis kyis sngar sma phab pas smras pa/gnas brtan gyi dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod//
150a3('dul ba): cig/de nas nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug/de gnyis kyi bar du ni tshe cig bzhag nas gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa rgan
150a4('dul ba): zhugs khyed gnyis na ci//'di gnyis dang kho bo cig ste/de ltar na gsum gsum mo//de ni gsol ba'o pa//de na tshwa gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangaso//cha gci
150a5('dul ba): ni de gnyis la byin pa dang /de gnyis kyis smras pa/gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyis/khyod kho nas bdag cag la
150a6('dul ba): bgos shig/des bgro yang brtsams pa/de nas ras yug gcig kha 'khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo //de nas
150a7('dul ba): rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong /des ji ltar gyur pa
150b1('dul ba): rgyas par smras pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa//khyed de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam//mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan naso//skabs de dge
150b2('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis
150b3('dul ba): de lta bas na/dge slong gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o//thob rgyal byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams
150b4('dul ba): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun nga tshe dang ldan pa nye dgras rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das
150b5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad de/'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis pa smras pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon
150b6('dul ba): byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na/sram gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la thon par 'gyur zhing gang gi tshe skam la dong ba de'i tshe
150b7('dul ba): chu'i nang du dong nas chung zad kyang mi rnyed//de ngas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/bdag cag lngas gtsog ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o//gcig shos kyis ni skam la ste/
151a1('dul ba): rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bya'o//de ni gcig ni chur song ngo //gcig shos ni skam la ste/de la nur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bsgrogs
151a2('dul ba): t+teska ma la gton nus de rnams sgyum la gonus pas bsad do//tshul gnas pa ni tshul gnas pa nyid kyis so//ji tsam na nye'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang /gcig
151a3('dul ba): gis smras pa khyod kyis bgos shig gcig shos kyis smras pa/bdag mi bgod do ci'i phyir/bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo //des kyang smras pa/gal te de lta
151a4('dul ba): na bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no//de gnyis soms khong su chud cing 'dug pa las//ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba/de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras
151a5('dul ba): ba/tsha bo dag ci ste khongasu chud cing 'dug/zhang po dag bdag cag ni nya rnyed pas so//ci ste mi bgod/zhang po nyes pas 'jig so//khyed ni nyes pas
151a6('dul ba): 'jigs la/bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa'i spyi'u tshugasu sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ni/bzhin rgyus kyis bsams pa/'di gnyis gdong
151a7('dul ba): gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yo ga byed pa ru sbal zhig mthong nas/gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/chab khyod kyis 'dir cing dag
151b1('dul ba): byas/zhung po bdag chur zhugs te bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams bskyobs te/skams la thon pa drung /'dis bsad//cha bo gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad thong
151b2('dul ba): nolta/bzhi ni rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o//skam la 'gro ba ni sdong dum gyi 'jigs pa dang /cher ma'i 'jigs pa dang /gcan zan gyi 'jigs pa dang /mi'i
151b3('dul ba): 'jigs pa dang /ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do//gzhan yang gal te des ma bsad na/khyod kyis bsgrogs kyang ci phan/mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin
151b4('dul ba): ba de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas/'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/'khang par mi bya'o//des de gnad pa la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/de nas
151b5('dul ba): gcig shos drung du song nas smras pa/tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag bye//zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste/bdag gos skam la thon pa'i nya rnams bsad do//
151b6('dul ba): tsha bo stsal te skam la song nas chung zad thob na lta/bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o//chur 'gro ba'i de dpa' klong gis 'jigs pa dang /ru sbal gyis 'jigs pa
151b7('dul ba): dang chu srin byis pa gsod kyi 'jigs pa dang /chu srin kum bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang /chu'i 'jigs pa yod do//gzhan yang gal te des ma bskyobs na khyod
152a1('dul ba): kyis ji ltar bsad/mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas de ci byin pa de blang bar bya skye/'khang byar mi bya'o//
152a2('dul ba): des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug//bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/tsha bo dag 'di la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/mi g.yo bar bogo ba'i
152a3('dul ba): thabs yod do//de sngar smo phab pas smras pa/zhang po ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum pa bgos te/nya'i 'jug ma rnams gcig
152a4('dul ba): tu byas/mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/bar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas/tshig su bcad de smras pathang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste/gtin du rgyu
152a5('dul ba): bas mgo bo'o//bar gyi lus nI gang yin pa/de ni chos la gnas pos bkur //bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa
152a6('dul ba): ldan no snyam nas des nya chen po zhig gi rked pa khyer te/ma'i drung du song ba dang /de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyi dris pa/bzhin rgyas khyod
152a7('dul ba): ni gang nas 'ongs//mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i//nyid che zhig thogs nas ni//shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs//des smras pa/gang phyir blun pa
152b1('dul ba): rtsod gyur cing //chos dang chos min mi shes pas//rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar//des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur//des kyang tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/rgyas/
152b2('dul ba): bsu blta na sdug pa khyod//pha rol mnan pa shin tu legs//de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la//khyed kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//
152b3('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nya dga' 'di nyid yino//sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'dri gnyis yin te/de na yang de gnyis 'dis
152b4('dul ba): bslus la/de ltar yang de gnyis bslu so////gleng gzhi ni gnyen yod na'o//ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag zhig yod pa des gtsug lag khang
152b5('dul ba): zhig gtsigs nas/der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcaso//khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa ras yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas//
152b6('dul ba): dge slong re re la yang ras yug re raM bskon no snyamo//ji tsam na nye dgas khyim bdag che ge mo zhog gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/re re la yang ras
152b7('dul ba): yug re re bsko no zhes thos so//thos nas kyang bsams pa/gal te de las ras phug cig ma grub na/bdag nye dga' ma yino snyam nas de mgron du ma ngos bzhin
153a1('dul ba): du song ngo //khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ras rnams 'grim pa dang /nye dgas ras gcig blangs
153a2('dul ba): nas myur myur bar song ngo //ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do//khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phags pa dag bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te
153a3('dul ba): 'tshal mchis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur grang dge slong rnams kyis smras pa khyim bdag de ltar su zhig byed 'on kyang
153a4('dul ba): btsun pa nya dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam//'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan ma drangaso//des ras de khyer nas song ngo //de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i
153a5('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong dag mgron du mi bos par gzhan gyi
153a6('dul ba): rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/de lta bas na dge slong gis mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o//thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du

153b1('dul ba): par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyod pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad te/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na

153b4('dul ba): mi ring ba zhig na/bram ze rgan po zhig gnas pa des thos nas/de rgan po'i mthar 'dug ste/thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo //bram ze
153b5('dul ba): ras rnams 'grim par byed pa na/ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gis ras chad nas des dris pa shes ldan dag bdag rnyas yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na bram ze'i

154a7('dul ba): yang de'i ched du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas/de nang par sngar langs te song ngo //dge slong de 'jam pag can zhig pas rnyed pa 'di na dge 'dun gyi yin no/

154b3('dul ba): du rnyed pa nyung ngu 'am/phal mo cher phul na de na gnas pa gcig gam gnyis sam rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//sdom la bye ba rnams

155a1('dul ba): mi sbyin na//gang la stsal bar bgyi/gang yun rang du gnas pa la'o//btsun pa dbyar gyi nang log su dge slong kum par gyur na/rnyed pa stsal bar

159b7('dul ba): bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma byung bar shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i mgos dang lhung bzed lod shig ces
