160b7('dul ba): legs par bsngos pa yin no//dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis gan su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad tsos tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/dam
161a1('dul ba): ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi na/dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis
161a2('dul ba): de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o//de ma ma bcas pa rnams 'gred par byed na/ma bgos pa nye bar bgos po yin no//dam
161a3('dul ba): bcas pa rnams la 'ged par byed na/bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no//bsres te 'ged par byed na/ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no//
161a4('dul ba): phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/legs par bsngos pa yin no//dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs te shi
161a5('dul ba): dam ma bces pa rnams kyis dmi bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ljong shig ces pho nya btang bar
161a6('dul ba): bya'o//dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yino//dam bcas pa rnams 'geng bar byed na dgos pa legs par
161a7('dul ba): bgos pa yin no//bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bltos pa yin no//phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/legs par
161b1('dul ba): bsngos pa yino//dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol//dam ma bcas par bgyi'o//zhes
161b2('dul ba): smras pa las de yang ma byung bar shi na/dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis/de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long
161b3('dul ba): shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o//dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin//dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/
161b4('dul ba): bgos pa legs par bgos pa yino//bsres te 'ged par byed na/ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yino//phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bur byed na
161b5('dul ba): legs par bsngos pa yin no//sdom ni nye dga' dang ni byin gyis brlabs//bar ma sbyin dang brlang bya dang //bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang //spang ba dang ni mi gsum
161b6('dul ba): mo//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//nye dga'i spyi bor po la mig cig byung nas de sman pa'i gon du song nas bzhin bzangs kho bo la ston cig/des smras pa 'phags
161b7('dul ba): ba mar khu gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro//nye dgaso bsams pa/gal te de ring kho na 'thungs nas di ring nyid du sos par gyur na/sang mar dang gos bslang
162a1('dul ba): ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ro shig bsrungs la phyi nas bcung bar 'gyur byar bya'o snyam du shes nas/bsod nams chen po dang ldan/
162a2('dul ba): ba des lhan cig gnas pa rnams kun du mngags pa dang /de rnams kyis mer gyi bum pa dang /rma g.yog pa'i gos phal mo che blangs so//phyi de nyin par sma na
162a3('dul ba): pas nges pa/'phags pa khyod snyan gdangs sam khyod kyis mar gsol tam/bzhin bzangs ma 'thung so//'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis deng nyis
162a4('dul ba): 'gyur du gsol cig/des lhan cig gnas pa dang nyo gnas rnams la smras pa/sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/mkhan po thos pa lagaso//kho bo'i nang
162a5('dul ba): 'di ni cher skyes par gyur te/mar dang rma g.yog pa'i gos ming du gos kyis slongs shig/de rnams kyis mar dang gos dal mo che bslangaso//de sang gi thabs la chags
162a6('dul ba): par gyur pas/nyi ma de la yang ma 'thungs pas/de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to//ji tsaman pA sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/'phags bya bar gsol
162a7('dul ba): tam/bzhin bzangs ma 'thung so//'phags pa ma le gas pa zhog dbyis so//des blas pa bzhi ni bzangs de rang ni sum gyur du btung ngo ///
162b1('dul ba): sman pas smras pa/'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang du nub par zhugs kyang da ni khyod la srog ma mchis//des smras pa gshin rje'i gu yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul pa rdeg
162b2('dul ba): pis man nI la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyu ro//sman pa des mjal to zhes byas nos khros te song ngo //de nas nye dgis mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las me
162b3('dul ba): zhu nas shi'o//de la gser mang du yod de/tshi gcig ni chos gos lngas so//cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman laso//tshe gsum pa ni rdungasu byas pa dang /
162b4('dul ba): ma byas pa lus te/gser srang sum khri byung ngo //zhes blon po rnams kyis thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/lha 'phags pa nye dga' gum pa las/de la gasnye
162b5('dul ba): mang du byung ste/gser srang sum khri mchis kyis de la bka' stsal pa'i rigaso//rgyal pos smras pa/gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob shig/
162b6('dul ba): dge slong ni dbyer te sreg dus pa/de sa kyang lha nas/gnas khang rgyas btab po dge slong rnams kyis der dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'od smra pa na/gnas khang
162b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
163a1('dul ba): ma bka' stsal pa/kun dga' ba khyod song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po smras pa rgyal la nad med par gyur cig ces
163a2('dul ba): byos la/'di skad ces rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe khyed rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'ikhyod kyis dge slong nye dga' la bltos sam/'on te gang gi tshe khyod bgram
163a3('dul ba): tang n+d+ha/bag mngon pa de'i tshe nye dga' la yon 'ga' khyod dz+haiM srid 'tsha ba tshas gos dang /bsod nams dang gnas na la dang nA pa'i rgyun ci dang
163a4('dul ba): byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/'on te na pa na rim gro byas som zhes kyis shig/gal te ma bgyi so zhes smran/de la rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim
163a5('dul ba): kyi bye ba dang /rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig/rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur
163a6('dul ba): bas gtogs 'dod thong shig ces smos shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas
163a7('dul ba): sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga na ba der song ste phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/btsun pa kun dga' bo//bcom
163b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis snga'i skad sprul pa bzhin du bgyis te/bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po'i lan bcom ldan 'das lnga gsol to//
163b2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyod kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig/dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi
163b3('dul ba): dbus su byung ste/bsgyur nas bgos so//gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas/de la gser mang du byung ste/gser srang sum khyi dge slong
163b4('dul ba): rnams kyis dgos so//zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/bdag cag kyang btsun pa nyi dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas
163b5('dul ba): bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed sA la dbang bar 'gyuraro//dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so//yangs pa can dang /bA ra na se bo dang /
163b6('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab pa dang /tsam pa ma'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'duso//
163b7('dul ba): dge slong rnams sdud cing bskyed pa na/lung nod pa dang /klog pa dang 'doni pa dang /yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
164a1('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnyed pa go ba'i rgyu ni lnga ste lnga gang zhe na/gaN+DI dang /rgyud chags gsum dang /
164a2('dul ba): mchod rten dang /tshul shing dang /lnga pa ni gsol ba'o//shi ba'i gaN+DI de rdung ba ni 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang /mchod/
164a3('dul ba): rten la phyag byed pa dang /tshul shing 'grem pa dang /gsol ba byed pa na yang ji bzhin no//dge slong dag de lta bas no shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te//
164a4('dul ba): bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro//'di ltar yang byas te/gnas mal ba shams la zhes bya ba nas/dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang
164a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol ba bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa
164a6('dul ba): rnams gsan du gsol gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dngami gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te//gal te dge 'dun
164a7('dul ba): gyis dus la ba'i cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad rdzas gdang ba dang /mi gang
164b1('dul ba): bo la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab pa'o//'di ni gsol ba'o//dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/'di lta ste gsol ba'o//gsol ba byas
164b2('dul ba): nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de lnga ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no//tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pabatsun pa gang na ba dge 'dun mi
164b3('dul ba): mthun pas gsol bar bgyid pa ma mchis pa der guma~M pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi 'am/bgo bar mi bgyid lags/nye bar 'khor thog ma dang tha mar byas nas bgo bar byung
164b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yo byad cig sbyar te de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyis rkun pa dang
164b5('dul ba): 'dun gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//gsol ba 'am thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni sangs rgyas
164b6('dul ba): kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur ro//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang /
164b7('dul ba): ldan pa nye dga' ma 'ongs pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de ltar 'ba' zhig du ma zad de/ji ltar 'das
165a1('dul ba): pa'i dus na yang ma 'ongs par chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnang
165a2('dul ba): du bsnun pa dang /de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda' phyi rjes bzhin du song nas/rngon pa de srog dang bral lo//ji tsam na ma stes te/chom
165a3('dul ba): rkun pa lnga brgya ri 'or zhig bcom nas phyogs der phyin pa dang /de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo //mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/
165a4('dul ba): shes ldan dag sha 'di rnyed kyis nyis brgya lnga bcu nas glang po che'i sha bcad la bco'o//nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu bla ngo //de na glang po che'i sha bcad cing 'tshed pa gang
165a5('dul ba): yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/rku rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin
165a6('dul ba): sha las ci yog pa zos la/lhag ma dug gis gang ba bo//de dag gis sha dug can zos dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro//zhes de rnams kyis
165a7('dul ba): ci yog pa'i sha zos nas/lhag ma dug gis btab bo//gang dag chu la dong ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du dpyad nas chu ci yogs pa 'thungs nas/lhag ma
165b1('dul ba): dudrug blugs te/'ongs nas/gang dag gis ni sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs/gang dag gis chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to//
165b2('dul ba): ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas/phyogs der 'ongs nas/des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo //de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams
165b3('dul ba): pa/bdag la rnyed pa phal mo che yod kyis rim bzhin du bya'o snyam nas des gzhu mchog khar bcug ste/gzhu rgyas kyi rtod pa rgyas pa bca' bar brtsams te/de nas
165b4('dul ba): rgyus pa chod dang mchog mas dkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to//lhas tshig su bcad pas smras pa bsregs par yang ni bya bu ste//lhag par bsags par
165b5('dul ba): mi bya'o//sogs la chags pa'i wa long ba//gzhu yis bsad par gyur la ltos//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni
165b6('dul ba): nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/de na yang lhag par chags pas shi'o//da ltar yang lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur to//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe dge
165b7('dul ba): slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa dedage slong gis rim gro byas na 'on kyang shi bar gyur nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar
166a1('dul ba): khyer ba dang /de nas chos gos gcig bshang gci dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to//de nas gos 'ged pas rim gro byed pa
166a2('dul ba): de la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyud ngan byas te/chos gos ma bkrus kyis khrus shig des smras pa/yo byad ni khyod 'ged na/kho bos bkru 'am/khyod
166a3('dul ba): kyis khrus shig/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nad g.yog la yo byad drug
166a4('dul ba): byin la lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o//gal te nad ge yog mang bar gyur na thams cad kyi spyir yo byad drug bgo bar bya'o//dge slong bshes gnyen dang bsod
166a5('dul ba): noms chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi na/de rnams kyi yo byad dang /dge tshul gyi yo byad dang /'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang /
166a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi nad g.yog gis ya byad drug bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes dris 'damos shing 'dams shing bzang po rnams blang so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
166a7('dul ba): pa/bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ngan pa rnams las sbyin dar
166b1('dul ba): mi bya ste/'on kyang bar ma dag las sbyin par bya'o//nad pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nang /
166b2('dul ba): g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/myur ba myur bar brtags par bya'o//de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas gang zag gi
166b3('dul ba): gnas mal la bsnyal bar bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//dge slong nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas/dge slong zhig la smras pa//
166b4('dul ba): re shig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo shi nas khyod ci bde ra gyis shig/des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las
166b5('dul ba): ji tsam na dge slong de shi'o//de nas gos 'ged pas de la smras pa/dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo dgos kyi bul cig/des smras pa/des kho bo
166b6('dul ba): kho na la ci bder byed du bcu go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dge slong dag de
166b7('dul ba): gson po'i tshe nyid na ma byin na/shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/bdag shi nas 'di'i yino//zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te bgos
167a1('dul ba): la dge slong de'i rang gi skal ba sbyin par bya'o//de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tsha bsna che ba zhig yod pa de shes pa chung bas
167a2('dul ba): de'i sman med nas/de'i lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags te rim gro byed pa la smras pa/bdag la ci yang med kyis bdag gi ched du mchod pa bgyis shig/des
167a3('dul ba): khas blangs pa las de shri nas ngan song rnams skyes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong shi ba gang yin
167a4('dul ba): pa des rim gro byed pa la ji skad smras pa de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa la gsol pa dang /dge slong dag dge slong de log par ltung ngo //gal te tshangs pa mtshungs
167a5('dul ba): par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas par gyur dang /dad pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/de lta bas na dge slong gis
167a6('dul ba): tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba nam yang yal bar ma bzhag ste//nad g.yog sbyin par bya'o//des de la dris te/gal te de la sman med na yon bdag la
167a7('dul ba): blang bar bya'o//gal te grub na de lta na legs/ji ste ma grub na dge 'dun gyi las sbyin no//ji ste yang ma grub na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/
167b1('dul ba): dri gtsang khang gang gi gdugs sam/rgyal mtshan nam rgyan gang yin pa de dag 'dun gyis phog la sbyin pa bya zhing //rim gro byed pas bsgyur nas rim gro dang ston pa mchod
167b2('dul ba): par bya'o//sos par gyur na de la 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te/khyod kyi yo byad du spyad zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te de la 'byor pa yod na des 'byud de bslab
167b3('dul ba): par bya'o//gal te med na de'i spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/pha'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//
167b4('dul ba): dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsnol bya/nad tsha bos che ba tshor bas nyen pa zhig yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed
167b5('dul ba): ba la smras pa/kho bo'i lhung bzed 'on cig/des ma byin pa dang /de de la ngan sems skyes zhing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa shi nas/de lhung bzed de nyid du
167b6('dul ba): sbrul zhig tu skyeso//dge slong rnams kyis de sreg tu khyer nas/bsregs te gtsug lag khang du lhag sa nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus//go sa 'gyed pas
167b7('dul ba): shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar spungaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge
168a1('dul ba): rnan/rmong sa ska 'du byug pa stongs du nA//da zhin pa sh+lo ts+tsha nga gyur//sa pan //rgyud ldan pa /
168a2('dul ba): dga' bo dge slong rnams la bad+mo'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rtsom bye ba dang/skub zhig ma gdung sako char byasmi nas 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'du
168a3('dul ba): gyis se gol gyi sgras blangs nas bka sbrul byud//mi gti mug can lhung bzed 'di spongs la song shig/dge slong rnams kyis 'ged par 'gyuraro//
168a4('dul ba): 'khrugs nas seM myu ba'i spyod lam gyis spong //nags sdug hU~M shig tu zugs nas/des de zlos pa'i mi smye bas nags dang ba tu'
168a5('dul ba): ga nas dge slong rnams mngon ste masna skyes pasna m+b+ha mA bI rnam sa skyes s+ho//denas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la gISha y-im+b+ha bya/
168a6('dul ba): spyod pa thams pa de las skrag par gyis shog/skyed po'i yi byad gling de phyir sems can gcig gi skyes de gnas gsum de nags su/ra sa myi dang /
168a7('dul ba): dbyim par sems can dmyal ba'i dang /dung chud bus phal pos sreg par 'gyur ba thams cad las med bye ba 'o//de stabs na dge slong gis so byu
168b1('dul ba): lhag pa chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing /gang la n+ya dastong su sgyung bar bya'o//ma spangs na 'gal chabs can du 'gyur ro//gzhan yang gal te nad pa rang giyo byad spong
168b2('dul ba): ni/rim gro byed pas myur ba sbyor bar smin par bya'o//mkhyen ni 'gal tshobs can du 'gyur//gleng gzhi ni n+ya nyin yod no'o//de'i tshe dge slong ni pa zhig gnas khang
168b3('dul ba): du shi nas/mi ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du skyeso//gos 'god pas lhung bzed dang chose gos bgo'o zhes dge slong de'i gnas khang du 'jug par btsems pa las de kun nas
168b4('dul ba): dkris pa drag pos dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/des smras pa/re shig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar lhung bzed dang /chos gos 'ged par byed dam/de sngangs
168b5('dul ba): nus zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/re shig zlog mar dge slong gi ro phyung nus
168b6('dul ba): byi nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe dge slong zhigA shrI nus/dge slong rnams kyis de phyung ste dur khrod du
168b7('dul ba): bzhin du bor nas gtsug lag khang du lhags te/gos 'god pas chos gos dang /lhung bzed dko'o zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa de'i/de mi ma yin
169a1('dul ba): pa rnams su smras pas/dbyug pa zangs te langs nas/dus smras pa/re shig kho bo'i rol mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang /ltung ngur
169a2('dul ba): 'ged par byed dam zhes pa'i skyabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i ro
169a3('dul ba): la mchod pa byas la/de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos dang nyes dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro//glang gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig ga nas khang
169a4('dul ba): du shi nas de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer te/rol mchod pa byas bsregs nas/de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang /glos 'ged pas de'i gnas khang
169a5('dul ba): du zhugs pa las/des dbyug pa blangs te langs nas re shig bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags par chos rnams 'ged par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
169a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa dang /de'i ched du yon sngo ba byas nas/chos gos rnams
169a7('dul ba): bgo bar bya'o//sdom la/nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang //dngos po'i sbyin pa lag gi gla/mtshams gzhi dag tu bya ba dang //po nyi brgyad du bya ba'o//gleng
169b1('dul ba): gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdug tshod la spyan drangs pa las/dge slong gi dge 'dun ni
169b2('dul ba): lhags so//bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal ba zhiso//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis
169b3('dul ba): bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku ska la bzhes te lnga po gang zhe na/nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang /lha rnams la chos 'tshed par bzhed pa dang /
169b4('dul ba): gan+d+ha sA mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang /nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang /nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/skabs
169b5('dul ba): 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang /bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku
169b6('dul ba): skal bzhiso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas/ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/lde mig bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun
169b7('dul ba): dga' ra ba dang /gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag ling dang /skyil po nas spyil po dang /'chab sa nas 'chag sa rnamasu 'chag cing gshegs pa na gtsug
170a1('dul ba): lag khang chen po gang na ba der phyin pa dang /de na dge slong nad chabs che ba shes pa chung ba rang gi gcin dang /ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa
170a2('dul ba): zhig gis/bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so//bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mngon ma mchis so zhes ska dang /
170a3('dul ba): bton pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong nga khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rje su khyod rab tu byung na/ci'i phyir de skad du bcom ldan
170a4('dul ba): 'das bdag la mgron ma mchi so//bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so//zhes ngu skad 'don/bdun pa bdug la tshangs pa mtshungs par
170a5('dul ba): spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa 'am/lta ba ma mchis so//dge slong khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang lta ba byas pa yod dam+ba/
170a6('dul ba): btsun pa mya mchis lags so//dre bsro dang khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o lha rnams kyi dab po brgya byin gyis
170a7('dul ba): mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'ong zhing ri spos kyi nged ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bor gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed ba mdzad do//chos nyid kyis
170b1('dul ba): gang gi tshwa/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyud pa mdzad pa de'i cha/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs te/lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
170b2('dul ba): thugs sems kyis shes sa de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril ba bkang ste/ri spos kyi
170b3('dul ba): ngad ldang ba las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te/'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang
170b4('dul ba): de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsa le pA/ke'u shi ka khyod kyis phyir rab tu byung ba mya yin gyi 'on kyang de'i phyir yin no//ga
170b5('dul ba): yang khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la/lha rnams ni gtsang sbra la dga' ba yin pas 'dug shig/nges 'di'i rim gro bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na ba
170b6('dul ba): chos gos brdzes nas/phyag 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang /g.yung drung 'khyil ba can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin
170b7('dul ba): par mdzad pas dge slong de 'thung ste/gcin dang /ngan skyugs nas byung nas mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/drug gi tshal pas bzhar name sa dkar pos dril phyes byos
171a1('dul ba): te bkruso//de nas skyil mo krung 'char bcug nas/de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te phyogs de yang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do//
171a2('dul ba): de nas phyag dang zhabs bsil nas//lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nad pa rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/yang dag par
171a3('dul ba): 'dzin du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du zhug so//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod snyoms khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song
171a4('dul ba): ngo //chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms mnos nas khyer te 'ong ba'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so/
171a5('dul ba): yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/dge slong cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
171a6('dul ba): pa yin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ci dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod nams legs
171a7('dul ba): par tshim par byas sam/btsun pa de bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun lags par tshim par bgyi lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
171b1('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhes te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la gtsug lag khang che ge mo na dge slong nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de la bsod
171b2('dul ba): snyoms phyed po 'od khyer la zos nas 'di skad ces/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyi bgo bsha' yang mdzad do zhes gyis shig/
171b3('dul ba): btsun po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka'
171b4('dul ba): stsal pa yang smras so////'dul ba bzhi//bam po re drug pa//de nas dge slong de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag ni khams gsum gyi
171b5('dul ba): bla ma nyid kyis rim gro mdzad de/bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyang gnang gis bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyod nas le los dus 'das par byed pa ni/bdag la rigs
171b6('dul ba): pa ma yin pas/ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang /nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas de nam gyi cha stod dang /cha smad
171b7('dul ba): la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo che lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid du rig ste/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang //
172a1('dul ba): ltung bdang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jog pa 'chos rta rngu rgyal smos mnan nas nyan rmongs pa rnams na spangs te/dgra 'a/
172a2('dul ba): par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong pa dang gser du mnyam pa//nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems can ngan drang ste'u
172a3('dul ba): mnyam pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs brel bar gyur cing /rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang /'dod pa'i rnyed pa
172a4('dul ba): baDUr stil rgyub kyis phyogs pa dang /dbang po dung/nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bye ba dang //brjed par byang dang
172a5('dul ba): mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nad pa 'di dag la ni tshangs pa mchongs pad+ma
172a6('dul ba): spyod pa khyod cag kho na mi gtogs par ma med pa myed/rtswa lag gzhan med do//de lta bsta na/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis phan tshun dU rem+b+he b+h+yo
172a7('dul ba): bya ste/mkhan pos ni lhan cig gnas pa'i'o//lhan cig gnas pas ni mkhan po'i'o//slob dpon gyis ni nye ga nas kyi'o//nye gnas kyis ni smim
172b1('dul ba): dpon gyi'o//mAkhan po gcig pas ni mkhan po gcig pa'i'o//slob dpon gcig pas ni/slob dpon gcig pa'i'o//gtam 'dres pas ni gtam 'dres pa'i'o//
172b2('dul ba): phengs par smras pas ni phebs par smra ba'i'o//smos 'dren gyis smos 'dren gyi'o//'khor dang bral ba shes pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis nad kyi gnas
172b3('dul ba): skabs la brtags nas rim gro pa gcig gam gnyis sam/mang po sbyin te mthar na dge 'dun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom
172b4('dul ba): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas/des dgra bcom
172b5('dul ba): ba mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad de/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na
172b6('dul ba): yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas/de mngon par shes pa lnga mngon du byas pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras dang /
172b7('dul ba): chu phun sum tshogs pa/shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na/drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnaso//des slob ma'i rim gro
173a1('dul ba): byas nas sos pa dang /de nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong
173a2('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/de na yang ngas de'i rim gro byas so//da ltar yang byas so//
173a3('dul ba): gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par nad pa rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/bcom
173a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga lhag par nad pa rnams la byams par byed pa de nyon//
173a5('dul ba): cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul shi bi pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na/rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs
173a6('dul ba): pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/de slong ba pa rnams la mi gtong ba cung zad kyang med de/nad pa rnams la ni khyad par
173a7('dul ba): du byed do//ji tsam na khyim bdag nad pa sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po'i drung du song nas/lha bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/rgyal pos sman pa
173b1('dul ba): rnams lnga bsgo ba/shes ldan dang dpyad byos shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha 'di'i sman ni dkon lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin
173b2('dul ba): lha gang zhig btsas tshun chad sbyin lan 'ga' yang su la yang khro ma myong ba de'i khrag las nas thug bgyes te/zla ba drug tu sprul na de lta na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyi gzhan
173b3('dul ba): gyis ni ma lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/de'i sman dkon pa ni bdeno//de nas bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par brtsams na/bdag nyid kyi spyod pa brtags par dka'
173b4('dul ba): bar gyur nas/des ma ma la dris par brtsams pa/ma ma nga dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon 'gro'i la khros pa yod dam/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi spyang du byon
173b5('dul ba): pa de nas/bdag kyang sngon su la lan 'ga' yang khro ma myong na/khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras pa//yum bdag dus 'di srid kyi bor
173b6('dul ba): du sngon su la yang 'ga' yang khros pa mchis sam/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe/bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang sngon su la yang khro ma myong na/khyod lta
173b7('dul ba): smos kyang ci dgos/des bsams pa/sman rnyed do snyam du rig nas sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/shos ldan dag ngas rang la brtags na/nga sngon su la yang khro ma
174a1('dul ba): myong bas/nga'i yan lag lnga'i rtswa gtor cag/sku bdag cag ni mi phal pa zhig gi don du lha'i sku la mtshan mi 'dab s+ho//byang chub
174a2('dul ba): sems dpa' rnams ni gze'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pa su/rgyal po rang nyid kyi hUM gtar tre/khrag de zla ba drug tu nyi ma
174a3('dul ba): rer zhing des nas thug spyad pas sos par gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/de na yang nang
174a4('dul ba): ba rnams la byams par byed na/de lta lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/gzhan yang shi ba'i rgyal po'i bu gzhog byed skams par gyur nas/rgyal pos snun pa
174a5('dul ba): rnams la bsngo ba/shes lhun dag gzhon nu'i dpyad gyis shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/sku bcud thams cad dang mar sgrol cig/myo bcu gnyi su bcud
174a6('dul ba): thams cad sogs na/'di'i yang shAng shang t+ta shA ma rnyed du/snun pa rnams kyis bya ba rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag me long dang byugag gyur te/
174a7('dul ba): rgya mtsho'i 'gram du deng la/der sti tshugs te byo gag gi mdun du me long nog cig dang /byo gag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di bya gag yon snyam ste/
174b1('dul ba): darlung bu dang shang sh+'ung t+tA gis smad san rgyangs bya bag go d+hAng du 'ong bar n+d+har t+na/rdo zung ngu thabastan 'dun // rnams kyis bzhin du b+h+yas/
174b2('dul ba): bstu nA/las kyi zhags pas rten pa'i srog chags shong shing te gas nas de rnams kyis de tI l+r-ing ngo //'dren chos nyid yin te/sprin gnas
174b3('dul ba): byom+bu kho 'i mdud gro rnam s+yAH sgra shes pas so chags shing shang trA~Mts+tsha gyis smras pa/bdug go d+ha 'aM/de rnams d+hi gyur pa smras pa dang /des smras
174b4('dul ba): san med ba nas / / \u0f7f sa hU~M A dag kyi bang
174b5('dul ba): nacig/des sgyus /dag gis sa d+has suni sh+tsa ma drub sbyin /ni 'di ni min dag rgyum
174b6('dul ba): 'jigs pas rin pa tshe rnams bor te shang shang ti'u dri nyid khyer tAM dong ba las rim gyis yul shi ba'i dbyings kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas/de rnams kyis srog chag
174b7('dul ba): nga rgya la te/des tsun pa'i sbyin gang yin pa dus su //de nas gang shing m+bu dzes padang /
175a1('dul ba): bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs can nu pyod pa lags//rgyal pos chu stod bdun chu bzang pos bkang bar bzhug/ji tsam na de da//tu ji srong lags
175a2('dul ba): pur ngal sos pa de srid khrus byas nas/de nas lus kyi stobs shes pa dang /mod la 'phur te khang po'i steng du 'dug nas/'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral te/
175a3('dul ba): tshig su bcad pas smos pa/re shig thog ma bdag blun to//phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go/de nas rgyal po sman pa ste/blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs//
175a4('dul ba): shes smras nas song ngo //de nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa/shes ldan dag shang shing te'u gyi khrus byas pa'i chu de sha'i mthu yod par byed pa de
175a5('dul ba): bden nam/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha madra lags kyis mar dang sgrol ci /de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang bcos te/rgyal po'i bu la
175a6('dul ba): blud pa zhug so//ji tsam ni yungs ri'i sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas pa las/de na gcig gzhogs byed skams par gyur to//de la rang sangs
175a7('dul ba): rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa ljongasu song la sman po la slo sa te sman rten pa sgrol cig dang sos par 'gyur//des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag skye bo
175b1('dul ba): mang po la mi sdug pa skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du chos 'di lta ste/
175b2('dul ba): 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ong ste/bdag nod dang bcas te khyer bar gyur na/ci'i phyir grong gi mthar 'gro//de rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod
175b3('dul ba): kyi 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du 'tsho de tsam du bsod nams mang po sogaso//ji tsam du bsod nams mang po
175b4('dul ba): bsags pa de tsam du mtho ris rnamasu yun ring du dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes de de rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongasu babs te/rim gyis yul shi ba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i
175b5('dul ba): pho brang du phyin to//de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/bzhin bzangs kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis sman ston cig/des smras
175b6('dul ba): pa 'phags pa khyod kyi snyun nad 'di ci 'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras kyi yang de kho na 'dra nas lo bcu gnyis kyis bcud thams cad ma re dang bcos par mchis kyis/gzhung
175b7('dul ba): la slongs shig dang /gal te skal ba'i khyang por gyis bcud de thob na/des na khyod 'tshe bar 'gyuraro//de rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas/sgro gar bsdad//
176a1('dul ba): rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni slong ba po'i skye bo sgron du bzhug pa'i phyir sgro rgyun tu dril 'dogs te/gang gi tshe slong ba po sgro na 'dug pa de'i tshe de dkrol
176a2('dul ba): bar byed do//ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dril te bkrol to//de nas rgyal po'i bu sa pha dang ma la smras pa/yab yum slong ba zhig mchis kyis ci zhige slong
176a3('dul ba): smros shig/de gnyis kyis smras pa/bu bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyi su rdzas rnams bsags te/btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di ri shig 'thung shig dang /
176a4('dul ba): phye nis slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba rma'o//de ngo mtshar dang /bkra shis dang /bde leg su gyur pa dag byas nas mar 'thung bar 'dod na/slong ba po'i
176a5('dul ba): skye bo'i re bas lus kyi gnang du phog nas/mar de ma 'thungs par smras pa/yab yum re shig slong ba po nang du bkug gi bar du mi 'tshalo//rgyal pos slo ba
176a6('dul ba): lo bsgo ba/slong ba po nang du thong shig/de nang du zhugs pa dang /rgyal po'i bus lus mdzes pa dang /sems dang ba dang /spyod lam zhi bas zhugs
176a7('dul ba): pa mthong nas/des smras pa 'phags pa ci zhig bzhed/des rgyas par smras pa dang /des smras pa 'phags pa bcud ni khyod kho na sa 'os kyi/bdag
176b1('dul ba): lam+b+ha lags kyi dbul gyi bzhes shig/des lhung bzed bzed pa dang /rgyal po'i bu bsam pa drag pos lhung bzad der bcud blug so//bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyul
176b2('dul ba): po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni 'grub par 'gyur la/de yang tshul khri mas
176b3('dul ba): rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis ka yang sos par gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzhon nu gang yin pa da ni nga nyid yin te/
176b4('dul ba): den yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/da lta smos kyang ci dgosabatsu ni pa rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las tswi zhig bgyis na/des na gnyi
176b5('dul ba): ga mnyam du bros thabs la/mnyamo du sos par gyur legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rabs
176b6('dul ba): grazhan rnamasu las tshogs bsags pa/rkyen yongasu sgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing gal ste
176b7('dul ba): nyi kyis 'a byes shing ngas pa gzhan du nigs so myong por gyur dgi slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
177a1('dul ba): chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/diN+DI Sh+ma dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag
177a2('dul ba): ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang no//chud mi zla ba'ang tshogs dang dus//
177a3('dul ba): rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba b+hA ra na se'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/de la
177a4('dul ba): bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to//mdun na 'don la yang bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de mdun na
177a5('dul ba): 'don 'dod par gyur te/sems can rnams ni khams kyi sgo nas/sheng 'phrod pa yin pas/de nas phan tshun du yid bcugs par rgyur nas rgyal bus smras pa//
177a6('dul ba): thabs ci zhig byas na des na nga rgyal por 'gyur/des smras pa khyod kyis gal te bdag mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni/thabs mchis kyis snyun du gsol bar bgyi'o//
177a7('dul ba): des smras pa de ltar bya ste/gzhug gis smros shig/des smras pa/bdag gis khyod kyi gtson zha bor bgyis dang /khyod rgyal por 'gyuraro//des rje su yi
177b1('dul ba): rangango //de nas rgyal bu pho ze shos des sman ma yin pa byin nas zhu bor gyur to//dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal po shi nas blon po rnams kyis de ni zha bor gyur to snyam
177b2('dul ba): nas/nu bo shos rgyal por dbang bskur to//des kyang mdun na 'don gyis nu bo shos gang yin pa de mdun na 'don du bcugo/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dang mdun
177b3('dul ba): na'adon lhan cig tu bre mo gta ma smra zhing 'dug pa las rgyal pos phu bo zha ba de mthong ngo //des de mthong nas 'gyod par gyur te/bdag gis rgyal sbrid kyi phyir phu bo zha bar
177b4('dul ba): byas pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byaso//lha bdag kyang 'gyod par gyur gyis/gal te lha dgyes na 'di phyir sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o//des smras pa/
177b5('dul ba): gnang gis byos shig/des de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to//de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la bya ba byas nas/smon lam gdab par brtsams pa grang
177b6('dul ba): yang bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas/phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rig su skye ba zhing zha bor byas pa'i sdigs
177b7('dul ba): ba'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang nyam su mi myong bar gyur cig ces byas//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin
178a1('dul ba): no//mdun na 'don gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas 'di nyid yin no//de gnyis kyis gros byas nas/rgyal po gzhon nu la sman ma yin pa
178a2('dul ba): byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du zhi bor gyur to//yang 'gyod par gyur pas de gnyis kyis glos byas te/slar smon byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyim du sos
178a3('dul ba): por gyur to//dge slong dag de lta bas ni las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yi ni la gcig tu skAr ba rnams kyi gcig tu dkar
178a4('dul ba): ba dang /'dres ma rnams kyi 'dres ma ste/dge slong dag de lta byas na/las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /'dres ma rnams ni spangs la/las gcig
178a5('dul ba): tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu lnga bslab par bya'o////gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i
178a6('dul ba): tshe mnyan yod na/khyim bdag tshod dpon zhes bye ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che /yongasu bzung ba/yangs shing rgyu che baM/rnam thos kyi bu'i no rA dang
178a7('dul ba): ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnaso//des rig sa mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi
178b1('dul ba): ba dang /chu m+b+ha dang /lus ngan dang /byAd+d+ha b+hin+da dang /tshangs pa la sogs bra la gsal ba 'dod sa shong /sgyu'i bye brag gzhan yang 'dri lta ste/kun dga' ra ba r+dz+nyA
178b2('dul ba): dag dang /tshol gyi lha drug dang / ni mdo'i lce dag dang /sum mdo'i lha dag dang /gtor ma len phyi'i lho dade/lhan cig skyes pa dang /chos 'thun pa'i
178b3('dul ba): lha dag dang /rtag tu rjesu 'byung ba'i lha drug la yang gsol ba 'debaso//'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las/bu pho dang /bu mo dgra skyer
178b4('dul ba): sa bya ba'i gtam+b+ha de lta bu yod do//de ni de lta ma yin te/gal te de ltar gyur du zin na/re re la yang 'di lta ste/dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyul
178b5('dul ba): zhin du bu stong stong yod par 'gyuraro//'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/gsum tho tshod dag gang zhe na/
178b6('dul ba): pa dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang ma dus la bab cing zla mi chen dang ldan pa dang /dri zanye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/gnas gsum pa dag
178b7('dul ba): mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur//des gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol ba byas kyang bu po dang bu mo med pa de'i/lha thams cad spangs te/

179a3('dul ba): par brtsams pa ltas rims chen pos thebs nas/rab tu byung ba'i bar chud du gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge sbyong rnams kyis gsil pa dang /
179a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/re shig sos kyi bar du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi sbyin zhing de'i rim gre bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro
179a5('dul ba): bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/dge slong rnams kyis sus byung ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/dge slong rnams dang sbyin bas+ho//sman pa
179a6('dul ba): rnams nyin par smin byas na/mtshan mo nAd lnga bab par gyur to//de rnams kyis smras pa 'phags pa 'di'i spyod bdag cag gis gdugasal bgyis na
179a7('dul ba): mtshan mo brol pib por gyur gyis gal te 'di khyim du bskyal na/bdag cig gis nyin mtshan du 'di'i dpyad pagyi'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis brtsa
179b1('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim du skyol la dar yang de'i rim gro byed pa sbyin par bya'o//de'i nad de yun ring por gyur nas/skra ring po
179b2('dul ba): ring por skyes nas/khyim bdag de khyim bdage mgo reg ces bya bar grag so//de grang gis rtsa ba dang /sdong bu dang /'dri ba ma dong /mye tog dang /'bras bu'i spyan gyis bsnyen bkur byas
179b3('dul ba): pa lAs/slar la nu bar gyur pa de'i tshe/des bdag ni 'chi'o zhes bya bar rang gis cha chod nas/de ni des 'chi ka'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad glegs pu li bris te/rgyal bu rgyal
179b4('dul ba): byed kyi tshal du bsgyuro//de ni shi'i blon po rnams kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/lha khyim bdag mgo reg bu ma mchis par gum ste/de la dbyig dang /goser
179b5('dul ba): dang /glang po tshe dang /d+hA dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang /go tsho la sogs te phol mo chi zhig mchis pa de thams cad glegs bu la bris nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phya
179b6('dul ba): pa'i dge 'dun la pu'o//rgyal pos smras pa/'phags pa nye dga' dbang ba glegs bu ma bris pa yang mya thob na/glegs bu la bris pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis
179b7('dul ba): gnang ba gang yin pa de long shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis badz+ra se la gsol pa dang /bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong de la ci dag yodakhar sdom la/gzhi dang gnas mal
180a1('dul ba): gos dang ni//lcags nag lcags dang lham mkhan dang /rdza mkhan 'dreg mkhan shing mkhan sogs//mtshon rtsi mdung shing bar bur dang //
180a2('dul ba): rkang gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi dang //zas dang btung ba sman dang ni//bran dang gding ba dbang rgya dag/ci rigs par ni bgo bar bya//dbyig rnams dang ni gser
180a3('dul ba): rnams dang //gzhan yang rdungs byas rdungs ma byas//dge 'dun 'dus nas bgo'o zhes//drang srong chen pos bka' stsal to//dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/
180a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ci rigs par bgo bar bya ste/de la zhing gi gzhi dang /khyim gyi gzhi dang /tshong khang gi gzhi dang /gnas mal dang /
180a5('dul ba): lcags nag gi mgar ba'i lag spyad dang /lcags 'gar gyi lag spyad dang /rdza mkhan gyi lag sprad dang /shing mkhan gyi lag spyad dang /smyug ma mkhan gyi
180a6('dul ba): lag spyad dang /bran pho dang blon mo dang las byed pa dang /zho shos 'tsho ba dang /kha zas dang /btung ba dang /'bru rnams kyi ma go ba phyogs bzhi'i dge
180a7('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir sbyar bzhag par bya'o//ras yug dang /ras yug chen dang /ko sgro dang /mchil lham dang /'bru mar gyi snod dang /ril ba
180b1('dul ba): dang /bya ma bum rnams ni dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o//mdung shang ring po gang yin pa de dag ni 'dzam bu lta bu'i sku'i gzugs rnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi shing bya'o//
180b2('dul ba): thung ngu gang yin pa de dag ni khar sil gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o//khye'u dang bu mo ni dge 'dun gyis mi bsgyur te/ci rigs pa zhig blangs nas tso bide
180b3('dul ba): bar btang bar bya'o//rkang bzhi pa rnams las glang po che dang /rta dang /rnga mo dang /bong bu dang /dre'u rnams ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o//ba lang dang /ma he dang /
180b4('dul ba): radang /lug rnams ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir bzhag ste mi bgo'o//'thab stan dang /gos dang /gzhan yang rgyal po la 'os pa gang yin pa de
180b5('dul ba): thams cad ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o//mtshon cha rnams ni gauzhag la/de rnams gri gu dang /khab dang /khar zil du bsnyungs te/dge 'dun la brim par bya'o//
180b6('dul ba): tshon rtsi rnams las tshon rtsi chen po gong bkus pa dang /mtshal dang /thing shing la sogs pa de dag ni sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dri gtsang khang du gzhag par bya'o//thod
180b7('dul ba): lo kor dang /btsag dang /rams ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o//chang ni yos blugs las dang du gzhug par bya ste/tshar gyur na longs spyad par bya'o//
181a1('dul ba): tshar ma rung na dor bar bya'o//dge slong dgang ston pa yin par khas len pa rnams kyi chang mi sbyin zhing tha na rgya mchog gis kyang mi btung ngo //smyan
181a2('dul ba): rnams ni nad khang rung bar gzhag par bya zhing /de nas dge slong rnams kyis ljongs spyad par bya'o//rin po che rnams mu tig ma gtogs par nor bu dang bai DUn+da dang /dung
181a3('dul ba): gas su 'khyil ba la sogs pa ni cha gnyi su byas te/gcig ni chos la'o//gcig shos ni dge 'dun la'o//chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri
181a4('dul ba): bar bya'o//seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o//dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o//glegs dam rnams sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi
181a5('dul ba): glegs bam rnams ni mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du bzhugs par bya'o//phyi rol pa'i bsten chos kyi glegs bum rnams ni
181a6('dul ba): btsongs la bgo bar bya'o//tshogs rgyu ni myur du 'grub par nus pa gang yin pa des ni rdzas 'ged pa'i tshe/dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o//mi nus pa gang
181a7('dul ba): yin pa de ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshong du spyir mdzod du gzhag par bya'o//gser dang dbyig dang gzhan yang rdungasu byas pa dang /rdungasu ma
181b1('dul ba): byas pa gang yin pa de ni cha gsum du bya ste/gcig ni sangs rgyas la'o//gnyis pa ni chos la'o//gsum pa ni dge 'dun la'o//sangs rgyas kyi gang yin pa des ni
181b2('dul ba): dri gtsang khung dang /dbu skya sen mo'i mchod rten rnams kyi ral po dang /'drums pa slar bcos par bya'o//chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o//
181b3('dul ba): seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o//dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o////gleng gzhi ni gnyen yod na'o//gong gi
181b4('dul ba): tshechoko sA la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis chu bzangs kyi dus ston pa tshugs pa de'i tshe/de na dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen du/dge bsnyen rnams mang du tshogs par gyur to//de'i tshe
181b5('dul ba): dge slong khrums stong dge slong mas bkur ba yin pas chu bzungs kyi dus ston btsugs pa'i dge slong ma rab tu mang pos/tshe dang ldan pa khrums stod la 'di skad ces smras
181b6('dul ba): so//'phags pa chu bzangs kyi dus ston la spyan 'drin gyis gshegs//des smras pa/bdag gi chos gos dang lhung bzed phyir su la btsal/dge slong mi
181b7('dul ba): bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis smras pa/'phags po thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig/bdag cag gis gzhag par bgyi'o//des de rnams la bzhag pa dang /
182a1('dul ba): de rnams kyis kyang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la'o chen mos kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la'o//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ngos kyang gtsug
182a2('dul ba): lag khang zhig tu bzhag go//de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa khrums spyod chu bzangs kyi dus ston la 'ongs pa dang /de na dge slong ma rnams kyis mgron du bos pa yin pas//

182a4('dul ba): pa/'phags pa bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol cig/de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras so//gzhan zhig gis smras pa/'phags
182a5('dul ba): pa bdag gis dus ma lags pa'i btung ba gsol cig/de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan sa kyi kyang smras nas/des de rnams kyi sems srung ba'i phyir g.yar chus rnams
182a6('dul ba): las cung zad cung zad blangs/des bzhin du dro yang zos dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud pa yang 'thungs pa dang /de dag btsog bcag pa yor langs nas de yang
182a7('dul ba): lam gyis dub pa des mang por zos nas ma zhu bor gyur te/bsud de she'o//dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du bsregs nas chos bsgrags pa byas nas rim/
182b1('dul ba): gyis gtsug lag khang du lhag so//gos 'ged pas nad g.yog la smras pa/de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'on cig/des smras pa/des bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi
182b2('dul ba): lag tu bzhig/de rnams la dris pa dang /smras pa/bdag gis skye dgu'i bdag mi chen mo'i lag tu bzhag/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos smras pa
182b3('dul ba): bdag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la gtad do//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'i bos smras pa/bdag gros gtsug lpag khang cho ge mo zhig tu bzhag zhes pa'i skabs de
182b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shi ba'i yo byad kyi sbyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlabs
182b5('dul ba): par bya'o//byin gyis brlab pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/gaN+DI brdungs la dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang /dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o//
182b6('dul ba): 'di ltar bya ste/gunas mel ba sham pa byas la/gaN+DI rdungs te dris pa'i chog gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/dge 'dun rnams tshogs shing 'thun
182b7('dul ba): par gyur pa dang /dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya ste lase bye'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gnas 'dir dge slong khrums stong gum na de'i rgyu
183a1('dul ba): bzed dang /chos gos kyin kyi ni bcas pa/kun dga' bo'i sdug pa na mchis kyis/garte de/'dun rje sa la pa bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
183a2('dul ba): 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong khrums stong gum pa'i yo byad lhung bzed dang //chos gos dang gos kyi rin du bcas pa'i dngos po'i sbyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin
183a3('dul ba): gyis brlab par bgyi'o//'di ni gsol ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong yang gzhan du gum
183a4('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan na mchis/dngos po'i sbyin pa 'ang gzhan na mchis na/de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/nye
183a5('dul ba): 'khor dngos po'i sbyin pa'i dge slong ngam/khyim pa gang na yod pa'o////gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe dge slong lag gi gla zhig
183a6('dul ba): shi'o//dge slong dag de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pas ma bgos pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /bcom
183a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun thams cad sogs la ci 'dres sam ma 'dres par gyur pa de brtag par bya'o//gal te 'dres te dge 'dun gyi ni mchod
183b1('dul ba): rten gyir byas la/mchod rten ni dge 'dun gyir gyur na/de lta bu chos dang mi mthun pa yin pas/de'i lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /gos kyi rin dang chas pas
183b2('dul ba): chu gsumi du bya ste/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun no//dge 'dun gyi ni dge slong rnams kyis bgro bar bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang
183b3('dul ba): dri gtsang khang dang /mchod rten gyi lag gi bla'i sar spyad par bya'o//dam pa'i chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya/seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o//gal
183b4('dul ba): te 'dres par ma gyur na thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/de la 'gyod par mi bya'o////gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//
183b5('dul ba): de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nyo ba zhig tu phyin pa dang /de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong zhig shi'o//
183b6('dul ba): de rnams kyis bsams pa/gtsug log khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs patshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang skal ba 'dod par 'gyur du 'ong gis/gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol
183b7('dul ba): tu bgo bar bya'o snyam pa las mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i ba lang gi rdzi dang byugs rdzi dang rtswa thun dang /shing thun dang /lam gyis 'tsho ba dang /lam gol bas
184a1('dul ba): ba'i mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing /de rnams gang dang gang du 'dug nas 'geng par byed pa/de dang der skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongasu bskor
184a2('dul ba): bapar gyur nas/de rnams kyis bsams pa/gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo'o snyam nas/de rnams kyis gtsug lag khong dang nye ba zhig tu bgo bar brtsams
184a3('dul ba): pa dang /dge skos kyis mthong nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig byed/de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /des smras pa/bdag kyang mtshams
184a4('dul ba): su 'ongs pa yin na zhes nges 'khungs kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
184a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/'tshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du shes te/shi ba'i yo byad 'ged par byed na/me bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/slar yang
184a6('dul ba): mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/gzhan du na 'gal tshobs can du 'gyuraro//de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang la yid gnyis kyis 'ged
184a7('dul ba): par byed na/ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin//slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can/
184b1('dul ba): du 'gyuraro//mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang gi 'du shes kyis 'god par byed na/ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/slar yang mtshams na 'dug
184b2('dul ba): bai rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya'o//gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//mtshams kyi phyi rol la yid gnyis 'ged par byed na/ma bgos pa nyes
184b3('dul ba): par bgos pa yin te/slar yang 'tshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
184b4('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe dge slong gi dge slong lnga dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na/dge slong des gang gis bskur ba de la yid btsugs pas spyad
184b5('dul ba): pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong des yid bcugs par bya ba ma
184b6('dul ba): yin pa la yid bcugs pas spyad de/'di ltar des gang gis bskur ba de la yang bcugs par spyad do//'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong la/dge slong gi lag
184b7('dul ba): nas chos gos dag bskur ba na/gang la bskur ba de la yid btsugs pas spyad na legs par spyad po yin no//gang gis bskur ba de la yid bcugs pas spyad na nye
185a1('dul ba): bar spyad pa yin no//dge slong gis dge slong la chos gro dag bskur ba byed na/gang la bskur ba de ni shi la/gang gis bskur ba de la
185a2('dul ba): yid bcugs pa spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no//gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung por byin gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis bslabs pa yin
185a3('dul ba): no//dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/gang gis bskur ba de nau shi la/gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar
185a4('dul ba): byin gyis rlob par byed na/nyes par byin gyis brlab pa yin no//dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/gang la bskur ba de slar
185a5('dul ba): bzlog lnga//gang giste bskur ba de la yid bcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no//gang la bskur ba de la yid bcugs pas spyad na nyes pAr
185a6('dul ba): spyad pa yino//dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur ba na/gang la bskur ba de ni shri la/ge nga lA bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin
185a7('dul ba): gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin//gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na/nyes por byin gyis
185b1('dul ba): brlabs pa yin+do//dge slong gis dge 'dun la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/glang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la gang gis bskur ba de yang shrI naswA gang la
185b2('dul ba): bskur ba de la yid btsugs pas spyod na nyes par spyad pa yino//gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/legs par byin gyis
185b3('dul ba): brlabs pa yino//dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog nas de shi laM/gang gis bskur bar byed pa
185b4('dul ba): de'ang shi na/de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no//gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar
185b5('dul ba): byin gyis rlob par byed na/legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin/gos kyi gzhi rdzog so////sra brkyang gi gzhi'i sdom ni/gnas bcas
185b6('dul ba): pa dang kha cig dang //rdol pa dang ni blangs pa dang //dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi//nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang //bgos pa dag ni bcu gnyis te//gnas
185b7('dul ba): bcas dbyar gan+dad bcas pa//ston pa blta bar 'dod na'ang //'dab rdzab kyis ni ngal gyur pa//de la der ni chos gos gnang //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
186a1('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis pa nas//de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang ba
186a2('dul ba): dag gnas bcasu dbyar gnas par dam btsos te/dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas/chos gos byas pa dang ldan chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung
186a3('dul ba): bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtswa stug po dang rtsub chen por tshobs ngal bar gyur cing rdul gyis lus yog bzhin du mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ste/rim gyis
186a4('dul ba): rgyu zhing song ba dang /mnyan yid du phyin to//de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gros ches gos dang lhung bzed mkho su phab nas rkang pa bkrus te/bcom
186a5('dul ba): sngon 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'dus kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyeg 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug//chos nyid
186a6('dul ba): kyis sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das rnams ni glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so so yang dag por dga' bar mdzad po 'dis so so yang dag par dga' byur
186a7('dul ba): mdzad de/dge slong dag khyed de gzang gnas 'di saganas gang du dbyar gnas gnas/btsun pa bdag cag ni gnas bcas nas/da gzod mchi
186b1('dul ba): ljags tAM/bdag drug gnas bcas na dbyar mchis mchis lagaso//dge sbyong dag spyod cag gnas bcwa su rdog pad+mo ba la rog par dbyar gnas snum/bsod sbyor sa
186b2('dul ba): kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/btsun pa mang por gsol te/bdag cag gnas bcas na badri ba la reg par dbyar gnas shing bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis
186b3('dul ba): lag so//'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtswa stug po dang /rdzab chen por tsha bas rol bar gyur cing rdul gyis lus yogs pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis
186b4('dul ba): te rim gyis rgyu zhing mchi ba na/tshogs chen pos 'dir mchis lags /'dul ba gni/bam po re bdun pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis
186b5('dul ba): dgongs pa/kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/rtswa stug po dang /rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing /lus rdul gyis yog pas ljongs
186b6('dul ba): rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni nyon mongs kyi ma la ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gan+d+ha byA rI tsI sbyin pa pa \u0f7f sbyin chom po spyad pa byani byid dge slong la sra brkyang gnang bar bya'o//'di ltar sra brkyang bting na
186b7('dul ba): len yon lnga yod de zhag bcu las thal na ma yin pa dang /zla ba las thal ni ma yin pa dang /nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang /bla gos zing gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis
187a1('dul ba): ljongs rgyur 'gro ba dang /chos glos rung ngam yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o//gzhan yang phan yon lnga yod de/tshogs
187a2('dul ba): shing za na ma yin pa dang /yang yang za ba na ma yin pa dang /khyim rnamasu 'gron du ma bos par 'gro na ma yin pa dang /ji tsam 'dod pa chos gos btsal ba dang /ston
187a3('dul ba): zla 'bring po nas dpyid zla ra bI bar gyi nang der sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na ngas
187a4('dul ba): rjesu gnang ste/dge slong rnams rig par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos ljongs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong
187a5('dul ba): rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o//'di ltar sra brkyang lo phan yon lnga yod de/zhag bcu thal nas ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nus sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed
187a6('dul ba): pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong mo bzhi no//bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/dge slong rnams kyis sri brkyang ji ltar gding ba ma shes
187a7('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding bar bya'o/gding ba ni 'di ltar
187b1('dul ba): b+h+yab+h+ya/re zhig thog mar mthun pa go ba b+h+yas te/chos gos 'di ni dbya glanas pa'i dge 'dun gyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lag+hA s+yA tAM/gal te dge 'dun bzhad na
187b2('dul ba): chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bya'o//de nas phyi de nyin gnas mal bai shams nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/dge slong rnams la
187b3('dul ba): yang dag par bsgrol/dge 'dun rnams drung tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang /dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun brgyan
187b4('dul ba): ba rnams gsan du gsol/chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/dge 'dun gyi choso gos 'dis sra brgyad bgyid
187b5('dul ba): nas/sra brkyang gding bar bzhed na/de san sro brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/chos pa la ches gos rnying pa rnams dang bral ba yang mi 'byung na/sar pa rnams dang
187b6('dul ba): lha smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /'di ltar dge 'dun gyis chos gos
187b7('dul ba): 'di sra brkyang du mdzad de/chos gos 'das dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings////des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang /
188a1('dul ba): 'phrul ba yang mi 'byung na/sra pa rnams pam+b+ha zlus kyang ci 'tshal/'di ni gsol ba'o//las/draltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rna/
188a2('dul ba): gsan du gsol/chos gos 'dri ni dbyung gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bying ba lags la dge 'dun yang sra brkyang bgyi bar bzhed do/dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di
188a3('dul ba): sra brkyang du mdzad pas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings//des na sra brkyang bting po'i gnas nas chas pA lA chos gos rnying ba rnams dang 'bral ba yang
188a4('dul ba): mi 'byung ni/sar ba rnams lta blos kyang ci'i tshal/tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dog chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyi zhing chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra btung
188a5('dul ba): bting ste/des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas rgyas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang bral ba yang mi 'byung na/sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar bzod
188a6('dul ba): pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shing /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/druge 'dun gyis chos gos sku brgyang du mdzad nas/chos gos 'dis dge 'dun
188a7('dul ba): gyisra brkyang 'dings te/des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chad pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang /bral po yang mi 'byung na/sar pa rnams dang lta smos
188b1('dul ba): lnga gang zhe na/dbyer gyi ma yin pa dang /dbya ra la
189a1('dul ba): pa dang /ma bting ba shes pa'o//bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/gnas mal bla shams te zhes bya ba nas/dge 'dun thams cad tshogs
189a2('dul ba): shing 'thun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/re zhig thog mor spro bar bya ste/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings

189a5('dul ba): cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong maung 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'drings par bskos te/sra brkyang

189a7('dul ba): gsol/sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar spro za na/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings
189b1('dul ba): par bskos te//sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bu 'gyur na/tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings pa
189b2('dul ba): bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnas nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings pa
189b3('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//de nas gsol bas sra brkyang 'drings pa'i dge
189b4('dul ba): slong la sra brkyang sbyin par bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol//dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad lags la/dge slong ming 'di/
189b5('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba 'di yong sra brkyang 'dings par bskos lags te/gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la brabI tsong bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /'di ltar dge

189b7('dul ba): chos dag bca' bar bya ste/dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pas sro brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste bkru'o//brkyang dro'o//drubo//khe sbyar ro//chung ngu na khab kyi sau bsrubs
190a1('dul ba): nasasam/gnam yang tsan pU b+h+yAM/lanAganyis lan kA sgyum du senas bstod par bya//donas ston na 'byung rmugs rgya/

190a3('dul ba): blangs te dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sgra bcung du mdzad sa bdag dge slong 'di zhes bgyi ba yang pra brgyad 'dings
190a4('dul ba): bar brnyasaskye brgyad 'dings pa bdag ming 'di zhes dbye na chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sa brgyad 'dings par 'a//gang dang //btid ngo //

190b1('dul ba): gsol/chas gos 'dan dge 'dun gyis su phyubyung du mdzad ma bdag mong 'dri nas pa gyi ba spang sra brgyad 'dings pa bskos pa lags te/dadag gis chos bas
190b2('dul ba): dis dge 'dun gyisgra babyung btid la ga sngo zhes brjod pa bya'o//des legs par bting ngo //shin tu tong ste/'di la rnyed pa dang /phan mon yod pa gang yin pa d+ma/
190b3('dul ba): ni bdag cag ga yon zhes brjod par du zhing /de bzhon du ldan gnyis ldan gsum du dge 'dun gas dbu' bar du thams cad kyis legs par bting ngo //shin tu bting
190b4('dul ba): 'di la rnyeng pa dang /phan yon yod pa gang yin/de ni bdag gi yin zhes brjod par bya'o//sr-i dbyu 'i dengs pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang thags te/cha
190b5('dul ba): d+yAsar ma yin/snum phyi sar ma yin te/tshangs bang du 'jug par mi bya'o//mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o//gal te so na der gnas par mi
190b6('dul ba): bya'o//sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcos pa bzhin yangs dag par blangs te/'jug par mi byed na/'phel chubs

191a1('dul ba): brkyang 'byin gyis/khyed cag so so'i chos gos rnams byin gyis rlobs shig/de la rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/dge 'dun
191a2('dul ba): gyis bgo ba bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa du zhig gis sra brkyang ma bting lags/nye bar
191a3('dul ba): 'khor lnga'i ste/dbyar gyi ma yin po dang /dbyar ral ba dang /dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang /dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang //
191a4('dul ba): sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'o/gzhan yang 'di lnga'i'o ma bting ba yin te/slob pa dang /spo ba spyad zin pa dang /mgu bar bya ba spyod
191a5('dul ba): pa dang /mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang /bslab pa byin pa'o//btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa mchis la/phan yon ma mchis lags/nye bar 'khor
191a6('dul ba): lnga'i ste dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang /dbyar ral ba dang /dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang /dbyar tha dad par bcas pa dang /sra brkyang de 'ding
191a7('dul ba): pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i'o//gzhan yang lnga po 'di dag gau ste slob pa dang /spo ba spyad zin pa dang //mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang /mgu bor bya ba spyad
191b1('dul ba): zin pa dang /bslab pa byin pa'i 'o//btsun pa du zhig gis rnyed pa yang ma mchis la phan yon yang ma mchis lags/nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba
191b2('dul ba): dang phyir mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba dang /sdig pa'i lta bar spong ba ma bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang /dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang /dge 'dun bye na chos
191b3('dul ba): mi yin pa'i phyogs pa'i'o//dge slong rab tu mang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na/chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom nas/de dag rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang //
191b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis mthong nus tshe dang ldan pa dgu 'ongs bye le gso//'ongs pa leg so//ji ga bde bar spyad dam/tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar spyod pa ni
191b5('dul ba): ci 'dra ba zhig bdag cag ni chom rkun po rnams kyis bcom mo//tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/glal te sre brkyang phyung na khyed la chos
191b6('dul ba): gos kyi bgo bA sha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas
191b7('dul ba): na rje su gnang ste/chom rkun bdag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir/sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o//dbyung ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/gnas mal
192a1('dul ba): bshams la grwaN+DI brdungasate/dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsnol/dge 'dun thams cad tshogs
192a2('dul ba): shing 'dun par gyur pa dang /dge slong gtsog gi suM gsal pa bye sgra las bya/'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gas+ho/don su 'dir da/'du
192a3('dul ba): 'thun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags na/gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab kyi
192a4('dul ba): bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du/sra brkyang 'byin
192a5('dul ba): pa mdzad do//'di ni gsol pa'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gson du gsol/gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas 'di
192a6('dul ba): srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/dge slong rab tu mang po tshom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags te/dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom
192a7('dul ba): pa rnams kyi slad du/sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad na/tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang
192b1('dul ba): 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis dge
192b2('dul ba): slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du/sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad/gang gi slad du cing mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//de nas rnyed pa
192b3('dul ba): byung ba gang yin pa de bgo bar bya ste/bgos nas gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal pa las chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bgo ba sha' bya'o//
192b4('dul ba): sdom la/rdol pa dang ni sril zlos dang //mtha' skor lhun rlo lhan rings dang //gso ma'i seng ras zegs pa dang //rnyings dang spangs dang dengos po'o//
192b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa chos gos rdol pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo //
192b6('dul ba): btsun po chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal ba dang /chos gos chag btab pa dang /chos gos lhan pa rlo bos btab pa dang /chos gos lhan rings can dang /gso
192b7('dul ba): ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos dang /chos pos zegs pa dang /chos pos rnyings pa dang /chos gos spangs pa dang /chos gos dengs pas sra brkyang gideng du ru
193a1('dul ba): lags samya/nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo //sdom la/blings dang dus ma yin pa dang /gang zag gis ni chos gos gsum//mi rung //
193a2('dul ba): ba dang ma dras dang //khru lngar ma mchog mi bya dang //glu 'thun min dang mi gding dang //mtshams kyi phyi rol mi skye'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
193a3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa//btsun pa blings pa'i chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung logs sam/nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo //btsun pa
193a4('dul ba): dus ma legs par chos gos dang /gang zag gi snam sbyar dang /bla gos dang mthang gos dang /mi rung ba'i chos gos dang /ma dras pa dang /klu lnga mA
193a5('dul ba): mchis pa dang /blo 'thun par ma bgyis pa'i chos go so dang /sra brkyang 'dings pa ma bskos pa dang /mtshams kyi slad rol du blo 'thun par bgyis pa'i
193a6('dul ba): chos gos kyi sra brkyang dang /mtshams kyi slad rol tu bskos pa'i sra brkyang 'drings pas/sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/nye bar 'khor mi rung
193a7('dul ba): ngo//sdom la/dus kyi dang ni zla ba gsum//sar pa dang ni brtags pa nyid//phongs pa dang ni gso ma'i ros//gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/
193b1('dul ba): btsun pa dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/nye bar 'khor rung ngo //btsun pa dgung zla gsum 'das nas/dge 'dun gyi chos
193b2('dul ba): gos kyi rnyed pa gang lags pa des sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/nye bar 'khor rung ngo //chos gos sar pa rung ngo //sar pa brtags pa ru //phongs pa'i
193b3('dul ba): chos gos rludang //gso ma'i snying ros sgyu m+b+ha sbyar mi rlung du//btsun pa gang zag go snum s+thAr+yA b+his+tha sku brgyad 'ding sa rlung lags sam/gal te dge /'dun la
193b4('dul ba): phul bar gyur na rung ngo //bla gros thang gos kyang de bzhin no//sdom la/gang zag gi dang khyim pa dang /khru lnga pa dang khru lnga'i lhag/blo 'thun byas
193b5('dul ba): pa'i gding ba dang //mtshams kyi nang nyid skye ba'o//btsun pa gang zag gi chos gos kyi sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/mi rung ngo //gal te dge 'dun la
193b6('dul ba): phul bar gyur na'o//khyim pa'i gos kyis mo rung ngo //gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo //khru lnga pas rung ngo //khru lnga las lhags pas
193b7('dul ba): rung ngo //blo 'thun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos dang sra brkyang 'dings pas rung ngo //mtshams kyi nang du zla 'thun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos kyis
194a1('dul ba): rung ngo //mtshams kyi nang du sra brkyang 'dings pa bskos pas rung ngo //ma mo brgyad kyi gzhis sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur te/brgyad gadran
194a2('dul ba): na/song ba dang /rdzogs pa dang /nges pa dang /nyams pa dang /thos pa dang /mtshams 'das pa dang /ra thag chad pa dang /brgyad pa ni
194a3('dul ba): sra brkyang phyung ba nyid de/song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba dang /rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang /nges pa'i mtha' can dang /nyams pa'i mtha'
194a4('dul ba): can dang /thos pa'i mtha' can dang /mtshams 'das pa dang /re thag chad pa dang /brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung zin pa nyid yin no//song ba'i mtha'
194a5('dul ba): can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/chos gos mi byas chos gos ma zin par lhung bzed dang chos gos
194a6('dul ba): blangs te/phyir mi 'ong bar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu spong ba de'i ni song bu'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no//rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba ga
194a7('dul ba): zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol nas/phyir 'ang zhing chos
194b1('dul ba): gros bya'o snyam pa la sna de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag slar mi 'ong ste/'on kyang chos gros bya'o snyam pa'i de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang ba yin no//
194b2('dul ba): des po'i mtha' can gyi sra ban+d+ha phyung ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong ste brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/rjes gos mya byas/chus gos ma zin par man+ta
194b3('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu smos nas slar 'odas shing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/de 'di snyam du sems te/slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i
194b4('dul ba): mtho' can gyi sgra brkyang phyung ba yino//nyamos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas chos gos
194b5('dul ba): mU byas/chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas/slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/de 'di snyam du sems te/slar yang
194b6('dul ba): mi 'ong la chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam nas des de rlom zhing brtsams pa dang /nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin//thos pa'i
194b7('dul ba): mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/chos gos ma byas/chos gis ma zin par mtshams kyi
195a1('dul ba): l+yA du saud+ha nAs/slar 'ongs te chos glos byad+mo snum pa lam+b+ha/dge 'dun 'thun pas/sku brgyud byung ldu ngas dge 'dun 'dun/
195a2('dul ba): bas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so//thos nas kyang legs par phyung //shin tu phyung ngo //zhes rje su yI rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang
195a3('dul ba): byung ba yin no//mtshams 'dus pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang ni na/'di lta ste/dge slong sa brgyad pa ting de'i gnas nas/rlos gos ma byas/
195a4('dul ba): gis ma zin pa'i phyir 'ong ngam mi 'ong snyam pa las//mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni mtshams 'ongs pa pa'i sra brgyad phyung ba yin//ro thog chang pa pa
195a5('dul ba): sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong skye brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/chos gosnga ma byas chos gos mi zin pA ri mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas//
195a6('dul ba): slar 'ongs shing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/de'i chos gos re ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du chad pa de'i ni/re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkya
195a7('dul ba): phyung ba yino//brgyad pa sro brkyad byung ba nyid gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin
195b1('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/de yang slar 'ongs shing ska brkyang phyung ba nyam su myong ba de'i ni brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid yin na//sdomA la/ma byas
195b2('dul ba): pa ni nyi shu dang //brtsams pa dag ni nyi shu dang //re ba yod pany+tsi shu dang //re ba med panyi shu yon//'di lta ste/dge slong sra brgya bting ba'i grwanam+b+ha
