330b2('dul ba): bzhag go/des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus na mkha' lding zhig sprul te/de sa de blangaso//des ro langs shig sprul pa dang /tshe dang ldan
330b3('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bus snga gas kyi phur pas btab pa las nyes par sbyar ba'i ro langs ni bdag nyid la gsod par byed pas des de nyid bsnyags pa dang /de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs
330b4('dul ba): shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/'phags pa skyobasu mchi lags kyis/yongasu bskyab tu gsol/de nas tshe dang
330b5('dul ba): ldan pa shI ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang /ro langs de zhi bar gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshadade/de dad pa skyes nas smras pa/'phags
330b6('dul ba): bai shA ri'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/bdag 'jigs pa shA ri'i
330b7('dul ba): spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung /bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/gdam ngag byin pa dang /des brtson pa
331a1('dul ba): dang 'bad pa dang /brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/khams gsum
331a2('dul ba): gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa na mkha' dang lag thil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/rig pas ma rig
331a3('dul ba): pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dril cing /rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /bkur bsti la rgyab
331a4('dul ba): kyi phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas de'i 'khor
331a5('dul ba): rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig dgad nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/'phags pa shA ri'i bus na smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po cher bcad snyam
331a6('dul ba): du rig nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang bzhin
331a7('dul ba): shes nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ches bshad pa byaso//de thos nas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/
331b1('dul ba): kha cig ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed//kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o//kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o//kha cig
331b2('dul ba): gis ni skyabasu 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i bzhin mos blang so//kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byaso//kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//kha
331b3('dul ba): cig gi ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byasaso//'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas
331b4('dul ba): la gzhol chos la babs/dge 'dun la bab par bkod do//mu stegs can rnams kyi bsams pa/'di bdag gis shags kyis tshar bcad par mi nus kyis/thabs shig bsham
331b5('dul ba): par bya ste/gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du glu ma'i las byas la de nas glags rnyed nas 'di dgas te/bsad par bya'o snyam nas thams cad 'dus te/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
331b6('dul ba): gyi drung du song nas son pa dang smras pa/khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad/de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang /khyod kyi gtsug lag khang
331b7('dul ba): du gla me'i las bya'o//kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung //de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/re shig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la
332a1('dul ba): brtag par bya'o zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras//'phags pa mu s+thA/
332a2('dul ba): can rnams kyis mchid nas/bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/de bas ni snying brtse bar gyis shig dang /khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du bla ma'i las bya'o//
332a3('dul ba): bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zad yod dmi 'on te med ces bsam
332a4('dul ba): pa la zhugs na yod par mthong ngo //su zhig la rag las snyam nas/bdag kho na la'o snyam nas/des bsams te smras pa/khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du
332a5('dul ba): gyis shog/de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla ma'i las bya bar brtsams pa na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu lcags thigs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/des de rnams las
332a6('dul ba): byed du gzhug par brtsams//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas/de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag cing 'dug pa las de rnams kyi de mab+h+yoH
332a7('dul ba): nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/dben pa na 'dubye bas 'di bsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin//snyam nas de rnams kyis de'i drung du do nas bskor te 'dug/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
332b1('dul ba): bus bsam pa dang /'di rnams sems ci 'dra ba zhig gis bdag gi drung du lhags snyam na/ji tsam nu gsad pa'i sems kyis yin par mthong nas/des lcag thogs de sprad nas/
332b2('dul ba): de ba de dang 'dra ba byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa shA ri'i bu bskyab tu gsol/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa re shig song la dral sor
332b3('dul ba): cug shig/de rnams kyis bsams pa 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/bdag cag gis ni 'di gsad par bsams na/'di ni bdag cag la byams pa'i sems
332b4('dul ba): so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/de rnams kyis bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin shos nas/'phags
332b5('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas te/de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes
332b6('dul ba): bcom nas/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras mngon sum du byas te/de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ste smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
332b7('dul ba): 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//de
333a1('dul ba): rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/gdams ngag byin pa de de rnams kyis/brtson pa dang 'bad pa
333a2('dul ba): dang /brtsal ba byas nas/'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang /mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /ltung ba dang /rnam
333a3('dul ba): par thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan te/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom
333a4('dul ba): par gyur nas khams gsum gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong ba dang /glaser du mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag thil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa
333a5('dul ba): tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i skabs dral cing /rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid
333a6('dul ba): pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /bkur bste la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang /nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjed par/
333a7('dul ba): bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/gtsug lag khang gi thig skad kyi mtha' cig nas gzung /mtha' cig nas phyim
333b1('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum par brtsams//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/'phags pa
333b2('dul ba): shA ri'i bu/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni/rgyu med rkyen med pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/'phags pa shA ri'i phyi'i
333b3('dul ba): ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/khyim bdag de de bzhino//de de bzhin te/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu
333b4('dul ba): med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na/dga' ldan gyis lha'i ri su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to//de nas khyim
333b5('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshur skyes pa'i mig dgrang de smras pa/'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te/de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang ba dang /lhag par
333b6('dul ba): sems mngon par dad por bgyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/yang thig skud de gzung ba dang /khyimaM bdag mgoni med zas sbyin gyis/lhag par dad pa drag
333b7('dul ba): po'i shugs kyis/sems mngon par dad pare byas te/dad pa de'i mjug thags kho nar gser gyi khang pa de rin po che sku bzhi los byas par gyur nas/tshe
334a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byaso//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud
334a2('dul ba): kyis/gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /khang phran drug cu brtsig tu bcug ste/des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /khang phran drug cu brtsigs na
334a3('dul ba): yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par bya ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras pa/'phags
334a4('dul ba): bA shA ri'i du/bcom ldan 'dasau gr-i shegs na shul tshod ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/khyim bdag dper na/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po tsamo//'khor lo sgyur
334a5('dul ba): bra'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/khyim bdag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du'o gro'o//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas spyi na
334a6('dul ba): gyis/gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi ge shegs dgongs brtsigs nas zhe sa dag byed du bcug srin po gtong gi khang pa dag brtsig tu bcug dus
334a7('dul ba): tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rgyan/tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag nye bar
334b1('dul ba): bkod/rta babs dag byed du bcug/dus dang thun chod kyis sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug/de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bskyo ba/kye nang rje tshur khyod bcom
334b2('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der sang la phyin pa dang /kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam
334b3('dul ba): bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho 'am/stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la/'di skad ces/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegasu gsol/bcom
334b4('dul ba): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' ches gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /
334b5('dul ba): byed rnams kyi bkur bsti bgyid do//zhes kyang gsol cig/jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag megon med zas sbyin gyis ltar mnyan nas/rgyal po'i
334b6('dul ba): khab gang na ba der chus te rims gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
334b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/mi des bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
335a1('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas/reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
335a2('dul ba): bzhin du'o//kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig/btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas kyi mchid nas/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
335a3('dul ba): du gshegasu gsol/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la zhes bya ba nas/bkur bsti bgyid do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
335a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gan ngo //de nas mi nges bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das
335a5('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/
335a6('dul ba): dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod/
335a7('dul ba): chags dang bral ba/dang ba 'khor dang ba/khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu dang khra bo glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lte bu dang /song
335b1('dul ba): bo mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /
335b2('dul ba): bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /dpa' bo dmago ma'i tsho gas kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /
335b3('dul ba): lam mkhan 'gron pa'i tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu dang /ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /tshong dpon skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /khams
335b4('dul ba): kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /'khor lo sgyur ba la bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang /zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /nyi ma 'od zer
335b5('dul ba): stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang /yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /'phags skyes po grul bumo gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /mig mi bzang
335b6('dul ba): klu'i tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu dang /rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /thog zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /brgya byin
335b7('dul ba): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskur ba lta bu dang /rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu dang //sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu nga
336a1('dul ba): glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar/dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
336a2('dul ba): gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan cing /dpe byad brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/'od mdom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/nyi ma'i 'odi zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can//
336a3('dul ba): rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /thugs chen po dang ldan
336a4('dul ba): pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang /mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /lha brgya stong phrag
336a5('dul ba): du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas/mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegaso//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas/mngon par 'du mdzad
336a6('dul ba): pas/grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe/sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos ldeg rab tu
336a7('dul ba): ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'u nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dmalha/byang phyogs
336b1('dul ba): mtshon lho phyogs dma'/mtha' mtshan dbus dma'/dbus m+b+hatso na mtha' dma' ba gyur nas/'jog rten 'dra thams cad 'jog rten gyi bar dang bcas te//snang ba chen dzan
336b2('dul ba): khyab par gyur to//bar snang la yang lha'i rdo rdung zhing /num pa'i dkyil na gnas pa'i sgras ni/steng nas lha'i me tog ud ba la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mung dang /bad+mA na/ po dang /
336b3('dul ba): a ka ru'i phyi ma dang /rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /gur kum gyi phye ma dang /ta maM la'i lo ma dang /lha'i me tog man dar ba rnams 'thar zhing lha'i gos rnams
336b4('dul ba): kyang 'thor ro//bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang gzhan yang ya mtshan 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to//gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur
336b5('dul ba): to//dam ma rnams ni mngon par gyur to//mngon po rnam mnyam par gyur to//glang po N+DI thung /de 'dun/d+hU yang skad 'dzin/khrumachog rnams kyang skad 'byin /
336b6('dul ba): pa na yod du'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnam kyang rang sgra 'byin to//ba rnams kyis ni mig thob bo//'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos//lkugs pa rnams kyis ni swA
336b7('dul ba): par gyur to//dbang po mchong ba rnams ni dbang po rnams tshang bar thor bo//chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to//dug 'thungs pa rnams ni drug zhi bar gyur to//
337a1('dul ba): phan tshun kho na byung ba rnams ni byams pa thob par gyur to//sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to//btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las thar
337a2('dul ba): to//nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed de/'di dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ngo cher brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
337a3('dul ba): 'das bkur ba sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegaso//gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas khyim bdag
337a4('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang /nye du dang /gnyen gyi skye bos yongasu skor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/chu sbreng bar btsams pa las/de 'dzag tu ma btub nas/
337a5('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
337a6('dul ba): stsal pa/khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas pa med de/'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas/sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
337a7('dul ba): rnams la phyogs 'di phul ba yin gyis/phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig/des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug ste sbrengs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
337b1('dul ba): yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad pa/rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod pa mdzad pa na/gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/kye ma bcom
337b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyams pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi bsam pa thugasu chud nas/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu
337b3('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yino zhes der ming thog ma smos pa mdzadado//gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis der/bdag gi ming thog mar
337b4('dul ba): smos pa mdzad pa thos nas/shin tu dga' bar gyur te/dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir rin po che
337b5('dul ba): sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go/de bzhin du sdud pa byed pa rnams kyi kyang /mdo sde'i nong du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshe la mgon med zas sbyin gyi
337b6('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//zhes gdags pa byas so//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun
337b7('dul ba): pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las phyogs 'di sngun nam phul lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
338a1('dul ba): dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs
338a2('dul ba): pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba
338a3('dul ba): 'jig rten du byung nas/de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang phyogs 'dir gshed so//de'i tshe mnyan yod 'dir khyim bdag rgyal zhe bya byung ste/des sa phyogs 'di
338a4('dul ba): rgyang brags drug gser dang /dbyig gshegs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas rnar gzigs la phul te de nyid kyi spyan sngar rab tu
338a5('dul ba): byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas//khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo zhig des bsten pas/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
338a6('dul ba): gzigs la shin tu dad pa skyes nas/des yang dgra bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang /sen mo'i mchod rten brtsig tu bcug ste/des
338a7('dul ba): bsams pa/gang gis na bdag cag gis 'di nyid mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur ba'i thabs de ci yod snyam pa dang /de la rten pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na
338b1('dul ba): 'dug pa zhig gis nor bu rin po che 'bar ba zhig smyosu bskur nas/des dri mchod rten la brtags pa dang /de'i mthus des dbu sgra dang /sen ma'i mchod rten de nyid mchin du
338b2('dul ba): sgrib pa med par mthong ngo //de nas dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa/ji ltar sa phyogs 'di bdag gi zhang pos rgyal bu gzhon nu las gser dang /dbyug gshings pas
338b3('dul ba): nyos nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul ba de bzhin du/bdag gis kyang sa phyogs 'di//gser dang //
338b4('dul ba): dbyig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing /de rnams kyis phyi ma shos gang yin pa de'i smyan
338b5('dul ba): sngar bdag rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas par gyur cig ces btab bo//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de
338b6('dul ba): tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de ni/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin//de tshun chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig baM la sten pa gtsug
338b7('dul ba): tor can zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/de 'khor dpe slong drug khri dang /sa phyogs 'dir gshegs
339a1('dul ba): so//de'i tshe khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ste/des phyogs 'di dpag tshad phye dang gsum nor bu ga shrIbasdu bas/rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos
339a2('dul ba): nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya bar
339a3('dul ba): gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste 'on kyang /de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin//de'i 'og tu bskal pa sum
339a4('dul ba): cu rtsa cig pa 'di nyid la ston pa thams cad skyob ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya bo'i bar grong ma bzhin du ste/de 'khor dge slong
339a5('dul ba): drug khri dang /sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so//de'i tshe khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba byung ste/des phyogs 'di rgyang grags gnyisu mu tig ga shibs pas gzhon nu las nyos
339a6('dul ba): nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyo ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phulo//dge slong dog de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba
339a7('dul ba): de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yino//de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po
339b1('dul ba): 'dri la ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/de 'khor dge slong bzhi khri dang phyogs
339b2('dul ba): 'dir gshegaso//de'i tshe khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/des phyogs 'dri ba lang gis bkang bas gzhon nu las nyos te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
339b3('dul ba): 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang btsos pa la phu'o//dge slong dag de'i tshe dri'i dus kyi khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de
339b4('dul ba): ltar mi lta ste/'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yino//de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo sum khri thub pa
339b5('dul ba): na/ston pa gser thub ces bya ba nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/de 'khor dge slong sum khri dang phyogs
339b6('dul ba): 'dir gshAMg so//de'i tshe khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya ba byung ste/des phyogs 'di gros bting bas gzhon nu la nyos nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser
339b7('dul ba): thub nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phu'o//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyed kyis de ltar
340a1('dul ba): mi blta ste/'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no//de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshul
340a2('dul ba): nyi khri thub pa na/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/
340a3('dul ba): de 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang /phyogs 'dir gsheg s+ho//de'i tshe khyim bdag chu spyod ces bya ba zhig byung ste/des sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags byed gser gyis baikram
340a4('dul ba): pas gzhon nu las nyes te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phu'o//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag
340a5('dul ba): chu stod ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyed kyis de ltar mi bAlta ste/'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yino//dge
340a6('dul ba): slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yod dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
340a7('dul ba): skyes bu 'dul ba/kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston pa nga 'jig rten du byung nas nga 'khor stong nyis
340b1('dul ba): rgya lnga ts+tsha dang /phyogs 'dir gshegs pa na/dAstAr yang khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin gyis/tshon pa der bcu drug gis smos pa'i khyon b+he bA ga shibs pas gshi stsu
340b2('dul ba): nas/gzhon nu rgyal byed las ltos te/nganyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phru'o//dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ston
340b3('dul ba): pabyams pa zhes bya ba 'khor dgra bcom pa khrag khrig phrag dgu dang /ther 'bum chen po drag drug phyogs 'dir gshegs par 'gyur//de'i tshe khyim bdag nor bzangs zhes bya
340b4('dul ba): babyung bar 'gyur tAM/des phyogs 'di dpagra tshad gsum gser dang /dbyig ga shibs pas gnon nu las nyos nas byams pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 'dul por
340b5('dul ba): 'gyur zhing de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spongs nas/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag
340b6('dul ba): nor bzangs shes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/khyed kyis de ltar myi lta ste//'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid khyim bdag nor
340b7('dul ba): bzangs shes bya ba yin par 'gyuraro//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /bdag po med pa dang thang la yod pa dang /chun yod pa dang /
341a1('dul ba): gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong bas/kun tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/gter bdag po dang /
341a2('dul ba): bcas pa dang /bdag po med pa dang /thang la yod pa dang /chun yod pa dang /gang dag rgyung ring po na yod pa dang /gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo zhes grag so//de'i
341a3('dul ba): tshe mu steg can gyi dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu sna tshogs rtogs khang du dus te/'khod pa rnams 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed/
341a4('dul ba): shes ldan dag khyim bdog mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan ni/gter bdag po dang bcos pa dang /bdag po med pa dang /thang la yod pa dang /chun yod pa
341a5('dul ba): dang /gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar gyur/de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u phyugs sten zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du tshogs shing 'dug par
341a6('dul ba): gyur nas/des smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod tsog dang /kho bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag ldan na/gtor bdag
341a7('dul ba): papopa dang bcas pa dang /bdag po med pa dang /thang la yod pa dang /chun yod pa dang /gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /gang dag zag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar 'gyur ba
341b1('dul ba): brtags la khyod la smra bar bya'o zhes de khyim bdag mgron mod zas sbyin 'gro ba dang /'dug pa la brtag pa lhur len cing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang //dzi nAm dus gzhan zhig
341b2('dul ba): na/khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin/chu bo a dzi ra ba tir khru so byas byung ba la//des de'i rgyab tu thal mo rgyab pa dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong bzhin
341b3('dul ba): du cang mi smra bar 'dug/des smras pa/khyim bdag khyod ni mkhas pa yin zhing bzod pa dang /nges pa dang /ldan pa yin pa de na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /bdag
341b4('dul ba): po med pa dang /thang la yod pa dang /chu na yod pa dang /gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /gang dag thag nye ban yod pa mthong ngo //des mu stegs can rnams la go bar byas pa dang /
341b5('dul ba): mu stegs can kha dom can rnams kyis kyang kun tu smras pas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/bzod pa dang /nges pa dang ldan pas/des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa
341b6('dul ba): dang /bdag po med pa dang /thang la yod pa dang /chu na yod pa dang /gang dag rgyang ring po ni yod pa dang /gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo zhes kun tu sgra grags pa'i skabs
341b7('dul ba): de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mu stegs can stong phrag bye bas kyang /khyim bdag mgon
342a1('dul ba): med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang ldan na/gter mthong bar 'gyur ba shes par bla ba ma yino//'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mig gi 'bras
342a2('dul ba): bu rin po che ltar bkra ba dang /dbyig gi skad yod do//des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /bdag med pa dang /thang la yod pa dang /chun yong po dang /gang dag rnyed
342a3('dul ba): ring po na yod pa dang /gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo //'dul ba da ni////bam po don drug pa//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod
342a4('dul ba): bsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis las ci zhig bgyi ba ni/las de'i rnam por smin pas mig gi 'bras bu rin po
342a5('dul ba): che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skyed dang /ldan par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid kyis lAs tshogs rnyed
342a6('dul ba): pabarkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye ba gnas pa gdon myi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag bye dzo lags ngasakhyim+bu bA k+Sha~M mgron med zas sbyin nyid kyis
342a7('dul ba): las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin
342b1('dul ba): bar mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/so'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar las drage ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin
342b2('dul ba): pa'i phung pA dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par gyur te/las rnams bskal ba brgyar yang ni//chung mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can
342b3('dul ba): rnams la ni//'brus du dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba rI ba zhig na/khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang lnga langs spyod che ba yongasu gzung ba yangs shing rgya
342b4('dul ba): ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis mgrin pa zhig gnas te/des sos ka'i dus la bab pa'i tshe me tog dang shing rnams 'brus shing /dang po dang /
342b5('dul ba): krung khrung dang /rma bya dang /ne tso dang /ri skegs dang /khu khrug dang /shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags tshal stug po'i bskyed mos tshul gyi gzhir nad mi dang lhan cig
342b6('dul ba): rlung ngo //sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/rang spangs rgyas dman pa dang /ngan pa la snying bsgru ba pas mtha'i gnas me lA ya dga' ba/'jig rten rnams kyi yon gam
342b7('dul ba): tshig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas rje ji tsam na sang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu ning song na ri bor der phyin nas/de bskyed mos tshal de'i phyogs zhika na 'dun
343a1('dul ba): /bskyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis khyim bdag de la smras pa/dpon po phyogs 'di na rab tu byung ba zhi pa'i bdag nyid can zhig bzhugs//des thos nas//
343a2('dul ba): de yid dga' bar gyur cing dad pa skyes te/gang gi bskyed mos tshal ni 'di 'dra ba'i rab tu byung ba gnas pa na/bdag skal pa can yin snya mo//bdag nyid chen po de
343a3('dul ba): yang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu zhugs te yongasu mya ngan las 'das so//de nas khyim bdag des mdza' bshed dang nye du dang /gnyen
343a4('dul ba): dang nang mi rnams dang lhan cig tu bkur bsti chen po byas nas bsregs te/mau de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa de rnams shel las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du rin po
343a5('dul ba): dang bsres te blugs pa dang /rus pa de rnams 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin par gyur to//de nas des drung du gtugs nus smon la btab pa/ci ltar rus pa 'di rnams rin
343a6('dul ba): po che dang bsres nas shin tu 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin pa de bzhin du dge bu'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi ming gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing /dbyug gi skad dang ldan par
343a7('dul ba): gyur cig ces byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/'dis rang
343b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas/smon lam btob pa gang yin pa de dang /khyim bdag rgyal gyi chu bor gyur pa na/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams par
343b2('dul ba): gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la nor bu 'bar ba btags pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gri
343b3('dul ba): skad dang ldan par gyur to//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni
343b4('dul ba): gcig tu dkar ba dang 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin te/de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/las gnag pa dang 'dren ma gang yin pa rnams ni spangs
343b5('dul ba): la/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//bar gyi sdom ni/rgyal dang rgyas pa chu dang ni//srid sbyin dang ni phur
343b6('dul ba): bu dang //chu bstod dang ni bzang sbyin dang //phyi ma pa ni nor bzangs yin//dbyig rnams dang ni gser dang ni//gsum pa nor bu mu tig yin//ba dang gos dang nas dang ni//
343b7('dul ba): bye ba dbyig gis bsdus pa yin//gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba'i gshebs pas gshibs nas/gzhon nu rgyal byed las nyos te sangs rgyas
344a1('dul ba): la sogs pa dge sbyong ga dag 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe/yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dad pa can mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du
344a2('dul ba): lhags nas/de rnams las kha cig mngon par dad par gyur nas/smras pa/'phags pa bdag cag gis kyang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi skad du/rgyal bu rgyal
344a3('dul ba): byed kyi tshal du gzhi cung zad brtsigo/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/rin gyis sa hos la brtsigs shig/'phags pa rin ji tsam sbrul legs/byig 'di spyad
344a4('dul ba): do//'phags pa re shig 'di snyed kyi 'byor pa bdag cag la lta ga la mchis/de lta mod kyi gal te phyogs 'di thob na brtsi go zhes pa'i skabs de/
344a5('dul ba): dpe slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag la
344a6('dul ba): rtogs la gal te/byin na brtsigs shing/dge slong rnaMs kyis khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin la brtags pa dang /des smras pa/gal ti bdag la rtun te bram ze
344a7('dul ba): dang /khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge 'dun gyi phyir bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po bgyid na sprur to//gang zag phyir bgyid na sprul to//zhes pa'i skabs de/
344b1('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta busma na d+he su gnang ste/dge 'dun gyi phyir ni brtsig par bya'o//
344b2('dul ba): gang theg gi d+hi ni yon padage la brtags /gal te sbyin na brtsig par bya'o//ma byin ni brtsig par mi bya'o//glo zur ba'i dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal po dag
344b3('dul ba): na yod du lhag pa na/de rnams skyes badzir d+hI ni da dge slong rnams kyi drung du dang ba dang /gzhan dag la sbyis 'drin meng po de dag bangs por d+hAr nas/
344b4('dul ba): 'di la bci ma na 'das kyis ga' stsal pa/b+h+yo dUr ba ma kyi phyir mi dgas po gan sa gzhan par bya//ri rir zhigan gadrug lag khang zhig yod pa dang dag
344b5('dul ba): rnams dbyang gnas par dam bcas pa las man ro b+hor de dbyar gyi nang log su 'jigs pa byung nas/den+d+ha gnas pa'i dge sbyong rnams skrag nas dgag dbye ma byas
344b6('dul ba): par mnyan yod du lhags pa dang /de rnams dge slong rnams kyis la mo gyis drub pa ngal sor bcug ste/lam gyis drub pa das sos nas/de rnams kyis smras po/tshong
344b7('dul ba): ldan pa dag kan seM mal rkos shig/de rnams kyis dbar gyi nang logs yin//sum mas bsgos pa dang /glo bur po'i dge slong rnams smod par byed gnags 'phyas
345a1('dul ba): byed kha zer bar byed de/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed da ltar ston pa nyid bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na/
345a2('dul ba): rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal byin cig/de rnams kyis 'on kyang ma bskos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /byung ba
345a3('dul ba): 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyis phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar
345a4('dul ba): bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zla ba gsum pa'i dgag dbye bya zhing dbyar zla ba tha chungs la dbyar phyi mar gnas
345a5('dul ba): par dam bca' bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
345a6('dul ba): ji tsam nu 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang mnyan yod du lhags pa'i skabs dri dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
345a7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ngas 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams la rten nas/dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' ba bcas kyis/gsum
345b1('dul ba): pa ni ma yin no//'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyang /smos 'drin ji lta ba bzhin du ngal sor gzhug par bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis de rnams las sko bar byang nas//
345b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de rnams la su bsko bar mi bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis de rnams la rnyed pa byin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
345b3('dul ba): de rnams la rnyed pa mi sbyino//dge slong rnams kyis kha zas kyi rnyed pa yang ma byin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de rnams la kha zas kyi rnyed pa ni sbyin gyi
345b4('dul ba): gos kyi rnyed pa nI yi no//dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang meng du brtsigs pa las mnyan yod na dge slong nyung ngu zhig dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/de rnams sbyong
345b5('dul ba): par 'dug pas sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod nams med cing nal phrug rnams kyi gnasu gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thams cad
345b6('dul ba): bgo bar bya ste/re res kyang so sor gnyis sam gsum 'am/bzhi ci ran par thams cad la longs spyad par bya ste/la lar ni snga dro 'dug par bya'o//la lar ni nyi ma'i gung
345b7('dul ba): la'o//la lar ni phyi dro'o//la lar ni nub mo gnas par bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis lag gi las mo byas pas de rnams 'drums par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
346a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pA/yon bdag la spro ba skyed par bya'o//gal te grub na de lta na legs/gal te ma grub par gyur na dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par/
346a2('dul ba): bya'o//gal te mi nus par gyur na ci tsam nus pa de tsam btsos par bya ste/gzhan ni btang snyomasu gzhag par bya'o//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rgyas par
346a3('dul ba): gyur pa'i tshe/dge slong mang po mnyan yod du lhags pa dang /de rnams gnas khang gi phongs par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnyis dang
346a4('dul ba): gsum gyi bsgo bar bya ste/chu snod gzhag pa dang 'dag cha la dang /sman dang so shing gzhag pa dang /phan tshun gyi them skas ma gtogs par/chung ngu na 'dug
346a5('dul ba): pA'i tshad tsam yang thams cad kyis 'dra bar bgo bar bya ste/nye spyod ni spyi'i yin pa nyid pas bgo bar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dgon pa dang /
346a6('dul ba): shing drung ba dang /khang stong nanga?/ri sul drang brag phub dang /rtswa'i stan dang bla gab med pa dang /dur khrang seng nags mtha' dang /bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di
346a7('dul ba): rnams su bsam gtan gyis shig/phyis yid la gcags par mi 'gyur par bag yid par gyis shig ces dgen pa'i bsngags pa mang du gsungs pa de'i tshe/dge
346b1('dul ba): slong kha cig dgon pa par dam bcas nas/dgon pa na gnas pa las/de rnams de na chom rkun pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to//gtogs nas bram ze dang /khyim bdag gi khyim//
346b2('dul ba): rnamasu/chos gos tshol ba'i phyir brtson par gyur pas/lung mnod pa dang /klag pa dang /gdon pa dang /rnal 'byor dang yid la bya ba nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnam
346b3('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das
346b4('dul ba): kyis dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o//zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis mi gsal ba zhig tu bzhag pa dang /dge slong dgon pa pa zhig
346b5('dul ba): gis lhung bzed dang chos gos gzhag nas sgo bcad lde mig blangs nas song ba dang /dge slong dgon pa pa gzhan dag phongs par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
346b6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/gnas gsal bar dge slong dgon pe ba rnams kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o//nye dgas khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang brtsig tu bcug nas/de ni de na
346b7('dul ba): mi gnas par dge slong glo bur ba gang zhig 'ongs pa/de la gnas byin nas rnyed pa ni bdag nyid kyis khyero//ci tsam na dge slong chos gos gsum pa zhig 'ongs pa dang /des
347a1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang de stong par mthong nas/des dris pa 'di su'i gtsug lag khung yin+tu/dge sbyong rnams kyis smras pa/dge slong nye dga' yin/
347a2('dul ba): de'i drung du song nas brnyas pa dang /des smras pa/gtsug lag 'dir 'dug la/rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo'i yin no//de der gnas te des gtsug lag khang de lan
347a3('dul ba): 'ga' yang phyag dar ma byis pa'i lci ba ser ba'i byug pas ma byug so//de ci tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang de nas song ngo //dge slong gzhan zhig 'ongs te/des kyang nye dgra'
347a4('dul ba): las brnyas nas gtsug lag khang der gnas pa dang /gtsug lag khang 'di phyag dar gyi phung pos gang bar mthong nas/des de phyags nas phyag dar bor te/phyogs mya 'dzin
347a5('dul ba): bzhin du byug dar gyi phung po'i drung na 'greng ba dang / tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod phyugs ma lag po na thogs
347a6('dul ba): bzhin du de nyid na 'greng ngam ci/phyugs ma de'i mi gzhag gam/des smras pa/'di ni lag bsrung ba 'ga' zhig gnas gnas pa lta ste/des phyags ma'i rjes
347a7('dul ba): kyang med do//des smras pa/'di ni dge slong chos gos gsum pa che ge mo zhig ni gnas gnas so//ji tsam na des de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas ma nongs so//
347b1('dul ba): des smras pa rnyed pa ni nye dgas khyer la de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag dar bya 'am zhes pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom
347b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnyed pa su khyer ba des gtsug lag khang phyug dar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag shi ba rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo bar bya'o zhes
347b3('dul ba): gsungs pa dang /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'dron pa na/khyim bdag gi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na des de yon sngo ba thos
347b4('dul ba): nas de de'i drung du song ste/smras pa/'phags pa gal te bdag gis kyang gtsug lag khang brtsigs na/bdag gi ming gis kyang yon bshad pa mdzad dam des smras pa/
347b5('dul ba): brtsigs shig dang legs par bsngo'o//ci tsam na khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsig tu bcug nas/des der ci yang ma gzhag go/des stong pa nyid du 'dug
347b6('dul ba): pa ci tsam na khyim bdag des mthong nas/de gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas smras pa/'phags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang stong par mchis na/de na su yang de mi
347b7('dul ba): bzhugs sam/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/bzhin bzangs snum pas so//khyim bdag des smras pa/'phags pa tsha rgo can dgon drung brtsigs pa
348a1('dul ba): la ga la snum par 'gyur/khyim bdag de bsams nas kho bo smra ba ma yin te/'on kyang de na rnyed pa med do//dris smras pa 'phags pa de ni bdag
348a2('dul ba): gri gtsug lag khang du su bzhugs pa la ras yug chen bskon no//nye dgas rnyed pa 'thob bo snyam nas gral rims kyis bab na rang gi skal par blangs nas de ni gzhan
348a3('dul ba): nyid na gnas te/de ni stong par 'dug go/ji tsam na bsod snyoms pa mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs pa des/gtsug lag khang stong pa de
348a4('dul ba): mthong nas/des dge slong dag la dris pa gtsug lag khang 'di su'i yin/de dag gis smras pa/dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yin med kyi/dge slong nye dga'i
348a5('dul ba): skal par dbang ngo //de nyid dgA'i drung du song nas/khyod kyi skal ba'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug go/des smras pa/de bzhin byos shig/de dri na gnas pa
348a6('dul ba): na bsod snyoms las med pa zhig yin pas/des de nyi ma re re phyag dar byas so//phyag dar byed pa la ni phan yin lnga yod de/'di lta ste/bradag nyid sems dang
348a7('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba dang /gzhan sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang /
348b1('dul ba): lus zhig nas bad 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyuraro//gang dag gis gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang /phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gi khyim bdag
348b2('dul ba): de'i drung du song ste/smras pa/des thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so//ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der song na gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byug pa dang /phya
348b3('dul ba): dar byas pa mthong nas/de dad pa skyes te/des bsod snyoms pa la ras yug chen bskon pa nye dgas thos nas de rnyings par song ste smras pa/bsod snyoms pa gtsug lag
348b4('dul ba): khang 'di kho bo'i skal pa yin gyis/ras yug chen kho bo la byin cig/bsod snyoms pas bsams pa chags pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin yang
348b5('dul ba): 'os kyang mthus khyer nas bdag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyuraro//snyam nas des de la byin pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
348b6('dul ba): gsol ba dang /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang la dad pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par bya ba byas pa de ni kho na'i yin no//dbyar gyi
348b7('dul ba): rnyed pa ni nye dga'i yin no//'jig rten pa ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas bdag nyid dang /bu dang chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang /yon tan dang ldan pa lo sbyin
349a1('dul ba): pa sbyin par byed de/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong dgon pa rnams zan la mgron du 'bod par byed do//dge slong dgon pa pa
349a2('dul ba): rnams zas la khyim rnamasu dong ba dang /ma byin par len pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nas brkus par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
349a3('dul ba): bsgo bcad la lde mig blangs la 'dong bar bya'o//ma byin par len pa rnams kyis lde mig byas te brkus nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/srungs
349a4('dul ba): ma'i dge slong bzhag la 'dod bar bya'o//de la bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par bya'o//ma byin pa len pa rnams kyis dge slong gzhan khrid de 'ongs nas/des
349a5('dul ba): sgro phye zhes smras nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rims dang bcas sam rims med ces brda bya'o//gal te rims dang bca so zhes zer na mi dbyen
349a6('dul ba): 'on te rims med ces smra na dbye bar bya'o//gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa bas lo ma ltar mnyan pa gzhag par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pas
349a7('dul ba): po ma ltar gnyen pa gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa/dge slong rnams kyis lo ma ltar mnyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
349b1('dul ba): slong dag lo ma lhur mnyon pa rno khyo yin te/de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o//dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'kho sa dang //
349b2('dul ba): gtsug lag khang sder mos brud cing /bshang ba dang gau cibs ma rung bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ngas dge slong khyi srel ba'i
349b3('dul ba): kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/dge slong khyi spel pas nang par sngar langs la/mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang byul bar bya ste/sder mos brud
349b4('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de bsnyam par bya'o//bshang ba dang gci ba yang phyag par bya'o//dge slong khyi srel pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcasra bzhin yang dag par blangs
349b5('dul ba): te/'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gtsug lag khang zhig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pa dang /ci tsam
349b6('dul ba): nade dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gzhan zhig 'ongs nas/nye dgas bsams pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed byed pa las gnas brtan gnyis
349b7('dul ba): par bya 'am/bdag gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro'o snyam ste/gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba dang /de'i gnas brtan
350a1('dul ba): gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de de'i dge 'dun gyi grwanas brtun gyi yin nas des bsams pa/bdag gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la bdag
350a2('dul ba): gi rnyed pa de na yang der zad na sprog sa med par dge 'dun gyi gnas brten gyis ci zhig bya zhes/de slar rig 'dri par gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang /gnas
350a3('dul ba): mal byed bsgos tsam na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas des smras pa/rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang 'dis shrIka/dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin
350a4('dul ba): to zhes ma bsgos pa dang /nye dgas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bsten pa nub par byed dam/dri rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gadrug
350a5('dul ba): lag khyung skos shig ces pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/gang zhig dge
350a6('dul ba): 'dun gyi 'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la/song ba zhig yin na/de'i ge nas ma lnga rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o//gzhan gyis ni grwar bab
350a7('dul ba): bzhin du'o//nye dgas lhags par chags par gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas/gtsug lag khang gnyis su dbyar
350b1('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas de/des dbyar gnas nas/rnyed pa mnos pa dang /cig nas kyang ma thob/cig shos nas kyang ma thob nas/gnas mal 'ged pa'i
350b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams la kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/des dbyar gnas par
350b3('dul ba): khas blangs pas de'i rnyed pa byin cig/dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gtsug
350b4('dul ba): lag khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o//gcig nas byin pa dang /dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/gzhogs 'phyas byed/kha zer bar byed
350b5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas nas/ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /pi tsam
350b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas byed phyed sbyin par bya ste/dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnyis su gnas par dam mi bca'o//
350b7('dul ba): dam bca' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//khyim bdag cig gi gtsug lag khang gnyis brtsig tu bcug ste/cig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyis yi no//
351a1('dul ba): cig+sa shas+t+ra ni grong mtha' pa rnams k+Sha rin no//khyim bdag de'i kun tu spyod pa ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong
351a2('dul ba): re re la ras yug chen re re bskon pa yin pas/de ras yug chen rnams khyer tedagon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khyeng du
351a3('dul ba): song ba dang /nye dgas dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed pa 'bul lo zhes thos nas/de dga' bo la spring pa/gal te 'di rnyed pa 'bul na skal
351a4('dul ba): pa nos shig ces smras nas/de rings par dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa'o ni gom stangs dang sbyar
351a5('dul ba): na dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang der song gis/da ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa las re shig grong mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du phul la/phyis 'dir 'bul lo
351a6('dul ba): snyam nas/de phyir log nas ras yug po che brim par brtsams pa na/dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang /khyim bdag gis ras yu go po che gcig byino//
351a7('dul ba): yang bzed pa dang /khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phags pa khyod la ras yug po che phul lags na/ci yang bzhed dam/des smras pa/khyim bdag khyod kyi
351b1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang du nye dwags dbyar gnas pas de'i skal pa nod do//khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag nas sbyin pa la bsngags pa
351b2('dul ba): mdzad pas/rang gi lag kho na nas 'bul lo//de skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/nye dgas bsams pa/khyim bdag de ring zhig thog na grong gi mthar ma song
351b3('dul ba): grang snyam du bsams nas/grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du song nas dga' bo la dris pa/tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi ras yug po che mnos sam/des ji ltar
351b4('dul ba): gyur pa smras so//khyim bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du song ste/ras yug po che brims nas song ngo //nye dgas yang slar dgon
351b5('dul ba): pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du brgyags na/ji tsam na ras yug po che rnams brims zin pa dang /des gtsug lag khang gnyis kyis rnyed pa la lhag par chags pa las
351b6('dul ba): rnyed pa las nyams nas/mya ngan byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags 'don to//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom
351b7('dul ba): ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa nye dga' lhag par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong
352a1('dul ba): dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang /lhag par chags pas zas par byas pa de nyon cig/dge slong
352a2('dul ba): dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs gnyis nu gtsug lag khang gnyis shig yod de/cig na ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'o//cig gshos na ni bsod snyoms pa rnams
352a3('dul ba): 'o//ci tsom na khyA gr-Id+d+hi'i sgra shes pa zhig sod de/de gAN+DI'i sgra thos nas/dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa song pa'i gtsug lag khang du song na/de la dge slong kha cig gi
352a4('dul ba): lhung bzed kyi lhag mo byin pa dang /de de zos nas bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/de yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos nas/dga' mgur 'gro'o//
352a5('dul ba): ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na bstod snyoms pa rnams la glo bur gyi rnyed pa zhig byung nas/de rnams kyis sngar gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /khye des gan+d+hi'i sgra thos nas/nu rgal ba
352a6('dul ba): brnams te/des dbus su phyin pa dang /dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa can gyi gtsug las khang gi gaN+DI yang berdungs nas de spro ba med nas slar log par brtsams pa las/de
352a7('dul ba): chu'i rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyi gaN+DI'i sgra shes pa gang yin pa de ni/nye ga'o/
352b1('dul ba): 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'dri lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to//da ltar yang lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to//dge
352b2('dul ba): slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lhag par chags par mi bya'o//byad na 'gal chebs can du 'gyur ro//sdom la/'thab dang nang pa rdzogs pa dang //nub mo'i dus
352b3('dul ba): dang ka shi dong //shing dang gsil ma 'dug gnas dang //cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/
352b4('dul ba): 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis/dge slong 'thab bkrol bgyid pa/'tshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/brtson par bgyid pa/bgyed par bgyid pa/rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid
352b5('dul ba): pa rnams mchi zhing de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas 'tho 'tsham pa'i slad du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid/dran par bgyid do zhes thos na/de rnams kyis de dag la
352b6('dul ba): ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/nye bar 'khor dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis/dge slong 'thab bkrol byed pa rnams 'ong ngo //zhes thos na gnas ma la bsgo/
352b7('dul ba): ba gsum dang gnas mal gzung ba drug bya'o//gnas mal bsko ba gsum gas zhe na/dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang /dbyar bgyi'o//gnas mal gzung na drug
353a1('dul ba): gang zhe na/gtsug ldag khang thams cad dang /gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang /khang phran thams cad dang /khang
353a2('dul ba): phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang /kun dga'i ra ba thams dang /kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o//gal te gtsug lag bskos shig/
353a3('dul ba): ces zer na/'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing /gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig zhe na/'di yang bskos zin no/khang phran skos shig ce na
353a4('dul ba): 'di yang bskos zin no//khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no//kun dga' ra bskos shig ce na/'di yang bskos zin no//kun
353a5('dul ba): dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor bskos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin te zhes brjod par bya'o//de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na/gang la nyes pa skyed par 'gyur/de nas
353a6('dul ba): bdo ba rnams med/phyir rgol ba rnams med/mi mdza' ba rnams myed nas/nga'i 'og tu rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du ga nas ma lo bskyo bar bya'o//bcom
353a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o//zhes gsungs pa dang /ji tsam na dge slong nad pa gcig cig yod pa de bas chos
353b1('dul ba): rkun bya dge slong nog 'ongs nus/rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnas khang pam+b+ha te/dri ni thams cad pas gzhon pas de'i gnas khang gzhan ni ma ba rga
353b2('dul ba): dge slong des dri la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gnas khang 'di kho bo'i yin par bskos kyis byung shig/des smras pa/bdag bro 'tshal bas nam sos pa na'o//dge slong
353b3('dul ba): de gtum po zhig pas des phyung nas/dang rar gzhag go/ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang la lta bar 'dod pa lhags pa de rnams kyis/dge slong de
353b4('dul ba): mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag ci dge slong 'di gum ljags sam/bzhin bzangs dag 'di shi ba ni mA yin no//'o na ci'i phyir 'dir bzhag/'di
353b5('dul ba): bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/'di'i grwa nas khang de de'i yin par bskos pa dang /des 'di phyung nas 'dir bzhag go/'phags pa dag bdag cag
353b6('dul ba): khyim pa lags kyang nad pa rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir/khyim nas mi 'byin na/khyed cag rab tu byung la/ston pa yang thugs rje can yin na/de ji ltar nad pa phyir
353b7('dul ba): 'byin par byed ces de rnams smod par byed gzhog 'phyes byed/kho zer bar byed pa'i skabs da dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang
354a1('dul ba): byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na//dge slong nud pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o//bcom
354a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas mjal to zhes byas nas/tsang mi skye bar 'dug
354a3('dul ba): go/tsi tsam na zhag drug grAm/mdun na gnas mal 'ged par 'gyur ba na/rkang pa rma byung ba ltar byas te/gos kyis dkris nas 'dug pa dang /gnas khang
354a4('dul ba): 'ged pa'i dge slong rnams kyis nad pa yin no snyam nas des gnas mal bskos so//de gnas mal bskos zin nas/rma'i g.yogs ma bor te 'dug go//
354a5('dul ba): nad pa la lta ba'i dge slong rnams kyis de la dris pa/ci gnas brtan zhabs spun sos sam/de smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed thams cad ni
354a6('dul ba): mI rtag pa'o zhes bka' ma stsal tam/ci kho bo'i nad rtag pa 'gyur ram/de rnams kyis smras pa/gnas brtan myur du smos par gyur pa/na bar skye
354a7('dul ba): ni ma btab grang /des smras pa/kho bo gnas khang sgo drung du bzhag par 'dod dam ci/dge slong don nyung ba rnams spyod par byed gzhigs 'phyas byed
354b1('dul ba): kha zer bar byed de/de ltar dge slong dag mi nu bzhin du gnas khang spang ba rang gis byed pa ci tha tshig ces pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das lnga gsol
354b2('dul ba): pa dang /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong de lta bas na sgyu 'debs pa'i nad pa la gzhi spang de sbyin par mi bya zhing /des rang gir yang
354b3('dul ba): mi bya'o//rang gir byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//lnga tshan rnams kyis bsdus pa'i sdom ni/mdun du 'dar dang rang khrims dang /ma chags pa dang de
354b4('dul ba): bzhin du//snang ba skyes dang byung ba dang //bar du gcod dang de bzhin du//phyi mar byas pa ltung ba ste//bsdus pa'i sdom du bsdus pa yin//par sdom ni/mdun du bya
354b5('dul ba): dang gzhan dang ying //nad dang gzhan rnams dag dang ni//sems can mang po phan bya ba/sna chen dag ni dang ba yin//bcom ldan 'das kyis//lha dang mi rnams
354b6('dul ba): lnga mdo sde drang ma mo gzhag go//klu rnams la ni mdo sde'o//'dul ba ni zab pa zab par snang ba mthing byar dka' ba/khong du chud par dka' ba/dgongs pa mang ba
354b7('dul ba): 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'thun pa yin na/dge slong rnams kyis 'dul ba zab pa nyid dang /dgongs pa mang ba nyid dang //'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'thun pa nyid
355a1('dul ba): yin pas/'dor bar mi smra'o//'drin chos nyid yin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bstan pa'i yan lag gang zhig yongs su
355a2('dul ba): nyams pa de'i bsngags pa lhag par brjod par mdzad pa yin pas/de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga'i 'dul
355a3('dul ba): ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/lnga gang zhe na/'khor bzhis mdun du 'dar ba yin/gdams ngag dang rje su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las
355a4('dul ba): pa dang 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi mdzod bsrung ba yin/dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan
355a5('dul ba): rnams kyi spyi bo la 'dug pa yin/dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /bslab pa'i ched kyi phyir skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde bar
355a6('dul ba): zhugs pa yin no//bar sdom ni/bdag nyid khrims ldan mngon par bsdu//'gyod pa dang ni bag tsho me de//chos dang 'phun das byed pa ste//lnga tshan gnyis/
355a7('dul ba): pa yin par bshad//gzhan yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/lnga gang zhe na 'di'i rang gi tshul khrimos kyi phung pos legs par
355b1('dul ba): bsrungs shing legs par sbas pa yin/'khor bzhis mngon snyam du bskul par bya bA yin/gang zag 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams kyis ston par gyur pa yin/dge 'dun gyi nang /
355b2('dul ba): na bag tsha ba med pas gnas pa yin/chos dang 'thun pas phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa yin no//bar sdom ni/ma 'dres don dang nges pa dang //bslab pa yi ni gzhi dag dang //
355b3('dul ba): snang ba dag ni gnyis po nyid//lnga tshan dag ni gsum pa yin//gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/lnga gang zhe na/don ma 'dres par srel ba
355b4('dul ba): yin/don rnam par gtan la dbab par bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin/de'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams legs par bzung ba yin/sems kyi snang ba skyes pas mang du gnas
355b5('dul ba): pa yin/skye bo phyi ma rnams kyi snang ba byed pa yin/sdom ni/snang ba gsal ba 'od dang ni//sems las chung dang mi stong pa'o//gzhan ying ga zag 'dul ba 'dzin
355b6('dul ba): pa la phan yon lnga yod de/lnga gang zhe na/phyogs gang na gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gnas pa'i phyogs dri ngas snang ba skyes pa dang gsal ba skyes pa dang /'od skyes
355b7('dul ba): bar mthong /phyogs de rang thugs khral chu ngur gnas/phyogs de ngas stong pa ma yin par mthong ngo //sdom ni/b+h+ring dang de nas bcas pa dang /rjes su bcas dang
356a1('dul ba): de bzhin du//bkag dang rjes su gnang ba ni//lnga mtshan lnga par byas pa'o//gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod du//
356a2('dul ba): lnga gang zhe na/zung ba shes/bcas pa shes/rjes su bcas pa shes/bkag pa shes/rjes su gnang ba shes pa yin no//sdom ni/byar chad bar chad ma yin
356a3('dul ba): dang //gdam ngag dang ni rjes bstan dang //slob ma'i mthu ni yod pa ste//lnga mtshan drug pa dag tu bshad//gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga
356a4('dul ba): yod de/lnga gang zhe na/bar du gcod pa rnams shes bar du gcod pa mA yin pa rnams shes/'doms par byed/rjes su ston par byed/lhan cig gan+d+he
356a5('dul ba): pa dang nye gnas rnams kyi gnas 'char 'jug nus so//sdom ni/ltung ba dang ni ltung ba min//lci dang yang dang de bzhin du/so sor thar pa rgyas par yang //gdon
356a6('dul ba): pa dag ni lha mtshan yin//gzhan yang glang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa yi phan yon sti yod do/lnga gang zhe na/ltung 'byung ba shes//ltung ba ma byung ba shes/
356a7('dul ba): shes/yang ba shes shing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa la rgyas par zhugs pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags yang /dge slong gnas
356b1('dul ba): brtan gnas brtan rnams/spro ba dang bcas pas/'dul ba gdon par brtsams so//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor 'dul ba'i gleng gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas pa rnams
356b2('dul ba): kyi mchog tu gyur na/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par byed par 'gyur ro//snyam ste/gus pas bsten par brtsams pas/de ska lus skya
356b3('dul ba): bo bseng bseng por gyur cing /rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang /na bas nyam dmas par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa
356b4('dul ba): ste/mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mi rmed/dus su rmed kyi dus las yol bar mi rmed/don dang ldan pa rmed kyi don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pa ste/sangs rgyas
356b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yin no//de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan
356b6('dul ba): par rmed pa la dus mkhyen pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong nye bar 'khor lus skye bo/
356b7('dul ba): bseng bseng por gyur cing /rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang na bas nyams dmas par gyur/des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsung
357a1('dul ba): bya/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis de thos nas/spro ba dang bcas pas/'dul ba gdon par brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa
357a2('dul ba): nye bar 'khor gyis/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par 'gyur ro//zhes gus pas bstan pa brtsams te/des na de lus skya bo bseng bseng
357a3('dul ba): por gyur cing rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas par gyur lags so//byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dog ngas lung
357a4('dul ba): 'brog pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam bzhir lung dbogs par bya ste/'chag pa dang 'greng ba dang
357a5('dul ba): 'dug pa dang nyal ba na'o//lung nod pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam pa gsum gyis lung nod par bya ste/gal te lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong chag par lung nod pa'i dge
357a6('dul ba): slong 'ongs la/gsar bu zhig pa yin na nges phyag byas la/khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/lus btud de sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri
357a7('dul ba): zhing lung mnod par bya'o//ji ste ches rgan pa zhig yin na des khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/lus btud de sems drag pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri
357b1('dul ba): zhing lung mnod par bya'o//ji ste 'greng ba na 'ongs la gsar bu zhig yin pa des phyag byas la/khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/stan chas dma' ba la tsog tsog por
357b2('dul ba): 'dug la/sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o//ji ste rgan pa zhig yin na/des khams snyoms sam zhes dris la/lus btud nas sems
357b3('dul ba): drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o//'greng ba la ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dug pa dang nyal ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o//lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis
357b4('dul ba): shin tu goms pa dang /legs par byang ba dang /the tsom med par byas nas/lung dbog par bya'o//lung nod pos kyang shin tu byang ba dang /shin tu zin pa dang /
357b5('dul ba): the tsom med par byas nas lung mnod par bya'o//lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong dang lung nod pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par
357b6('dul ba): blangs te/'jog par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na/gtsug lag khang zhig tu nub mo phyin nas/
357b7('dul ba): de rnams 'grogs bshes ji lta ba bzhin du/dge slong rnams kyis ngal sor bcug pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dug ste ci byed/gnas
358a1('dul ba): mal bsko ba bos shig/de dag gis smras pa ci dgos/gnas mal skor gzhug mod/de rnams kyis smras pa/gnas mal yod
358a2('dul ba): kyis bde bar nyol cig dang /nam nangs nas bgo'o//de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ci khyed cag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed
358a3('dul ba): dam/gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal smros shig/de rnams kha stobs can yin pas gnas mal ska ba bred nas gnas
358a4('dul ba): mal bskos pa dang /drug sde de rnams kyis rgan rims bzhin du gnas mal mnos te nya'o//ji tsam gzhon rims kyi bar du sko ba de'i bar du nam nangs so//drug
358a5('dul ba): sde rnams myur ba myur bar langs te smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal bsdus shig 'dong ngo //dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis
358a6('dul ba): nu'i gcig gi phyir/dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dge nub mo mtho tsam 'am/kye ma'o//khyed cag 'di nyid du 'dug shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/dga' dzin
358a7('dul ba): dge' mnyan yod du 'dong ngo //'di dag ni rlung nad can yin no zhes byas nas de skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa dang /byung ba 'di
358b1('dul ba): la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/nub mo gnas mal bsgo bar mi bya'o//gal te nub mo lhags na 'grogs bshes ci lta ba bzhin//
358b2('dul ba): du so sor del sor gzhug par bya'o//yul zhig nas dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs na de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par sngar lang
358b3('dul ba): te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod
358b4('dul ba): snyoms la zhugs te/de bsod snyoms spyod pa dro bab tu nye nas de nyid du ra ba zhig gi drung du 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsams so//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang
358b5('dul ba): mchod rten la phyag 'tshal zhing lam de nas song ba las des de mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa kun nas mdzes pa'i stan pa las rab tu byung ba yin na mi rigs po mdzad
358b6('dul ba): dmA ci/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dro la bab tu nye ba ma mthong ngam 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod/des smras pa/khyod ci'i slad du bdag gi khyim du mi byon//khyod
358b7('dul ba): kyi ming ci/mgon med zas sbyin no//kho bos mdo sde de dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi khyod kyang mi shes la khyim yang mi
359a1('dul ba): shes so//khyim bdagra mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/dge slong 'di ni lam ring po nas 'ongs la rgyus mi shes pa zhig yin te/
359a2('dul ba): gdon mi za bar bdag kyang mi shes la bdag gi khyim yang mi shes kyis/'di lta bu la ji ltar byas na rung ba/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/gang yang mnyan yod
359a3('dul ba): nus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bya'o snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das glang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das
359a4('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan
359a5('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge slong glo bur pa spyod yul ma 'tshal bzhin bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro yol tu nye nas ra ba zhig gi drung du g.yar zas kyi bgyi ba bgyid de
359a6('dul ba): ma dad pa rnams yan lag 'dis 'phags pa rnams la smo par 'gyur ro//gral te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu
359a7('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bgyi ste/gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der bsod snyoms longs spyad par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan
359b1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnas gis brtsigs shig/des gang yang mnyan yod nas/rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du byasta
359b2('dul ba): glaganas dag brtsigs nas dge slong gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der zas kyi bya ba byed do//dge slong gzhan dag chus phongs par gyur nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
359b3('dul ba): gyis der khron pa brkos nas/tshe ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum gyis shing rta dkang ste btab pas/chu dero phun sum tshogs par gyur to//zhes 'jig rten thams cad du glu
359b4('dul ba): pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas lhags byas/dge slong rnams kyis bgags pa dang /mnyan yod na gnas pa rnams kyis smrasmra pa/'phags pa khyed cag la bdag cag gis
359b5('dul ba): yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis na/chab 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong khyed 'gog par mdzad dam zhes pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom
359b6('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dgag par mi bya'o//bud med dge slong rnams la chu slong ba nA dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas/
359b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sbyin par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med ni kun nas zhags pa ste/bdud kyi 'ching ba yin no zhes gsungs pas/
360a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams bud med la chu sbyin par byed pa na chags par gyu /man blud mod byang bzhin dang lang tsas rgyags pa zhig dag slong gan/
360a2('dul ba): nu zhig la shin tu chags pas de la chu blangs pa dang /de yang de la chags pas/bcings pa'i sems kyis slar bzlog kyang rgyun ma bcad par bsrugs te/de yang
360a3('dul ba): del rtog bzhin 'thungs pa las chu de glor song nas shi'o//don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/gzhog 'phyas byed//ba zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/dge
360a4('dul ba): spyod rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol padrung /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ stsal pa/byung myong gang zhig chags bas bcings pa'i sems
360a5('dul ba): kyis/dge slong la chu skyong ba de lta rang gis sbyin par mi bya'o//bud med la chu rgyun ma chad par sbyin par mi bya zhing snyim pa khong la 'thung shig ces bsgo la/
360a6('dul ba): skyangs su bcud+ma ts+l-i thugs par bya'o//gzhan dun 'gal ldan pa can du 'gyu /'dul ba gzhin/bam badzin bdun pa//de'i tshe gang dag
360a7('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyi thog me/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbul ba rnams kyis de nyid du dbul bar brtsams pa drug sde rnams kyis thos nas de rnams bsti gnas
360b1('dul ba): dong 'dug nas/bsod snyoms kyi thog myur khyer te 'ong ba gang yin pa de la rmas te gal te 'o thug yin na ni lhung bzed zad par byed de/ci ste chu thugs yin na ni rdzu 'phrul
360b2('dul ba): chen po'i dge 'dun dang /mthu chen po'i dge 'dun la phul cig ces smra'o//de bzhin du hwags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa la yang sbyor bar bya ste/don nyung ba'i dge
360b3('dul ba): slong rnams smod par byed/gzhog phyas byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das
360b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la khe brngam mi bya'o//kha brngam byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gzhan
360b5('dul ba): gyi rnyed pa la mkha brnga ma mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong kha cig dgos pa zhig la gtsug lag khang gzhan du ngo ngo ste/de rnams der phyin pa na dro la bab kyang 'gyod pas
360b6('dul ba): longs ma spyad pa'i skabs do/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ched du bsams te
360b7('dul ba): 'gro bar mi bya'o//ma bsams par 'ongs pa las gal te dro la bab par gyur na longs spyad par bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//phongs pa dang bcas pa'i dus byung
361a1('dul ba): ba na dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ba las don dge slong de rnams longs spyod pa mthong nas yang bza' bar 'dod pa las 'gyod pa las
361a2('dul ba): longs mi spyod pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gtsug lag khang snga mar
361a3('dul ba): de blangs lo de yang gal te tshad med pa zhig tu 'drim na blang bar bya'o//ji ste dge slong tshad yod par byas pa zhig yin na blang bar mi bya'o//len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
361a4('dul ba): ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ri nag po la gshegs so//de'i tshe ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis
361a5('dul ba): gnas te/de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dge slo nga gi dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs shing 'dir gshegs
361a6('dul ba): par 'gyur ro zhes thos so//thos nas kyang bsams pa/ston pa'i spyan sngar dge slong ngo tsha med pa dang /'dzem pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag la gleng bar byed dran
361a7('dul ba): par byed par 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen po gcig ma gtogs pa dge slong rnams las brtsams te/gnas
361b1('dul ba): mal bsko ba gsum dang /gnas mal gzung ba yang drug bya'o//gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang dbyar bgyi'o//gnas mal gzung ba drug
361b2('dul ba): gang zhe na/gtsug lag khang thams cad dang /gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang /khang phran thams cad dang /khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang
361b3('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba thams cad dang /kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o//gal te gtsug lag khang skos shig ces smras pa dang 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod
361b4('dul ba): par bya zhing khang phran skos shig ce na/'di yang bskos zin no//gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor bskos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no//khang phran gyi nye 'khor bsgos
361b5('dul ba): shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no//kun dga' ra bskos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no//kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod
361b6('dul ba): par bya ste/de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na ngo tsha med pa/'dzem pa med par bdag cag la gleng bar mi 'gyur ro//snyam nas/de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba
361b7('dul ba): gsum dang /gnas mal gzung ba drug byas so//ci tsam na bcom ldan 'das ri nag po la gshegs na de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ni snga nas
362a1('dul ba): bsdogs zin to//dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal dang /gtsug lag khang smyos shig/de gnyis kyis smras pa/
362a2('dul ba): gtsug lag khang sngar bskos zin no//khang phran skos shig de yang bskos zin no//gtsug khang gi nye 'khor skos shig de yang bskos zin no//khang phra ni gyi nye 'khor
362a3('dul ba): skos shig de yang bskos zin no//kun dga' ra ba skos shig de yang bskos zin no//kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor bskos shig de yang bskos zin no//gang gi phyir
362a4('dul ba): de gnyis kyis gnas thams cad ma bskos pa dang /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po byung ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen
362a5('dul ba): bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par marmed/dus su rmed kyi/dus las yol bar mi rmed/don dang ldan pa rmed kyi/don dang
362a6('dul ba): mi ldan pa mi rmed pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa mi yin pa rmed pa la chu lon+da gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
362a7('dul ba): 'das rnams don dang ldan pa rmed pa de la dus mkhyen pa yin pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/kun dga' bo kun
362b1('dul ba): dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen por grags pa 'di ci zhig yin/des gsol pa/dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas
362b2('dul ba): mal bsgo ba gsumo dang /gnas mal gzung ba drug bgyis nas/dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal ma thob par gyur te/des na kun dga' ra ba'i nang na/skye bo'i tshogs
362b3('dul ba): chen po'i sgra mthon po dang /sgra chen po 'di grags lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ngas 'thab bkrol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la
362b4('dul ba): dgongs nas gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang /gnas mal gzung ba drug mdzad kyi/rang bzhin du gnas pa la ni ma yin pas/de lta bas ni dge slong rnams kyis rang
362b5('dul ba): bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las brtsams te/gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang /gnas mal gzung ba drug mi bya'o//byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
362b6('dul ba): ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/grong med pa'i dgon pa zhig tu nub
362b7('dul ba): mo dgongs btab bo//drug sde rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir shing bzang po zhig bzhag nas/shing bzang po gzhan ni rang rang gis bzung ngo //dge slong
363a1('dul ba): gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis na/shing khong stong ngag zom pa//kau sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/dpung gi tshogs yan lag/
363a2('dul ba): bzhi dang chus te bsu nas/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la brtags ni/ji tsam na drug
