394b6('dul ba): bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa/'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o//chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang /chos gang dang /
394b7('dul ba): 'dul ba gang gis rtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang /chos de dang /'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa de ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o//gal te
395a1('dul ba): mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis/rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/de rnams kyis rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong
395a2('dul ba): nyid la gtad par bya'o//rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gis/gnas gang na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba 'am/shes nyan can shes nyen can gang yang
395a3('dul ba): rung ba'am/gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa de la gtad par bya zhing /rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin las brjod par bya ste/gnas brtan dag gson cig/rtsod pa
395a4('dul ba): 'di ni gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas/dus 'di srid cig lon te/rtsod pa de skom la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bor byed ma nus nas/de rnams
395a5('dul ba): kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa dang dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas/des kyang dge slong gsal ba rnams bskos pa las/dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/de
395a6('dul ba): rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba bskos pa las/dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/de rnams kyis dge 'dun
395a7('dul ba): la gtad pa las/dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos nas/bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbeng ba ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/rtsod pa
395b1('dul ba): 'di gnas brtan dang bcas/so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad pa las/gnas brtan dang bcas/so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis/zhi bar ma spyod
395b2('dul ba): nas/des kyang bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtad nas/bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/rtsod pa 'di mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang /
395b3('dul ba): ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad pa dang /mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang /ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/de rnams kyis kyang bdag dge slong rtsod pa
395b4('dul ba): sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtang nas/bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan la 'bul na/gnas brtan gyis 'di nas
395b5('dul ba): bzung ste/rtsod pa 'di ji tsam gyis mthar phyin kyi bar du zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o//ngas dge slong gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar
395b6('dul ba): bya ste/dge slong gnas brtan gyis rgol ba dang /phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams so shing stobs na bdag gir mi bya ste/bo'o lci ba stobs na mi yin/'dug tshal
395b7('dul ba): stobs na ma yin zhing /gdon pa dang 'dri ba yang byed mo gzhug ste/gzhan du na mdun nam rgyab tu 'dug nas/tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag ma 'thab shig/
396a1('dul ba): mtshang mu 'du shig/'thab mo ma byed cig/ma 'gyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyi 'on kyang cig
396a2('dul ba): rgyal cig 'pham par 'gyuraro//'byed pa la gnyis kau rgyal ba med kyi/'on kyang cig rgyal cig 'pham par 'gyu ro zhes bya zhing /dge slong gnas brtan gyis ston pa'i
396a3('dul ba): bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o//dge slong gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa do zhi bar byas nu/legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya'o//dge slong dag
396a4('dul ba): de ltar na/mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /de ltar na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste//mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod
396a5('dul ba): pazhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang /zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba yino//dge slong dag gang tshul shing mang po blang ba ni/rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ji ltar 'di na kha cig
396a6('dul ba): gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rjod pa zhi bar byed pas/dul ba dang /zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/skam la gnas pa nas
396a7('dul ba): bzung ste/gnas brtan gyi bar gong ma bzhin du ste/gal te dge slong gnas brtan gyis/rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/rtsod pa de rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong de nyid
396b1('dul ba): la gtad par bya'o//des kyang rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par bya'o//dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bas zhi bar bya'o//rgyud lnga las gang
396b2('dul ba): tshul shing mang po len pa'i rtsod pa zhi ba ni/rtsub pa dang /gdug pa dang /dam po dang /dbye ba'i bsam pa dang /sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yino//rtsub pa ji
396b3('dul ba): lta bu zhe na/rgol ba dang /phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyiste/rtsub po rab tu bzung ba yin te/de ltar na rtsub btsan yin//gdug pa ji lta bu zhe na/rgol ba dang
396b4('dul ba): phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams gdug pa dang rnam par gnon pa yin te/de ltar na gdug pa can yino//dam po ji lta bu zhe na/rgol ba deng phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams
396b5('dul ba): kyis dam por rab tu bzung ba yin te/de ltar na dam po can yino//dbye ba'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na/dbye bar byed pa'i bzhi bcu bzhi las 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi
396b6('dul ba): gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shin tu rab tu gzung ba yin te/de ltar na dbye ba'i bsam pa can yino//sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/skam la gnas
396b7('dul ba): pa nas bzung nas/gnas brtan gyi bar gyis te/de ltar na sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin te/chos 'di lnga dang ldan pas na/gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i
397a1('dul ba): zhi ba ni rngub pa dang /gdug pa dang /dam po dang /dbye ba'i bsam pa/sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yino//des na tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge
397a2('dul ba): slong bsko bar bya ste/chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'drim par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o//bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o//lnga gang zhe na/'dun pas 'gro ba
397a3('dul ba): dang /zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /tshul shing brims pa dang ma brims pa mi shes pa ste/chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i
397a4('dul ba): dge slong tshul shing 'drim par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o//bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o//chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'drim par ma bsgos pa ni bsko
397a5('dul ba): bar bya'o//bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o//lnga gang zhe na/'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /zhe sdang bris mi 'gro ba dang /gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas mi
397a6('dul ba): 'gro ba dang /tshul shing brims pa dang /mA brims pa shes pa ste/chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'drim par ma bskos pa ni besgo bar bya'o//bskos pa ni
397a7('dul ba): dbyung bar mi bya'o//tshul shing brims pa ni bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sba ba dang /mngon pa dang /rna drung du ba shub pa dang bcas pa dang /dge 'dun thams cad pa'o//
397b1('dul ba): ba'i tshul shing brims pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te gnas 'di na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po dag ni chos
397b2('dul ba): ma yin pa s+phu la/dge slong gsar bu nyung zad ci ba ni chos smra bas/gal te bdag gis tshul shing mngon par brims nas/dge slong gsar bu dge slong gnas brtan
397b3('dul ba): rnams kyi rje su byed pa rnams chos ma yin par tshul shing rab tu mang po ldan par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod kyis/ma li bdag gis tshul shing smras te brimo
397b4('dul ba): snyam nas/de tshul shing sbas nas/'drim pa ste/'di ni sba ba'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes bya'o//mngon pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul shing
397b5('dul ba): 'drim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/gnas 'di na dge slong ga nas brtan rab tu mang po dag ni chos sgra la/dge slong gser bu nyung zad cig ni chos ma yin pa smra bas/
397b6('dul ba): gal te bdag gi tshul shing sbas te brims na/dge slong gsar bu rnams/chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod kyis/ma la bdag gis tshul
397b7('dul ba): shing mngon pa ra brim mo//bdag gis tshul shing gsal bar bri mas na/dge slong gsar bu dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyi rje su byed pa rnams chos kyi tshul shing rab tu
398a1('dul ba): mang po len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/de tshul shing mngon par 'drim pa ste/'di ni mngon pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes
398a2('dul ba): bya'o//rna drung du ba shub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong gis rna drung du gtugs te ba shubs la/tshe dang
398a3('dul ba): ldan pa khyod kyis mkhan pos chos kyis tshul shing blangs kyis/khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing long shig/khyod kyi slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang /slob
398a4('dul ba): dpon gcig pa dang /gtam 'dres pa dang //phebs pa smra ba dang /spros 'drin pa dang /'grogs bshes kyis chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyis khyod kyis kyang chos
398a5('dul ba): kyi tshul shing long shig ces smra ba ste/'di ni rna drung du ba shub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes bya'o//dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa gang
398a6('dul ba): zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/gnas 'di ni dge slong nad pa rab tu mang bas/gal te bdag gis dge 'dun ma 'tshogs
398a7('dul ba): shing /ma 'dus par tshul shing brims na/dge slong rab tu mang pos chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod kyis/ma le bdag gis
398b1('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang /tshul shing brims par bya'o snyam nas/de dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang /tshul shing 'drim pa ste/'di ni
398b2('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes bya'o//chosde ma yin po'i tshul shing len pa bcu dang /chos kyi bcu'o//chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/
398b3('dul ba): chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa dang /mi mthun pa tshul shing len pa dang /chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa dang /'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa
398b4('dul ba): dang /sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa dang /rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi snun pas tshul shing len pa dang /tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye yang ci ma rung
398b5('dul ba): snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang /tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam nas tshul shing len pa dang /tshul shing blangs
398b6('dul ba): pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa dang /tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po dag/chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin
398b7('dul ba): du tshul shing len po'o//'dul ba gzhi///bam po don dgu pa//chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/'dul ba dang 'thun pa ma yin pas tshul shing
399a1('dul ba): len pa ste/de lta bu ni chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa yin no//mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/dge 'dun mi mthun pas tshul shang
399a2('dul ba): len pa ste/de lta bu ni mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa yin//chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/bsdam par bya ba dang /bshags par bya ba
399a3('dul ba): yin no snyam nas/tshul shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa yin//'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/'phya
399a4('dul ba): bar byed pa'i bzhi bcu bzhi las/'bye bar byed pa'i bzhi gang yang rung ba zhig/legs par shin tu rab tu bzung ba de lta bu ni/dge 'dun 'bye ba'i bsam pas//tshul
399a5('dul ba): shing len pa yin no//sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas/tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/skam la gnas pa ma yin pa nas bzung nas/gnas brtan gyi ma yin pa zhes
399a6('dul ba): bya ba'i bar du ste/de lta bu'i sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa yin no//rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi snyan pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/dge slong mdo sde
399a7('dul ba): 'dzin pa dang /'dul bya 'dzin pa dang /ma mo 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la rten dang /kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ste/de rnams la ma brtags par tshul
399b1('dul ba): shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni rten kha lo sgyur ba dang /mi snun pas tshul shing len pa yin//tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snum pas tshul shing len
399b2('dul ba): pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyud kyang ci ma rung zhes de snyam du bsams nas/tshul shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas/
399b3('dul ba): dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin//tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin par gyur kyang ci me rung snyam pas chu
399b4('dul ba): shing len po ji lta bu zhe nA/tshul shing blangs pas/dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas/'jug par 'gyur yang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len
399b5('dul ba): pa ste/de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin//tshul shing blangs pas
399b6('dul ba): dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin de ltar bsams
399b7('dul ba): nas/tshul shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas/dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len po yino//tshul shing blangs pas dag
400a1('dul ba): slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shi len pa ji lta bu zhe na/tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang
400a2('dul ba): chos ma yin pa blangs nas 'jug par 'gyur bar shes shing /de ltar bsams nas tshul shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas/dge slong rab tu mang
400a3('dul ba): po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ste/'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu yin no//chos kyi tshul shing len pa
400a4('dul ba): bcu gang zhe na/chos kyis tshul shing len pa dang /'thun pas tshul shring len pa dang /chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa dang /mi 'bye ba'i
400a5('dul ba): bsam pas tshul shing len pa dang /sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa dang /rten kha lo sgyur ba dang snun pas tshul shing len pa dang //tshul shing blangs
400a6('dul ba): pra dge 'dun 'bye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang /tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po ches ma yin par smra bar mi gyur kyang tsa ma
400a7('dul ba): rung snyam pas/tshul shing len pa dang /tshul shing blangs pas/dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa dang /tshul shing blangs pas dge
400b1('dul ba): spyo rab tu mang ba rgyas ma yin pa sgyu bar 'gyur ba m+b+ha shes pas tshul shing len pa yin//chos kyis tshul shing lon pa ji lta gu zh-in+tu/'dul ba dang 'thun pas tshul shang la
400b2('dul ba): pa ste/de lta bu ni chos kyis tshul shing len pa yin//'thun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/dge 'dun 'thun pas tshul shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni 'thun pas
400b3('dul ba): tshul shing len pa yin//chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas/tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/bsdam par bya ba ma yin pa dang /bshags par bya ba ma
400b4('dul ba): yin snum bsnams nas/rgyul shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni chung ba zlas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa yin//mi 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing lon pa jis
400b5('dul ba): bu zhe na/'bye bar byed pa'i bzhi bcu bzhi las 'bye bar byed po'i bzhi gang yang rung ba legs pa re shin tu rab tu ma bzung ba s+ho/de lta bu ni mi 'bye ba'i bsam pas
400b6('dul ba): tshul shing 'on pa yin//sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pos tshulo shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/sgyum la gnas pa nas bzung nas/gnas brnyan gyi bar gyis te/de lta bu ni sbyor
400b7('dul ba): po gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa yin//rten kha lo sgyur ba dang ston pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /'dul ba'i dzin pa //
401a1('dul ba): ma mo 'dzin pa gang drag yin pa de dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la rten dang kha lo sbyar ba zhes bya ste/rnams la brtags nas tshul shing len pa de lta
401a2('dul ba): bu ni rten kha lo sgyur ba dang snun pas tshul shing len pa yin//tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas//tshul shing len pa ji lta bu
401a3('dul ba): zhe na/tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/de lta bu na tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun phye
401a4('dul ba): bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas/tshu la shing len pa yino//tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas/
401a5('dul ba): tshul shing len pa dri lta bu zhe na/tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs te 'jug par ma gyur kyang ci mi rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa
401a6('dul ba): ste/de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas/dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin//tshul shing blangs pas
401a7('dul ba): dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes shing de ltar mi sems pas
401b1('dul ba): tshul shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas/dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas/tshul shing len pa yino//tshul shing blangs pas/dge slong rab tu mang
401b2('dul ba): pa chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas/tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/tshul shing blangs pas/dge slong rab tu mapo rma ma yin pa blangs nas/spyod par mi shes
401b3('dul ba): shing de ltar mi sems pas/tshul shing len pa ste/de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas/dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba ri mi shes pas/tshul shing
401b4('dul ba): len pa ste/'di ni chos kyi tshul shing len pa bcu yino//ngas dge slong tshul shing 'drim pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/dge slong tshul shing 'drim pas/tshul
401b5('dul ba): shing rnam par gnyis bsham par bya ste/chos kyi tshul shing dang che sa ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngo //chos kyi tshul shing rnams ni yaM ye med pa/kyag kyog med pa/kyang
401b6('dul ba): klor med pa/kha dog bzang ba/reg nu badra bar bya'o//chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams ni/ya yo dang /kyag kyog dang /kyar kyo R+Ya dang /kha dog dran pa dang /reg na mi
401b7('dul ba): bde bar bya'o//de nas dge slong tshul shing 'drim pos lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi tshul shing rnams blangs la/g.yon pas chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams blangs nas/
402a1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/chos kyi tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa dang /chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa
402a2('dul ba): ma yin pa brjod par bya ste/gnas brtan 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing lags te/ya yo ma mchis pa/kyag kyog ma mchis pa/kyar kyor ma mchis pa/kha dog bzang
402a3('dul ba): ba/reg na bde ba lags kyis bzhes shig/'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lags te/ya yo dang /kyag kyog dang /kyar kyor dang /kha dog ngan pa reg na
402a4('dul ba): mi bde ba lags na bzhes shig/gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de log su lag pa zed na/tshig dang po la yang sbyin par mi bya/gnyis pa la yang
402a5('dul ba): sbyin par mi bya/gsum pa la yang sbyin par bya ste/dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyis 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o//de bzhin
402a6('dul ba): du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar b+hi mdun du 'dug nas/ches kyi tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa dang /chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa
402a7('dul ba): brjod par bya ste/'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing lags te/ye yo ma mchis pa/kyeg kyog ma mchis pa/kyar kyor ma mchis pa/kha dog bzang ba/reg na
402b1('dul ba): bde ba lags kyis bzhes shig/'di dag na chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lags te/ya yo dang /kyag kyog dang /kyar kyor dang /kha dog ngan pa reg na mi bde ba lags na
402b2('dul ba): bzhes shig/gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de log smra lag pa zed na/tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya/gnyis pa la sbyin par mi bya/gsum pa la sbyin
402b3('dul ba): par bya ste/de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bus 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshegs par bya'o//grol te chos kyi tshul shing nyung por gyur na/kun shes
402b4('dul ba): ko'u di n+ya'i tshul shing blang bar bya'o//gal te chos kyi tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur na yang /de lta na 'di lta ste/chos kyi rtsod pa de nye bar zhi ba yinano//de ltar
402b5('dul ba): rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la gal te 'ga' zhig skyo sngogs byed ni/ltung byed du 'gyur//de bzhin du gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur na yang
402b6('dul ba): de ltar na 'di lta ste/chos ma yin pas rjod pa de zhi bar byas pa yin//de ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la 'ga' zhig skyo sgyogs byed na nyes bya su 'gyuraro//de ltar gang tshul
402b7('dul ba): shi mang po blang ba rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing //de ltar na 'di ni kha cig gis rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba
403a1('dul ba): dang /zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba yin no//dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa las/rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa gnyis kyis dul bar bya/zhi bar bya/nye bar
403a2('dul ba): zhi bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /gang tshul shing mang po blang ba so//dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i
403a3('dul ba): chos gsum gyis dul bar bya zhi bar bya/nye bar zhi bar bya'o//gsum gang zhe na/mngon sum du 'dul ba dang /dran pas 'dul ba dang /ma myos pas 'dul ba'o//
403a4('dul ba): dge slong dag ji ltar na mngon sum gyis 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ji ltar na ni 'di ni kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod
403a5('dul ba): pa zhi bar byed pas/dul ba dang /zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas/gnas brtan gyi bar gyis gong ma bzhin du ste/dge slong dag
403a6('dul ba): de ltar mngon sum du 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas
403a7('dul ba): dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin//dge slong dag ji ltar na dran pas 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lto ste/dran
403b1('dul ba): pas 'dul ba'i rtsod pa rnams zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/dper na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur pa
403b2('dul ba): btab pa de la dge slong rnams gleng bar byed de/gzhi des gleng ba na ngo che'o zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
403b3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dge slong dag khyed kyis byad ba nor dang gzhan ang de lnga bu dang 'thun pa su yang rung ba la dan pas 'dul brda thos pa bin cig/srin pa ni 'di ltar
403b4('dul ba): sbyin par bya ste/gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/dge 'dus thams cad tsha bas shing 'thun par gyur
403b5('dul ba): pa dang /gyad bu nor gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/rgan rims dri l+ya ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la/rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dag nas thal mo sbyar tote/
403b6('dul ba): tshig 'di skad ces dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/bdag gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur pa btab pas bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi
403b7('dul ba): des gleng bar bgyid de/bdag la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/dge 'dun btsun po thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar
404a1('dul ba): bzung ste/bdag gyad du nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o//de nas dge slong cig gis gsol
404a2('dul ba): ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur pa btab pas 'di la/dge slong rnams
404a3('dul ba): gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na//
404a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /'di ltar dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la/dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad do//'di ni gsol ba'o//las bya ba ni nga
404a5('dul ba): 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur pa btab pas/'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar
404a6('dul ba): bgyid de/'di la gzhi des blang bar bgyid pa na/dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol
404a7('dul ba): bar mdzad na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig//
404b1('dul ba): 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis pa dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o//dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis gyad
404b2('dul ba): bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/'di ltar cing mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum dang chos kyi
404b3('dul ba): gsum//chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba smin pa gsum gang zho na/'di ltasadage slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byed ba de la dge slong nan dis gleng bar byed
404b4('dul ba): cing /de la gzhi des gleng bar byed na/dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba gsode la dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas
404b5('dul ba): 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni bsnyil bar 'os pa'i phyir//'di lta sku/dge slong dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed dang /so sor bshags pa
404b6('dul ba): dang nyes byos kyi lhung ba de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing //de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa ni/dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/dge
404b7('dul ba): 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/chos ma yin po'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni bshags pa re 'os pa'i phyir ro//'di
405a1('dul ba): lta ste/dge slong bye ma skyes/smyos sems 'khrugs tshor bas nyen te sgren mor byung nas/dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa mang
405a2('dul ba): du spyad/smras bsal nas/kha chu zags/mig dgrong bzhin gyur te/gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du shes/pha rol gyis ma smras par smras
405a3('dul ba): snyam du sheso//dus gzhan zhig na des rang gi sems slar sor chud pa dang //de la gzhi des dge slong rnams gleng bar byed cig/de la gzhi nges gleng bar byed pa na//
405a4('dul ba): dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe
405a5('dul ba): na/de ni ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i phyiraro//'di lta ste/dge slong bzhi can dge 'dun gyis nang du ltung ba nyid shes pa las brjed nas phyis dran te/shes
405a6('dul ba): bya las yang brjed pa dang /dbye 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba byin pa ni/chos mi yin pas dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni de'i
405a7('dul ba): ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhugs par 'os pa'i phyir te/'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum yin//chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin po gsum gang zhe na
405b1('dul ba): 'di lta ste/gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mo bden pas skur pa btab pa de la/dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing /de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/
405b2('dul ba): dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin//'di lta ste/dge slong zhig
405b3('dul ba): la ltung ba gzhan kho na zhig byung bar gyur pa de la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi gzhan gyis gleng bar byed cing /de la gzhi des glong bar byed/na/dge 'dun las dran pas
405b4('dul ba): 'dul ba gsol te/dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yino//'di lta ste/dge slong zhig pa ltung ba byung bar gyur la nges
405b5('dul ba): de dge slong gi mdun du bshags pa'am byin gyis brlabs por gyur pa de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing /de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/dge
405b6('dul ba): 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba byin pa ni/chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/gsum po 'di dag ni
405b7('dul ba): chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no//dge slong dag de ltar na dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /de ltar na 'di ni kha cig gi rtsod
406a1('dul ba): pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin//dge slong dag ji ltar na ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byung ba yin/
406a2('dul ba): ltar na 'dri na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba deng zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste
406a3('dul ba): dge slong bye ma skyes smos/sems 'khrugs tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad/sgras brtsal
406a4('dul ba): nas//bo chu thogs mig gyur/bzhin gyur te/gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log snyam du shes/pha rol gyis ma smras par smraso snyam du shaso//dus gzhan zhig na
406a5('dul ba): des rang gi sems sor chud pa dang //de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed de/de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/dge 'dun la me myos pas 'dul ba gsol
406a6('dul ba): ba'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong bye me skyes dang /
406a7('dul ba): gzhan yang de lta bu dang 'thun pa su yang rung ba la/ma myos pas 'dul ba byin cig/sbyin pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/gnas mal bshamos la gaN+DI brdungaso te/dris pa'i
406b1('dul ba): tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang /dge slong bye ma skyes kyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/
406b2('dul ba): rgan pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la/rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste/thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad cese/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol
406b3('dul ba): bdag dge slong bye ma skyes myos/sems 'khrugs tshor bsra nyen nas sgren mo re byung ste/dge slong gi tshul ma yin pas rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa/mang du spyad smras/brtsal
406b4('dul ba): bas kha chu zags/mig gyur/bzhin gyur to/gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis lo go snyam du 'tshal/pha rol gyis ma smras par smraso snyam du 'tshal ba las/dus
406b5('dul ba): gzhan zhig na bdag sems sor chud pa dang /bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing //bdag la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/dge 'dun la ma myos pas
406b6('dul ba): 'dul ba gsol na/dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/bdag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma myos pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/de skad
406b7('dul ba): la ni gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o//de nas dge slong cig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun po rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong bye ma skyes 'di
407a1('dul ba): smyos/sems 'khrugs/tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/rjesu 'thun pa ma lags pa/mang du spyad/sgras brtsal
407a2('dul ba): nas/khe chu zags/mig gyur/bzhin gyur te/gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log snyam du 'tshal/pha rol gyis ma smras par smras snyam du 'tshal po las/dus
407a3('dul ba): gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gi sems sor chud pa dang /'di la dge slong rnams gzhi desna gleng bar bgyid cing /'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/dge 'dun la ma myos pas
407a4('dul ba): 'dul ba gsol na/gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye me skyes la ma
407a5('dul ba): myos pas 'dul ba bstsol bar mdzad do//'di ni gsol ba'o//las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong bye me skyes 'di myos/sems 'khrugs
407a6('dul ba): tshor bas nyen nus sgren mor byung ste/dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/rje su 'thun pa ma lags pa/mang du spyad smras/brtsal nas kho chu zogs/mig gyur bzhin gyur te/
407a7('dul ba): gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du 'tshal/pha rol gyis ma smras par smraso snyam du 'tshal ba las dus gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gi sems sor chung ba dang /
407b1('dul ba): 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing /'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/dge 'dun lam myos pas 'dul ba gsol te/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis/dge
407b2('dul ba): slong bye ma skyesnre la ma myos pas 'dul ba stsal bar mdzad na//tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong bye ma skyes la/ma myos pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad pa bzod pa de dag na
407b3('dul ba): ma gsung shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis pa dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o//dge
407b4('dul ba): 'dun gyis bzod cing gnad nas/dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la/ma myos pas 'dul ba stsal legs te/'di ltar cang me gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//
407b5('dul ba): chos ma yin pa'i ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os par sbyin pa gcig dang /chos kyi gcig go/chos mi yin pa'i gcig gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong ma smyos par bdag
407b6('dul ba): ni sgyuso//sems mA 'khrugs par sems 'khrug so//snyam du shes pa dang /dge 'dun gyi de la ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni/chos ma yin pa'i ma myos pas
407b7('dul ba): 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa yin te/'di ni chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin//chos kyi go cog gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong bye ma skyes myos sems 'khrugs/tshor ba
408a1('dul ba): nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad/smras brtsal nas/kha chu zags mig gyur/bzhin
408a2('dul ba): gyur te/de gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis lo go snyom du shesapha rol gyis ma smras par smraso snyam du shes pa las/dus gzhan zhig nAM hrIs ring gi sems sor chud pa
408a3('dul ba): dang /de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing /de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa gsol te/dge 'dun gyis de
408a4('dul ba): la ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni/chos kyi ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ste/'di ni chos kyi gcig yino//dge slong dag de ltar na ma myos pas 'dul
408a5('dul ba): bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /de ltar na 'di ni kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yino//dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod
408a6('dul ba): pa la/rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos 'di gsum gyis/dul bar bya zhi bar bya/nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /dran pas 'dul
408a7('dul ba): bar 'os pa dang /ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os paso//dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa las/rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhes dul bar bya zhi bar bya/nye bar zhi bar
408b1('dul ba): bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/khas blang bar 'os pa dang /mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhugs par 'os pa dang //rtsa bkram pa lta bur 'os paso///
408b2('dul ba): dge slong dag ji ltar khas blang bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gis rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/khas blangs par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed
408b3('dul ba): pas dul ba dang /zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong ltung ba byung bar gyur pa de la gzhi nges glengs kyang rung ma glengs kyang rung /dran par byas kyang rung dran
408b4('dul ba): par mi byas kyang rung /dge slong gi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la la ltung ba 'di lta bu zhigo byung ba de/bdes
408b5('dul ba): gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mthol zhing bshags par bgyi'o//bdag gis mthol zhing bshags na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/ma mthol mi bshags
408b6('dul ba): nA ni ma lag se//des ltung ba mthong ngam zhes brjod par bya'o//des kyang ltung ba mthong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o//snga ma shos kyis phyis sdom par byed dam zhes brjod par bya'o//
408b7('dul ba): phyi ma shos kyis bgyid do zhes brjod par bya ste/'di ni khas blang ba'o//chos ma yin pa'i khas blang ba sbyin pa bcu dang /chos kyi bcu'o//chos ma yin pa'i khas blang po bcu
409a1('dul ba): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung la/bdag la ma byung snyam du shes pa de la/dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/chos
409a2('dul ba): ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yin//dge 'dun lhag ma dang /ltung byed dang /so sor bshags pa dang /nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du she
409a3('dul ba): pa dang /dge 'dun gyis de la khas len du 'jug pa ni/chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yino//'di lta ste/dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba ma byung la/bdag mi
409a4('dul ba): byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la/dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yino//dge 'dun lhag ma dang /ltung byed dang /so sor
409a5('dul ba): bshags pa dang /nyes byas kyi ltung ba ma byung ba la bdag la byung snyam du shes pa de la/dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa
409a6('dul ba): ste/'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa bcu yin no//chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung la/bdag
409a7('dul ba): la byung snyam du shes pa de la/dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no//dge 'dun lhag ma dang /ltung byed dang /so sor bshags pa dang /
409b1('dul ba): nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung la/bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la/dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yino//'di lta ste/dge slong pas pham
409b2('dul ba): pa'i ltung ba me byung la/bdag la ma byung snyam du shes pa de la/dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/chos kyis khas len pa sbyin pa yin//dge 'dun lhag ma dang /ltung
409b3('dul ba): byed dang /so sor ba shags pa dang /nyes byas kyi ltung ba ma byung la/bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la/dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/chos kyis khas
409b4('dul ba): len pa sbyin pa ste/'di dag ni chos kyis khas len pa'i sbyin pa bcu yino//dge slong dag de lta bos na khas blang bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing //de ltar na 'di na kha
409b5('dul ba): cig rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/khas blang bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi bar yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
409b6('dul ba): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po yangs pa'i spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na
409b7('dul ba): 'dug go/de la brten nas/yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed pa dang /yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis
410a1('dul ba): bsams pa/tshe dang ldan par dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po 'ang/rganan nyid du bcas la/gzhan du tshun por gyur pa ste/mnyan yod du skyes pa dag
410a2('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams lhag par byed kyis de la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya ste/des ni de la yangs bcan rmyi li tsaM byi rnams ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro snyam du/
410a3('dul ba): bsams nas/de la glags tshal bar gyur to//ji tsam na khyim bdag cig gis songs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro gang gi khros la spyan drangs pa dang /
410a4('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis/bzar thag la chos gos rnams bkal te khrus bya bar brtsams so//tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu neg pos kyang /shes bzhin gyis mtha'
410a5('dul ba): gcig tu chos gos bzhag nas khrus bya bar brtsam so//dge slong gzhan zhig gis kyang /phyogs de nyid du ches gos bzhag/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu
410a6('dul ba): nag pos khyas byas nas/'di nyid bdag gis chos gos yin sbyim nas dge slong de'i chos gos bgos te seng ngo //ji tsam na dge slong de langs ni rang gi chos gos de mi snang
410a7('dul ba): nas/des dge slong rnams la dris pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i chos gos sus 'dus/ji tsaman phyogs den tshe dang ldan par dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po'i lhan gyini
410b1('dul ba): gnas pa 'dug pa des thos nas/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mkhan pos phyogs 'dir chos glos bzhag na des nor te/khyer bar ma gyur grung /re shig kho bos song la
410b2('dul ba): mkhan po la de'o zhes de mkhan po'i drung du song ste/smras pa/mkhan po khyod kyis su zhig gi chos gos blangs/des smras pa/bu kho bo'i'o//mkhan po dge slong che ge mo
410b3('dul ba): zhig gis chos gos phyogs de nyid du bzhag pa de kho na mchi lagaso//bu gal te de lta na chos gos de dag khyer te shog shig blta'o//des de khyer te 'ongs nas mkhan po
410b4('dul ba): chos gos 'di ngo mkhyen par mdzod cig/des ngo shes nas bu ngas nor bar khyer te 'ongs kyis/dge slong de'i 'di dag yin gyis skyol cig/des khyer te dge slong de'i
410b5('dul ba): drung du song nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa chos gos 'di dag mkhan pos nor te khyer ro//des smras pa/des rku sems kyis blangs pos/phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung //de
410b6('dul ba): nas glegs tshol ba'i dge slong de rnams kyis de la gleng ba ma byas/dran par mo byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byaso//tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu
410b7('dul ba): nags pos bsams pa/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dang po bskyed par ni dka' la/ma dad pa skye bar ni bla bas/gal te 'dug na gdon mi za bar yangs pa can gyi la
411a1('dul ba): tsa byi rnams dad pa skye bar 'gyur gyis/mdor na mnyan yod kho nar 'gro'o snyam nas//des yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la ma bltas par//des lhung
411a2('dul ba): bzed dang chos gos blangs nas/gnyen yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ste/rims kyis rgyu zhing song ba na/mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /de dag dge slong rnams kyis
411a3('dul ba): mthong nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa nag po 'ongs pa legaso//'ongs pa leg so//khyod mi thong ba ni kho bo cag dga' na 'ongs pa ni ma yino//ci'i phyir 'di ltar khyod la
411a4('dul ba): brten nas/yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams sangs rgyas la mngon par dang /chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pas/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la lhag
411a5('dul ba): par bya ba byed do//des smras pa/de ni mad mod kyis yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bdag la gleng bar ma byas/dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i
411a6('dul ba): las byaso zhes pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/dge slong 'dug shig/khyod ngas
411a7('dul ba): chos kyis blang bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyis blango //yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams bdag cag gis/dge slong nag po skyon med pa gnod pa
411b1('dul ba): ma byas pa la mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa gang yin pa ni mA legs pa zhig byaso zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas/de rnams lhung mazed dang chos gos blangs te/mnyan yod/
411b2('dul ba): gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ba las/de rnams kyis lam kAr dge slong zhig mthong nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan po khyod gang nas 'ongs/mnyan yod naso//khyod kyis ri dwags 'dzin
411b3('dul ba): gyi bu nag po mthong ngam/mthong ngo de ci bya/kho bo cag gis de skyon med pa gnod pa ma byas pa la gleng ba ma byas/dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas de byung ba'i las byas//
411b4('dul ba): bslang zin no//sus bcom ldan 'das kyiso//de na kha cig gis 'di skad ces smraso//blang ba ni ma yin gyi/thag bsring bar bslang ba yin te/'di ltar de bdag cag gis
411b5('dul ba): gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byiskye la/bdag cag gi mngon sum du mi gyur par de bslang ba ni rigs pa ma yin//kha cig gis smras pa/gal te bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
411b6('dul ba): rje bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rjes/bslang na legs par bsgrung ba yin//de rnams rims kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhosu phab nas/
411b7('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis bkrugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhibs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu
412a1('dul ba): na//rnanas na dun na sa byu na slong mas rgyas smra nas smras //tsun pa nag
412a2('dul ba): bsgyur pa/migs pa brim ma mas parnams kyis/ sa na na ma /rnyed pa myu baHsa hU~M /rnyeng ba kyis dran pa sa sa
412a3('dul ba): gnas nas rtswa ba'i gyis bzlas pa/smyan pa'i khyod pa rnaMseM danas rkyen gyi thunan kyi 'i rnyed pa gsol du trA~M margyas smra /ts+tsham zla
412a4('dul ba): sbrul hU~M/ slod dag rjod pa da na tu shegs d-in//btsun pa dug cashegs shUl ka na rlung nag /
412a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das skyes nad pa de/'di sa ste/kyis drang ldanas nas gas meng mye cag nAng na/can gi snyamatsha na s+ye/'ad ska na
412a6('dul ba): rgyung ma /smyen nga byung ba sadi ltar de ga cag sbyin ng+ya na da nas ldan
412a7('dul ba): chos kyi rje/bde bar gshegs pa ches 'dzes/bsrung ba na lags par baspang bal na ma zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/tha ma'o nga'i nyan zas
412b1('dul ba): rnams na 'di lta ste/ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul byas/rtsod pa sgyu nang byung ba zhi bar bya bar 'dod do snyam du dgongs nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dag sbyong
412b2('dul ba): ngag ji ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa
412b3('dul ba): zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang /zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/dge slong dag 'di la chos 'dul bas gang zag gis gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /chos
412b4('dul ba): 'dul pos gnyis dang mang po dang /dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /chos 'dul bas gang zag gnyis kyis gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /
412b5('dul ba): chos 'dul bas gang zag gnyis kyi gnyis dang mang po dang /dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang //chos 'dul bas gang zag mang pos gang zag la mig bzhi
412b6('dul ba): mngon sum du gleng ba dang /chos 'dul bas gang zag mang pos gnyis deng mang po dang /dge 'dun lo mag bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /chos 'dul byas dge 'dun gyis
412b7('dul ba): gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /chos 'dul bas dge 'dun gyis gnyis dang mang po dang /dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du grang ba'o//chos ma yin
413a1('dul ba): pa'i mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug dang /chos kyi bcu drug go//chos ma yin pa'i bcu drug gang zhe na/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pas/
413a2('dul ba): gang zag chos dang 'thun pa dang /gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang 'thun pa dang /gang zag chos dang mi mthun pas mang pos/gang zag chos
413a3('dul ba): dang 'thun pa dang /dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/gang zag chos dang 'thun pa dang /gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis/gang zag chos dang 'thun pa dang
413a4('dul ba): gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang 'thun pa gnyis dang gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po
413a5('dul ba): dang /gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis/dge 'dun chos dang 'thun pa dang /gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos//gang zag chos dang 'thun pa dang /
413a6('dul ba): gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/gang zag chos dang 'thun pa gnyis dang /gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/gang zag chos dang 'thun pa mang po dang /
413a7('dul ba): gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/dge 'dun chos dang 'thun pa dang /dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/gang zag chos dang 'thun pa dang /dge 'dun chos dang
413b1('dul ba): po mthun pas/gang zag chos dang 'thun pa gnyis dang /dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/gang zag chos dang 'thun pa mang po dang /dge 'dun chos dang myi mthun pas/
413b2('dul ba): dge 'dun chos dang 'thun pa ste/'di dag ni chos me yin pa'i mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug yin no//chos kyi mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa
413b3('dul ba): bcu dru'i gleng zhe na/gang zag chos dang 'thun pas/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang /gang zag chos dang 'thun pas/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /
413b4('dul ba): gang zag chos dang 'thun pas/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang /gang zag chos dang 'thun pas dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa dang /gang zab chos dang
413b5('dul ba): 'thun pa gnyis kyis/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang /gang zag chos dang 'thun pa gnyis kyis/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /gang zag chos dang
413b6('dul ba): 'thun pa gnyis kyis/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang /gang zag chos dang 'thun pa gnyis kyis/dge 'dun chos dang me mthun pa dang /gang zag chos dang 'thun
413b7('dul ba): pa med pos gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang /gang zag chos dang 'thun pa mang pos/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /gang zag chos dang mithun pa mang pos//
414a1('dul ba): gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang /gang zag chos dang 'thun pa mang pos/dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa dang /dge 'dun chos dang 'thun pas/gang
414a2('dul ba): zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang /dge 'dun chos dang 'thun pas/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /dge 'dun chos dang 'thun pas/gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa
414a3('dul ba): mang po dang /dge 'dun chos dang 'thun pas/dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa ste/'di dag ni chos kyis mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug yino//dge slong
414a4('dul ba): dag de ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa ni rjod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /de ltar na 'di na cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod
414a5('dul ba): pab zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin no//dge slong dag ji ltar na de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhugs par 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ji ltar na 'di
414a6('dul ba): na kha cig gi cod pa rnams 'di lta ste/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhugs par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste/
414a7('dul ba): dge slong me bzhi dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba brjed pa las brjod pa slar dran te/shes pa las yang brjed pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
414b1('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyod kyis dge slong me bzhi dang gzhan yang de lta bu dang 'thun pa su yang rung ba la/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du
414b2('dul ba): gzhugs par 'os pa byin cig/sbyin pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/gnas malnga ba shoms la gaN+DI brdungs te/dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/dge 'dun
414b3('dul ba): thams cad tshogs shing 'thun por gyur pa dang /dge slong me bzhis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/rgan pa'i mthar cog tsog por 'dug la thal mi sbyar te/de'i
414b4('dul ba): ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol ba byas te/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/bdag dge slong me bzhi dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyed pa las/
414b5('dul ba): bskyud pa slar dran te 'tshal ba las yang bskyud nas/dge 'dun la bdag de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol na/dge 'dun btsun po thugs rtse ba can/
414b6('dul ba): thugyis brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/bdag da ge slong ma bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsal tu gsol/dri skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o//
414b7('dul ba): de'i 'og tu dge slong cig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong me bzhi 'di dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyed pa las song spyad
415a1('dul ba): paslar dAn te 'tshal ba dang /yang bsgyud nas dge slong me bzhi 'di dge 'dun la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol na/gal te dge 'dun//
415a2('dul ba): gyi dus lab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong me bzhi la/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sprul par
415a3('dul ba): mdzad do//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge sbyong me bzhi 'di dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyud pa las/
415a4('dul ba): bskyed pa slar dran te 'tshal ba dang /yang bskyed nas 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong me bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar mdzad na/tshe dang ldan
415a5('dul ba): pa gang dag dge slong me bzhi la/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/
415a6('dul ba): 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o//dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis dge slong me bani
415a7('dul ba): la/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsal lags te/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//ngas de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i
415b1('dul ba): dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gis rab tu dbyung bar ma bya/bsnyen par rdzogs pa mi bya/
415b2('dul ba): gnas mi sbyin/dge tshul gzhag par mi bya/'di las mi bya/las byed par bsko bar mi bya/'dis dge slong ma la gdams ngag sbyin por mi bya/dge slong ma'i gdams
415b3('dul ba): ngag ston por bsko bar mi bya/sngon skos na yang dge slong mo la gdams ngag sbyin par mi bya/'dis dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /lta ba nyams pa dang /spyod
415b4('dul ba): pa nyams pa dang /'tsho bo nyams pas gleng bar mi bya/dran par mi bya ste/'dis gdams ngag dbog par mi bya/gso sbyong la ma yin/dgag dbye la ma yin//gsom
415b5('dul ba): ba la ma yin/gsol ba dang /gnyis la ma yin/gsol ba dang bzhi'i las la ma yin zhing /gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzhan yod na/dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dul
415b6('dul ba): ba gdon par yang mi bya'o//de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par
415b7('dul ba): mi byed na 'gal tshab so can du 'gyuraro//chos ma yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin po chos ma yin pa'i gcig dang chos kyi gcig go//chos ma yin pa'i
416a1('dul ba): gcig gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong gzhi can dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran te shes pa las brjed pa de brjed nas yang dran pa de la dge 'dun gyis
416a2('dul ba): de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ni/chos ma yin pa'i de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ste/'di ni chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no//
416a3('dul ba): chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong gzhi can dge 'dun gyis nang du ltung ba brjed pa las/brjed pa slar dran te shes pa de yang brjed pa de la dge
416a4('dul ba): 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa byin pa ni/chos kyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ste/'di ni chos kyi gcig
416a5('dul ba): yin no//dge slong dag de ltar na de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa ni/rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /de ltar na 'di na kho cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/de'i
416a6('dul ba): ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yino//dge slong dag ji ltar na rtsa bkram pa lta bu 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar
416a7('dul ba): byed pa yin/ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/rtsa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa/dul ba dang /zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na
416b1('dul ba): 'gyu ste/dge slong rnams 'thu bar n+d+ha tsid/tshang 'du ba dang /'byu mo dang /'gyod par gyur nas/gnas shing rtogs dang phyogs gzhan du rnam par gnas na//
416b2('dul ba): gcig na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba/bshes gnyen can pa shes gnyen can gang yang rung ba/gtso bro gtso bo gang yang rung ba/yod pa gang
416b3('dul ba): yin pa des rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song ste/tshig 'di skad ces/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/'thab par
416b4('dul ba): gyur cing /mtshung 'dru ba dang /'thab mo dang /'gyed par gyur pa na bdag cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas/tshe dang ldan pa dag
416b5('dul ba): gzhi 'di la kho bo dang /khyod kyi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las kha na ma tho ba sbom po 'am/khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs pa/kho bos bdag dang khyed kyi ched
416b6('dul ba): du tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing ba shags par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o//gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas/dge slong gcig kyang smras pa
416b7('dul ba): ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/de nas dge slong des phyogs cig shos kyi drung du song nas/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du/bdud pa byas
417a1('dul ba): la cog cig por 'dug ste/chog 'di skad ces/tshe dang ldan pa dag/kho ba cag legs par gsungs pa'i chob 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/'thabs
417a2('dul ba): par gyur cing /mtshang 'dru ba dang /'thab mo dang /'gyed par gyur pa ni/kho bo cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas/gzhi 'di la
417a3('dul ba): kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/kha na ma tho ba sbom po 'am/khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs pa/kho bos bdag dang tsha
417a4('dul ba): dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o//phyogs cig shos nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas
417a5('dul ba): brtan gang yang rung ba/bshes gnyen can ba shes gnyen can gang yang rung ba gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa gang yin pa des kyang rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song ste/
417a6('dul ba): tshig 'di skad ces/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/'thabs par gyur cing /mtshang 'bru ba dang /'thab
417a7('dul ba): mo dang /'gyed par gyur pa ni/bdag cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyed
417b1('dul ba): kyi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las kha na ma tho ba slob po 'am/khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs pa kho bos bdag dang khyod kyis ched du/tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi
417b2('dul ba): drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o//gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong cig gis kyang smras pa/ma bzlog cing mi gshe na de
417b3('dul ba): nas dge slong de phyogs cig shos kyi drung du song nas bla gos phrag po gcig tu gzar te/rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la/gtso por 'dug ste/tshig 'di skad
417b4('dul ba): ces tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/'thabs par gyur cing mching 'dru ba dang /'thab mo dang 'gyed par gyur pa ni
417b5('dul ba): kho bo cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas/gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las kha na ma tho ba
417b6('dul ba): sbom po 'am/khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs pa/kho blos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi drung du mi 'chab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o
417b7('dul ba): zhes smra bar bya'o//gang gi tshe phyogs gcig gis cig shos la 'am/cig shos kyis cig shos la spus la ltung ba lta bur byed//'byung bar skyod/mtshungs par nye bar
418a1('dul ba): ston par mdzad kyi/phan tshun du ltung ba sgrogs pas gleng bar mi phyed na/de ltar na rtsod pa de 'di lta ste/rtswa bkrAm pa lta bur 'os pas zhi ba yin te//
418a2('dul ba): dge slong dag de ltar na rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa'i
418a3('dul ba): rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yino//dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhi po 'dis dul bar bya zhi bar bya nye bar zhi
418a4('dul ba): bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/khas blang bar 'os pa dang /mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhugs par 'os pa dang /rtswa bokram pa lta bur 'os
418a5('dul ba): paso//dge slong bya ba'i rtsod pa ni dge 'dun 'thun pas zhi bar bya'o//dge slong dag gnas gang na dge slong gcig gnas pa de na/'thab pa med 'tshang 'dru ba med/
418a6('dul ba): 'thab mo med/'gyed pa med do//gang na gnyis yod pa de na yang 'thab pa med/mtshang 'dru ba med/'thab mo med/'gyed pa med do//gang na gsum yod pa de na
418a7('dul ba): yang /'thab pa med/mtshang 'dru ba med/'thab mo med/'gyed pa med do//gang na dge slong bzhi 'am/lhag pa gnas pa de na ni/'thab pa dang /mtshang 'dru ba
418b1('dul ba): dang /'thab mo dang /'gyed pa yod do//dge slong dag tshangs pa ji bzhin gcig de bzhin/brgya byin ji bzhin gnyis de bzhin/rgyal po ji bzhin gsum de bzhin/de las lhag
418b2('dul ba): pa 'khrug par 'gyur/dge slong dag de lta bas na/rje su gnang ste/tshigs bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la yang /chos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya zhing
418b3('dul ba): des kyang longs spyod par bya ste/'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o//rtsod pa'i bzhi rdzog so////'dul ba bzhi//bam po brgyad cu pa/dge 'dun dbyen gyi bsdus pa'i
418b4('dul ba): sdom ni/mang pos bkur dang lhag yos dang /ba ga ma rnyings dang bzang po dang //'khor dang ko'u di na rdzu 'phrul dang //ko'u shi kas zos ngang pa dang /mnar med lhag gyur phyi
418b5('dul ba): ma'o//sdom ni/mang pos bkur dang seng ge'i 'gram//legs par rab sad de bzhin du//dga' ldan 'dod pa'i rigs dang ni//'dun pas 'dug dang gzhong ba dang //srin bu
418b6('dul ba): go spobs bzang len dang //lhag bcas pa dang de bcu'o//yangs pa can du bstan pa dang //rab sbyin dang grags 'dzin dang //dang pa dang na mikhas me dang //sa 'tshe ma ni bstan
418b7('dul ba): pa dang //'dzam bu ri dgas nang skyes dang //rigs bdun ngan spong bu dang ni//rgyal po khab dang dka' thub dang //ri 'phur dka' spyod dga' bo dang //nag po bkra shis de bzhin du//
419a1('dul ba): bdud gzhom pa ni byas pa dang //'a khor ni mdo ru bsdus pa'o//gru 'dzin du dgra 'dul dang 'argya thum pa'o//dmad gis mi chugasu ma rgyal ba las rgyal
419a2('dul ba): dang lnga bzhi stong ngo //bI ra na ser bzod dka' dang drug khri sum stong //kim bi lar tshangs sbyin dang brgyad khyu bzhi stong //glang po che'i grong du glang pos sbyin dang nu ma khri
419a3('dul ba): nyis stong //rdo 'jog tu bal bu can dang lnga stong //brang gis nyal du chen po che 'dul dang sum khri nyis stong //ma rgyal ba las rgyal du nga rgya byin dang /sum khri gnyis
419a4('dul ba): stong ngo //ka nA ku ba tsar rgyal sde dang khri nyis stong ngo //tsam par klu'i lha dang khri brgyad stong ngo //ta la'i phreng du ma'i lha dang nyis khri lnga stong ngo //ta ma lir rgya mtsho'i lha dang
419a5('dul ba): khri nyis stong //ba so'i grong du blo gros bzang po dang khri brgyad stong ngo //rgyal po'i khab tu mun sol da nyi khri lnga stong ngo //bA ra na ser dbang phyug chen po'i sde dang brgya tham pa'o//
419a6('dul ba): rtsacan du rgya mtsho sde dang brgyad khri bzhi stong //gru 'dzin du dka' thub stong dang stong //rtswa can du sa'i gdong dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //bA ra na ser sa'i bdeg po dang 'bu mo//
419a7('dul ba): dmag gos mi tshugs par 'dzin dang 'bu mo//mi tho la re lho chen po dang brgyad khri bzhi stong //yang mi the ler lha chen po nas bzung ste mu lhud dang sra ba'i bar brgyad khri ni/
419b1('dul ba): stong ngo //kun tu snang bar na mkha'i bdag po dang /klu mnyam skyong dang bdun khri bdun stong ngo //bA ra na se rA kri kri dang legs skyes dang brgya tham pa'o//gru 'dzin du rna ba can dang bu ram
419b2('dul ba): shing pa dang brgya thim pa'o//gru 'dzin du 'phags skyes dang //bu ram shing pa la sogs pas khyim gyi bar brgya rnam pa'o//ser skya'i gzhir shing rta bcu po nas bzung ste/lnga
419b3('dul ba): khri lnga stong byung ba la seng ge'i 'gram las bzhi ste/bzhi po de rnams las gnyis gnyis//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul sor skya'i gzhi n+ya gr-i d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na
419b4('dul ba): bzhugaso//de na ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dug nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dog gleng bar byed de/shes ldan dag
419b5('dul ba): shAkya rnams ni gang los skyes/thog ma ni gang yin/rgyu ni ci zhig yin shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyad ni gang yin/gal te bdag cig gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs
419b6('dul ba): nas 'di skad 'dri ste/shos ldan dag shAkya rnams ni bang las skyes/thog mi ni gang yin/rgyu ni ci zhig yin/shAkya rnams sngon gyi rigs brgyad nI gang yin zhes de skad
419b7('dul ba): du 'dri na/bdag cig gis ni shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes pa dang /thog ma gang yin pa dang /rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni ga
420a1('dul ba): yin pa yang mi shos na ji skad du lung bstan/chur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dor dong la lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la don 'di
420a2('dul ba): nyid zhus nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la/ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o//de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po/
420a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyog byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug
420a4('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das la ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du
420a5('dul ba): tshogs shing 'dug nas/bar stobs bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/thog ma ni gang yin/rgyu ni ci zhig yin/shAkya rnams
420a6('dul ba): kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin/gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas/'di skad 'dri ste/shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/thog
420a7('dul ba): ma ni gang yin/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad 'dri na bdag cag gis kyang shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/thog ma ni gang yin/rgyu ni ci
420b1('dul ba): zhig yin/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad lung bstan/tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang /
420b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas/de'i slad du bcom ldan
420b3('dul ba): 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/thog ma ni gang lags/rgyu ni ci zhig lags/shAkya
420b4('dul ba): rnams sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud la brtsams nas chos
420b5('dul ba): kyi gtam glengs na/mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni tsa 'dod pa de lung ston pas/bdag nyid la bstod par byed do//zhes smra ba gang
420b6('dul ba): yin pa'i gnas 'di yod pas nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngan gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas/chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyamo//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
420b7('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal
421a1('dul ba): kyi bu nga rgyab srung bas re shig de bsal gyis khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas/dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya
421a2('dul ba): bar spobs par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cing mi smra bas khas blangaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mi'u
421a3('dul ba): dgal gyi bu chen pos cad mi smra bas khas blangs par thugasu chud nas/snam sbyar blta ba ste sngas phangasu bcug nas glo g.yas pas phab ste/zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag
421a4('dul ba): nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang /dran pa dang shes bzhin dang /ldang ba'i 'du shes kho na yid le mdzad pas mnal to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di
421a5('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ma la bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud/shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang /thog ma gang
421a6('dul ba): yin pa dang /rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas//
421a7('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyom
421b1('dul ba): par zhugs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dkal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud/shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang /thog ma gang yin pa dang /rgyun
421b2('dul ba): zhig yin pa dang /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa mthong //mthong nas ti nge 'dzin de las langs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la stan pa shams
421b3('dul ba): ba nyid la 'dug/'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/go'u ta ma dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing //'jig
421b4('dul ba): rten zhig na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing
421b5('dul ba): ma tshang ba med pa yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad dang ljon pa kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/rang gi 'od can na mkha' la 'gro ba dga' ba za zhing dga' zas kyis
421b6('dul ba): tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnaso//de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba'i shig tu 'gyur zhing /mcho gcig tu 'gyuraro//sa chen po 'di chu 'ba'i shig gi mcho gcig tu gyur pa'i
421b7('dul ba): steng du rlung gis bris me chags pa dang mkhregs pa dang /khebs par byed do//dper na 'o ma bskol bgrangs par gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis dris ma chags pa dang /mkhregs
422a1('dul ba): pa dang /khebs pa de bzhin du/sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' shig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis dris ma chags pa dang /mkhregs pa dang /
422a2('dul ba): khebs par byed do//sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa/yin zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/dper
422a3('dul ba): ne mar sar lta bu'o//ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang tse btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa dri yod do//go'u ta ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags
422a4('dul ba): shing 'jig rten chags na/de nas sems can kha cig tshe zed las zad bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lci'i ris nas sha 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal
422a5('dul ba): ba mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa yan lag dang /nying lag thams
422a6('dul ba): cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro ba dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par
422a7('dul ba): 'gyur ro//de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/rgyu skar rnams kyang med/skad cig dang thang cig dang yud ci yang med/mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang med/zla ba dang
422b1('dul ba): dang zla ba phyed dang /dus tshogs dang lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do//skyes pa dang bud meng du mngon pa yang med kyi/gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya
422b2('dul ba): ba'i grangasu 'gro'o//de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis/mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do//ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar
422b3('dul ba): sred do//ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o//sems can gzhan dag gi kyang seMn de mdzub mo'i rtse mos so'i bcud myong bar byed de/ji lta ji ltar
422b4('dul ba): myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la/ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong //mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang
422b5('dul ba): bar rtsom ste/ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do//ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyis zas rim gyis za'o//gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i
422b6('dul ba): bcud la kham gyis zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe de rnams kyis lus la mkhrad dang lci ba zhugs par gyur to//de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po gsal ba gang yin pa
422b7('dul ba): de yang nub par par gyur pas/'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to//go'u ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jog rten du mun pa byung na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung
423a1('dul ba): bar 'gyuraro//rgyu skar dang skad cig dang zang cig dang yud tsamra dang /mtshan myo dang /nyin mo dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang dus tshogs dang /lo
423a2('dul ba): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnaso//de rnams las kha zas la cheso nyung zad ze ba gang yin pa de ni
423a3('dul ba): kha dog dang ldan par 'gyuraro//kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/kha dog ngan par gyur te/kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la rten nas/kha dog rnam pa gnyis
423a4('dul ba): mngon te/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no//khyed ni kha dog ngan pa yino zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod
423a5('dul ba): do//kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to//go'u ta ma dag sa'i bcud de//
423a6('dul ba): nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hu dra bri ba kyi hud bro ba zhe sa smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur te//
423a7('dul ba): dper na da ltar mi rnams kyis zas zhim po chung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang tshig dang tshig 'bru de nyid rjesu dran nas/'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes
423b1('dul ba): smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nus pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug
423b2('dul ba): bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/smras pa 'da'i don ni 'di yino zhes de'i don ni mi sheso//go'u te ma dag sems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcud de nub pa na//
423b3('dul ba): sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te dper na dong ka'i me tog lta bu'o//
423b4('dul ba): ro de 'di lta bu yin te/dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o//de rnams de za zhing za su za ba la tshe ring yun ring du gnas//de rnams la kha zas las chos nyung nguzla
423b5('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni kha dog dag dang ldan par gyur to//kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to//zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/kha dog
423b6('dul ba): rnam pa gnyis mngon te/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can
423b7('dul ba): le khyad du gsod par byed do//kha dog gi mngon pa'i de rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid rmongs pa'i rgyus sa zhag nung bar gyur to//go'u ta ma dag sa
424a1('dul ba): zhag de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hungad bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan gyi
424a2('dul ba): sdug bsngal bar byed do//dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba 'ga' zhig gis reg pa na/ston gyi yi ge dang /tshig dang tshig 'bru de nyid rje su dran
424a3('dul ba): nas 'di skad ces e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud ces smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa zhag de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud
424a4('dul ba): bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi sheso//
424a5('dul ba): go'u ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyis sra zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal khe dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur zhing /
424a6('dul ba): kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/dper na shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o//ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o//de rnams de za zhing zas
424a7('dul ba): su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnaso//de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to//kha zas la chos mang du za ba
424b1('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to//zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no//kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kye sems can kho bo ni kha
424b2('dul ba): dog dang ldan la/khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yino zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do//kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi
424b3('dul ba): dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus/myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to//go'u ta ma dag myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na/sems can tshogs shing 'dus nas
424b4('dul ba): 'di skad rje mdun nas phar song mdun nA phar song zhi smra zhing sgra sngags 'dron la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to//dper na da ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la tshig drag po'i tshar bcad
424b5('dul ba): pas/tsher gsad par 'dod pa na/sngon gyi yi ge dang /tshig dang tshig 'bru de dag nyid rje su zlos shing 'di skad ces mdun nas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba
424b6('dul ba): de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshe la nub pa dang tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces mdun nas phar song mdun nus phar song zhes smra zhing /smre sngags 'don
424b7('dul ba): la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras par de'i don ni 'di yin/smras pa/'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don mi sheso//go'u ta ma dag sems can de
425a1('dul ba): rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas/ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa phub ma dang sbun pa med pa/shun pa med pa dag gtsang ma
425a2('dul ba): skyes te/de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/brngas shing brngas kyang slar skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon no//de rnam
425a3('dul ba): do za zhing de zasu za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnaso//gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bros bu la kham gyi za su rim gyis zos pa de
425a4('dul ba): nas de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur te/kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o//kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o//de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa
425a5('dul ba): rnams dang /skyes pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig lo gcig mig gi mi ga tshug su blta'o//ji lta ji ltar cig la cig mig gis mig tshug su blta ba de
425a6('dul ba): lta de ltar kun tu chagaso//ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar zhen te/ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhugaso//sems can gzhan dag gis kyang
425a7('dul ba): sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong //mthong nas kyang sa dang bong ba dang /gseg ma dang gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha chad
425b1('dul ba): rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do//sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis kwa'i sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o//
425b2('dul ba): dper na de ltar mi rnams bgra ma blangs pa na/phye ma dang dri dang phreng ba dang /gos dang 'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de
425b3('dul ba): bzhin du sems can rnams kyis/sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ba na sas gtor cir bong ba dang /gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor
425b4('dul ba): nas 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do//sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis kwa'i sems can khyed kyis
425b5('dul ba): nga ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do//go'u ta ma dag de ltar na sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi 'dul ba ma
425b6('dul ba): yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/da ltar chos su 'dod/'dul bar 'dod//sngon smad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar bsngags par bya bar 'dod do//de
425b7('dul ba): rnams kyis de zhag ci ga cig spangs pa nas/zhag gnyis dang gsum dang bdun yang spangaso//gong nas sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la
426a1('dul ba): lpags par ldog pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de nas de rnams khang pa bzlog pa la brtson par byed do 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyod do//'dir 'dug
426a2('dul ba): cag bya bya ma yin pa spyad zhes zir dus khyim khyim zhes bya ba grags te/goT tam dgu 'di ni 'jig rten du kha bo'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no//
426a3('dul ba): de yang chos kyis yin gyis chos ma yin pas ma yin te/de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin te/de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs
426a4('dul ba): ka/nung bza' don du gnyer ba yang nang par sa lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do//de nas sems can snyoms las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par gyis lu nub blangaso//
426a5('dul ba): de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smraso//kye sems can khyod tshur sa lu'i phyir 'dong ngo //de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad
426a6('dul ba): ces smraso//kye sems can khyod rang gi sa lu la soms shig/kho bos ni nang par gyi sa lu nub blangaso//de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma re ni legasaso//
