426a7('dul ba): kye ma do ni shin tu legs kyis ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang /nag gsum gyi dang /zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sa lu blang ngo snyam nas//des zhag gnyis kyi dang /
426b1('dul ba): zhag gsum gyi dang /zhag bdun gyi bar gyis lu blangaso//de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smraso//kye sems can khyod tshur sa lu'i phyir 'dod/de
426b2('dul ba): nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smraso//kye sems can khyod rang gi sa lu la soms shig/kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi dang /zhig gsum gyi dang /zhag
426b3('dul ba): bdun gyi bar gyis lu blangs zin no//de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma de ni leg so//kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang
426b4('dul ba): zla ba gcig gi sa lu blang ngo snyam nas/des zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig gi sa lu blangaso//gang nas sems can de rnams kyis/ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras saM lu'i 'bru
426b5('dul ba): stsogs 'jog gi yongasu spyad pas zos pa de nas sa lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang sbun pa dang shun pas yogs par gyur to//brngas shing brngas na yang phyir mi skye bas brjes
426b6('dul ba): bIr yang mngon la/sa lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i spobs la yod par gyur to//de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas shes ldan dge bdag cag sngon
426b7('dul ba): yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med la/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa kha dog bzang pos gnas
427a1('dul ba): pa rang gi 'od dang ldan pa na mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/bdag cag sa'i bcud kha dog phun
427a2('dul ba): sum tshogs pa dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to//bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos te/gang gi tshe bdag gi sa
427a3('dul ba): bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe/bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang /lji ba nyid zhugs par gyur to//kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa
427a4('dul ba): de nub par gyur pas/'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to//bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur te//bdag cag las kha zas
427a5('dul ba): ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni/kha dog bzang por gyur kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/kha zas kyi ched gnyis la brten nas/
427a6('dul ba): kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kwa'e sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/khyod ni kho dog ngan pa yin zhes sems can gyis
427a7('dul ba): sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do//bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par
427b1('dul ba): gyur to//sa'i bcud de nub pa na sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/bdag cag de za zhing de zasu za ba la tshe ring
427b2('dul ba): zhing yun ring du gnas//bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/khe dog ches mong du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur
427b3('dul ba): te/zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no//kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kwa'o sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/khyod ni kha dog
427b4('dul ba): ngan pa yino zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do//bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs
427b5('dul ba): pa'i rgyas sa zhag de nub par gyur to//zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/bdag
427b6('dul ba): cag de za zhing de zasu za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so//bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur kha zas ches mang
427b7('dul ba): du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no//kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kwa'e sems
428a1('dul ba): can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/khyod na kha dag dran pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do//bdag cag kha dog gi mngon
428a2('dul ba): pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i che la de nub par gyur to//myu gu'i tshol de nub pa na mo rmas ma btab pa'i 'bras sa su
428a3('dul ba): 'bru tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa sbun pa med pa shun pa med pa/dag pa gtsang ma skyes te/de nub brdas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par
428a4('dul ba): 'byur bas/brngas shing brdas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/bdag cag de za zhing za su thu ba lo tshe ring zhing yun rang du gnas//gang nas bdog cag gis
428a5('dul ba): ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru spogs 'jog gi yongasu longs spyod pas/zos pa de nas sa lu di'i 'bras bu phub ma dang /sbyin pa dang /shun pas g.yogs
428a6('dul ba): par gyur to//brngas shing brngas paR+Sha yang slar mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/sa lu yang sbubs sem yel ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas/ma la bdag cag
428a7('dul ba): tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcod la 'di ni khyed kyi'o//'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug bre bar bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas/zhing bgos te
428b1('dul ba): mtshams bcad mu thug bras//go'u ta ma dag 'dri ni 'jig rten du mu thug 'dra ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang pa yin//de yang chos kyis yin gyis rgyas ma yin
428b2('dul ba): pas ma yin pa de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i tshu la 'dri ni chos kyi detso tha~M yin//de nas sems can zhig gis rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu la ma byin par blangaso//
428b3('dul ba): sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can des rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu la ma byin par blangs pa mthong //mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras//kwa'e
428b4('dul ba): sems can khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir blang /kwa'e sems can song la khyed phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/sems can des lan gnyis
428b5('dul ba): lan gsum du yang rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu mo byin par blangs//sems can des sems can de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rang rang gi sa lu yod bzhin
428b6('dul ba): du gzhan gyi sa lu ma byin par len pa mthong //mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smraso//kwa'e sems can khyod rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par
428b7('dul ba): ci'i phyir blang zhes des de phar drangs tshur drangs nas/ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang khrid de/shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du/lan gsum gyi bar
429a1('dul ba): du gzhan gyis lung de byin par len to zhes spyoso//de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can dri la 'di skad ces smras//'e sems can khyod rang gi sa lu/
429a2('dul ba): yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang /kwa'i sems can song la khyod phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/de nas sems can ngos sems can de rnams la 'di
429a3('dul ba): skad ces smras//shes ldan dag sems can 'dis/bdag sa lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs te ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas spyos//de nas sems can de rnams
429a4('dul ba): kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smraso//kwa'e sems can khyod kyis sems can la sa lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs nas/ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas/ci'i
429a5('dul ba): phyir spyo/kwa'e sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag sa lu'i phyir phar 'dren tshur 'dren
429a6('dul ba): cing ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du spyo ba yang snang bas ma la bdug cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cag gi nang na sems can lhag par gzugs bzang po/lhag par blta na
429a7('dul ba): sdug pa/lhag par mdzesde pa/lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyis bdag por bskos dang /des bdag cag chad pas
429b1('dul ba): bcad par bya ba de rnams la ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/phan mdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te/bdag cag go zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang
429b2('dul ba): yin pa de la chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas de rnams 'tshogs shit+ya 'dus te/de rnams kyi nang nas sems can lhag par gzugs bzong ba/lhag
429b3('dul ba): par blta na sdug pa/lhag par mdzes pa/lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/'di skad ces kye sems
429b4('dul ba): can khyod chur shog kho bo cag las chad pas bcad par bya ba rnams la ni/chad pas gcod cing phan gdags par bya ba la ni phan thogs shig/kho bo cag gi zhing
429b5('dul ba): ngag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyino//de de rnams la chad pas bcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod
429b6('dul ba): phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing /de la de rnams kyis zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thogs shas 'bul
429b7('dul ba): te/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur cing skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur bas/mang pos bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes gragaso//zhing rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na/
430a1('dul ba): nyams pa las skyob par byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs shes bya bar grags//chos kyis skyo dgu mgu bar byed cing tshul khrims nyam su blangs
430a2('dul ba): gnas/shes rab nyam su blangs te gnas pas rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grag so//go'u tA ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sems can sems
430a3('dul ba): can zhes bya bar gyur te//ga t+yA ma da rgyal po mang ngos blokur byung po 'od mdzes shes b+ham+b+ha/Tad+ha mA drug rtul po 'od mdzes kyi rje mi rnams kyi ming tshur shog rgyu
430a4('dul ba): shog ces bya bar gyur to//'od mdzes kyi blo dge ba zhes bya ste/go'u tumya dag rgyal po dge bo'i tshe mi rnams kyi meng smra ba can skye ba can zhes bya bar gyur to//go'u t+ya
430a5('dul ba): dag dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces bya ste/go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dge mchog gos tshe mi rnams kyi ming sprin mgrin sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to//dge mchog gi blo gas
430a6('dul ba): spyod 'phags shes bya ste/ko'u tA ma dag rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi rgyu mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang pa zhes bya bar gyur to//rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bar
430a7('dul ba): shi chen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyon te/dper na shing bal gyi mdab ma 'am/ras bal gyi mdab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do//de sprin
430b1('dul ba): nas brtol ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba/blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/spyi bo las skyes
430b2('dul ba): pas spyi bo skyes bya bar gyur to//gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'ophags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bsgo ba dang /de thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o ma zag so
430b3('dul ba): nas re ris ngo las nu pa las nu zhes smras pas/nga las nu nga las nu zhes bya bar gragaso//go'u ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams
430b4('dul ba): sems par byed/'jam par byed/nye bar rtog par byed do//de rnams bsams gzhal nye bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du
430b5('dul ba): 'jug pas des na de rnams yid las skyes yid las skyes zhes bya bar gragasaso//go'u ta ma dag rgyal po drug po 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med pa yin/bar/
430b6('dul ba): sdo mo la/sems can tshur shog sme bo can//sprin mgrin dang ni de bzhin du//ta la'i rkang dang yid las skyes//sngon gyi de drug bsdus pa yin//go'u ta ma dag rgyal
430b7('dul ba): pir nga las nu'i bla g.yas par sha rmin zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyan te/dper na shing bal gyi mdob ma 'am/ras bal gyi mdab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang
431a1('dul ba): gnod pa mi skyed do//de smin nas brtol ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
431a2('dul ba): kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/blo g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to//gzhonu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang
431a3('dul ba): gling gzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes pa'i bla g.yon par sha rmin cig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyan te/
431a4('dul ba): dper na shing bal gyi mdab ma 'am/ras bal gyi mdab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi bskyed do//de smin nas brtol ba dong /khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta
431a5('dul ba): na sdug pa/mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/bla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya
431a6('dul ba): bapar gyur to//gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug/go'u ta ma dag rgyal po nye
431a7('dul ba): mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/dper na shing bal gyi mang ba ma 'am/ras bal gyi mdab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang
431b1('dul ba): gnod pa mi skyed do//de smin nas brtol ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig
431b2('dul ba): byung ste/rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas mying mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to//gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas nga dung yang gleng gnyis la
431b3('dul ba): rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug//go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon pa re sha rmin zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/dper na
431b4('dul ba): shing bal gyi mdab ma 'am ras bal gyi mdab ma bzhin du chung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do//de smin nas brtol ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/
431b5('dul ba): mdzes pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes ldan nye mdzes lnga ni zhes bya
431b6('dul ba): byar gyur to//gzho nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/da dud yang gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug/go'u ta ma dag de ltar na rgyal
431b7('dul ba): po mang pos bskur gyi bu 'od mdzes so//'od mdzes kyi dge ba'o//dge ba'i dge mchog go dpe mchog gi gso sbyong 'phagaso//gso sbyong 'phags kyi nga las nu'o//nga las
432a1('dul ba): nu'i mdzes pa'o//mdzes pa'i nye mdzes so//nyes mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang nye mdzes ldan dang /bzang po dang /legs bzang dang /btang ba dang

432a6('dul ba): 'dzin du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/ngagra 'dul bar byed pas dgra 'dul dgra 'dul zhes bya bar gyurA to//g+ho'u ta ma dag rgyal
432a7('dul ba): po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang /tsha bo dang yang cha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gis mi tshugs par byung //de rnams kyi tha mo ni rgyal po ma rgyal ba las
432b1('dul ba): rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed pas na ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya bar gragaso//go'u ta mya dag rgyal po ma rgyal ba las
432b2('dul ba): rgyal ba'i bu dang che bo dang yang tsha dang /sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po drug khri sum stong yul bA ra nu ser byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bzod ka zhes bya ba byung //goH
432b3('dul ba): two ma dag rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang tsha bo dang yang tshe dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong kam pa'i la'i grong khyer du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha mo ni rgyal po tshangs
432b4('dul ba): sbyin zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi bu dang /tsha bo dang yang tshe dang sum che'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong glang po che'i grong khyer du byung ste/de rnams
432b5('dul ba): kye tha ma ni rgyal po glang pos sbyin zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po glang pos sbyin gyi bu dang che po dang yang cha dang sum tsho'i rgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo 'jog tu
432b6('dul ba): byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bal pu can zhes bya ba byung //bo'u ta ma dag rgyal pa bal bu can gyi bu dang tsha bo dang yod tshe dang sum tshe'i rgyud rgyal po sum
432b7('dul ba): khro nyis stong grong khyer brang gis nyal du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po chen po che 'dul zhes bya ba byung ngo //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po chen po 'dul gyi'u
433a1('dul ba): dang che bo dang yang cha dang sumacha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byu ste/de rnams kyi tha man rgyal po rnang
433a2('dul ba): byin zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal byin gyi bu dang chu bo dang yang tshe dang sum che'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer kan+ya kub dz+war byung ste/de rnams
433a3('dul ba): kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal sde zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang tsha bo dang yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer tsam par
433a4('dul ba): byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal bkru'i lha zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dge rgyal po klu'i lha'i bu dang tsha bo dang yang tsha dang sum tshwa'i rgyud rgyal po ci khri lnga stong grong khyer
433a5('dul ba): ti la'i 'phreng du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mi'i lha zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mi'i lha'i bu dang che bo dang /yang tsha dang sum che'i rgyud
433a6('dul ba): rgyal po khri nyis snying grong khyer ta ma lcir byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho lha'i bu dang tshi
433a7('dul ba): dang yang tshe dang sumatsho'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer ba po'i grong du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo //go'u
433b1('dul ba): tA ma dag rgyal po blo gros bzang po'i bu dang tsha bo dang yang cha drang sum cha'i rgyud rgyal po nya khri lnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung /de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mun
433b2('dul ba): sel zhes bya ba byung ngo //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang tsha bo dang yang tshe dang sum tsha'i rgyu rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer bA ra na ser byung ste/

433b4('dul ba): khri bzhi stong grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dag rgya mtsho'i sde'i bu dang //che bo dang yang tsha dang sumatsho'i
433b5('dul ba): rgyad rgyal po stong yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dka' thub sprad ces bya ba byung ngo //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dka' thub spyod kyi bu dang che bo dang
433b6('dul ba): yang cha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer rtsa can du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i gdong zhes bya ba byungango //go'u tom dag rgyal po sa'i
433b7('dul ba): gdong gi bu dang che bo dang yang tsha ngang sum che'i rgyud/rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer bA ra na ser byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung //

434a5('dul ba): ba'i mu khyud dang /rko ba dang /nye bar rko ba dang /rko ba yod dang /kun nas rko ba dang /gya nom snang dang /mnyam snang dang /thos pa'i sde dang /chos kyi sde dang /rtog

434b6('dul ba): rgyal po brgya tham bya yang grong khyer bA ra na ser byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba byung //de'i tshe ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
434b7('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na mod pa lha dang mi rnams
435a1('dul ba): kyi ston pa/srangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od drung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung /de'i spyan mngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ma

435b1('dul ba): yab mkhyen par mdzod cig/bdag ni dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung //des smras pa/bu gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang /sbyin sreg sreg

436a1('dul ba): zhan nag na d+ha smyan rgyas mdun pal smras pa/mkhan na rdzun sa ba rdza ma thag smras stong 'du du rgyun du pa y-i//

436a4('dul ba): na sbed tsha ma pabang mo zhes byab dang /skyes thu gang n+d+ha can pad+ma'i rtsal ga ces bya ba zhig gnas d+d+he/des de la da ga'i dpur spyod pa'i phyi gas dang rgyan pacu'o//des sa
436a5('dul ba): dang rten dag thogs nas chas pa las/yang ni rganan zhig kA shrA pa na lnga brgya rloms pazhig 'ongs nas bzang mo dga' dgur sbed kyi chung shog/des bsams pa

436b1('dul ba): bamang po zhig yin pas de dang de dga' dgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo //des bsams pa na ma tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems bdag gis bsrung bar nus so snyam nas des

436b6('dul ba): mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog ces byos shig/des song nas bzang mo lo smras pa dang /de nas de bskyed mos tshal du song ba dang /skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa log
436b7('dul ba): gis smras pa/khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa rigs samo/des smras pa/rje'i sras de ni bdag gis nongs te/'on kyang

437a7('dul ba): tshogs chen po des lag pa phyin ge log tu dmo du bcings nas/rgyal po la phul te/lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad nas de bkum
437b1('dul ba): lags so//rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas/des smras pa/gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis gsal zhing la ga shon cig/de nas rab
437b2('dul ba): tu byung ba me tog ka ra bI ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing /skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa lag ni mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor nas/lam po che dang /
437b3('dul ba): tshong 'dus dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sbyor bsgrags te/grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyungs nas gson po nyid du gsal zhing la gshon

437b5('dul ba): bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na de gsal shing la ga shon par mthong nas de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus
437b6('dul ba): smras pa/kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig des kyang skad mi gsal shing yid chad la gnad du bab pa'i gnod tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/mkhan po gzhan ci

438a1('dul ba): bu ji ltar shes mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis/gzon cig bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig glang gis bdag gis lus kyis rmya phyung gi sems kyis
438a2('dul ba): ni ma yin na/bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa de gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig/bdag nyid chen po de lhag
438a3('dul ba): pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing /gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to//kun tu drang srong mdog
438a4('dul ba): nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra glegs pas/de'i ming gser mdog ces bya bar gyur te/de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to//de nas drang srong go'u ta mes smras
438a5('dul ba): bamakhan po bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang /skye ba ni gang /tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lags/des smras pa/bram ze rnams na re bu med pa la 'gro ba
438a6('dul ba): med do zhes zer na/khyod kyis bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/mkhan pa yab kyis rgyal srid kyi sladu spro ba bskyed pa ni/bdag gzhon nu nyi du rab tu byung bas bung
438a7('dul ba): med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/bdag gi bu skyes pa lta ga la mchis/bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyod pa rjesu dran par gyis shig/mkhan po cher bi drag pos nyan
438b1('dul ba): pas de ni bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing chog rnams bya ste/'bum pa cig pu dran par bas na ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjesu dran par 'gyur/de'i mkhan po mngon par
438b2('dul ba): shes pa thob pa yin pas/des rdzu 'phrul gyis rje char chen po sprul nas char pa'i theg pas de'i lus la phog pa dang /de nas char pa dang /rlung grang mos reg pas/
438b3('dul ba): sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/des sngon gyi yul la spyad pa dz+haiM su dran par bya bar brtsamaso//gang gi tshe des 'khrigs pa'i 'dod chags rje su dran par byas pa las
438b4('dul ba): khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig ltungango //bas mo gyis mi khyab pa'i glanas ni bzhi ste/bdag sems pa dang /'jig rten sems pa dang /sems can rnams
438b5('dul ba): kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o//khu ba'i thig pa de gnyis spong gnyi su gyur nas/nyi ma shar ba'i
438b6('dul ba): dus kyi tshe/nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang /khye'u gnyis shig byung nas/de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshaMl gseb der de gnyis
438b7('dul ba): bzhug so////bam po gya gcig pa//de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha 'byung ste/nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong go'u ta ma gdungs nas shi'o//
439a1('dul ba): de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas/des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na/skro rdol pa'i khogs pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/
439a2('dul ba): de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gsab du zhugs pa las/ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo //des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la
439a3('dul ba): zhugs pa dang /drang srong go'u ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun bskyod de/de gnyis
439a4('dul ba): ming btags pa nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las/'di gnyis smyos par gyur pas/de bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya
439a5('dul ba): bar gyur to//drang srong go'u ta ma'i bu yin pas ming gnyis pa go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to//rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan log skyes yan lag skyes
439a6('dul ba): bya bar gyur to//bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po ba ra dA dza bu med par
439a7('dul ba): shi nas/blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag da su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/gzhan dag gis smras pa/'di'i gcen go'u ta
439b1('dul ba): ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin byas de dbang bsku ro//de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi
439b2('dul ba): drung du snang ste/son pa dang /rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/drang srong chen po go'u ta ma gang du mchis/des smras pa/khyad cag kho nas bsad do//de
439b3('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/kho bos dran par bya'o//ma nongs so//des de rnams dran par byas pa dang /

439b6('dul ba): bde ba skyes nas smras pa/drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma lags kyi bdag cag gis sdig pa'i la sre bgyi'o//zhes re rnams de skad du gtam skye bar byed pa na/
439b7('dul ba): khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ong so//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/des smras pa/de kho ni'i bu'o//de rnam
440a1('dul ba): kyis smras pa/'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/des byung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/blon po rnams kyis//
440a2('dul ba): thos te mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur
440a3('dul ba): ba las de yang bu med par shi'o//de nas cig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to//go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram
440a4('dul ba): shing pa'i bu dang tsha bo dang yang cha dang sumatsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/de rnams kyis tha ma ni rgyal po bur ma shing
440a5('dul ba): pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung //go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ramya shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/skar mda' gdong dang /lag rna dang /glang po che
440a6('dul ba): 'dul dang /rkang gdub can no//dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/de lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/blon po rnams
440a7('dul ba): kyis smras pa/lha ci'i sladadu phyag la zhal gtad de thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/des smras pa/nga yi btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khongasu chud cing

440b2('dul ba): da ngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol pa 'di dag 'ad na/ngal zhig bu me sbyar bar 'gyur ba ste dgu su sheg dang bdag cag gis mo//tsaman rmyil ba bzhin
440b3('dul ba): zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzong pa blta na sdug pa mdzes pa btsun mo dam par 'tshal ba yod pa de rnams kyis brtabs te/rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas/de rnams rgyas
440b4('dul ba): cig nas cig tu brgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang /rgyal pos bsgo ba khug shig/de nas de rnams rgyal po'i mar gtam byas te 'dug/gtam gyi skabs rnyed

440b6('dul ba): shing ba 'phags skyes pa'i blan+dan mo dam pA gum nas de'i ched du sras mo spyod//rgyal pos smras pa/'dre b+h+ring grub pa'i mchog yon pas rgyun ldan kyang dam nog
440b7('dul ba): bca' ste/gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par 'gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa ltan sbyin no//lha bka' bzhin 'tshal mchis la sprul
441a1('dul ba): snyan du gdas par gsol zhes de rnams dong nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/shes
441a2('dul ba): ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin//lha don 'di la nges pa ma
441a3('dul ba): mchis te/re shig btsun mo blangs la/lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang degyes pa dang /dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig dang /de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/
441a4('dul ba): 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/spyi ma mchis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la long shig/de rnams dong nas
441a5('dul ba): bsu ste/ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par 'gyur te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga'
441a6('dul ba): bar byed//dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to//de zla ba brgyad dam/dgur 'das
441a7('dul ba): pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta ni sdug pa mdzes pa zhig btsoso//bcas nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/khye'u 'di'i ming cir ga gis shes
441b1('dul ba): ming 'dogs par byed/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nus rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas/de'i slad du khye'u yi ming rgyal srong dag
441b2('dul ba): zhes bgyi'o//khyo'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjesu gtad do zhes bya ba nas/rdzing ni gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
441b3('dul ba): bzhin du'o//de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la me bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/des de la pho nya btang ste tshig rtsub po dang chos pa'i spyi'i yog spring ba/khyod
441b4('dul ba): kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bces pa bzhin gal te byed na/de lta na legs gal te de ltar ma byas na/khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang
441b5('dul ba): yin pa des/sdod cig kho bor nir 'ongs nas yul 'khor thur mar klog go/rgyal po de mthu chen po ldan pa des thos nas sgeg ste/blon po rnams bsags nas
441b6('dul ba): smras pa/shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces sbrengs na/de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/des rnams kyis smras palha rgyal srid dga'/rgyal tshab
441b7('dul ba): tu dbang bskur lags mod/des smras pa/shes ldan dag gzhan nu ches pho bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bo rnams spangs te/nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang
442a1('dul ba): bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no//de rnams kyis smras pa/lha'i rgyal po de ni stobs dang gzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon ma
442a2('dul ba): 'chal bar yul bur ma re klogs pa gang lags pa'i gnas de/mchis pas/rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/gzhon
442a3('dul ba): nu de rnams ni smyug tu gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhonu rnams ji ltar skyug/lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/
442a4('dul ba): lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas/skyon ma mchis pa dang /nongs pa ma mchis po yang spyug la/skyon ma mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni gzhog go//
442a5('dul ba): rgyal po btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang ma smra bar 'dug go/blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya
442a6('dul ba): ste/des na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o//zhes de nas de rnams kyis bskyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ri mo sna tshogs bris par
442a7('dul ba): shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bzhag/dar gyi tshun 'phyang mang po btags/me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcugo/de nas de
442b1('dul ba): rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis bskyod mos chal de byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams bskyed mos tshal gyi phyogasu dong //blon po rnams
442b2('dul ba): kyis bskyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang /gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa 'di su'i bskyed mos che la de rnams kyis smras pa/lha'i lag so//de nas slar
442b3('dul ba): ldog paro brtsams pa dang /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig/ci'i phyir slar log/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha'i bskyed mos tshal
442b4('dul ba): yin na 'dir 'jug tu ga lA rung /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/dri rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar
442b5('dul ba): brtsam so//blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha bskyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab legasaso//rgyal po
442b6('dul ba): chas pa dang /bskyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra thos so//thos nas kyang blon po rnams la skyes pa/shes ldan dag bskyed mos tshal na ku tsa'i sgra glags na 'di na su zhig
442b7('dul ba): 'dug blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lho gzhon nu rnamaso//gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangaso//blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/
443a1('dul ba): lha bzod par mdzad cing gzho nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhonu de rnams spyug par chas pa dang /
443a2('dul ba): rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyis skye bo dang lhan cig mchi na de ci nas kyang mi dgeg pa de ltar bka'
443a3('dul ba): stsal pa rig so//rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te/zhag bdun
443a4('dul ba): du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas/skye bo'i tshogs rgyu so//blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgro ma bskum na ring po mi thogs par
443a5('dul ba): glu 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro//gal te de lta na sgo chod cig/de nas gzhonu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye bar skal ldan
443a6('dul ba): shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/de rnams kyis der lo ma'i skyil bu dag byas te gnas btab ste/
443a7('dul ba): ri dgas bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho bar byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do//lang tsaM dang ngar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin
443b1('dul ba): pAsna 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyan to sha bri ngan pA skya bo bsong bsong por gyur to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong sngor skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/khyed cag
443b2('dul ba): ci'i phyir skye bo bseng bseng por gyur/de rnams kyis smras pa/drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen paso//des smras pa/rang
443b3('dul ba): rang gi sring mo spongs la mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug shig/drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ngam/shes ldan dag 'di ltar
443b4('dul ba): rgyal rigs rgyal srid stong pa rnams kyis rung //de na de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yino snyam nA lo ba'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te
443b5('dul ba): mos dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed/dgo' bar
443b6('dul ba): byedadaga' dgur spyod par byed pa na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas to//de rnams chen por rgyur pa dang /bsam gtan gyi tsher ma nI sgra yin pas/drang srong sar skya
443b7('dul ba): sems rtse gcig po nyid du ma btub nas des smras pa/shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o//drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi
444a1('dul ba): tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtswa gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas//drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig/bdag cag gzhan du mchis
444a2('dul ba): nA 'on kyang sna'i phyogs shig bdag cag la phog shig/shes ldan dag rung ngo //drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin du dal re ba 'grub po yin pas
444a3('dul ba): des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsig so//drang srong ser b+h+yas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gan
444a4('dul ba): yongs btung bas ser skya'i gzhi ser sgra'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to//de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas/skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te/dog byas 'phel che ba
444a5('dul ba): ma gyur to//lha rnams kyis sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang de rnams der dong ste/grong khyer cig shos brtsigs nas/
444a6('dul ba): lhas bstan lhas bstan zhes bya bar gyur to//de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/shos ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag
444a7('dul ba): spyug pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs par mi bya ste/gcig
444b1('dul ba): kho nas chog shes par bya'o//de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma len gyis chung ma ni me len to//de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po du
444b2('dul ba): sdug pa rnams rjesu dran nas/blon po rnams la smras pa/kye grong pa dag gzhonu de rnams de ltar ga na 'dug/de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa/lhas nongs po 'ba'
444b3('dul ba): zhig las spyugs pa las de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa nas/gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha
444b4('dul ba): cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/rang rang gi srib mo spangs te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar babyed dga' dgur spyod par bgyid do//de rnams
444b5('dul ba): rtse bar bgyid dga' bar bgyid/dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na/bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so//grong ba dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed pad dA mu/lha rdo thogs lag so//
444b6('dul ba): de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos ro stong bsring nas lag pa g.yas pa rkyang ste ched du brjod pas brjod pa/kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin//kye mA gan
444b7('dul ba): nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yino zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/kye ma gzhon rnams ni phod pa yin no//kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no//
445a1('dul ba): zhes byas pas de rnams shUHzhes bya bar gyur to//de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga'
445a2('dul ba): rgyal srid la dbang bskur to//de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcugo/de yang bu med par shi nas/lag rna rgyal
445a3('dul ba): par gyur to//de yid bu med par shi nas glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to//de yang bu med par shi nas/rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur to//de'i bu gnas 'jog
445a4('dul ba): go'u ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo//go'u ta ma dag rgyal pos khyim gyi bu dang che bo dang yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga skyong grong khyer ser skya'i
445a5('dul ba): gzhir byung ste/de rnams kyis tha ma no shing rta bcu pa dang shing rta brgya pa dang /shing rta dgu bcu pa dang /shing rta khro bo dang /sheng rta rgyal dang /brtan
445a6('dul ba): pa'i shing rta dang /gzhu bcu pa dang /gzhu brgya pa dang /gzhu dgu bcu pa dang /gzhu tshul dang /gzhu bkra dang gzhu brtan no//go'u ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu
445a7('dul ba): gnyis te seng ge 'gram dang sesang ge'i sgra'o//go'u ta ma dag 'dzam bu gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so//go'u
445b1('dul ba): ma dag slong gi'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/zas gtsung dang //zas dkar dang /bre bo zas dang /tshad med zas so//bu mo gtsang ma dang /dkar mo dang /bre mo ma dang /tshang
445b2('dul ba): med ma'o//zas ge tsang la bu gnyis tAM/bcom ldan 'das dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o//zas dkar la bu gnyis te/tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang /shAkya'i rgyal
445b3('dul ba): po bzang ldan no//bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ming chen dang /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o//tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang //lhas
445b4('dul ba): sbyin no//gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab bskrad do//dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can no//bre bo ma'i ni bzang len no//tshad med ma'i dge 'phel//bcom ldan 'das kyi smras
445b5('dul ba): no sgra gcan zin yin te/go'u ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi rgyud/tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcin zin du rdzogs/srid pa'i phreng rgyan chad/skye ba'i 'khor zad ste/da ni
445b6('dul ba): yang srid pa med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugaso//bzhugs nas tshe dang
445b7('dul ba): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu legaso leg so//mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi
446a1('dul ba): sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa/yang khyod log so//mo'u dgal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud
446a2('dul ba): las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang /des na de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang /phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro//dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
446a3('dul ba): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam tshangs shig/zung shig/lhogs shig/
446a4('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rmad las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan/chos dang ldan pa nas/tshangs par spyod pa'i bar
446a5('dul ba): dang ldan pa yin te/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam zung zhing klog pa'i rog so//
446a6('dul ba): de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/rje suM yi rangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis kyi la mgo bos
446a7('dul ba): phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dongango //de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/'byor pa dang /
446b1('dul ba): rgyus pa dang /bdo ba dang /l-i legs pa skye bau dang mo mang pos dang ba/'thab pa dang /'thab mo dang rjod pa dang /'gyod pa dang /tshom rkun med cing nad rab tu
446b2('dul ba): zhozhi bar gyur pa/'bras dang //bA ram shing gi phreng ba dang /ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu cig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyed par byed do//grong
446b3('dul ba): khyer lcis bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/'byor pa dang /rgyus pa dang /bde bo dang /la legs pa skye bo dang m+b+hi
446b4('dul ba): mang pos gang baM/'thob pa dang /'thab ma dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyod pa dang /tshim rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/'bras dang /bu mo shing gi
446b5('dul ba): phreng ba dang /ba lang dang /ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal skyeng skyong bar byed do//rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun
446b6('dul ba): myi dam pa gzugs bzang ba dalta na sdug pa mdzes pa/yul gyi bzang mo lus pi ni zhes bya ba yod do//lhas bston na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba long
446b7('dul ba): spyod che ba yongasu bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu la ner gyis mgrin pa zhig gnas pi de'i kun dga' rab me tong
447a1('dul ba): phun sum tshogs bya dang /'bras bu phunA sum tshogs pa dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /byA sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra bya/
447a2('dul ba): dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtse mo nyim su myong bar byed do//lum pa ni mi de mthong
447a3('dul ba): nas 'dod pa smos te/des smras pa/lha kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/rgyal pos spras pa/kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin ne ji ltar
447a4('dul ba): sbyin/gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na/khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang pa gzhan zhig bya'o//de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum bi na'i tshad
447a5('dul ba): du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to//rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po
447a6('dul ba): nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor lo bsgyur ba skye bar 'gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do//rgyal po legs par rab sad la yun ring po nas kye
447a7('dul ba): ma'o bdag ni seng ge'i 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar
447b1('dul ba): byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na bcen mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs
447b2('dul ba): bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yan lago dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcaso//btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo
447b3('dul ba): 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam 'on te las sna tshogs pa
447b4('dul ba): sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin sku mo//de'i bcas pa'i btsos ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig rgya cher byas nas/bu mo 'di'i ming cir gangags shes ming 'dogs par
447b5('dul ba): byed do//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang /tshong 'dus dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum rnam su gleng ba kha gcig
447b6('dul ba): gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na legs te sngon gyi las kyis rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o//gzhan dag gi
447b7('dul ba): mchid nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi 'o na ci zhe na las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lagaso zhes mchi lags pas de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdag so zhes
448a1('dul ba): de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btag so//bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma mya brgyud la rjesu gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
448a2('dul ba): du'o//de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa mtshan phuni sum tshogs pa du ma ldan pa'i bu zhig bca' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
448a3('dul ba): rgyal por 'gyur zhes bstan to//yang de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa khA
448a4('dul ba): dag bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig bcos//de btsas pa na grong khyer de dge thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin/
448a5('dul ba): du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nuso//de'i bcos pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags shes ming
448a6('dul ba): 'dogs par byed do//blon po rnams kyis smras po/sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags zhes btag
448a7('dul ba): so//de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang /de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsal
448b1('dul ba): bar 'gyur te/de ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to//rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la pho nya ba tAng ste/bdag la
448b2('dul ba): bu mo gnyis shig bcas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dang /sgyu 'phrul chen po lags te/de la cig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu gcig btsa' bar 'gyur
448b3('dul ba): zhing de ni stobs kyis 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//zhes lung bstan to//cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu
448b4('dul ba): zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan gyis 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/
448b5('dul ba): seng ge'i 'gram gyis slar snying pa gnyis ka yong gzhonu la dgo sa mod kyis/'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis cig la bzhag par mi bya bas/gang la skyes bu chen
448b6('dul ba): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /de yang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhes lung bstan par dwe ro shig
448b7('dul ba): 'dod do//cig shes kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o//des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o//de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba smra bseng zhes bya ba ri khyod pa dag
449a1('dul ba): cig yod nas/shAkya rnams 'dus te/rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/lha skya bsaMng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis
449a2('dul ba): grogs mdzad du gsol/des smras pa/shes ldan dag kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so//lha gzhonu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/
449a3('dul ba): dam cig bca' ste/gal te gzhon nu ji ltar 'dod pa'i dam pa cig blangs pa de sbyin pa lta na gting //de rnams kyis smras pa/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal
449a4('dul ba): bar bgyi'o//rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/des ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste/rmeg bto'o///
449a5('dul ba): de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste/rmeg bta' lags pas/bdag
449a6('dul ba): cag glo ba dga' na/gzho nu mchog ci bzheng gsungs shig dbul lo//shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrimasu bcas pa sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma
449a7('dul ba): gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so//lha ci khrims dral lam/des smras pa/lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi dral ba mi bya na/'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa cig/
449b1('dul ba): skyo ba ni mnyam pa lngas chun ma blangs pa yin//lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/de nas sod ge'i 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la po ny+tsa btang nas/kho bos
449b2('dul ba): tshogs la brtags zin gyis/bu mo gshos kyang skri shig/des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bsgri ste/gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangaso//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig
449b3('dul ba): nA/rgyal po sdeng ge'i 'gram shi nas/ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa
449b4('dul ba): skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba/'thub pa dang /'thab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang /'bras dang /bu ram shing gi
449b5('dul ba): phreng ba dang /bA lad dang mu he phun sum tshogasdu pa na bu cig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do//de dus gzhan zhig na/btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen
449b6('dul ba): mi dang /lhan cig lteng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/rol mi sa rtse bar bye /dgo' bar byed de/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//'di ni chos
449b7('dul ba): nyid yin te/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten pa las gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mo rje de/rogs la gzigs pa
450a1('dul ba): dang yul la gzigs pa dang //dus la gzigs pa dang /rgyud la gzigs pa dang /bud med gzigs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'
450a2('dul ba): rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad tsa nA/byang chub sems dpa' dga'i ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sem
450a3('dul ba): dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba lan snyam na/bram ze'i rigs sam rgyal rigs kyi rigasu yin la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs
450a4('dul ba): btsun par bkur res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/da lta ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems
450a5('dul ba): dpa' rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blang so zhes bzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigasu nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o//snyam
450a6('dul ba): mo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
450a7('dul ba): rnams ni chos bshed pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams
450b1('dul ba): rgyurgyag dkyus sA pA la gzugs byar madz+nyA ts+tshanA/byang chub sems dpa' dudul ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni khyod sgyum du ts+tsha swAd+ha/byang chub sems dap+taSh+Tarnams/
450b2('dul ba): ji lta buM zhig tu nying mtshan su sbyar ba sku na brusgra dang du la dang ma hU~M thun su rgyunas pa sgra snyam pa brgya 'dri ba mtha' ma
450b3('dul ba): bomed pa dbus pa'i sgra bya gnas pa'i yul gang yin par gzigs nas/'dusnyam du dgo ba tu dbus ky-i tshul 'di na bu rum shing gi phyung dang //'bras dang /
450b4('dul ba): drung /ma ha~M phun sum chogs pa slong me pra brgya 'du ba mtha' mkhyab kyi skye ba meng pa dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis/ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub
450b5('dul ba): sems dpa' yul mtha' ma blob rnamasu nying mtshoms sbyor ba blangs zlos gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gos yul dbusu nyid mchums sbyor snyom//'di
450b6('dul ba): sbyar byang chub sems dpa'athog ma med pa'i dus na spyad par mi 'gyur ba'i las shing bsams pa dang /sas rgyus bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bsha ba 'bras bu
450b7('dul ba): meng po mtshan pas rgya 'dis na/byang chub sems dpa rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par
451a1('dul ba): mdzad ce na/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus cu lta bu zhog
451a2('dul ba): tu 'dzam bu'i gling bu nying mtshams sbyor ba len pa ni skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skyes na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nyung mtshams sbyor ba mi len la mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar
451a3('dul ba): 'grib pa na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no//byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams
451a4('dul ba): sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa ni/yid 'byung bar dkar zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la/blun zhing dbang po rtul bu dang
451a5('dul ba): bag med cing bde ba mang bas/bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//mar 'grim pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/tshe'i snyigs
451a6('dul ba): ma dang /nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /sems can gyi snyigs ma dang /lta ba'i snyigs ma drung /dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas/bdag la gzhan dag
451a7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangaso//zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyamo//'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
451b1('dul ba): thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsngags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/
451b2('dul ba): rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/byang chub sems
451b3('dul ba): dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam nA rigs gang
451b4('dul ba): zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang /pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/shAkya'i rigs rgyud
451b5('dul ba): 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing /mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste/spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis/ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa
451b6('dul ba): las nying mtshams sbyor ba blang so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gos rgyal po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang so snyam mo//'di ltar byang chub
451b7('dul ba): sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa/'bros
452a1('dul ba): bu med pa ma yin pas/rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la bzegs par mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud
452a2('dul ba): med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med
452a3('dul ba): ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba lan snyam na/bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/tshul dang ldan pa/rigs dang ldan pa/rgod bag
452a4('dul ba): can ma yin la/rigs 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang /byang
452a5('dul ba): chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur rum du 'dzin nus pa dang /rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs ni/'di snyam du dgongs te/sgyu 'phrul tshon
452a6('dul ba): me 'di ni ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang /tshul dang ldan pa dang /rgod bag can ma yin pa dang /rigs
452a7('dul ba): 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang /rang gi de na yang mi nyams pa 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs
452b1('dul ba): rgyas rnams la/kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang
452b2('dul ba): ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangaso zhes 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las
452b3('dul ba): byis shing bsngags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
452b4('dul ba): bud med la gzigs par mjed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la lan gsum du bsgrags pa grogs po dag dga'
452b5('dul ba): ldan gyi ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung ma dmo pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la/de'i bur gyur te bdud rtsi
452b6('dul ba): rtogs par byas/khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbusu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
452b7('dul ba): dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to//byang chub sems dpo' mkhyen par mdzod cig/da ltar 'jig rten ni
453a1('dul ba): sdig pas gos pa/skye dgu ma rung ba'i bsam pa can 'dzum bu gling na rtog ge drug dang /rjesu sgrogs pa drug dang /snyoms par 'jug pa drug gi
453a2('dul ba): dkrugs pa lag so//de la rtog ge pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'od srung rdzogs byed dang /kun tu rgya gnag lhas kyi bu dang /smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal
453a3('dul ba): pa can dang /mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang /ka ta'i bu nog can dang /gAcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o//rje su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bram ze rgyus rgal
453a4('dul ba): dang bram ze rnas rdeg dang /bram ze bzang ldan dang /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang /bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang /bram ze dmar po'o//snyoms par 'jug pa drug
453a5('dul ba): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang /sgyu rtsal shes kyi shu ring 'phur dang /kun tu rgyu legs bzang dang /bram ze'i khye'u rgyal dang /drang skyong ma bcings
453a6('dul ba): pa dang /lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can no//'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing //
453a7('dul ba): bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/chos de bdag cag gis thos nas/ci nas kyang
453b1('dul ba): bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang /bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyid par sems lagra so//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dbus dga'/
453b2('dul ba): ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras//grogs po dag de'i phyir rol me'i tshe byad thams cad brdungs shig/dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha
453b3('dul ba): byud thams cad brdungs pa dang /byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/grogs po dag 'di la sgra lhag par gang che/bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lagaso//
453b4('dul ba): grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgra rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te/gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang /rjes su
453b5('dul ba): sgrogs pa drug dang snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas/bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/bdud rtsis 'gro bar bya'o//mi rtag pa'i dung bus par bya'o//stong pa nyid
453b6('dul ba): kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o//bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o zhes smos nas tshig su btsad de smras pa/seng ge gcig gis gcan zan tshogs ni du ma 'joms//
453b7('dul ba): rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig/brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms//nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel//grogs po dag khyed
454a1('dul ba): cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dngasu kyu drang khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig/de lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
454a2('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhum su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyi ma lo bdag
454a3('dul ba): gIs de la gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas/lho rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs
454a4('dul ba): shing lhums kyang gtsang bar bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug
454a5('dul ba): lnga lan gsum du bsgrags nas/nam gyi gung thun la glang po cher bstan te/btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhum su zhugaso//smras pa/'gro ba yongasu bskyab
454a6('dul ba): phyir dam bzhes nas//lha rnams la bsgo de nas shi 'phos te//nang pa sprin rum nyi ma gser 'char ltar//de ni bai ram shing de'i lhums zhug so//'od ltar
454a7('dul ba): smyo 'phrul chen po'i rmi lam bzhi rmis pa/glang po che dam pa dkar po mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi dum dral nas zhugs pa dang /steng gi na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
454b1('dul ba): ri brag chen po la 'jog pa dang /bdag la skye bo'i tshogs chen po phyag byed pa'o//des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang /rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes
454b2('dul ba): ldan dag rmi lam gsod mkhan dang /mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khug shig/de dag gis rmi la mo gsod mkhan dang /mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams
454b3('dul ba): bkug pa dang /de nas rgyal pos de rnams la rmi lam bskyed pa las/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha bstan chos las ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar nas/sras
454b4('dul ba): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por
454b5('dul ba): 'gyuraro//gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/de bzhin gshegs
454b6('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyuraro//bar sdom la/'chi 'pho lha dang rin po che//zur
454b7('dul ba): brgyad dub dang brtul zhugs brtan//chos nyid kyis gang gi sa tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ros nas shi 'phos te/yum gyi lhum su zhugs pa de'i
455a1('dul ba): chos chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi
455a2('dul ba): mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tsha ba/'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyi snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang /de'i tshe snang ba
455a3('dul ba): ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to//der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba las/de rnams snang ba des sems can cig
455a4('dul ba): bris gcig mthong nas/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yong 'dir skyes//shes ldan dgu sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so//zhes bya bar shes so//chos
455a5('dul ba): nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhomasu zhugs pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi 'om mi ma yin pa sus
455a6('dul ba): kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar/lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srung mar 'jog pa ni lag naM ral gri dang /lag na mdung dang /lago na mdung thung dang /lag na mda' bo che'o//
455a7('dul ba): chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa ni mdzod kyi nang du rdzas gzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /sha ma'i dri ma dang /
455b1('dul ba): ga blo dri ma dang /mo gtsang ba gang+gA yung rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma skrag s+ho//dpoper na nor bu rin po cho ka shrI'i rus kyis mi gos pa dang /ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin b+hU/
455b2('dul ba): ches mo gos pa de bzhin du gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na/mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /sha'i
455b3('dul ba): dri ma dang /khrag gi dri ma dang /mi gtsang po gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbag so//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums
455b4('dul ba): na bzhugs bu de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongasu rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo //dper na bai DU zur brgyad pa bzang po rigs dang ldan pa/dang ba gsal
455b5('dul ba): badri ma mod pa tshon skud s+t+rai lU/sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang /le brgan la brgyas la de skyes bu mig dang ldan pa su mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o//
455b6('dul ba): 'di ni nor du'o//srud po 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin zhes shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bocom ldan 'dres gang gi tshe yum gyi l+h+wam san
455b7('dul ba): bzhugs pa de'iyum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs por bzhugs pa mthong ngo //ches nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems
456a1('dul ba): dpa' btsom ldan 'das yum b+hi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/de'i yum 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas lus ngal ba
456a2('dul ba): 'am lus dub par 'gyur ba med do//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/yum de phan
456a3('dul ba): chung ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog ge cod pa spangs te/srog gcod pa las slar ldog go/ma
456a4('dul ba): byin par len pa dang mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /sbyar ba'i chang dang 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/sbyar ba'i
456a5('dul ba): tshong dang /'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed//srog mi gcod dang ma byin mI len dang //brdzun du mi spro chang la mi
456a6('dul ba): brkam dang //'khrig pa'i mtshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di//'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin//mos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan
456a7('dul ba): 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa medo//nyon mongs rnams la chags par mi
456b1('dul ba): 'gyur zhing //de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la//de yul 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi//skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtod pa med//sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa
456b2('dul ba): skyes pa//kye ma bdag gos rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung snyam nas/des rgyal po zas gtsang lo smras pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la
456b3('dul ba): smras pa/ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skye//mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa
456b4('dul ba): zhig paltam por 'gyur te/de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//rgyal pos smras pa/gal te 'di la mtsho chen
456b5('dul ba): po'i chu mi blud na cir 'gyur/sras yan lag ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyu ro//rgyal pos smras pa/nga ming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan log ma tshang bar bya ba
456b6('dul ba): 'am/de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun tu rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas bsgo ba dang /des de steng gi khang
456b7('dul ba): bzangs kyi gzhan 'dug pa la rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bstan tu chu blud po dang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to//gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/
457a1('dul ba): kye mya btson thams cad thar bar bya'o snyam pa dang /rgyal pos btson thams cad thar bar byas nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur
457a2('dul ba): to//gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/kye ma sbyin pa dog sbyin bsod nams dag bya'o snyam pa dang /rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin bsod nams dag byas nas/de'i
457a3('dul ba): 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to//gzhon yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/kye ma bdag bskyed mos tshal blta'o snyam pa dang /rgyal pos bskyed mos
457a4('dul ba): tshal bston nas/de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to//gzhon yang de'i 'dod pa skyes po/kye ma bdag bskyed mos tshal du 'dug par bya'o snyam pa
457a5('dul ba): dang /rgyal po legs par rab mad la lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal yod nas/de la rgyal po zas gtsang bos spring ba/khyod kyi bu mo bskyed mos tshal
457a6('dul ba): du 'gro bar 'dod kyis bskyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byos shig/de'i zho shos 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag bskyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byos shig/de rnams
457a7('dul ba): kyis bskyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byaso//de nas 'khor rnams dang lhan cig 'dong //de nas des lum bi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa no shing mya ngan 'tshong me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhig
457b1('dul ba): mthong ste/de bltam par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug pa dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pas
457b2('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bskor na bltam mi phod kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/des rlung dang char drag cig sprul nas des skye bo'i tsho gas de kun tu broso//
457b3('dul ba): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du bsdad pa dang /des bltam par
457b4('dul ba): brtsamaso//byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa dang /brgya byin gyis ldogs pa'i sleb mos bzung //de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/brgya byin
457b5('dul ba): 'di bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blang so zhes dregs par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas/bdag nyid rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
457b6('dul ba): 'drar bar 'gyur to//byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ko'u shi ka/thong shig thong shig/phar song shog/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa'i
457b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur ces bya ba nas/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes//shes ldan dag sems can
458a1('dul ba): gzhan yang 'dir skye so//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o////'dul ba bzhi//bam po gya gnyis pa//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub
458a2('dul ba): sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa na ral gri shu bes nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /sha ma'i dri ma dang /khrag gi dri ma dang /
458a3('dul ba): mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis mgo so//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa/de'i tshe
458a4('dul ba): de'i yum mi 'dug ma nyal te 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltam par byed do//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la sus kyang ma
458a5('dul ba): bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom po bdun bdun 'dor zhing tshig tu yang gsung la/'di ni shAr phyogs yin te mya ngan las 'das pa'i thog myur 'gro bar
458a6('dul ba): bya'o//'di ni lho phyogs yin te/'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnasu gyur par bya'o//'di ni nub phyogs yin te/nga'i skyo ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro//'di ni byang
458a7('dul ba): phyogs yin te srid pa'i mtsho las rgal bar bya'o//de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po dang rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to//chos nyid kyis byang chub
458b1('dul ba): sems dpa' bltam pa'i myod la bar sang las chu bsil ba cig dang /rgyu dron mo cig skye/chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa'
458b2('dul ba): khrus mdzad do//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'bab par 'gyur te/de la de'i yum chus chu'i
458b3('dul ba): bya ba byed do//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la/ltos par snang las lha'i ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /a ka ru
458b4('dul ba): phye mo dang /rgya spos kyi phye mo dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /ta ma la'i mdab mas 'thor ro//lha'i me tog man da ra bis kyang /'thor ro//lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra
458b5('dul ba): 'byin no//gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed//bar sdom la/bltam dang bzhengs dang gom pa bdun//chu rgyun gnyis dang chu mig lha//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom
458b6('dul ba): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe/rgyal po bzhi yang bur bcas te/mnyan yod du rtsos kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu bcas pa ni de 'di snyam du sems
458b7('dul ba): te/bdag gi bu btsas pa na/yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas do bas na 'di'i ming gisal rgyal zhes bya bar gdog so zhes btag so//rgyal po khab kyi grong
459a1('dul ba): khyer na rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu bcas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu bcas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing
459a2('dul ba): gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdag so zhes btag so//ko'u sha ma bi ni rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam
459a3('dul ba): du sems te/bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang ba 'gyur pas 'di'i ming shar pa zhes bya bar gdag so zhes btag so//grong khyer 'phags
459a4('dul ba): rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsos pa na/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu bcas pa na 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba lta bur gyur pas 'di'i ming
459a5('dul ba): rab snang zhes bya bar ga gso zhes btags te/de ni de lta ma yin no//'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin//ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon
459a6('dul ba): mongs med ces bya ba 'jig pa la mkhas pa 'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/de'i tshe bo ni mos byin zhes bya'o//des de la dus du su 'jig pa'i gtam dang /
459a7('dul ba): 'chags pa'i gtam smras pas/de de las rab tu byung //byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa no 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal
459b1('dul ba): bar gyur to//de'i tshe mis byin phug tu zhugs te/bsam gtan byed pa na/des snang ba de mthong nas/nyon mongs myed la smras pa/mkhan po 'dir ni nyi mu thams cad
459b2('dul ba): dag/cig car 'byung bar byur+ya ta ma tsi//'di ltar ri ni phug btsos pa//'di ni dzod kyis gsal bar gyur//nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun tu
459b3('dul ba): rno/bu cig snang ba 'di dag ni//yan lag rnyog na 'di bsel bas//nges par thub pa de yi 'od//byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ni//nges par lhums nas bltam
459b4('dul ba): gyur la//bltam nas sems dpa' chen po de'i//'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni//dri ma med pa 'di dag gis//'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas//mis byin gyis smras
459b5('dul ba): pa/mkhan po bdag byang chub sems dpa' ltar mchi'o//des smras pa/bu da lta byang chub sems dpa' dbang che ba dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor cing bzhug pa
459b6('dul ba): pas grung yang bdag cag gis skyabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod do//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i bzhir byon pa nas/de'i ming 'dogs
459b7('dul ba): pa de'i tshe/bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'dongo //gang gi nyi ma kho na la byang chub semamo dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de nyid kyi nyi ma kho na lo rgyal po zas gtsang gi rim
460a1('dul ba): gri ba rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang /rimya gr-i pa rnams las 'dun ma la sogs te lnga brgya bcaso//khan glang mo lnga brgya dang /
460a2('dul ba): rta rgod ma lnga brgya la yang te'u 'brangaso//gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snangango //khams kyis rgyal phrin rnams kyis kyang dpya phul te blon po rnams kyis rgyal po
460a3('dul ba): zas gtsang la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /rgyal pos bsams pa bdag gi bu btsas pa na bdag don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad yongasu rdzogs par
460a4('dul ba): gyur pas/gzhon nu'i ming dran thams cad grub pa zhes gdag so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/'di lta ste/don thams cad
460a5('dul ba): grub pa zhes bya'o//khrong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnaso//shAkya rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la
460a6('dul ba): khye'u 'am bu mo bcas pa gang yon pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du bzhugs pa'i phyir khrid pa yin pas/rgyal pos blon blo rnams la
460a7('dul ba): bsgo ba/shes ldan dag deng la gzho nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug shig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po
460b1('dul ba): zas gtsad la mnyan nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa na/ser
460b2('dul ba): skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po gzu lums can rtsub pa/btsam pa med pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na/thub pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams
460b3('dul ba): kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang /rgyal po zlas gtsang gis bsams pa/ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya 'di rnams ni gtum po gzu lams can btsam pa med pa yin na gzhonu
460b4('dul ba): nang du zhugs pa ni thub pa bzhin du gnas pas gzho nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba gdag so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis pa btags pa 'di lta ste/
460b5('dul ba): shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gno sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gnas dud nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang/gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems
460b6('dul ba): dpa'i gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong //mthong nas kyang phyir byung nis lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs bya skye bo'i tshogs kyis
460b7('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/lha gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'o zha'as gnyis la gtugs lagaso//rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/shes
461a1('dul ba): ldan dag lhas kyang bzho nu'i rkang pa gnyis lnga btugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas de bas na gzhonu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdag so//zhes//
461a2('dul ba): de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gsum pa btags pa/'di lta ste/lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis
461a3('dul ba): ma mo rnams la gtang nas/ma ma khyod kyis gzho nu dus dus su sku mnyi byas shi ka/dus dus su khrus byos shig/dus dus su zan byen cig/dus dus su
461a4('dul ba): yang dge ba'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig/mo me dga' ba'i log pa gnyis kyi de rlangs nas dus dus su bsku mahe byed/dus dus su khrus byed/dus dus
461a5('dul ba): su zan byin/dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do//yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shing rgyan
461a6('dul ba): thams cad kyis brgyan nas yang zas gtsang la phul ba dang /rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te pang du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba bskyed//
461a7('dul ba): chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la/yab dang yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pos/
461b1('dul ba): shes ldan dag ji ga gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyi su 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni ma yin te/gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor lo sgyur
461b2('dul ba): ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/'di lta
461b3('dul ba): ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rtswa rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa ni blon
461b4('dul ba): bo rin po che/bu dpa' ba rtul phod ba yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod
461b5('dul ba): bar bsngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa de nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang 'thun pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro//gal te skra dang kha spu bregs
461b6('dul ba): nas gos ngur smrig dgos te/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu phyung na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
