461b7('dul ba): rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtse gnyis dang ldan nam/shos ldan dag gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu
462a1('dul ba): chen po'i 'gro ba gnyisu 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du rnam par grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar skyes bu chen
462a2('dul ba): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni gang dag yin/lha gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lagaso//zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par
462a3('dul ba): 'bab ste/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lagaso//zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis las 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa lte ba dang mu
462a4('dul ba): khyud du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa mchis te/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lag so//lha gzhon nu ni sor mo ring
462a5('dul ba): ba dang /zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang /de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags so//phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni/
462a6('dul ba): dper na shing bal gyi mdab ma 'am ras bal gyi mdab ma bzhi no//lha 'di ni gzho nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshon lagaso//lha gzho nu ni phyag dang zhabs dra bas
462a7('dul ba): 'brel pa lags te/de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa ni/dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i bzhin no//lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen
462b1('dul ba): po'i mtshan lags//lha gzhonu ni zhabs long ma'i tshogs mi mngon pa dang /byon pa ri dgas a na ya ya~M lnga bu dang spu ma dud pa dang /sku bzhengs bzhin du ma bdun
462b2('dul ba): par phyug pus mos lta nga gnyis sgribs shing reg pa ste/lU 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan legs//lha gzhon nu 'di ni mngoms kyi smrang
462b3('dul ba): sbub sa nub pa lags te/de'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbubasu nub pa ni/dper ni glang po cang shes kyi 'am/rta cang shes byung ba dag gi bzhino//lha 'di ni gzho nu'i skyes
462b4('dul ba): bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lag so//lha gzhin nu'i sku ro stod sU re re nas skye zhing de'i sru la s+phu re re nas skye ba yang mthing kha la g.yas phyog su 'khyil bar
462b5('dul ba): spyi lags /lha 'di ni gzho nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lpags//lha gzho nu'i mdog gsor 'dra ba dang 'odra 'dom gang bya dang /lhogs pa
462b6('dul ba): slob cing mdog gsar 'phra ba legs te/lkugs pa slob pa nyin kyispyi rdul dang dri mas sbrul mi gos pa ste/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i
462b7('dul ba): mtshan lagaso//lha gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mtho ba ste/sku bdun mtho bo 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang zhabs gnyis dang /dpung mgo gnyis dang lhag po lags te/lha
463a1('dul ba): 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lag so//lha gzhon nu'i ni thal gong rgyas pa dang /sgra ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /
463a2('dul ba): srudrung zhing kho lag che ba dang /dpung mgo shin tu bzlum pa dang /tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang /tshoms mnyam pa dang tshems thugs bzang ba dang /mcheb
463a3('dul ba): shin tu dkar ba dang /'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
463a4('dul ba): lag so//lha gzhon nu ni ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang /srab pa nyid kyi phyir/lcogs zhal nas byung bas skra mchims nas
463a5('dul ba): bzung ste/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//lha gzhon
463a6('dul ba): nu'i ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang kA la bing ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang /ji'i dbyangs can lags te/lha 'di ni gzho nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
463a7('dul ba): lag so//lha gzhon ni spyan mthon thing la/ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang /dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yasu 'khyil ba lags
463b1('dul ba): te/lha 'di ni gzho nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lagaso//lha 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyi su 'gyur gyi/gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes
463b2('dul ba): bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgo rnam par grags par 'gyuraro//zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lagaso//gal te gzhonu rab tu ma
463b3('dul ba): byung bar gyur na/'khor lo sbyor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams nas
463b4('dul ba): zhig bdun lon pa dang /de sbyin pa'i yum nongs par 'gyur te/nongs ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par las skye bar 'gyur ro//chos nyid kyis byang
463b5('dul ba): R+Ya ba sems dpa' shAkya thub po ni gzugs babrang ba mdzes pa palpa rna sAg pa mo'i kha dog las 'das pa l+yA'i kha dog ma thob pa skeso pa dang /shud med rnams kyi so
463b6('dul ba): bltas pa ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser la mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan brdungs po/la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du
463b7('dul ba): bzhag na shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mi'i kha dog las
464a1('dul ba): 'das shing //lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang /yid
464a2('dul ba): du 'ong bar 'gyur te/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos nga phrag pa nas phrag par sbed pa ni dper na ston ka'i pad+ma skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing /yid du 'ong bas/skye tshe'i/
464a3('dul ba): tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no//bar sdom la/mig mi 'dzums dang rnam smin dang //gsung snyan 'jebs pa mkhas
464a4('dul ba): pa bsdus//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzums par gzugs rnam par lta ste/de sbyin mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum cu rtsa
464a5('dul ba): gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin no//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas des na de
464a6('dul ba): nyin mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu gzig so//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i med nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /gsung
464a7('dul ba): snyan pa dang /gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/dper na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /skad snyan pa dang /yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
464b1('dul ba): bltam pa'i mong nas gsung snyan cing 'jobs pa dang /gsung snyan pa dang /gsung yid du 'ong ba yin//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas mkhas
464b2('dul ba): pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa rgyud las 'byung ba'i shes rab dpyod pa dang ldan pa yin te/de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i ched la 'drug nas/don zab mo'i tshig
464b3('dul ba): dang yi ge dag shes rab kyis so sor 'gyed do//de nas mis byin gyis smras pa/mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ser skya'i gzhir byon nas/de'i mtshan yang gsum
464b4('dul ba): btags kyis/da ni byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba'i phyir bzhu //de bzhin du bya'o zhes de gnyis chas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthus rdzu 'phrul nyams
464b5('dul ba): nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zhugs nas/rgyal po zas gtsang gi khyimau gyi sgor song ba dang /drang srong nyon mongs med kyis sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa/
464b6('dul ba): kye nang rje song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong nyan mongs med lha zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas/sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig/de song nas rgyal po la rig
464b7('dul ba): bar byas pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan nyon mongs med la su zhig 'gog nang du zhugs shig/de zhugs pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkur sti sngon du/
465a1('dul ba): 'gro ba'i mchod yon sbreng bas mchod nas/stan bstabs te 'dug pa dang /rgyal po zas btsang gis pa shes pa'i gtam gyis kun tu dga'
465a2('dul ba): bar byas nas sbas pa//drang srong chen po dgas pa ci zhig la 'ongs/des smras pa/rgyal chen bdag cag 'dir mchis pa//khyod kyi sras ni mthong bar 'tshal//'jig
465a3('dul ba): rten gtso bo rnams 'dren pa//thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal//rgyal pos skyes za/gal te de lta na gzhon nu nyal gyis ma sad kyi bar du re shig skad cig sdod cig/
465a4('dul ba): des smras pa/lha mnal log pa nyid blta'o//de bzhin gyis shig/de ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' mig ma btsums shing mi 'dzums par gzugs la blta ba
465a5('dul ba): mthong nas/des tshigasu bcad de smras pa/rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni//mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar//dgos pa don gnyer rnams kyi gnyid//mig la yun
465a6('dul ba): ring me gnaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod kyi ma mas pang du blangs nas/drang srong la byin pa dang //drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis
465a7('dul ba): kyis blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te/smras pa/lha gzhonu bram ze mtshan mkhan ltas mkhan gyi bra mo ze rnams la bsten legs sam/rgyal pos smras pa/
465b1('dul ba): bstan to//de rnams kyis ji skad du lung bstan/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro zhes bya ba nas/'jig rten du skra rnam par grags par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
465b2('dul ba): bzhin du'o//de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshig su bcad de smras pa/sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor
465b3('dul ba): lo sgyur mi 'byung //bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni//nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur//mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po//gling bzhi
465b4('dul ba): rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur//thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na//mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur//zhes smras nas bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha'
465b5('dul ba): dang byang chub sems ngaba'i mngon par byang chub pa la brtag pa la zhugs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhis nas khyab nas byung nas/lo drug tu dka' ba
465b6('dul ba): spyod par 'gyur te/de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ngo //bdag ni bar skabs der shi ba'i dus byed par 'i'agyur bar mthong nas/de ni ga mchi mas gang ste/
465b7('dul ba): 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas spangs nas/tshigasu bcad de smras pa/skyes pa bud med rnams kyis gar mthong nas//ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob
466a1('dul ba): 'gyur ba//lus bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas//drang srong chen po ci slad du bzhin gyur//ga las bdag gi gzho nu 'jigs pa la sA//tshe zad
466a2('dul ba): 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grung //de ni myur du logs par bdag la smros//khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar gyur//drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigasu bcud
466a3('dul ba): de smras pa/gal te 'di'i steng du na mkha' lo//rdo rje'i ser drug 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang //thub pa chen po'i skul bu spu ni//nyag ma gcig kyang g.yos par mi nuso//
466a4('dul ba): mtshon rlung gi shubs kyis bdas pa dang //mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzang dang //drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug rnon yang //gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jig mi
466a5('dul ba): 'gyur//thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa//'jigs par nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol//de ni 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms ni//mi dbang 'di
466a6('dul ba): la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung //'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi//gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la//tshangs bcas lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa//mi
466a7('dul ba): dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung //mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni//gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob bdag tu mod//chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang phrad nas ni//
466b1('dul ba): don mi thob par bdag ni 'tsho bar 'gyur//klung dang smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med pa// mchis pas 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang //rab tu nany+dzA ba rol 'gro dang //skyed bang
466b2('dul ba): bsod nams ldan wA rI ma nad bral//drang srong nyin mongs med rgyud nyon mongs pa can gyis bsams pa/byang chub sems dpa'i mthus bdag gi rdzu 'phrul nyams te bangag
466b3('dul ba): rkang gos song na skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang rgyal po 'phya bar 'gyur//snyam du rig nas smras pa/lha khyod yun ring po nas kye ma'o drang srong nyon mengs maud rkang kho nas ser
466b4('dul ba): sgra'i gzhir zhugs par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du dgongs pa skyes pa/baidag gi rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir zhugs te ni rkang kho nas phyir 'byung gis/khyod kyis lam
466b5('dul ba): bstar ba dang /grong khyer byi dor byed du stsol cig/rgyal po zos gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer gyi byi dor dang lom sbyor du chug
466b6('dul ba): la/lam po che dang tshed 'dus dang /bzhi mdo dang sumo mdo rnams dang srong nyon mongs med rlung gis grong khyer sa re sgra'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis khyed cag gis bye
466b7('dul ba): dang byed pa gang yin pa de dge byos shig ces dril sgrogs shig/m+b+ha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gni rdo ba
467a1('dul ba): dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo dang sa bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/shin tu dri zhim po'i bog phor nye bar bzhag/dAr gyi chun 'byung
467a2('dul ba): mang po bcangs/rgyal mtshan dang bya dan bsgreng nas lam po che dang tshong 'dus dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnamasu dril sgrogasu bcug pa/ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya shos
467a3('dul ba): ldan dag nyon cig/drung srong nyon mongs med grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de byos shog/de nas de nyon mongs
467a4('dul ba): pi'i blo dang ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyal po zas gtsang blon po'i tshogs rnam kyis yongasu bskor ba dang /ser skya na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag tu ma rjes bzhin du
467a5('dul ba): 'brang zhing 'byor pa mchog gis grong khyer gyi dbus nas dbus su byung ste/grong khyer ser skya'i sgor byung nos/rgyal po slar bzlog ste ji ltar dga' ba'i spyod lam
467a6('dul ba): gyis song ste/rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin gyi drung du phyin pa dang de de la 'dzegs nas phan tshun nyul zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas phyogs zhig tu
467a7('dul ba): 'dug go/de nas de lam gyis dub pa ngal ba sos te bsam gtan bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul yang bskyed do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong nyon mongs med nad
467b1('dul ba): kyis thebs nas/de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur bya ba ma/'on kyang phyir zhu bar gyur to//de nas mis byin gyis de'i lus kyi
467b2('dul ba): dA nas rnams brtags nas smras pa/mkhan po bdag cog cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni bdud rtsi'i ched dang bdud rtsi'i bcol ba'i phyir lags na/gal te mkhan
467b3('dul ba): pos bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na/bdud rtsi de las bdag cag yang gos shig/des smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u kho bo yang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi'i ched
467b4('dul ba): dang bdud rtsi'i btsal ba'i phyir yin+da na/kho bos kyang bdud rtsi ma gtog so//de lta mod kyi shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzho nu gang yin pa des bdud rtsi 'dri rtogs par
467b5('dul ba): 'gyur zhing bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba tshim par byed par 'gyur gyis de'i drung du rab tu byung shig/khyod rab tu byung nas kyang rigs brjod par mi bya/rus brjod par mi
467b6('dul ba): bya/bram ze'i khye'u brjod par mi bya ste/rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pa zhig 'ba' zhig spyad par bya zhing /bdud rtsi rtog par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o//de nas
467b7('dul ba): khyod kyis bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur zhes smras nas/tshigasu bcad de smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na//shar gyi phyogasu khyod 'dug dang //yang dag sa
468a1('dul ba): rgyus grags ldan pa//rnyed pa r+ya dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur//zhes bya ba smraswA nAs+ya/bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing //mthon po rnams kyi mthu' lku
468a2('dul ba): 'gyur//phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste//gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin//zhes smras te dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur te//de nas mi byin gyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod
468a3('dul ba): pa byas nas bA ra na ser song ste gnas/de de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze'i gsang tshig glog tu 'jug/mis byin gyi rus kau ta ya na yin pas/de'i maung ka t+ya'i
468a4('dul ba): bu kau t+yA'i bu zhes bya bar gyur to//de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa na spyan sngar 'gro bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis kA t+yA'i bu de la gdams
468a5('dul ba): dag phyog nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bango ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur te/de'i ming ni ka t+yA'i bu
468a6('dul ba): chen po ka t+ya'i bu chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//de nas dus gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring po ma lon par ma me'i pang du zhugs nas gser
468a7('dul ba): kyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar po sras pa'i chan gsol da ni/de mams bkan kyang mthub par mang por gsol nas/dbrog par brtsams pa dang /dbrog ma nus nas
468b1('dul ba): ngos rgyal po zas gcung la sbran pa dang /rgyal pos btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrab par brtsams pa dang /ngos kyang ma nus so//de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser stun+tu
468b2('dul ba): gnas pa'i rgyu bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgon de rnams kyis kyang dbrog par ma nus//de nas glang po che lce brgyal gtags pa dang /byang chub sems de pas bsams pa/
468b3('dul ba): rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gis/ma la bdag gis mdzub mo bkug pas gsar gyi gzhong po nas bzung snyam nas des mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa
468b4('dul ba): bzung nus drangs pa dang /glang po che lnga brgya po de dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nuso//rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams
468b5('dul ba): pa/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag sa g.yon paste/gling po tsho lnga brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na/gdon mi za bar lagro pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che snong thub kyis de byas na
468b6('dul ba): gzhan nu'i myong zang ngo tshe snang gi stobyas sam nas gang saso zhes btAg//bar sgom la/khyo'u de rtse mo dag dang na//rig pa khang bzungs drug dang ni//ngang pA mtshon
468b7('dul ba): pa'i byung //dmag bdun mo rnams yin no/ nyid kyis byang chung sems dang shrIH pa 'i la lde brgyad dang ma de'i gleb pon srin tshun tsham mi mams par/
469a1('dul ba): gtad nas/yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas/byang chub sems dpa' la yi ger bris nas phog pa dang /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/'din pa
469a2('dul ba): shes so//de nas des yi ge gnyis dang gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i der byis nas phog pa dang /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/'di dag kyang ngas shes kyis gzhan
469a3('dul ba): ngag smos shig riDa kyi bu go chas smras pa/'jig rten nA ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi gzhan ni bdag gis mi 'tshal to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris
469a4('dul ba): tesrin po go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/yi go 'di'i ming ci yin smros shig/des smras pa ma 'tshal to//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/'jig rten du
469a5('dul ba): gnyis shig byung na yi ge 'di mngon par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor lo sbyar ba'o//na mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/srin bu go cha
469a6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin to/yi ge 'di ni 'jig rten du gnyis sho ga byung na mngon par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' 'am 'khor lo sgyur
469a7('dul ba): ba'i rgyal po'o//byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis glegs la na mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byis pas tshangs pa'i yi ge tshangs pa'i
469b1('dul ba): ga shes bya bar gyur to//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa de'i tshe byang chub snyoms dpa'i nang po bzang len zhes bya b+hur ngos glang po che'i gnya' bar
469b2('dul ba): zhon pa bslabs nas/'phong gi slob dben lhar bcas zhes bya ba des 'khor lnga brgyad ngo //gcod pa slob pa la zhugs pa na bzang lon gyis lhur bcas la smras pa/
469b3('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin du gzhon gzhan dag ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad slobs shig/lha sbyin 'di na gdug pa'i las byed pa yin pa
469b4('dul ba): 'jig rten thams cad la gnod par gyur dang mi rung gis 'di la gnang du bsnun pa ma bstan cig/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la legs par
469b5('dul ba): bslab pas gnas lnga po 'di lta ste/rgyang nas phog pa dang /sgra grags pa ri phog pa dang gnang du phog pa dang /mi 'tsher bar phog pa dang /tshabs che ba dag la
469b6('dul ba): yang byed par gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs kun tu sku grags pa shUkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon zhes bya ba nis 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong
469b7('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o//de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi ma tsi byi rnams kyis glang po che mtsho ni dang ldan pa zhig rnyong nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/rgyal po zis gtsang gi sras mtshan
470a1('dul ba): mkhan rnams kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po rin po che 'di byung gis dong la de kho na la dbul lo snyam
470a2('dul ba): nas de rnams kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che dam pa bzhag
470a3('dul ba): nas sdod pa dang /ma ltos te gdug pa'i las can lhas sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes
470a4('dul ba): twe/de phyag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pa dris pa/glang po che dam pa 'dri su'i yin/de rnams kyis smras pa/gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams
470a5('dul ba): kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ro lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyis tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo//lhas sbyin lhag par
470a6('dul ba): mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/re shig 'khor lo sgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag de la glang po rin po che 'bul la mo zhes smras nas thal lcag gis glang po
470a7('dul ba): che bsad do//ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bos 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/shes ldan dag glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/de rnams kyis
470b1('dul ba): smras pa/lhas sbyin gyis//des bsams pa gdon mi za bar 'dra la lhas sbyin gyis mthu sad kyis ma la bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o//snyam nas 'jug ma
470b2('dul ba): nus bzung ste/dri myi zhim par mi 'gyur bar bya bar mtha' gcig tu bor//ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/glang
470b3('dul ba): po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so//sus bsad lhas sbyin gyis so//mgron rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin na ma logs pa
470b4('dul ba): zhig byaso//phyogs gang du bsade'o ni ra'o//'od sus 'dir khyer te 'ongs/dga' bos//des dgongs pa gdon mi za bar ngo gnyis kyis 'di la mthu sad kyis/ma l+ya ngas
470b5('dul ba): kyang 'di la mthu smad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung ste/ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las ra ba rim pa bdun dang /'obs bdun las bzlas te blo'o//
470b6('dul ba): de ltung bas gshong bad+mod pa glang po che'i gshod glang po che'i gshed zhes bya bar gyur to//der bram+bu ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can rnams kyi su mchod rten brtsigs
470b7('dul ba): pas deng sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa dag phyag byed do//'dir smras pa/lhas sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsang //dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun
471a1('dul ba): du khyed/byang chub sems dpa'i phyag gis bar snang la/rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs//gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/chod pa byed du
471a2('dul ba): 'dong ngo //zhes de rnams kyis phyir byung ba/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kyang gsan nas 'khor lnga brgya dang mchod pa byed du phyir byung //gzhon nu rnams 'bras rje
471a3('dul ba): bzhin du gcod par byed de de rnams kyis shing bcad cing bcad pa rnams kyis 'gyel to//byang chub sems dpa' ni bre'i kho bcod pa bzhin du gcod par mdzad//des
471a4('dul ba): shing bcad cing btsod pa rnams ma 'gyel te/de bzhin du 'dug pa dang gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa stobs
471a5('dul ba): dang ldan zhing gnas lnga la byang che zhes thos na 'di gcod par byed pa yang mi shes pa las na/'di bdag cag pas stobs dang ldan pa ni ma yin te/'di ltar bdag
471a6('dul ba): cag gis shing gang dag bcad pa de thams cad ni 'gyel la/'dis gang dag bcad pa de dag ni de bzhin du 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la mngon
471a7('dul ba): par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/shAkya 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang bzo la byang ba ma shes pas/byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas
471b1('dul ba): shing mthu la yang smod par 'gyur gyis de la thabs shig ba sham par bya'o snyam nas/des de dang 'thun pa'i rlung zhig btang bas des shing de dag thams cad choms tshams
471b2('dul ba): zer nas 'gyel te/shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyeso//de rnams tshabs byed pa la zhugs te/de rnams kyis de na 'ben du lcags kyi tA la bdun
471b3('dul ba): dang rnga dang phag btsugaso//lhas sbyin gyis rkang thubs byas te/lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang /lcags kyi shing rta la gcig phig so//dga' bos ni gnyis pa'o//byang chub
471b4('dul ba): sems dpas lcags mda' 'phyangs pa dang /shing rta lo bdun dang rnga dang phrag las thal nas lcags kyis mda' de la sa la zug pa/klus byung ba dang /tshu ro phun sum tshogs
471b5('dul ba): pa zhig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 'thung bar brtsam so//bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod rten brtsigs te/dang sang du yang dge slong
471b6('dul ba): mchod rten la phyag 'tshol bA dag phyag byed do//gzho nu rnams shing rter zhugs nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs pa dang /mtshan mkhan grong khyer nas phyir byung ba de rnams
471b7('dul ba): kyis gzhonu shAkya thub pa shing rta ro zhugs nas nang du zhugs pa la lung bstan pa/gal te 'di lo bcu gnyi su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/gdon mi za bar 'khor lo
472a1('dul ba): sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu mthun rnams kyis lung bstan to zhes thos s+ho//thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu
472a2('dul ba): bskyes te/shAk+Sha rnams bsags nas smras pa/shos ldan dag mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis su r+yA ba~M ts+tsho ma byung bar gyur na/'kho
472a3('dul ba): lo sbyor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa kho bos thos so//gzhon nu 'di gal tI lo bcu gnyis rab tu ma byung ste/'khor lo sgyur bya'i rgyal por gyur na
472a4('dul ba): bdog cag na mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir mchi zhing 'dong gis 'di khyim phub shig/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha gzho nu 'dod pa rnams don du mi
472a5('dul ba): gnyer ro//rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/gzhon nu la bud med thams cad bstan nas 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chung mang blang bar bya'o//de nas khya
472a6('dul ba): cig gis smras pa/lha gzhon nu ni sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan rnams bud med la stsol du stsal la deg la mgu ba skye bar gyur pa de btsun mor blang bar bgyi'o//
472a7('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/de bzhin du gyis shig/blon po rnams kyis rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rin po che sa spras pa'i phung po spung so//de nas rgyal po
472b1('dul ba): zas gtsang gi khyim dang grong khyer phyug dar dang byi dor byed du bcug nas/rgyu skar drang chos grangs dang /yung tsa ma dag btsun te/gdan ya g+hA shab+da sus dgro'i khri ba shams pa
472b2('dul ba): la gzhon mu shAkya thub pa bzhug nas/song ga'i khri dang nye bar rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po spungs te/blon po rnams dang gzhan yang sa ma skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor
472b3('dul ba): bkur ba rnams nang du zhugs so//de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang 'thun pa'i cha byad dang rgyan dang gos gyon nos zhugs po dang /byang chub sems
472b4('dul ba): dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyun de dag de rnams la byin no//shUkyalag na dbyug pa can gyi bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba gzugs dang lang tsho la bab bo//de ma song
472b5('dul ba): nAs shAN+Da lag na dbyug pa can gyis smras pa/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rkyen sbyin gyis skyong shig/des smras pa/yab ci'i skal cag la rgyan ma mchis sam/bu mo
472b6('dul ba): myed pa ni ma yin mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' bud mod gang bzhed pa de bdam+b+ha par mdzad do//yab 'dam yang rung mi 'dam yang rung /de kho na badrug gi sdum thabs lag
472b7('dul ba): so//dbu gal te de ltan shin tu 'gro dgos pas song shig/de nas grags 'dzin man tshad gzhon zhing che lugs bzang ba skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i srid dang mi 'phrog pa/
473a1('dul ba): bud med thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi brjid dang ldan pas nang du zhugs nas spyod lam dul bas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sbyar
473a2('dul ba): 'dug go/byang chub sems dpas rgyun thams cad byin nas sor gdub rgya kho na lus pa byang chub sems dpas de la bstan pa dang /de nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas mchog
473a3('dul ba): tu mnyes pa byas pa des/seng ge'i khri'i skas la 'dzegs nas/byang chub sems dpa'i phyag nas rang gis phyung ngo //blon po rnams dang /ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs
473a4('dul ba): gtso bor bkur ba rnams kyis smras pa/shas ldan dag 'di ni bud med thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa yin te/'dis gzhon nu'i thugs dang bsnyon par nus
473a5('dul ba): pas 'di blang bar bya'o//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang gzhon nu shAkya thub pa'i btsun mor blangs so//chos nyid kyis gang
473a6('dul ba): gri tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba skye bar 'gyur te/de nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye bar 'gyur la/
473a7('dul ba): ji tsam nyi ma ma shar ba de srid du ni/sen mos kyang bcad du rung la nyi ma shar nas ni mtshon gyis kyang mi chod cing mes kyang mi tshig pa zhig ser skya'i gzhi dong lhas bstan
473b1('dul ba): gyis bar na 'bab chu ro hi ka zhes bya ba'i 'gram na skyes te//dus dus su chu brug pas de'i rtsa ba brus nas/rlung gi shugs kyis 'gyel te/lags bzhin du chu bcad de
473b2('dul ba): 'dug go/de nas chus rgyal po lcogs par rab sod kyi yul ni chu med pos mi rung la/zas gtsang gi yang chus ma rung ste/rgyal po logs par rab sad kyis rgyal po zas
473b3('dul ba): gtsang la spring pa/shing dge ba'i snying po 'gyel nas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i gags su gyur te mchis na/gzhon nu mthu dang ldan zhes thos kyis de btang ba'i rigaso//rgyal
473b4('dul ba): po zas gcong gis smras pa/kho bo gzhon nu la bka' mi stsol lo//'dun pas smras pa/lha bdag la gnang ba 'ba' zhig stsol cig dang /ci nas kyang gzhon nu la
473b5('dul ba): rmang bka' ma stsal bzhin du rang nyid gshegs par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o//rgyal po zas gtsang gis khas blangs so//'dun pas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i 'gram du gzhon nu
473b6('dul ba): rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal re re gcugs nas smras pa/gzhon nu dag bskyed mos tshal du 'dong /de rnams so so'i shing rtar zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal du 'ding ba lis
473b7('dul ba): lhas sbyin gyi bskyed mos tshal gyi steng nas dang po zhig 'phur ba de lhas sbyin gyis mdas bsnun nas byang chub sems dpa'i bskyed mos tshal du ltung ba dang /byang chub
474a1('dul ba): sems dpas bzung nas mda' phyung ste/sman gyis blun nas sos so//lhas sbyin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la spring pa/dang pa'i na sdang las bzung /
474a2('dul ba): ba yin no//skur cig/byang chub sems dpas slar spring pa/ngas gang gis tshe kho na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
474a3('dul ba): de kho na'i tshe ngas sems can thams cad bzung ba yin no//der byang chub sems dpa' dang lhas sbyin lhan cig srid pa tha ma la thog mar sha kho na de byung ste/srid pa gzhan
474a4('dul ba): rnams su ni phal mo che zhig kyang byung ngo //legs par rab sad kyis gzhon nu rnams shing dge ba'i snying po dbyung ba'i phyir lhags so zhes thos nas/des skye bo'i tshogs
474a5('dul ba): chen po mngags te/de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang /sgra mthon po grags nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i
474a6('dul ba): sgra chen po sgra mthon po grags pa 'di ci zhig 'dun pas ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/gal te de lta na 'byin du 'dong ngo zhes/
474a7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig dong ba dang /ji tsam na khung nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du byung ba dang //'char kas
474b1('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' thul bar blugs su 'gyur du 'ong zhes mtshan rnon pos rkang du bcad pa las ngos dbugs kyis 'char ka nag por gyur nus/de'i ming 'char k+Sha
474b2('dul ba): nag po 'char ka nag po zhes bya bar gyur to//de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis shing dge ba'i snying po 'byin pa la zhugs pa na/lhas sbyin gyis 'bad pa dang chung zad cig
474b3('dul ba): g.yos so//dga' bos ni chung zad cig bteg go/byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad du steng gi nam mkha' la 'brangs te/dum bu gnyis su chag nas
474b4('dul ba): 'bab chu ro hi ka'i tshu rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcigapha rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig ste bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpas skye bo'i tshogs la gsungs
474b5('dul ba): bya/shes ldan dag shing dge ba'i snying po 'di ni bsil ba'i rang bzhin yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang shu bo dang phol mig byung ba l-i byugs na zhi bar 'gyur
474b6('dul ba): gyis dum bu dus bur byas pa khyer cig/gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi shing rtar zhugs te/bskyed mos tshal gyis nas ser skya'i gzhi re dong nas grong khyer du zhugs
474b7('dul ba): pa na/byang chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs pa la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te 'od mo bdun du rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 'khor lo sgyur ba'o rgyal por 'gyur
475a1('dul ba): ro zhes lung bstan to//shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug pa byang chub sems dpas gzigs/
475a2('dul ba): so//gzigs ma thag tu zhabs kyis mthe bos shing rta mnan nas mi g.yo bar gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpas sa 'tsho mi la brtag par brtsams so//sa
475a3('dul ba): 'tsho mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' la'o byang chub sems dpa' sa 'tsho ma la rtog pa na lcags kyi mnga' bsnams pa de phyar blags so//sa 'tsho ma yang
475a4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na rkang pa'i mthe bos khang bzangs kyi gzhi brtol to//skye bo'i tshogs cheni pos byang chub sems dpa' dang sa 'tshom phan
475a5('dul ba): tshun du rtog par byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pa skyes par gyur pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang smras pa/bud med 'di 'dra ba 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i
475a6('dul ba): thugs dang bsun por nus so//gsum de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas des 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so//chos nyid kyis
475a7('dul ba): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' basbed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe/kha lo sgyur ba la/kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig gzhon pa bzang
475b1('dul ba): snod du shoms shog dang dror da zhugs nas bsnod nas cham sa gnar 'ga' zhos gsung bar 'gyur chu/don byu chub snyoms dpas kha sbyar bam hA/
475b2('dul ba): ba kyai kha lo sgyur ba re shig gzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang /der ngazhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o//lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
475b3('dul ba): kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub po'i lhar mnyan nas/gzhon pa bzang po myur du bo shams te byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der
475b4('dul ba): song nas phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so//lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis lha de de'i dus la bab par
475b5('dul ba): dgongs su gsol/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i shAkya thub pa gzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /byang chub sems
475b6('dul ba): dpa' shAkya thub pas mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po//phyam chur po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba
475b7('dul ba): de'i skra se ba ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/kha lo sgyur ba mi rgas 'khogs
476a1('dul ba): gtugs pa sgur po phyam rku po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas khar ba la brten cing //lus 'drar zhing 'gro la de'i skra ser ba ji ltar
476a2('dul ba): yang mi gzhan dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/lha mau 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o//kha lo sbyar ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin//lha mi 'di ring po mi thogs
476a3('dul ba): pA kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas/de rgas pa zhes bgyi'o//kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rga ba'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/lha yang rga
476a4('dul ba): ba'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so//kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir ro shing rta phyir sbyar cig/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo //'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas
476a5('dul ba): nga rga ba las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bas ma par bya'o//kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/dai ro byang chub
476a6('dul ba): sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du byon nas nga yang rga ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgye sa shing thugs nga ni dgongs so//'di ro smras
476a7('dul ba): pa/dar yal rgas shing skur la mgo skya bo//lag na khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas//'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces//de nas
476b1('dul ba): mi dgyes thugs dran dgongs par mdzod//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa//khru lo sbyar ba ni gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas bskyad
476b2('dul ba): mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam//bskyed mos tshal lo mngon par dga' 'am//sgyu ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/lce gzhin nu bskyed mos tshel+la
476b3('dul ba): gzhir gu shegs pa na/mI rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/sgyer po phyam chu bo ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas khar ba la brten cing lus 'drar zhing mchil
476b4('dul ba): de'i sgra se ba/ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kha lo sgyur ba mi rgas
476b5('dul ba): 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam rgu po ltar gyur kyor can mdun nas khar ba la brten cing lus 'drar zhing 'gro la de'i skra se ba//ji ltar ying mi gzhan
476b6('dul ba): dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//lha 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o//de 'di skad ces gsungs so//kha lo
476b7('dul ba): bsgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsal to//lha mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas
477a1('dul ba): lha de na rgas pa zhes bgyi'o//de 'di skad ces gsungs te/kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/de la
477a2('dul ba): bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//lha yang rga ba'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so//de skad ces gsungs te/kha lo sgyur ba'i de'i phyir
477a3('dul ba): shing rta phyir bsgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo do//'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas/nga rga ba las ma 'das shes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o//lha
477a4('dul ba): gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/de nas da yang rga ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so//de nas rgyal po zas gcod
477a5('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang //bzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs
477a6('dul ba): t+ye gos ngur smrig bgos nas dang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur du 'ang gis/ma la bdag gis gzhan nu la 'dod pa'i
477a7('dul ba): yon tan lnga ldi phal mo che zhig byen la ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems
477b1('dul ba): dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin te/ci nas kyang 'od la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so//'dir smras pa
477b2('dul ba): shAkya thub pa'i lab ste zas gtsang nges/kha lo sgyur las tshig de thos nas ni//de tshe dga' nas bdag 'dor mi gzhug phyir//'dong ba'i yon tan lnga las yang
477b3('dul ba): byin no//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bskyod mos tshul gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha l-i sbyar ba la/kye kha lo sbyar ba re shig
477b4('dul ba): gzhon pa bzang po myur du shams shig dang /de la nga bzhon nus bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur bas/de nas byang chub
477b5('dul ba): semasna dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/kye kha lo sbyar ba re shig+sa gzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shog/de la nga gzhon nas bskyed mos tshil
477b6('dul ba): gyi gzhir gshegs so//lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo byur pas/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas/bzhon pa
477b7('dul ba): bzang po bshams te/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub ga gang na ba der song nos phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad
478a1('dul ba): ces gsol to//lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags na/lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/de nas byang
478a2('dul ba): chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas/bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi
478a3('dul ba): skye bo rba ba rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/kye bo mang po'i mig gis blta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so///sarba mang+ga laM//
